story:
As the ‘information age’ expands so does the need for affordable, secure and reliable high speed internet. Residents and Small Business Owners are increasingly deciding where to live and build their businesses based on the availability of high speed internet.

Access to the Internet has become more of a necessity than a luxury over the past few years and many residents of Central Minnesota do not have access to even basic internet service.

SkyNet Broadband, Inc. was founded to bring "state of the art" wireless high speed internet access to the various unserved and underserved populations in Central Minnesota. With SkyNet’s new technology we will be able to give these residents high speed wireless broadband internet quickly and efficiently and foster development that can address the needs of communities using the most efficient technology available.

We receive a multitude of calls daily from customers in and around our headquarters who are in desperate need of a solution to their high speed internet needs.

Where do you want the internet to go?

This is where we need your help! SkyNet has established a solid foundation and infrastructure for providing service to those in need, but needs your help in raising funds which will enable us to activate additional tower sites in the rural St. Cloud area. With your help we will be in a position to bring access to the internet to a much wider audience more quickly. SkyNet’s solution for the suburban/rural areas allows us to quickly bring a high speed internet solution to the currently unserved or underserved areas.

Access to high-quality broadband helps people to take advantage of online education, telemedicine, or telecommuting. These broadband-intensive applications give users the capability to perform remotely functions traditionally done in person, allowing services to reach more people, for a lower cost, and with a lower impact to the environment.

Broadband access can bring more than economic progress, including:

improved health and safety to all communities online government services saving travel and time telemedicine allowing people to remain in their home as they age online education keeping rural communities vibrant and alive while giving residents access to experts and resources around the world

There remain a significant number of rural communities without even a basic connection to the internet much less one with speeds necessary to take full advantage of what the internet has to offer. With your help, SkyNet will be in a position to bring a much needed service to these unserved and underserved communities much more quickly.

SkyNet Broadband, Inc. plans to execute a radiating pattern of expansion from our headquarters in order to service as many subscribers as quickly as possible while doing so with the least cost and impact to the environment.

SkyNet Mission

To provide consistent delivery of high speed internet with unsurpassed customer service

SkyNet Keys to Success

Provide a culture resulting in staff devoted to delivering on our mission Ensure our customer’s needs are met and maintain a 98% customer retention ratio

SkyNet Objectives

The overall goal of SkyNet Broadband is to become Central Minnesota’s number one Wireless Internet Service Provider (WISP). SkyNet will provide faster internet speeds to its customers at competitive rates and be able to cover areas where limited internet options are available.

SkyNet Broadband will measure its progress towards this goal through these objectives:

1. Consistent delivery of high speed internet with unsurpassed customer service thus encouraging repeat business, high customer satisfaction and retention rates.

2. Be an active and vocal member of the community, and to provide continual re-investment through participation in community activities and financial contributions.

3. Consistent expansion by opening up more tower site locations beginning within the counties of Central Minnesota to reach more and more potential customers.

4. Each expansion phase will focus on one county until we have established an effective coverage area within that county then we will continue into the next phase.

SkyNet Company Summary

SkyNet Broadband, Inc. is a fixed wireless internet services provider (WISP)currently serving St. Cloud, MN residences and businesses. SkyNet utilizes “state of the art” fixed wireless equipment to provide their subscribers with high speed internet. Our fixed wireless internet service is facilitated via broadcasting a radio signal from a tower site location out to a receiving radio located at our subscribers home or business.

SkyNet is able to bring high speed internet to those areas who currently are either not able to receive high speed via traditional in ground copper/fiber or need more reliable service than currently is offered in their area. Most specifically this is found in suburban/rural areas and smaller communities on the outer ring “Last Mile” of urban areas like Minneapolis.

SkyNet’s solution for these areas, utilizes a digital wireless signal sent/broadcast through the air, similar to a cell phone, which allows us to quickly deploy high speed internet to currently unserved or underserved areas.

SkyNet Services

SkyNet Broadband, Inc. offers customers high speed internet access, Digital Voice (VoIP – Voice over Internet Protocol) and Data Backup. SkyNet subscribers can select our services ala carte.

Internet

SkyNet Broadband, Inc. offers fixed wireless broadband internet access. The internet service, which is up to 10x faster than DSL, only needs a roof radio antenna and must live within range of the signal which covers about a 3.5 mile radius from each tower site.

The high-speed technology is based off of the 3.65GHz licensed spectrum. This frequency is not in use by consumer communication devices(i.e. cordless phones, baby monitors etc.) which eliminates any interference compared to the antiquated 900 MHz channels. The network cable from the roof antenna into your home can be connected directly to a device (i.e. laptop) or into a wireless router to enable the signal to be sent wirelessly throughout your home.

Voice

                                               No more long distance charges!

SkyNet Broadband, Inc. offers VoIP – Voice over Internet Protocol. SkyNet VoIP works just like a regular phone with just one key difference – how the call actually gets to you. Instead of using the high priced telephone company’s wiring, SkyNet VoIP routes your phone calls directly to your telephone using your high speed internet connection.

Data

In the near future SkyNet Broadband, Inc. will be adding services designed to meet our subscribers various data needs.

Market Analysis Summary

There continues to be a proliferation of broadband internet connections. With so many people enjoying fast connections at work, they are no longer willing to deal with a dial-up connection at home. With the advent of this “state of the art” 3.65GHz fixed wireless technology being offered by SkyNet in the state of Minnesota, customers can now enjoy a faster connection without having to lay expensive cables since the signal is sent via radio waves.

The targeted market segments consist of residences and businesses located in suburban/rural areas. These areas are unserved or underserved by the traditional and costly in-ground fiber.

SkyNet has put together this Expansion Plan based on the overwhelming requests for internet access from residents/businesses in the neighboring counties from our headquarters.

Market Segmentation

As the ‘information age’ expands so does the need for affordable, secure and reliable high speed internet. Residents and Small Business Owners are increasingly deciding where to live and build their businesses based on the availability of high speed internet.

Our neighboring cities are faced with the challenge of finding a solution to the ever increasing dilemma of their communities having the availability of high speed internet to attract and retain residents and business owners, without raising taxes to try to cover a fiber build-out.

SkyNet has chosen the neighboring cities as target markets due to their increasing need for reliable high speed internet and continued lack of affordable options. The phases have been designed based on current market feedback SkyNet receives daily.

What is Broadband?

In general, the term broadband refers to a network connection with high bandwidth. High-speed Internet connections that allow for transfers of information at rates far faster than those of dial-up modems.

According to the FCC, the term “broadband” means 768 Kbps. According to the Minnesota Broadband Task Force’s definition, the minimum broadband speed should be 10-20 Mbps (download) and 5-10 Mbps (upload) for all residents of Minnesota. These speeds allow communities to grow jobs, improve educational opportunities and have faster access to health care services. As of October 2014 only 78% of Minnesotans had access to these speeds.

For the most part, broadband networks have evolved from two existing networks: cable and telephone. Only in the last few years have new networks been deployed that are specifically built for the purpose and use of broadband. The various types of broadband are outlined below:

Cable. A coaxial connection that uses the cable TV wiring for transmission. DSL (digital subscriber line). A connection that utilizes the copper phone lines as the method of transmission. Fiber-to-the-Home (FTTH). To be classified as FTTH, the access fiber must cross the subscriber’s premises boundary and terminate inside the premises, or on an external wall of the subscriber’s premises, or not more than 2 meters from an external wall of the subscriber’s premises. Mobile wireless. A connection that uses the mobile phone towers for transmission. Satellite connections. A connection via a geosynchronous satellite. Fixed wireless. A connection facilitated via a radio signal from a tower site access point to a subscriber radio on your home or business.

Competition and Buying Patterns

As mentioned in the previous section, DSL, cable, FTTH, mobile wireless and satellite access are the competitors in the broadband market. Consumers buying patterns are based on two factors:

Availability: not every type of broadband connection is available to every consumer. Consumers often pick service providers based on what is available to them.

Convenience: Consumers often pick service providers based on how difficult is it to obtain and/or how long does it take to activate service.

Current Market Feedback

Suburban

SkyNet Broadband, Inc. receives numerous calls each day from local customers who currently utilize existing services such as CenturyLink, Charter, and Comcast. These companies are primarily rooted into densely populated areas because they only utilize hard line technology. One would think they pose a significant competition since they are highly known/advertised companies. However, what SkyNet is hearing on a daily basis is that they are only utilizing these companies because options are limited. The complaints we are hearing repeatedly are:

Their bill is never the same month to month; there are always new fees. Speeds are over promised and under delivered Customer support has been outsourced to foreign countries resulting in a language barrier

SkyNet Broadband, Inc. eliminates these issues because we can provide

Matching or better data speeds at competitive or better rates Consistent internet service Local tech support Fixed bill each month without surprise fees

Rural

Working from home is now possible for everyone! Working from home is now possible for everyone!

SkyNet’s website is designed to allow a potential customer to enter their address and determine if they are within our coverage area. On a daily basis, our website takes in numerous requests for service from outside of our coverage area. These customers have used or are currently using either satellite internet or cellular hotspot technology and are extremely dissatisfied due to the huge limitations and disadvantages. Satellite and Cellular have much of the same issues between them, such as:

Both require the leasing or purchasing of equipment Both have data caps preventing customers from utilizing the full potential of the internet Both have high latency times, which causes additional lag time to access the internet and disrupts VoIP service. Both require contracts Both are very costly when compared to the service being provided.

Simply put, rural areas outside the current coverage area are begging to have a better alternative to their current options. SkyNet’s solution for rural areas can not only address their needs but exceed their expectations.  

Expansion Plan Strategy and Implementation Summary

SkyNet’s strategy is to expand our service into neighboring cities by activating additional sites. SkyNet Broadband, Inc. will facilitate its expansion via a phased approach, expanding tower site by tower site across the targeted areas.

Competitive Edge

SkyNet’s competitive edge lies in our ability to be the first internet service provider to bring high speed wireless internet with fiber optic speeds. The “state of the art” SkyNet equipment is the first of its kind to be deployed in our target market.

Additionally, SkyNet is able to install and activate a broadcast site in a fraction of the time and cost it would take for traditional hard line connections.

Marketing Strategy

SkyNet employs a multi-pronged marketing approach:

Mailings. SkyNet utilizes a targeted mailing campaign to the local residents. Website. SkyNet leverages its website as a comprehensive and efficient source of marketing/sales information. Outside Sales. SkyNet uses an outside sales staff to have direct contact with business owners and in turn with employees. Billboards. SkyNet’s use of billboards will increase name recognition and encourage visits to our website. Public transportation. SkyNet’s use of advertising on public transportation vehicles will increase name recognition and encourage visits to our website. Company Vehicle. All of SkyNet’s vehicles have been wrapped entirely with our logo and company identity which acts as a moving billboard throughout the communities we service. Word of Mouth. Last but not least is the word of mouth results from our extremely satisfied customers.

Sales Strategy

The sales strategy SkyNet employs is based on developing awareness of SkyNet’s service as a viable alternative to cable and DSL within the community. The message we use is “you can receive broadband connections to your computer, wherever it may be, even your laptop on your front lawn, at higher speeds than what your current options provide.”

story:
Short Summary (Note reduced goal! $35,000 Revised to $20K!!)

  • I have been in sales and marketing for 30 years, Several of those years in residential roofing as a general contractor.
  • Split boots lack structural support, take too long to install, and usually don't do any favors for the new appearance expected. With no reasonably priced  visually appealing products on the market, I designed one.
  • Patent was submitted in early December (already had the provisional for a year), First 2 quarters of sales and marketing has been laid out (8 states). Tooling, packaging, printed materials, office expenses and first production run for early sales and demonstration samples funding is needed.
  • All tooling is laid out and ready to mill the molds and start production, just need MONEY!
  • Reaching the funding goal will allow all aspects of the first 180 days of operations to move forward. Marketing to the contractors who will use the product and selling to the distributors who those contractors buy from will be established enough that sales will fund operations after 180 days. First orders and revenue will begin 60-90 days after launch.
  • Client relationship manager software bundled with prospect database access has been sourced. Packaging needs have been sourced, All marketing and sales leads have been laid out for the first 180 days and rough drafts for 4 quarters following,
  • Wages, advertising expenses, necessary printed materials, sales trip expenses are planned. Looking for $20,000toward the total required.  Falling short of this goal will slow the launch but not stop it. In reality it started years ago, this campaign is to fund finishing the roll out but the process was started years ago.
  • A comfortable, 2 quarter roll out is what has been planned but it may instead be an uncomfortable 3 or 4 quarter bumpy roll out with erratic sales and marketing plans, which route is dependent on how much of the funding goal is reached.

What We Need & What You Get

  • $15000 Packaging materials, web site for contractors, website for distributors to order, office supplies, envelopes and printed materials to send to contractors and potential distributors .
  • All contribution promotional perks include catch phrase "if you cant get over it, go around it" with the exploded drawing of the Garrdal 2 piece boot.
  • The goal is to reach $20000 (now)knowing that will get Garrdal over the 180 day hump.
  • All aspects of Garrdal compared to alternatives, favor Garrdal. Price, installation speed, reliability and how it looks. Potential customers, roofers in particular need to know it exists.
  • Mailing information to roofing contractors with websites in larger counties will stimulate activity with contractors asking their local suppliers about availability.
  • Roofing contractors contacting their suppliers will stimulate interest from those suppliers and increase traffic to Garrdal related social media. Most importantly, distributors will react faster as buyers if their customers have asked about a product. Their own research after a customer inquiry will have many trying to stock the product before a Garrdal sales call.
  • Availability through suppliers needs to be established as quickly as possible not only for revenue but to assure interested contractors actually get the chance to use the product sooner rather than later.
  • Contractors will call the branch, the branch will be mailed, a Garrdal representative will call the branch and purchaser, I will visit the branch to demonstrate with a sample.
  • The potential market is over a million units yearly! 600,000 or more roofs with electrical weather head masts are re-shingled each year and another million with roof mounted satellite receivers. Only a portion of the potential market is the target for the first couple of years. Controlled growth is easier to manage. 3000 units monthly is enough to cover expenses.  As volume grows so can staff for more growth.

The Impact

  • For those who haven't shingled a roof, a pipe boot is the flashing that gets pushed over a pipe. It is fastened to the roof and shingled around to weatherproof the perforation.
  • What if there is something that prevents the roofer from pushing the boot over the pipe? Wires? Antennas? Knuckles?
  • When replacing or repairing the roof conventional boots can't go over these obstacles. The solution is a lot of messy caulking and paint and trying to reuse the existing flashing or an expensive split boot with no structural support except a metal clip or zipper or pipe clamp, Each of these are time consuming, unreliable and often unsightly.
  • 600,000 roofs with electrical service masts are re-shingled each year in USA, plus repairs.
  • There are 34 million satellite dish TV subscribers in the USA, 25 million roof mounted. Replacing a roof every 25 years equals 1 million roofers yearly need to remove and realign the  receiver. Alternatively you could seal the receiver arm with a Garrdal 2 piece boot.
  • Numerous knuckled clay or cast iron soil stacks protrude through roofs on older homes. Reusing existing boots or modifying 1 piece boots with lots of caulk is a common solution to weatherproof these boots. A time consuming endeavor with unsightly results. Another practical instance that Garrdal pipe boot can be used. And save time and money.
  • A possible market of easily over 1 million units yearly.
  • Your contribution will help take Garrdal from years of planning and designing to actual production, marketing and sales of the product.
  • Even if total funding goals aren't met from the campaign, manufacturing can begin and Garrdal can be introduced to the marketplace.
  • If the campaign is short, marketing and sales will be behind schedule but at least they can start, even if at a slower pace than hoped.
  • A monetary contribution or sharing of this page are each very much appreciated!

Risks & Challenges

Production keeping up with sales may become a problem but what a great problem to have. If sales go beyond manufacturing capabilities a second set of tooling will be needed. That would mean Garrdal having more profits to pay for the tooling though. Looking forward to that problem!

Sales growth, most industries face the challenge of finding quality salespeople who are also familiar with the industry. Garrdal sells 1 product to a relatively small, easily defined set of buyers. New hires will be account managers who maintain those accounts with very little if any cold calling required. Qualified candidates can be found with a customer service or account management background or someone with industry experience, especially shingle roofing and good organizational and communication skills. Controlled growth and hiring and training will be an easy burden to overcome.

Office location needed in the future. In the short term an account manager can work with me. This will be an added expense that fortunately  will be covered by revenues. This additional expense will only be necessary when sales growth and revenues and staffing needs warrant.

I have trained sales teams, phone rooms and customer departments as well as built sales offices from scratch in the past. Each of these potential obstacles are welcomed especially since each challenge means Garrdal sales are growing.

Other Ways You Can Help

Roofers have been spending more than a Garrdal boot costs to modify 2 boots and mash them together for years. Share this page with your entire social network and it will find it's way to them.

Share it often, even with those you know  can't help fund the  campaign, they can share it!!

Contributions and brand awareness or people knowing about the product are equally important. If someone sends this to someone who sends it to a roofer that isn't on a mailing list we will use, a goal has been reached. That roofer will remember the product and talk about it.

Share, share, share. Twitter, Instagram, Facebook. The funding campaign is relatively short. The more eyes and sharing of the campaign the faster goals can be reached and recognition maximized.

There are really 2 campaigns in play here. A funding campaign and a product recognition campaign. Expanding on either side is helpful.

Share www.garrdal.com , there are more photos and information about the product and it's uses there but remember that it is under construction still. Follow www.twitter.com/garrdal Track the campaign for updates and please share it with everyone you can. Or share the campaign link. Make Garrdal related internet sites regular stops for the next few weeks when you are browsing, follow Garrdal and share links to the sites please. Contribute if you are so inclined but share it either way please.
story_txt:
Short Summary (Note reduced goal! $35,000 Revised to $20K!!)

I have been in sales and marketing for 30 years, Several of those years in residential roofing as a general contractor.
Split boots lack structural support, take too long to install, and usually don't do any favors for the new appearance expected. With no reasonably priced  visually appealing products on the market, I designed one.
Patent was submitted in early December (already had the provisional for a year), First 2 quarters of sales and marketing has been laid out (8 states). Tooling, packaging, printed materials, office expenses and first production run for early sales and demonstration samples funding is needed.
All tooling is laid out and ready to mill the molds and start production, just need MONEY!
Reaching the funding goal will allow all aspects of the first 180 days of operations to move forward. Marketing to the contractors who will use the product and selling to the distributors who those contractors buy from will be established enough that sales will fund operations after 180 days. First orders and revenue will begin 60-90 days after launch.
Client relationship manager software bundled with prospect database access has been sourced. Packaging needs have been sourced, All marketing and sales leads have been laid out for the first 180 days and rough drafts for 4 quarters following,
Wages, advertising expenses, necessary printed materials, sales trip expenses are planned. Looking for $20,000toward the total required.  Falling short of this goal will slow the launch but not stop it. In reality it started years ago, this campaign is to fund finishing the roll out but the process was started years ago.
A comfortable, 2 quarter roll out is what has been planned but it may instead be an uncomfortable 3 or 4 quarter bumpy roll out with erratic sales and marketing plans, which route is dependent on how much of the funding goal is reached.


What We Need & What You Get

$15000 Packaging materials, web site for contractors, website for distributors to order, office supplies, envelopes and printed materials to send to contractors and potential distributors .
All contribution promotional perks include catch phrase "if you cant get over it, go around it" with the exploded drawing of the Garrdal 2 piece boot.
The goal is to reach $20000 (now)knowing that will get Garrdal over the 180 day hump.
All aspects of Garrdal compared to alternatives, favor Garrdal. Price, installation speed, reliability and how it looks. Potential customers, roofers in particular need to know it exists.
Mailing information to roofing contractors with websites in larger counties will stimulate activity with contractors asking their local suppliers about availability.
Roofing contractors contacting their suppliers will stimulate interest from those suppliers and increase traffic to Garrdal related social media. Most importantly, distributors will react faster as buyers if their customers have asked about a product. Their own research after a customer inquiry will have many trying to stock the product before a Garrdal sales call.
Availability through suppliers needs to be established as quickly as possible not only for revenue but to assure interested contractors actually get the chance to use the product sooner rather than later.
Contractors will call the branch, the branch will be mailed, a Garrdal representative will call the branch and purchaser, I will visit the branch to demonstrate with a sample.
The potential market is over a million units yearly! 600,000 or more roofs with electrical weather head masts are re-shingled each year and another million with roof mounted satellite receivers. Only a portion of the potential market is the target for the first couple of years. Controlled growth is easier to manage. 3000 units monthly is enough to cover expenses.  As volume grows so can staff for more growth.


The Impact

For those who haven't shingled a roof, a pipe boot is the flashing that gets pushed over a pipe. It is fastened to the roof and shingled around to weatherproof the perforation.
What if there is something that prevents the roofer from pushing the boot over the pipe? Wires? Antennas? Knuckles?

When replacing or repairing the roof conventional boots can't go over these obstacles. The solution is a lot of messy caulking and paint and trying to reuse the existing flashing or an expensive split boot with no structural support except a metal clip or zipper or pipe clamp, Each of these are time consuming, unreliable and often unsightly.
600,000 roofs with electrical service masts are re-shingled each year in USA, plus repairs.
There are 34 million satellite dish TV subscribers in the USA, 25 million roof mounted. Replacing a roof every 25 years equals 1 million roofers yearly need to remove and realign the  receiver. Alternatively you could seal the receiver arm with a Garrdal 2 piece boot.
Numerous knuckled clay or cast iron soil stacks protrude through roofs on older homes. Reusing existing boots or modifying 1 piece boots with lots of caulk is a common solution to weatherproof these boots. A time consuming endeavor with unsightly results. Another practical instance that Garrdal pipe boot can be used. And save time and money.
A possible market of easily over 1 million units yearly.
Your contribution will help take Garrdal from years of planning and designing to actual production, marketing and sales of the product.
Even if total funding goals aren't met from the campaign, manufacturing can begin and Garrdal can be introduced to the marketplace.
If the campaign is short, marketing and sales will be behind schedule but at least they can start, even if at a slower pace than hoped.
A monetary contribution or sharing of this page are each very much appreciated!


Risks & Challenges
Production keeping up with sales may become a problem but what a great problem to have. If sales go beyond manufacturing capabilities a second set of tooling will be needed. That would mean Garrdal having more profits to pay for the tooling though. Looking forward to that problem!
Sales growth, most industries face the challenge of finding quality salespeople who are also familiar with the industry. Garrdal sells 1 product to a relatively small, easily defined set of buyers. New hires will be account managers who maintain those accounts with very little if any cold calling required. Qualified candidates can be found with a customer service or account management background or someone with industry experience, especially shingle roofing and good organizational and communication skills. Controlled growth and hiring and training will be an easy burden to overcome.
Office location needed in the future. In the short term an account manager can work with me. This will be an added expense that fortunately  will be covered by revenues. This additional expense will only be necessary when sales growth and revenues and staffing needs warrant.
I have trained sales teams, phone rooms and customer departments as well as built sales offices from scratch in the past. Each of these potential obstacles are welcomed especially since each challenge means Garrdal sales are growing.

Other Ways You Can Help
Roofers have been spending more than a Garrdal boot costs to modify 2 boots and mash them together for years. Share this page with your entire social network and it will find it's way to them.
Share it often, even with those you know  can't help fund the  campaign, they can share it!!
Contributions and brand awareness or people knowing about the product are equally important. If someone sends this to someone who sends it to a roofer that isn't on a mailing list we will use, a goal has been reached. That roofer will remember the product and talk about it.
Share, share, share. Twitter, Instagram, Facebook. The funding campaign is relatively short. The more eyes and sharing of the campaign the faster goals can be reached and recognition maximized.
There are really 2 campaigns in play here. A funding campaign and a product recognition campaign. Expanding on either side is helpful.
Share www.garrdal.com , there are more photos and information about the product and it's uses there but remember that it is under construction still. Follow www.twitter.com/garrdal Track the campaign for updates and please share it with everyone you can. Or share the campaign link. Make Garrdal related internet sites regular stops for the next few weeks when you are browsing, follow Garrdal and share links to the sites please. Contribute if you are so inclined but share it either way please.

story:
What You Get

Contactless Delivery & PickUp Solution Keeping Your Packages Safe

Package Vault 3- Robust Delivery Storage with Smart Bluetooth & RFID Lock, mobile phone App ready access control 

Or

Package Vault 2- Robust Delivery Storage with Smart Tech System; WiFi Security Sensor and Electronic Lock

​

  • INCREASES YOUR SECURITY!: Keep your packages out of sight and Locked up! Package Vault stores and locks up your packages until you are ready to pick them up from your home. 
  • SMART Bluetooth & RFID Lock works with Phone App TTLock and can alert you when the Package Vault is opened or closed via Lock status, Check the status remotely on your phone within bluetooth range or use a wifi gateway to get the status anytime and anywhere; battery powered. Included on PV-3 Version.
  • SMART WIFI SECURITY SENSOR KEEPS YOU INFORMED: Wifi sensor works with smart home wifi Apps and alerts you when the Package Vault is opened or closed via sensor status. Check the status remotely on your phone anytime and anywhere; battery powered  included on PV-2 Version.
  • DURABLE and STRONG + WEATHER RESISTANT. Made with Polypropylene and enhanced structurally to be strengthened with cross members and reinforced corner connections. Designed to keep precipitation out with an elongated lid and angled curves keeping your packages dry! 
  • ELEGANT, MODERN, and SPACIOUS DESIGN: Sleek and savvy design utilizing efficient industrial design with sharp angles that will turn heads and will look beautiful in front of your house. Excellent storage space holding several common package box sizes.
  • EASY STARTER KIT Comes with everything you need to help safeguard your packages: 1 Package Vault Delivery Box, 1 Smart Bluetooth RFID Lock (PV-3 version) 1 Electronic Pin Code lock and wifi door sensor (PV-2 version), 1 "Deliver Here" Sign, 1 Doorbell Sign, 2 Corner Anchors to hold this puppy down.
  • Ready set go keep your packages safe!
  • Theft is usually an opportunity crime and Package Vault can help securely store your packages out of sight. Easy to set up in 15 minutes with a straight forward design.
  • Don't be another statistic; get protected today! Bluetooth Lock connection can be hooked up to a Wifi  gateway and then can notify you when you have received a package delivery remotely when you are out of Bluetooth range. Help ensure your gifts don't get stolen from your front door!
  • Designate your Package Vault as your preferred delivery location by using delivery instructions or 2nd address line. Delivery driver reads your instructions and places your packages inside the open Package Vault. They then close the lid, and lock the electronic lock. Retrieve your packages by entering in your code into the lock; open and enjoy your items :-)
  • Product dimensions 24" Length 24" Width 30" Height
  • Color: Grey / Black

The unique perks for being a backer is a 20% discount off the regular price and the chance to own a product that will provide value time after time. A true asset that will benefit you and your whole family.

Be the first in your neighborhood with an awesome Package Vault on your porch.

Why Us?

My favorite Holiday was coming up and I finally ordered that perfect gift for my youngest child. After waiting forever to get the delivery notice I quickly came home to pickup the package. I went straight toward the front door, but the package was no where to be found!!

 I looked everywhere, but no luck. I checked my video camera and a package thief walked right up to my door and just took the gift that was meant for my kid. That experience made me committed to protecting packages and making sure someone's special gift stays safe! I want everyone to shop online with confidence your packages will be protected.

Package Vault has been working hard to develop an efficient and innovative solution for package theft. Imagine the peace of mind knowing your deliveries will be there waiting for you safe and sound. Keeping your packages safe for you and your family is our number one priority. Never shop online without a Package Vault in front of your house!

The Impact

You will be helping thousands of people and family's have a safe method to store their packages. No longer will people have to worry about their packages being stolen off their front door step. Take action today and support us to put an end to porch pirates.

Our first Package Vault version 1 sold out in 2.5 months and now we are here to launch an even better version.

Risks and Challenges

The challenges that we will encounter are typical production related problems that we have experience with. Our team has successfully launched several commercial security products before and we have what it takes to ensure the products get produced on time and with the best quality. We have also partnered with a very experienced supplier who has produced similar parts and can provide certifications on quality and processes to ISO 9000 standards.
 

Other Ways You Can Help

We would love your help to spread the message and to inform your friends and family of the Package Vault option. Feel free to share and check out our website at  www.packagevault.com

Thank you ! :-)

story:
Blacksor will protect your personal home internet network or your business internet network. Blacksor Technology block hackers and malwares from getting inside the internet network, blacksor technology is a cloud based structure that is connected to blacksor secured servers and on the disk on key devices there is the cloud connection that operate the entire secured technology. Blacksor identify the packets and the intervals of the suspicious access That The Malware Or Hackers printed and generated or any malicious software identification and block it instantly and will audit the attack.

Blacksor block the malware from getting inside the network and audit it. Also please note  that the cyber world is changing a lot and blacksor will always get the updates with us as it is cloud based security installed on the blacksor disk on key so in case new attacks came in the blacksor will always know how to handle it and will always stay up to date in order to protect the network.

Blacksor Have Smart algorithm that act on real time to prevent hack, scam, identity thiefs, malwares, ransomware attack, It Will Block Suspicious IP's and behaviors Of Online Users

1. Blacksor Product Moves To Shipping Stage And Have Begun Process Orders Of Blacksor Disk On Key Device. First 100 Pieces Are Being Shipped Soon And The manufacturer Have Started The Mass Production Creation. As Of Now We Already Have Final Inventory ready With The Blacksor Software.

See On The Videos In The Story Section The Shipping Process Video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=UqKtNO0X62Y 

2. Blacksor Product Moves To Production Stage And Have Begun The Mass Production Process Of Blacksor Disk On Key Device. First 100 Pieces Are Ready To Be Shipped Soon And The manufacturer Have Started Using The Prototype To Create The Tulling For Mass Production Creation. As Of Now We Already Have Final Inventory ready And Soon The Mass Production Will be Able To Generate 1 Million Pieces Per Month For Delivery With Blacksor Software.

See On The Videos In The Story Section The Mass Production Video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=6H4cxhC2fxc 

It is a first of its kind innovative solution that protect you from hackers and identity thieves by blocking any illegal access to your network.

COMPLETE NETWORK SECURITY PROTECTION

Your network security deserves the best protection. Traditional tools can't solve all security problems, blacksor redefines network security. Prevent Cyber Attacks. Network Traffic Analysis.

The Ultimate software to protect from hackers and identity thieves and protects your data.

Our Approach To Security

The Goal Of Blacksor Team Is To Protect Home And Work Networks From Hackers And Identity Thiefs and malware treats Accessing And Taking Advantage And Harm You

                    

Innovative Cyber Protection Of Your Office And Home Network Online

Blacksor Prevention Software That Is Installed On Disk On Key And Connected To Your Network Internet Router Will Protect Your Intire Network Connection And All The Devices That Is Connected To The Network And That is Using The Netwrok! The Blacksor Will Be The Netwrok Guardian And By Using It Your Will NOt Need Any Anti Virus For Each Device As Our Smart Algorithm Will Protect All The Devices That Is Connected To The Network

Include: All Internet Connection, PC, Mobile, CCTV, Tv, Any Network Adapters, Intercom, Smart Home Systems And More...

 

Blacksor is literally plug and play.

  • No need to install any individual software on each of your device.
  • Blacksor connects to your home network and starts scanning your network immediately.

Blacksor device connects to USB plugins and to network plugins with adapter so in case your router doesn’t have USB port, we offer this connector that will enable you to use Blacksor on your router even if it doesnt have USB port. (available as an addon in perks)

 

     Features                                                               Blacksor                         Competitors

  • Full Network Protection                                               YES                                           NO                      
  • Install Price                                                                   149 USD                                600 USD
  • Algorithm                                                                  Cloud Based                      Software Based
  • Monthly Cost                                                                  None                                   200 USD
  • Hardware Size                                                                Small                                         Big  
  • Cover Hacking                                                                 YES                                           NO  
  • Audit Attacks                                                                   YES                                           YES
  • Block Suspicious IP's                                                    YES                                           NO
  • Identify Malwares Attack                                             YES                                           YES
  • Block Ransomware Attack                                          YES                                           NO
  • User Privacy                                                                     YES                                           YES
  • Cyber Security                                                                YES                                            NO
  • Industry Certified                                                           YES                                           YES
  • Content Delivery Network                                           YES                                           YES
  • Malware Detection Removal                                       YES                                           YES
  • 24/7 Cyber Security Support                                     YES                                           NO

​  

Using an efficient Content Delivery Network, Blacksor improves performance by optimizing the traffic and analyzing it in real time to prevent potential fraud, phishing links and keeps your home or office network safe from identity thieves and sneaky hackers.

Unlike traditional cybersecurity devices, the Blacksor acts like a guardian for your network eliminating the need of installing antivirus software on all your devices.

Blacksor provides advanced malware & ransomware protection by identifying a potential threat before it does any damage and block it instantly.

BLACKSOR Group was set up in 2013 and represents considerable authority in giving vital and esteem added counseling administrations to the business and business divisions.

The gathering is one of the most established and driving in its field Worlwide, with high notoriety and a wide customer base, both in the business division in Israel and abroad and in open associations and organizations.

The BLACKSOR Group works Worldwide, utilizing the sending of expert universal foundation and broad experience.
The human capital of the gathering is gifted in the territories of data gathering, examine vital arranging and innovation. Previous senior officials work in first-class units in The Israeli intelligence Units

The BLACKSOR Group gives its customers expert and great data, with the most extreme consideration to keep up corporate morals and tact and to utilize just lawful methods. The activities are done intimately with driving legitimate consultants in the economy.

The BLACKSOR Group's proficient tasks make it conceivable to acquire a particular upper hand and a complete, extraordinary and modern picture of the market and contenders

 

 

Customs & Duty

Our prices do not include VAT, GST or other country taxes. 

Our terms of sale for international orders are FOB destination. This means that you pay all duties or taxes in your country if applicable. As we are shipping these products all over the world, it is impossible for us to build in the various duties, VAT and GST tax for each location through indiegogo.

If you would like to estimate your duties, you can use this online tool (remember to convert the U.S. dollars to your local currency):

simplyduty.com/import-calculator/

For international customers who are required to pay customs, you will receive an email from your local customs authorities asking for payment to have your order processed through customs. Unfortunately, there is no legal way around customs (including marking an order as a gift, which we cannot do). Once you make that payment to the customs broker your order will be processed for final delivery.

 

Shipping & Return Policy

It is critical that you enter your correct, valid address when placing your order. If our shipping carrier attempts delivery to you and you don't get it because you’re not there, wrong address or moved without notifying us, and the package returns back to our warehouse, it will be the buyer's responsibility to pay the shipping fee to reship the order. When you receive your tracking number, please keep an eye out for the package.

We are not accepting returns of the blacksor disk on key that are ordered via Indiegogo . However, if your device is not perfect, please reach out to us at info@blacksor.com, and we will do whatever we can to help make it right!

 

Risks and Challenges

As you can see on the timeline, we have been working on this product for more than a year, and have already completed the design / development and have moved forward on the process of creating all the molds, fixtures, and processes needed for mass production.

Here are a few risks and challenges that we can think of:

Product Manufacturing Delays

We’ve produced a small run of samples and we feel confident that a large production order will be successful; however, it is common that factories can have unforeseen setbacks. We plan to stay in constant communication with our manufacturer including working on-site to resolve any challenges that may arise.

Shipping Delays

As with any manufactured good, delays can happen -- a typhoon can hit, or a pallet can get stuck in a shipyard. We’ve padded our schedule to accommodate some changes, but will let our backers know immediately if we foresee any updates to the timeline for delivery.

​  Using an efficient Content Delivery Network, Blacksor improves performance by optimizing the traffic and analyzing it in real time to prevent potential fraud, phishing links and keeps your home or office network safe from identity thieves and sneaky hackers.Unlike traditional cybersecurity devices, the Blacksor acts like a guardian for your network eliminating the need of installing antivirus software on all your devices.Blacksor provides advanced malware & ransomware protection by identifying a potential threat before it does any damage and block it instantly.BLACKSOR Group was set up in 2013 and represents considerable authority in giving vital and esteem added counseling administrations to the business and business divisions.The gathering is one of the most established and driving in its field Worlwide, with high notoriety and a wide customer base, both in the business division in Israel and abroad and in open associations and organizations.The BLACKSOR Group works Worldwide, utilizing the sending of expert universal foundation and broad experience.The human capital of the gathering is gifted in the territories of data gathering, examine vital arranging and innovation. Previous senior officials work in first-class units in The Israeli intelligence UnitsThe BLACKSOR Group gives its customers expert and great data, with the most extreme consideration to keep up corporate morals and tact and to utilize just lawful methods. The activities are done intimately with driving legitimate consultants in the economy.The BLACKSOR Group's proficient tasks make it conceivable to acquire a particular upper hand and a complete, extraordinary and modern picture of the market and contenders  Customs & DutyOur prices do not include VAT, GST or other country taxes. Our terms of sale for international orders are FOB destination. This means that you pay all duties or taxes in your country if applicable. As we are shipping these products all over the world, it is impossible for us to build in the various duties, VAT and GST tax for each location through indiegogo.If you would like to estimate your duties, you can use this online tool (remember to convert the U.S. dollars to your local currency):simplyduty.com/import-calculator/For international customers who are required to pay customs, you will receive an email from your local customs authorities asking for payment to have your order processed through customs. Unfortunately, there is no legal way around customs (including marking an order as a gift, which we cannot do). Once you make that payment to the customs broker your order will be processed for final delivery. Shipping & Return PolicyIt is critical that you enter your correct, valid address when placing your order. If our shipping carrier attempts delivery to you and you don't get it because you’re not there, wrong address or moved without notifying us, and the package returns back to our warehouse, it will be the buyer's responsibility to pay the shipping fee to reship the order. When you receive your tracking number, please keep an eye out for the package.We are not accepting returns of the blacksor disk on key that are ordered via Indiegogo . However, if your device is not perfect, please reach out to us at info@blacksor.com, and we will do whatever we can to help make it right! Risks and ChallengesAs you can see on the timeline, we have been working on this product for more than a year, and have already completed the design / development and have moved forward on the process of creating all the molds, fixtures, and processes needed for mass production.Here are a few risks and challenges that we can think of:Product Manufacturing DelaysWe’ve produced a small run of samples and we feel confident that a large production order will be successful; however, it is common that factories can have unforeseen setbacks. We plan to stay in constant communication with our manufacturer including working on-site to resolve any challenges that may arise.Shipping DelaysAs with any manufactured good, delays can happen -- a typhoon can hit, or a pallet can get stuck in a shipyard. We’ve padded our schedule to accommodate some changes, but will let our backers know immediately if we foresee any updates to the timeline for delivery.

story:
Take a typical Italian family. Add a long-standing passion for great food, handed down through the generations. Mix in a pinch of design expertise. Stir in a drop of help from friends who share our passion for food, health and beauty. Put it all together and what have you got? It’s The Food Lover - ready to change your life in the kitchen. Kickstarter crowd, it’s time to celebrate your love for food!

 

The Revolutionary 4 In 1 Pot system  

The Food Lovers offers 3 CAST IRON COOKWARE PIECES FOR THE PRICE OF ONE! A pot, a grill and a pan – all in one simple-to-use system. You can even combine them together to create a ‘Dutch Skillet Oven’. What’s not to love?

 

Naturally Non-Stick

Unlike most cookware, The Food Lover doesn’t have a painted non-stick layer. Instead, it’s naturally non-stick, with a top-level of polishing and vegetable pre-seasoning (soy-bean oil).

 

Four Ways To Cook All Your Perfect Dishes

The Food Lover is a revolutionary cooking system: with one pan you get 4 different ways to cook. It’s great for cooking meat, pizza and more. Whether you’re baking, boiling, roasting or frying – The Food Lover is the only pot you need.

 

Pot + Pan Lid Or Pan Grid = 1 Dutch Oven   

A lid, a grill and a pan – all in one simple-to-use system! Use the pan as a pan, a grill or a lid! Combine with the pot to create a unique Dutch "skillet" Oven!

How It Works

 

No More Lids  

 At The Food Lover we decided to ditch the lid because you hardly ever use them and they just get in the way. We don’t need excess stuff in our kitchen, and neither do you! Instead, it comes with an extra pan included! You can use this high-quality pan to cook amazing dishes, and also use it as a lid for The Food Lover pot, if you need to. This multi-purpose pan fits snugly on top of the pot, turning it into a perfect stove-top oven. So no matter what, you’re covered, literally!

 

The Classic Cast Iron Pot With A Innovative Twist 

So much more than a cast iron pot: you also get a lid that is a pan, a grill, and an oven too. Everything is compatible with everything else, it’s a one-of-a-kind pan system for your kitchen.

 

Ultimate Heat Retention For Perfect Dishes 

 

We created The Food Lover from cast iron - the most effective material in the world for heat retention and distribution. Cast iron has been used in the kitchen for centuries, because it’s the healthiest, most versatile and durable material around.

The Food Lover’s surfaces are smooth, non-porous and indestructible, higher in quality than anything else on the market. And with its stunning, timeless look, you’ll be reaching for The Food Lover for years to come. 

 

So Versatile - Creating The Perfect Dish Every Time  

With The Food Lover you can cook literally every kind of food to perfection. 

What’s more, it’s suited to all kinds of cooking: ​you can fry, boil, stew, bake, roast and steam too! The Food Lover redefines what you can do in the kitchen.

Once you try it, you won’t want to cook with anything else.

 

It's Never Been Easier To Cook Like A Pro  

The Food Lover reimagines the traditional cast iron cooking pot, especially in design and weight. You won’t believe how good it looks.

We paid special attention to the pot’s weight distribution. After a detailed study and extensive testing on the shape and the size of the handles, we created a well-balanced product, easy to move between burners. The handles are large, ergonomic, and so convenient to use.

We also calibrated the thickness to guarantee the optimal heat distribution with the right weight, as well as being naturally non-stick.

 

The Cast Iron Pot With Wow Factor Looks  

We also paid attention to our pot’s aesthetics. The stunning double color is a design choice, but it’s also functional. It’s what sets us apart from other cookware on the market.

Other pots, even some that cost 4 times the price of The Food Lover, turn yellow after repeated use. Not this pot - its colors will never deteriorate.

 

Your New Best Friend In The Kitchen  

 

Now, you don’t need 100 pots with their useless lids cluttering up your kitchen. You only need The Food Lover: one pot with a multitude of uses. It’s an easy way to cook like a professional, at a price you can afford.

But that's not all… together with you we’d like to celebrate nature and help the planet too! In particular, that aspect that gives life to one of the healthiest foods: Extra Virgin Olive oil, pride and Italian heritage. For each order, we will plant in our farm a new 3 years old olive tree that will bear your own name and that you’ll see in picture after the first year of growth!

 

Compatibility 

The Food Lover fits every cooking surface: gas, induction, glass-ceramic. It fits perfectly in the oven. Try it on the campfire too!

 

Affordable Pricing   

 

Comparison Charts 

 

 

Design Process  

Italy is like nowhere else in the world when it comes to food. In Italy, food is an art and a passion. Growing up in Italy, our grandmothers would cook us delicious meals which we have never forgotten. Those memories are fixed in our minds. However, there is always room for something new on which we can create more memories.

Around two years ago, we identified something that was missing in the kitchen: the perfect pan. That’s when we first had the idea for The Food Lover.

The Food Lover looks simple and is intuitive to use as if it’s been around forever. But, it took a lot of work to bring our idea to life.

Our first task in creating The Food Lover was choosing materials. We wanted to find the perfect material for heat distribution and retention. It also had to be hard-wearing and look great. After looking at ceramic, aluminium, even stone, we settled on cast iron. There’s a reason Italians have cooked with cast iron for hundreds of years!

The next part of the process was developing the 4-in-1 pan system that we had in our minds. Our designers and engineers worked for 14 months creating the optimal system. We visited dozens of manufacturers to make sure their machine tools were equal to the job of creating our perfect pan.

Finally, we tested our new creation with every type of food you can imagine, notably my family recipe lasagne Bolognese.

We think we’ve created something very special, and we back this up with a lifetime guarantee. Because we spent so long developing and testing The Food Lover, we can be 100% sure that it will become the first thing you reach for when you want to cook up some more magical memories.

Whether it’s an old family recipe passed down from your ancestors to something brand new to wow your dinner guests, The Food Lover will help you produce meals no one will ever forget.

 

Features  

 

 

Colors

Your pan and grill lid are both in classic black Pure Iron color.

For your main pot, select from RED and obviously PURE IRON. Your choice will be processed after the end of the campaign.

 

 

Technical Specs 

The Food Lover are among the lightest cast iron pots on the market. They are perfectly weight balanced with a double handler for easy grip. The removable stay-cool silicone handle grips withstand temperatures up to 500 degrees F.

Every piece of iron at our foundry is sampled and tested to meet the highest standards.  Food Lover pots and pans are made from 75-90% recycled iron. They’re non-toxic, with no added paints or chemicals. Plus, we recycle all the sand from the casting so, no waste! We offer a lifetime guarantee on all our cookware.

 

Perks 

 Timeline

 

Timeline

Meet The Team  

When it comes to food, Italy like nowhere else in the world. In Italy, food is art, passion. TheFoodLover is a team of Italian cooks and designers in search of the perfect taste. In the last few years, The Food Lover team has brought dozens of ideas to life, helping cooks just like you create better dishes and have more fun in the kitchen. Now, we’ve created a revolutionary cookware system. We can’t wait for you to enjoy it!

story:
Hi! My name is Susanna Pilia, I'm the founder of the Peralia brand and I'm here on INDIEGOGO to ask you a contribution for the realization of two very special lamps named Zero Ossigeno.

Would you like to make a magic every time you turn the lights on? That's what Zero Ossigeno lamps let you do!

They will be completely self produced by hand here in Italy, but first I need to find funds for some necessary expenses like the CE electrical certification, the circuit mold and the packaging. I thank you so much for your interest in my work and I will be really grateful if you will decide to contribute to this project! 

ITA

Ciao! Mi chiamo Susanna Pilia, sono la designer di Zero Ossigeno Lamps e fondatrice del brand Peralia. Sono qui su INDIEGOGO per chiedervi un contributo per la realizzazione di queste due lampade. Ti piacerebbe fare una magia tutte le volte che accendi una lampada nella tua casa? Siamo qui per questo!

Verranno realizzate in autoproduzione  ma ho bisogno di trovare i fondi per la loro certificazione CE, lo stampo del circuito, lo studio del packaging e la partecipazione a fiere di settore. Vi ringrazio molto per il vostro interesse verso il mio lavoro, vi sarò infinitamente grata se deciderete di aiutarmi in questa avventura! 


How it works

Zero Ossigeno Lamps can be turned on and off with just a small wave of your hand. They have no physical switch, using instead a proximity sensor connected to a microprocessor that allows the lamp to be turned on and off by simply placing your hand over the light source. The name is derived from the amount of oxygen that remains during the combustion of a flame when it gets covered. The two lamps, presented as prototypes for the first time at Operae 2015 Independent design festival, are entirely self produced. The design of the circuit has been realized by Laboratorio Creativo Geppetto.


Zero Ossigeno Candle

      

   

In this version the lamp can be turned on by placing your hand on it. Its elegant shape and the soft light coming out from the cone makes it the perfect solution for your bedroom: when it's time to sleep you won't need to look for the switch, a simple gesture will turn it off.


Zero Ossigeno Directable

   

   

In this version, the lamp can be turned on by placing your hand on the white base – the sensor is the black rectangle clearly visible on the top. The light source can be directed wherever you need it, making it perfect for your desktop or bedside.


Production process

For the realization of Zero Ossigeno Lamps, I started with a gesture. I had before me a small cone-shaped container and I imagined to turn it on by putting my hand over it without touching it. I immediately made some sketches in my notebook to fix the idea and think of a functional shape, and then built a 1:1 scale clay model. One of the advantages of self production is the possibility to quickly produce prototypes in order to study shapes, dimensions and proportions of a potential product.

     

After deciding the appropriate shape and measures of the lamp, I went on with the realization of the first model. I digitally redesigned the shape of the cone in order to print a 3D model for the plaster mold, and used it to cast the final body.

    

The cones are finished by hand, smoothed with a sponge and subsequently fired for a first time at 950 degrees. After the first firing the ceramic must be glazed in order to give it a shiny look and protect it from dirt and humidity. The transparent matte glaze applied to the base play a nice contrast with the glossy grey one of the upper cone.

The internal circuitry was realized with the help of Laboratorio Creativo Geppetto. We started with a prototype version which is entirely hand soldered: with this campaign we will also be able to produce a mold in order to speed up the realization of the electrical part.

Once the circuit is ready and we have all the additional components we need, such as the power supply, the lamp, its holder and various mounting accessories, we move on to the assembly phase. The base is then closed with a laser cut wooden lid.

Finally the lamp is ready, and we can have fun with magic!


Perks

The Peralia brand also has a jewelry and home collection, so I thought to give some of these products as perks, besides the possibility to order one or both lamps as early user and get a special price.

Ferula necklace: a short, sleek necklace with a white ceramic pendant. The chain is made of nickel-free brass.

    


Nemula necklace: a shiny, elegant necklace featuring a white ceramic pendant decorated with a golden luster. The chain is made of nickel-free brass.

   


Coasters set: a five coasters set with handmade decorations inspired by the maritime landscape of Sardinia and the tradition of sardinian carpet decorations.

  

  

  


Coffee cups set: six cute coffee cups for your relaxing moments, two cups for each decoration.

the circuit is ready and we have all the additional components we
need, such as the power supply, the lamp, its holder and various
mounting accessories, we move on to the assembly phase. The base is
then closed with a laser cut wooden lid.
Finally
the lamp is ready, and we can have fun with magic!Perks
The
Peralia brand also has a jewelry and home collection, so I
thought to give some of these products as perks, besides the
possibility to order one or both lamps as early user and get a
special price.Ferula necklace: a
short, sleek necklace
with a white ceramic pendant. The chain is made of nickel-free brass.    Nemula necklace: a
shiny, elegant necklace featuring a white ceramic pendant decorated
with a golden luster.
The chain is made of nickel-free brass.    Coasters set: a five coasters set with handmade decorations inspired
by the maritime landscape of Sardinia and the tradition of sardinian carpet decorations.      Coffee cups set: six cute coffee cups for your relaxing moments, two cups for each decoration.

story:
After a year of hardwork. Blood (literally) sweat, and tears. It is time..  We are Colossal3D.  ( c3d for short ). And there is only one goal for us. We will make larger 3D printers available at a reasonable price. By larger we mean ½ meter print bed or larger. With our expansion kit, print area can go to 1 1/2 meters, 2 meters or more. No need to buy another printer. Bored with printing something that can fit in a suitcase. You can print the suitcase.

How about printing a big Drone that can fly for hours or carry a heavy payload ? Or a custom Kevlar bicycle frame (2 pieces, frame and front forks),  a backpack, a toolbox, an insane chair for computer gaming, or a canoe. Not in 12 pieces, in only 1 piece. With multiple extruders, parts can be printed in multiples. With a second controller board it is possible to use 2 independent gantries on the larger printers. A first in the consumer 3D realm.  

We offer 3 types of printer. Desktop. $2000. 1 Cubic meter $2,500, and 2 Cubic meter with plexiglass enclosure. Price on request. 

UPDATE !!  We offer D I Y kits for $500 lower price.

We are a small team, determined to disrupt the market by bringing larger print bed formats to market for a lot less than current prices.  We are Americans in Korea and also in China. Quality is important for us!! Our electronic parts are sourced from Japan, Korea, Europe or America, with production begining in Korea. Our products will always be open source. We encourage everyone to send suggestions, ideas, thoughts, no matter how crazy ! !

We decided not to pay a video company to make some clever video, keeping everything simple and saving money. We know this may discourage some contributors. But we believe that big budgets make for high price printers. We want to be the Toyota of 3D printers, not the Bentley.

Hobbyists, schools, universities, businesses, aspiring mad scientists. Join us ! Become a disruptor in the 3D printing world. We need your help. We can´t do this alone. You can be part of BIG changes. Lets do big things together ! Your contributions will help us to bring big ideas to big printing. Whatever funding we receive, we will use for bringing change to the idea that big is expensive. By building printers and helping to bring real meaning to the words BIG 3D Printer.

Thank You.  

**Printers and perks are not available in Mainland China. Because of the likelyhood of poor quality copies..**

story:
I am an inventor and writer from Honolulu, Hawaii.  I have been working on 2 table ideas for the past 5 years.  At first I worked with a disappointing company that failed to develop my concepts to fruition.  After spending nearly $10K with that disreputable firm, I began again with Invention Home which breathed new life and confidence into my inventions.  They are 2 table concepts called Stable Table and Little Johnny.  The presentations for both can be viewed here:  http://inventoraccount.inventionhome.com/  click on GUEST LOGIN and enter Guest User ID - Guest021479 Guest Password - TT214795 , when finished watching video (click on it upper left) and viewing entire page presentation, log back out and re-enter with following:  Guest User ID - Guest021422 Guest Password - TT214222 .  Make sure your sound is turned on as the narration begins right away.

Since finishing with the concept-to-virtual presentation phase, which cost me an additional $12K, I launched into the patent process.  That set me back another $10K.  All of this on a waiter's income.  Yes I've worked in a large hotel restaurant for over 25 years.  The patents have been granted and I am now looking at making my first product samples.  This will cost me another $40K, and I just don't have it.  After charging all of these expenses to credit card (over $30K and counting), my credit is maxed out.  I am now hoping to participate in the largest tradeshow for my type of inventions at the 

National Hardware Show

 Wednesday, May 4 - Friday, May 6, 2016

 Las Vegas Convention Center 

 Las Vegas, NV  http://floorplans.reedexpo.com/RX/Floorplans/FX/nhs6t/default.html .  

The lowest estimates I've received for creating my product samples are $15K for Little Johnny and $25K for Stable Table.  There are a lot of moving parts, and since both products must deliver on claims to support significant weight, they can't be made cheaply.  I am not asking for the full $40K because I hope to finance the rest myself.  If I can't be ready in time for the Las Vegas Tradeshow, I hope to participate in the Fall tradeshow which is on the East Coast. 

While I can't offer anything more than the satisfaction of bringing 2 unique concepts into the marketplace, I hope that in itself is a reward for the investors, benefactors, and future consumers of Little Johnny and Stable Table.

story:
Want to try awesome SPECIALTY filament without breaking the bank?

WE DO TOO! That's why we started Filapack. We were tired of spending lots of money on filaments we weren't even sure were going to work with our 3D Printers. 
Or, if you HELP us reach our goal, EVERYONE will be able to choose what filament samples they want every month from our partnering companies! We will simply send out a survey every month with all of our partnering companies filament and you choose 4 samples that you want to try out. It's that simple.

Take this for instance:

$118 for only 500g of filament.

Now you can test your filament before you buy it! 

Then, after you find a filament that you like, you can simply go through our website and buy through us at a discount. Help make our project a reality!

The question everyone wants to know.
What types of filament will you be receiving? We have partnered up with some of the top 3D printing filament companies like Voltivo, Proto Pasta, Form Futura, Rep Rapper Tech, 3DomUSA, 3D Fuel, Clean Strands 

and many more so that we can get you a great variety every month.

Here are just some examples of what you will be receiving at such a low cost:

ExcelFil™ – High Grade PLA and ABS 3D Printing Filaments

                               


ExcelFil™ TECH – Metal and Wood Composite 3D Printing Filaments

                     



Composite Metal PLA - 

Rustable Magnetic Iron

     


Composite Metal PLA - Polishable Stainless Steel

     


Composite Carbon PLA - Electrically Conductive

                 


Advanced PLA - Corn based

                   


Buzzed - Beer based

                          


Wound Up - Coffee based

    


Aluminum, Bronze, Copper

                                           


And many more...

My name is Cole Washburn and I have been working in the 3D Printing Industry for about 3 years now. My background is in Manufacturing Engineering and Technology and I have worked in and 3D printed parts for the Oil-Field and Aerospace Industry. I believe that 3D printing is one of the keys to using creativity to make new prototypes to help make our lives easier and more enjoyable.
What We Need & What You Get

In order for Filapack to ship out filament samples that people want every month and keep it affordable for everyone, we need to get the right equipment, inventory, and partnering companies.

When you help us get funded we will be able to establish ourselves as a more reliable company which will help us get more partnering companies so that you can get the filament samples that you want each month at a low cost. How awesome is that! Help us fund this project, every amount counts! You will also allow us to stop breaking the filament down into 50 gram samples by hand and help us get the right equipment so that we can keep our prices affordable for everyone. Let's work together to get this project funded. And once we're funded simply let us know what filament size (1.75mm or 3mm) you want shipped every month and it will arrive! Also, every subscription has FREE U.S. SHIPPING!

      


The Impact

Everyone hates wasting money, time, and filament. By backing us we will be able to solve all three of those problems by allowing you to try unique and awesome filament at a very low cost, which you most likely wouldn't have purchased other wise. Help us reach our goal and you can choose what filament samples you want every month!

Your contribution will help bring jobs, happy faces, and a beautiful woman (My Wife) who is about to have a baby in July some comfort knowing that things are going to be all right.

Risks & Challenges

There has been a lot of time put into getting partnering companies together to work with us at a low cost to help keep it affordable for everyone. Now that we have the partnering companies, we need your help! We are confident in our partners, however, we do feel that there are a few challenges.

First Challenge is the fulfillment process. Once we have reached our goal on Indiegogo we will start receiving filament spools and breaking them down into 50 gram samples. We have confidence in our partners getting us the spool amounts needed but we know there can be unexpected time delays with producing the filament. We will do our best in this aspect to get our partners shipping us the spools as soon as we reach our Indiegogo goal so that we can make sure to get any delays out of the way early.

Second Challenge is to accurately cut and weigh our filament samples. Currently we have been cutting the filament samples by hand into 50 gram samples and weighing them on a scale. We are confident that with the right equipment we can get them into 50 gram samples cheaper and quicker to make it affordable for everyone.

The Third Challenge is customer confidence and satisfaction. We want to make sure that once our backers have our product and are printing with the samples, that they feel like they can count on us every month to continue to deliver to their expectations. We will continue finding out what samples from what companies people are wanting, so that we can do all we can to make sure to get them every month.

We want to make sure you, the backer, is confident and happy with your purchase!

By the end of the Campaign 
- Filament spools will begin being shipped to our location

By May
- Filament spools will start being broken down into 50 gram samples 
- 3D printers will start printing with samples to get the best printer settings

By June 
- Start shipping out first month's filament samples

By July
- Start getting feedback from customers about what we can do better every month to make their experience with us unforgettable!

Other Ways You Can Help

If you don't own a 3D printer or have a need for our monthly subscription, don't worry, you can share our unique video and campaign with someone you know who does. You can even help us reach out through social media or even come and help us get started breaking down the filament and testing them to get the best printer settings. We want you to get into 3D Printing if you don't have a 3D Printer. Click on the Indiegogo share tools and help us get started!

Thanks a million!

Cole Washburn & Team


(Filapack is not related to Rigidbot in any way)
