story:
With our 3D visualization technology, furnishing, decorating and checking your designs in 3D & VR is easier than ever. Simply drag & drop to design your space and check in real life perspective until you create your dream space. 

Archisketch automates all the laborious works from measuring, modeling to planning so you can start interior designing your own space on our platform in a matter of MINUTES. 
 
 

1. 3D SPACE SCANNER

Attach it to your smartphone, turn on our app, mark the corners of a room and BOOM - The device calculates the distances between each corner to automatically generates 2D, 3D, and VR model in minutes.

2. WEB EDITOR (3D HOME PLANNER)

Our cloud-based Archisketch web editor has been running in beta stage with the growing number of users over 100,000 from all over the world.

Seamlessly integrated on our mobile application, you can drag & drop to

  • Furnish & Decorate your space at your fingertips in minutes

You can try the Archisketch web editor right now on your computer (currently in a beta version) by clicking the link below.

3. VR PREVIEW

Using a VR Head Mount Device, you can immerse yourself into the designed space from your point of view to get the real world feel of how it looks from your perspective.

 

Whether it is for

  • Moving-in to a new place 
  • Renovating your current place or 
  • Simply changing you furniture 

Archisketch makes it easy.

Compatible with the workflows of pre-existing softwares, you can import and export 3D files from/to Archisketch.

Watch how you can even import your own furniture into our platform in a matter of seconds.

The idea of the Archisketch came from personal frustrations that we have repeatedly faced as Architects. In almost every renovation or interior construction projects;

  • Even experts walk around each corner of a building & measure them one-by-one 
  • 3D Modeling is a time-consuming and labor-intensive process that requires months of training to be proficient at

On top of that, you have to use difficult and expensive 3D software to build a model.

The existing solutions were either

  • Too expensive
  • Limited in functionalities
  • Fragmented in terms of the scope it covers and
  • SLOW  

Archisketch is a byproduct of countless hours of research on pre-existing solutions. Putting aside professional devices that were too expensive and not accessible to everyday people, the mobile application based interior designing software was simply inaccurate and fragmented.

Our new measuring method combines hardware sensors and computer vision technology software, so you can get accurate measurements of lines, areas, and floorplans of enclosed spaces in high precision.

Sensors within our hardware complements and completes the software side of Archisketch to innovate shortcomings of traditional measuring software - combining the pros to provide even more accurate AR driven measuring solution.

Aside from the tools used and types of spaces measured, we measure spaces with a tape measure, put samples on the wall and floor in advance - just like the professionals -  to see how it would look while searching for decors presented on the web. 

It's a personal assistant in your pocket to fulfill your interests in designing your own home like the professionals do except that it is

  • Intuitive
  • Easy
  • Automated 
  • Measures distance between you & target object

Archisketch's laser pointed at the target accurately measures the distance between you and your object up to 1,574 inches (40 meters).

Mode 02. AR Distance Measure

  • Measures distance between any two objects
Driven by augmented reality, AR distance mode measures distance between any two objects up to 787 inches (20 meters).
 

Mode 03. Space Capture

  • Measures any space 3-dimensionally to auto-generate 2D & 3D floorplans
Mark each corner to automatically generate 2D and 3D floor plans of your space. Capable of measuring up to 787 inches (20 meters).

This particular accessory is an external battery, 9-axis sensors and a bluetooth module that allows Archisketch to be standalone. That means, Archisketch doesn't have to be attached to your phone any longer and still communicates with your phone regardless of your model.
 

Following are the photos of the most up-to-date working prototype of the Accessory Module. 

 

We’re redefining the way we design our spaces. While we’ve come this far with an incredibly small team and a boot-strapped budget, we need your help in making this technology a reality.

Our goal is to not only develop a product but help educate the world on the potential of ARCHISKETCH. To do this, we need your support from this initial campaign to not only fund our production but also get the word out about what we’re developing.

Our team got together for a habitat project, a volunteer activity group to build and design homes for disadvantaged people. After debating about Architecture and the problems that lie within the current system, Archisketch has been founded and joined by experts in electronics and telecommunication fields.Once we start manufacturing our products in the mass scale after a successful campaign, we would like to make a promise to you backers and Habitat Community that we will be distributing spare Archisketch devices to Habitat for free to support fellow volunteers that work hard for noble cause.

This is the most capital-intensive part of our next phase. We’ve developed many products over the course of our careers, so we’ve got a very good idea on costs needed to produce the initial molds, purchase supplies, meet the minimum quantity order, and ship to consumers. We need your help to get us to the production phase of our hardware.

 

 

Even as we are running a Kickstarter campaign, we are still working hard to improve our product by listening to you. Not only that, we are constantly on the move to let the world know about our product.

We will keep you updated on where and when to find us.

story:
H2know by Conservation Labs can be installed in minutes and help you better manage your water consumption and protect your home the same day. Our goal is to help you save over $200 every year in water-related expenses. All for about $100.

 

 

H2know takes measurements from your pipe every second. Our proprietary machine learning approach works in the cloud to transform those measurements into water flow estimates and insights.

 

For example, using H2know's smart water meter you can record the gallons and the number of uses for each major water appliance. Your water data is recorded and processed, then displayed on your H2know smartphone app so it is easy-to-read and to take action! View reports, find leaks, and discover ways to conserve water and save money!

 

 

 

 

Mark is a veteran entrepreneur with over two decades of experience ranging from startups to global companies. He has led business units and companies, founded a non-profit, and is engaged in social entrepreneurship. His passion is analytics and solving complex problems with data science; his solutions are used to manage global supply chains, improve billions of dollars of media spend, and assess trillions of dollars in tax returns. Mark received his degree in Applied Mathematics from Carnegie Mellon University.

Tom is an expert in embedded signal processing applications with multiple patents to his name. For over 30 years, he has designed and built audio applications for the government and military, cellular and police radio, and medical electronics. His designs, solutions and algorithms are used in nearly every branch of government and all branches of the military. Tom received his Masters from Arizona State University specializing in signal processing.

Pablo is a 20 year veteran in technology, including over a decade as a software engineer with Google. He has worked in all phases of development and product lifecycle with specific interest and work in artificial intelligence, grid computing, and virtual reality. He has co-founded multiple companies and received his degree in Computer Science from Carnegie Mellon University.

Risk Prevention Efforts

  • After extensive testing for over a year, the Conservation Labs team began a more aggressive and formal private field test program in October 2017 that included both residential and commercial properties.
  • Our goal with these tests is to identify and solve real-world plumbing and environmental challenges.
  • The current field test program will continue through 2018 to identify and solve challenges before the first product ships.

The Device

  • On the device side of our solution, our engineering team has brought multiple products to market and manages relationships with multiple manufacturers.

  • We intentionally built the H2know device with as few components as possible, reducing the chance of a break or malfunction.

  • As with any wireless device, H2know must be certified to meet all FCC specifications.

Although we design and test to these specifications, when H2know is sent off to the certifying lab, any issues that arise during these tests may lead to design changes. In this event, these issues will be addressed before delivery as quickly as possible and as close to the projected timeline as possible.

The App

The success of the device relies on our proprietary machine-learning software and approach that we have developed at Conservation Labs.

  • The approach is continuously improving as we test and collect more data.
  • Our key team members working on the machine learning approach each have over 25 years of experience solving large, complex challenges with data science.
  • The current version of H2know is fully functional: from the device, to water flow estimates, to reporting.

Conservation Labs recognizes that the H2know™ device and app may require additional testing, hardware adjustments, software engineering, industrial design checks. Any changes to the device will be followed by further testing before manufacturing and delivery.

How do you install H2know?

There are three steps: (1) Connect the device to your WiFi. (2) Attach the device to your water pipe and plug it in. (3) Install the app.

Where do you install H2know?

 

The H2know sensor attaches over your water pipe in an indoor area of your house with access to an electrical outlet and WiFi connection.

More specifically, H2know attaches to your water pipe on the house side of the meter on the main pipe that “feeds the house” before it branches into sections. If your water meter is located outside of the house (e.g., in a meter pit), then you will attach it to the main pipe as it enters the home.

If you do not have a meter, H2know attaches to your water pipe on the house side of the pump or other systems for moving and cleaning water.

 

What type of pipe does H2know work with?

At launch, H2know is optimized for ¾ inch copper. We will add additional material and sizes after the initial product launch.

Are there additional requirements that I should be aware of?

Since H2know transmits data through your WiFi, the location of the device must be in range of your WiFi. You will also need access to an electric outlet.

How does H2know work?

 

H2know consists of a sensor device and an app.

The device takes many measurements from the pipe every second. These measurements are transformed into a second-level water flow estimate. Our team of mathematicians and engineers designed a proprietary machine learning approach to transform low-cost sensor data to insights including: accurate water flow estimates, categorization of water use, identification of leaks and burst pipes, identification of specific leaking appliances, and custom conservation recommendations.

The app delivers water usage and alerts in an easy-to-use and understandable interface.

 

Is there an ongoing fee?

 

We are planning a zero-cost service that provides water use by the day as well as real-time leak and burst pipe alerts. More advanced features will be available through a nominal subscription fee. These features include categorization of water use (e.g., by appliance), water use down to the hour or minute, identification of the location of the leak, custom conservation recommendations, and custom DIY tips and recommendations. We are planning features beyond these, stay tuned!

 

Will H2know shut off my water?

 

H2know is a monitoring-only device. However, we are already working on a companion device that will automatically or remotely shut off water based on user configurations.

 

How does H2know save me money?

 

There are several studies that examine the impact of leaks in homes and the impact of metering. Studies by the EPA and USGS indicate that as much as 15% of the average homeowner’s water use is attributed to leaks. Other studies demonstrate the presence of a monthly-read meter can reduce water consumption by 5-30%. Analysis of U.S. consumption behaviors suggest there is a 20% reduction opportunity for homeowners by improving water habits. The conclusion is that a device like H2know can help save the average U.S. homeowner $250 in water-related expenses every year.

In addition, a plumbing leak or burst pipe is the most common non-weather related home insurance claim. There are various studies on this topic, we use the mid-range estimates of 1 million insurance claims at an average of $10,000 per claim. This means the average home has a 1 in 75 chance of a catastrophic leak this year and every year. We want to put an end to those leaks and give you peace of mind.

 

How does H2know help the environment?

 

The sum of leaks and unwanted use across all homes in the U.S. is a staggering 2 trillion gallons of water. That is enough water to meet the needs of homes in our 50 largest cities for an entire year. Access to clean water and the infrastructure to deliver that water is increasingly stressed and puts demands on the environment. In addition, water conveyance (moving water from its source to the home to sewage treatment) is one of the leading consumers of energy. The energy consumption on leaks and unwanted water usage alone produces an estimated 3.7 million MT Tons of CO2 every year.

Conservation Labs was one of the winners of the inaugural CES Climate Change Innovator Awards for our ability to demonstrate a reduction greenhouse gas (GHG) emissions if H2know is widely implemented.
story_txt:
H2know by Conservation Labs can be installed in minutes and help you better manage your water consumption and protect your home the same day. Our goal is to help you save over $200 every year in water-related expenses. All for about $100.  H2know takes measurements from your pipe every second. Our proprietary machine learning approach works in the cloud to transform those measurements into water flow estimates and insights. For example, using H2know's smart water meter you can record the gallons and the number of uses for each major water appliance. Your water data is recorded and processed, then displayed on your H2know smartphone app so it is easy-to-read and to take action! View reports, find leaks, and discover ways to conserve water and save money!    Mark is a veteran entrepreneur with over two decades of experience ranging from startups to global companies. He has led business units and companies, founded a non-profit, and is engaged in social entrepreneurship. His passion is analytics and solving complex problems with data science; his solutions are used to manage global supply chains, improve billions of dollars of media spend, and assess trillions of dollars in tax returns. Mark received his degree in Applied Mathematics from Carnegie Mellon University.Tom is an expert in embedded signal processing applications with multiple patents to his name. For over 30 years, he has designed and built audio applications for the government and military, cellular and police radio, and medical electronics. His designs, solutions and algorithms are used in nearly every branch of government and all branches of the military. Tom received his Masters from Arizona State University specializing in signal processing.Pablo is a 20 year veteran in technology, including over a decade as a software engineer with Google. He has worked in all phases of development and product lifecycle with specific interest and work in artificial intelligence, grid computing, and virtual reality. He has co-founded multiple companies and received his degree in Computer Science from Carnegie Mellon University.Risk Prevention Efforts
After extensive testing for over a year, the Conservation Labs team began a more aggressive and formal private field test program in October 2017 that included both residential and commercial properties.
Our goal with these tests is to identify and solve real-world plumbing and environmental challenges.
The current field test program will continue through 2018 to identify and solve challenges before the first product ships.
The Device
On the device side of our solution, our engineering team has brought multiple products to market and manages relationships with multiple manufacturers.
We intentionally built the H2know device with as few components as possible, reducing the chance of a break or malfunction.
As with any wireless device, H2know must be certified to meet all FCC specifications.
Although we design and test to these specifications, when H2know is sent off to the certifying lab, any issues that arise during these tests may lead to design changes. In this event, these issues will be addressed before delivery as quickly as possible and as close to the projected timeline as possible.The AppThe success of the device relies on our proprietary machine-learning software and approach that we have developed at Conservation Labs.
The approach is continuously improving as we test and collect more data.
Our key team members working on the machine learning approach each have over 25 years of experience solving large, complex challenges with data science.
The current version of H2know is fully functional: from the device, to water flow estimates, to reporting.
Conservation Labs recognizes that the H2know™ device and app may require additional testing, hardware adjustments, software engineering, industrial design checks. Any changes to the device will be followed by further testing before manufacturing and delivery. How do you install H2know? There are three steps: (1) Connect the device to your WiFi. (2) Attach the device to your water pipe and plug it in. (3) Install the app. Where do you install H2know? 
 
The H2know sensor attaches over your water pipe in an indoor area of your house with access to an electrical outlet and WiFi connection.
More specifically, H2know attaches to your water pipe on the house side of the meter on the main pipe that “feeds the house” before it branches into sections. If your water meter is located outside of the house (e.g., in a meter pit), then you will attach it to the main pipe as it enters the home.
If you do not have a meter, H2know attaches to your water pipe on the house side of the pump or other systems for moving and cleaning water.
 
 What type of pipe does H2know work with? At launch, H2know is optimized for ¾ inch copper. We will add additional material and sizes after the initial product launch. Are there additional requirements that I should be aware of? Since H2know transmits data through your WiFi, the location of the device must be in range of your WiFi. You will also need access to an electric outlet. How does H2know work? 
 
H2know consists of a sensor device and an app.
The device takes many measurements from the pipe every second. These measurements are transformed into a second-level water flow estimate. Our team of mathematicians and engineers designed a proprietary machine learning approach to transform low-cost sensor data to insights including: accurate water flow estimates, categorization of water use, identification of leaks and burst pipes, identification of specific leaking appliances, and custom conservation recommendations.
The app delivers water usage and alerts in an easy-to-use and understandable interface.
 
 Is there an ongoing fee? 
 
We are planning a zero-cost service that provides water use by the day as well as real-time leak and burst pipe alerts. More advanced features will be available through a nominal subscription fee. These features include categorization of water use (e.g., by appliance), water use down to the hour or minute, identification of the location of the leak, custom conservation recommendations, and custom DIY tips and recommendations. We are planning features beyond these, stay tuned!
 
 Will H2know shut off my water? 
 
H2know is a monitoring-only device. However, we are already working on a companion device that will automatically or remotely shut off water based on user configurations.
 
 How does H2know save me money? 
 
There are several studies that examine the impact of leaks in homes and the impact of metering. Studies by the EPA and USGS indicate that as much as 15% of the average homeowner’s water use is attributed to leaks. Other studies demonstrate the presence of a monthly-read meter can reduce water consumption by 5-30%. Analysis of U.S. consumption behaviors suggest there is a 20% reduction opportunity for homeowners by improving water habits. The conclusion is that a device like H2know can help save the average U.S. homeowner $250 in water-related expenses every year.
In addition, a plumbing leak or burst pipe is the most common non-weather related home insurance claim. There are various studies on this topic, we use the mid-range estimates of 1 million insurance claims at an average of $10,000 per claim. This means the average home has a 1 in 75 chance of a catastrophic leak this year and every year. We want to put an end to those leaks and give you peace of mind.
 
 How does H2know help the environment? 
 
The sum of leaks and unwanted use across all homes in the U.S. is a staggering 2 trillion gallons of water. That is enough water to meet the needs of homes in our 50 largest cities for an entire year. Access to clean water and the infrastructure to deliver that water is increasingly stressed and puts demands on the environment. In addition, water conveyance (moving water from its source to the home to sewage treatment) is one of the leading consumers of energy. The energy consumption on leaks and unwanted water usage alone produces an estimated 3.7 million MT Tons of CO2 every year.
Conservation Labs was one of the winners of the inaugural CES Climate Change Innovator Awards for our ability to demonstrate a reduction greenhouse gas (GHG) emissions if H2know is widely implemented.

story:
Two years ago it took 73 cranks on my pepper mill to season steak.  I wondered if the same job could be done with less cranking.

786 days, 54 revisions, 11 prototypes,  82 tests, and 4,673 sneezes later, the MÄNNKITCHEN Pepper Cannon was born.

Babish making profuse peppering look positively painless. Because now it is.

 

 

 

 Pepper Your Steak In 7 Cranks Instead of 70

 

 

What Others Say:

 

 

10X The Output of Top-Rated Mills

 

Speed:  At up to 10x the output of top-rated pepper mills, the Pepper cannon produces extravagant quantities of fresh ground pepper. 

 

You may briefly think "That's too much pepper" when you first use your new Pepper Cannon.  Don't be alarmed, this is normal. 

 

 

Simply decrease the coarseness until the output is merely excessive, pepper your eggs with 1/2 crank instead of 5 cranks, and with your extra time cure cancer and give your partner proper lovin'. 

 

 More Grind Options 

 

Ordinary pepper mills are capable of producing pepper in the 12-28 mesh size range.  

 

The Pepper Cannon can grind from 8 to over 60 mesh, producing pepper coarse enough for stocks and roast beef, and finer than the pepper you buy pre-ground because your old mill can't grind fine enough.

 

 

World-class Grind Quality 

 

Traditional pepper mills use wobbly drive shafts that turn an undersized self-dulling burr.  

 

The male and female burrs grind against each other (which is way less fun than it sounds) resulting in dull, chipped burr teeth and allowing larger than desired pepper particles to pass.  

 

The Pepper Cannon uses a heavy double-bearing supported drive shaft to power wicked-sharp burrs made of high-carbon stainless steel forged in the fires of Mount Yougetthepoint. 

 

With the Pepper Cannon, you can grind everything from pixie-dust-fine-powder up to cracked pepper in seconds.

 

NOTE: Grind consistency is a function of maintaining equal distance between the burrs as they rotate.  As such, it is expected that pepper particles smaller than the grind setting will pass through while larger particles will not. 

 

So, a consistent grind means that no particles larger than a certain size will pass.  The stabilized drive shaft and precision burrs on the Pepper Cannon make it so.

 

 

Superior Consistency

 

The traditional method of placing a rotating grind adjuster in direct contact with a rotating top is a recipe for wildly inconsistent ground pepper.

 

The grind adjuster on the Pepper Cannon is on the base and uses dual spring-plungers and detents so it won't move unless you move it.  

 

Make on-the-fly grind adjustments quickly and easily and rest assured the grind adjuster will stay where you set it.

 

 Effortless Filling

 

Having to remove the adjustment nut, remove the top, replace the top, replace the adjustment nut and recalibrate your pepper mill every time you refill it is not awesome. 

 

The Pepper Cannon features a top that pops off with the push of a button for easy filling then presses back into place with a satisfying "Click". 

 

 

 The Bloody Hand Conundrum: Solved

 

You've seasoned meat on one side, now what?  

You've got to flip the meat over and season the other side, which means you'll either have to wash your hands mid-seasoning OR handle your pepper mill with a bloody hand.

 

We've all been there. Don't let this inconvenience force you into using inferior pre-ground pepper. The MÄNNKITCHEN pepper mill features a removable base cup.

 

1/4 twist when removing & replacing the cup makes it easy.

 

You can use the Pepper Cannon without the cup in normal operation, or you can grind up to 1/3 cup before you start handling meat, then sprinkle it directly from the cup when one-handed peppering is preferable.

 

Superior Build Quality + Materials

 

The MÄNNKITCHEN Pepper Cannon body is milled from a solid chunk of Aerospace Grade Aluminum and then anodized black to make the surface durable, non-reactive, and easy to clean.

 

  • Not plastic:   Plastic breaks and deforms easily.
  • Not wood:   Wood retains moisture.
  • Not glass:  Glass shatters and allows light to degrade pepper.

 

 

Metal construction allows us to achieve the very strict tolerances required for precision parts to produce exceptional results while adding strength and durability.  

Milling from a sold chunk of metal is not the way to make a cheap pepper mill, it's the way to make the best pepper mill.

 

 Precision Engineering

 

The Pepper Cannon is precision engineered to produce the widest range of ground pepper at the fastest speed.  It's a quantum leap forward in pepper milling.

 

Rewards

 

Backers will get $40 OFF the Pepper Cannon plus FREE shipping anywhere in the USA. Backers outside the USA will pay a flat $22 for shipping (even if you order multiple units).

 

The Pepper Cannon outperforms high priced mills in more than just speed, consistency, and grind options:

 

There are many pepper mills that cost more than the Pepper Cannon, but In almost every case the high price is the result of form rather than function:

  • Super tall
  • Exotic materials
  • Famous designer/brand names
  • Unusual shapes

 

Every decision in the creation of the Pepper Cannon was driven by function:

 

  • High output
  • Maximum grind range
  • Consistent grind quality
  • Super durable
  • Easy to use/refill/calibrate
  • Low center of gravity for stability

 

Does the Pepper Cannon look like a million bucks? 

 

Of course it does.  It performs even better.  

 

 Sustainable Materials 

 

Aluminum is the most abundant metal on planet Earth, is 100% recyclable, and can be recycled indefinitely.

 

The pepper cannon body, top, and base cup are made from recycled Aerospace grade aluminum with anodized black exterior.

 

 

One Last Testimonial:  

 

Things you can buy today for $159:

 

  • 8lb Bone-in Prime Rib Roast
  • One night in a 2 Star Hotel
  • Dinner for two at a steakhouse
  • 4.5 ounces of caviar
  • 1 Bottle Château Haut-Bailly Pessac-Léognan Cabernet
  • A pair of running shoes
  • The best pepper mill in the World

 

Oops, Here's Another Testimonial:

 

Sorry, this just keeps happening:

 

Frequently Asked Questions

 

Why build the pepper cannon?

We were tired of using stale and inferior pre-ground pepper because existing mills are slow, and we were tired of cranking ordinary pepper mills an excessive number of times to get small amounts of inconsistently ground pepper.  

Maybe you are tired of those things too.

When you see top chefs using premium mills crank over 60 times for a simple dish, it means there's an opportunity to improve the experience.

Once we started working on the speed problem, it became apparent that other problems like filling, calibrating, and grind quality/range were also fixable.  

We've ground pepper one way for so long that we're used to it, but now there's a better option. 

 

Why call it the Pepper Cannon?

Two reasons.

Reason 1: The more comparisons we did between our prototypes and top-rated pepper mills, the more it was apparent that there was no comparison.  The Pepper Cannon is a different animal, so it gets a different name.

Reason 2: It's difficult to be upset when a product called the "Pepper Cannon" puts out a lot of pepper.  With a name like Pepper Cannon, you know exactly what to expect.

 

 

Is the pepper cannon REALLY  better?  What difference does it really make?

For professional cooks, it means better food made faster.

For pepper lovers, it means finally getting the amount of pepper you want.

It's the difference between using fresh ground and musty pre-ground pepper. 

It's using 15 cranks to pepper a side of brisket instead of 150.  

It's the ability to get super fine and super coarse pepper from one device, in seconds.

It's the only pepper mill that will prompt you to say "Whoa" when you use it.

 

But, will there be too much pepper?

No.  There will be the exact amount of pepper you want, ground more consistently, in a fraction of the time.

If you want to decrease the output, either crank it less or adjust the pepper cannon to a finer setting.

* Unless you dial the pepper cannon wide open.  Then there may be too much pepper.  Use your new pepper power wisely.

 

 

Does the Pepper Cannon put out a lot of pepper at all settings?

No, the finer the grind, the less pepper comes out.  

You can adjust the Pepper Cannon so fine that pepper stops coming out completely. 

We call this setting "invisibly fine" or "inert iocane powder". 

 

 

Why do you endorse the grind & shake method?

Every pepper mill can drop remnants of pepper after grinding when you set it down.   

After grinding, give the Pepper Cannon (or any other pepper mill) one shake above whatever you're seasoning before putting it down.

This helps prevent wasting pepper and leaving pepper where you don't want it.

 

 

Will I have to refill my Pepper Cannon frequently?

That depends on your use. The Cannon holds a half cup of peppercorns, which is generous but not excessive.  

It's best to store peppercorns in a sealed container to prolong freshness, so we opted against a super large reservoir (and corresponding height) that would take home users a long time to empty.

Plus the Pepper Cannon is so easy to refill that it's no longer a chore.  Pop the top, pour in fresh peppercorns, and click the top back on.  No need to remove, replace, and recalibrate the Pepper Cannon just to refill it.

 

 

Will the Pepper Cannon come pre-filled with peppercorns?

The Pepper Cannon will ship empty, but we're researching options to include high-quality peppercorns as an add-on (in a separate sealed container) after the campaign ends. 

We hope to source various peppercorn varieties from multiple locations around the globe so you have an amazing selection of the World's best pepper to go with your favorite new seasoning machine.   

If you wholesale fresh organic peppercorns, email info AT mannkitchen DOT com.

 

 

Can I grind red peppercorns, and white peppercorns, and green peppercorns, and coffee, and cloves, and fennel, and anise, and coriander in it?

Yes.

You should get one Pepper Cannon for each of those things though, or your coffee will taste extra bold & special.

 

Will the Pepper Cannon be available in different colors?  I want one for each spice!

Currently, to minimize costs and simplify fulfillment the Cannon will only be available in black. We're looking at the possibility of adding silicon sleeves and/or extra tops of differing colors down the road.

 

How do I clean my Pepper Cannon?

Wipe the exterior with a warm damp cloth or paper towel.  It is recommended to keep the interior of the Pepper Cannon dry.  If you must wash it, be certain to dry the interior thoroughly before refilling as it uses dry bearings, and they need to be kept dry.

Do not put the Pepper Cannon in the dishwasher.

 

What if I don’t like pepper?

Purchase a Pepper Cannon to give away to someone who loves cooking. 

Right now you're thinking of someone who would love this.  

Get one for them.

 

 

But, I’m satisfied with my existing pepper mill, aren’t I?

Remember when you used to get up early to harness your horses to the carriage and the horses would poop so much-and it was everywhere?  

And then you got a Tesla?  

Replacing your pepper mill with a Pepper Cannon is like that. 

You won’t want to go back to the old way.

 

Isn’t $199 expensive for a pepper mill?

Yes, it is.  And a new car is expensive compared to a bicycle.

The Pepper Cannon was engineered and built for performance and it performs exceptionally well.  We could have made it less expensively, but it wouldn't be the same quality.

Hopefully one day we'll be able to order material in enough quantity to bring the cost within reach of more people because no one should have to continue grinding pepper the old way.

That said, the Pepper Cannon will never be as inexpensive as ordinary mills because there's nothing ordinary about it.

Also, backers will get $40 OFF + FREE Shipping to all US locations!

 

 

Will you ship outside the US?

Yes, flat rate USPS shipping outside the US is $22.  Shipping stays at $22 even if you order multiple units.

 

 

If I'm outside the US, will I have to pay taxes and duties?

Taxes and duties differ between countries, but if your jurisdiction taxes goods shipped internationally, yes you will have to pay them when your Cannon arrives.  

 

 

Can I grind Salt in it?

No, salt will corrode even stainless steel eventually.  

Plus, inside each salt crystal is… more salt!  It doesn’t have any added flavor/aroma qualities that are improved by grinding, and it doesn’t degrade like pepper when pre-ground.  

A salt shaker (or box, or bowl) with the size salt you want is fine, unlike a pepper shaker, which is a crime against flavor.

 

   

 

Will there be a salt grinder? 

Salt and steel don't always play well together for prolonged periods, so a salt mill would require ceramic burrs and other internal changes.  

We anticipate less demand for a premium salt mill because grinding salt fresh does not change the flavor/aroma, only the texture.  

 

 

But I like cranking my pepper mill many, many times every time I eat.

That’s not a question.  

 

 

 

What's the downside of the Pepper Cannon? It can't be all sunshine and butterflies...

You'll probably go through more pepper. Also, the Pepper Cannon grinds more peppercorns at once so it requires more force to turn than ordinary mills at some settings.

Oh, and dinner guests will try and steal it.

 

 

What does MÄNNKITCHEN mean?

Männ is old Norse for “my”, so männkitchen means "my kitchen".  

So, in a way-my kitchen is your kitchen, and your kitchen is my kitchen!  

Which reminds me- you're out of cheese.

 

 

Who are you?

I’m a guy who cooks a lot and appreciates kitchen tools that work exceptionally well. 

My background is in design, and I enjoy short walks on the beach.

 

 

Did your Mom really say you were a difficult child?

Not out loud within my hearing.  Yet.  

Yes, the other testimonials are real.

 

 

 

What if you take my money and run?

I understand that running adds years to your life, but all those years are spent running. 

Plus I'm still working on my "before" picture. 

We had a successful crowdfunding campaign for the MK9 chef knife last year that was delivered on-time and got rave reviews, and that was way more fun than running. 

*I reserve the right to engage in non-running activities with your money.

Like flying.  And skipping.

 

Ok, so can you actually deliver?

Yes. The Pepper Cannon has been in the works for over 2 years.  We have working prototypes in the hands of amazing cooks right now, and we have manufacturing partners ready to get to work.

If there are unexpected delays, we will be transparent throughout the process and offer the option of a full refund to those who decide not to wait.

 

 

Why would anyone need a pepper cannon?

Professional kitchens need it to save time and increase the consistency/quality of their black pepper.  

You need it for the same reasons, plus to prompt envy in dinner guests.

 

 

I’m against firearms, is a pepper cannon a violation of my moral code?

Yes, but in the best way possible.

 

 

I’m from England where firearms are illegal, and even pointy objects are coming under increasing government scrutiny.  Can I still get one?

Absolutely!

 

 

Is the Pepper Cannon loud?

It is the quietest cannon we've tested.

 

 

Is the Pepper Cannon better than a pepper shaker?

The Pepper Cannon is better than a pepper shaker in the same way that eating your favorite meal is better than a mouthful of cat litter. 

 

 

Why aluminum?

Building it out of metal enables us to machine precision parts that fit together with exact tolerances so the results are consistent and fast. 

Also, aluminum is the most plentiful metal on Earth, is the easiest to recycle, and can be recycled again and again, indefinitely. 

 

 

Do people really like me, or do they just come over because I have a Pepper Cannon?

They really like you. 

Aaaand the Pepper Cannon helps.

 

What should I do with my old pepper mill?  Looking at it brings back unpleasant memories…

Forgive your old pepper mill.  It served you as best it could.  

 

 

 

Why didn’t you make this years ago?

I know, right? 

We tried for 2 years and it took longer than expected to get the details right.

 

 

Share this link with someone who could use it!

 

https://www.indiegogo.com/projects/pepper-cannon-the-pepper-mill-for-pepper-lovers/x/22555573#/

A pair of running shoes
The best pepper mill in the World
 Oops, Here's Another Testimonial: Sorry, this just keeps happening: Frequently Asked Questions Why build the pepper cannon?We were tired of using stale and inferior pre-ground pepper because existing mills are slow, and we were tired of cranking ordinary pepper mills an excessive number of times to get small amounts of inconsistently ground pepper.  Maybe you are tired of those things too.When you see top chefs using premium mills crank over 60 times for a simple dish, it means there's an opportunity to improve the experience.Once we started working on the speed problem, it became apparent that other problems like filling, calibrating, and grind quality/range were also fixable.  We've ground pepper one way for so long that we're used to it, but now there's a better option.  Why call it the Pepper Cannon?Two reasons.Reason 1: The more comparisons we did between our prototypes and top-rated pepper mills, the more it was apparent that there was no comparison.  The Pepper Cannon is a different animal, so it gets a different name.Reason 2: It's difficult to be upset when a product called the "Pepper Cannon" puts out a lot of pepper.  With a name like Pepper Cannon, you know exactly what to expect.  Is the pepper cannon REALLY  better?  What difference does it really make?For professional cooks, it means better food made faster.For pepper lovers, it means finally getting the amount of pepper you want.It's the difference between using fresh ground and musty pre-ground pepper. It's using 15 cranks to pepper a side of brisket instead of 150.  It's the ability to get super fine and super coarse pepper from one device, in seconds.It's the only pepper mill that will prompt you to say "Whoa" when you use it. But, will there be too much pepper?No.  There will be the exact amount of pepper you want, ground more consistently, in a fraction of the time.If you want to decrease the output, either crank it less or adjust the pepper cannon to a finer setting.* Unless you dial the pepper cannon wide open.  Then there may be too much pepper.  Use your new pepper power wisely.  Does the Pepper Cannon put out a lot of pepper at all settings?No, the finer the grind, the less pepper comes out.  You can adjust the Pepper Cannon so fine that pepper stops coming out completely. We call this setting "invisibly fine" or "inert iocane powder".   Why do you endorse the grind & shake method?Every pepper mill can drop remnants of pepper after grinding when you set it down.   After grinding, give the Pepper Cannon (or any other pepper mill) one shake above whatever you're seasoning before putting it down.This helps prevent wasting pepper and leaving pepper where you don't want it.  Will I have to refill my Pepper Cannon frequently?That depends on your use. The Cannon holds a half cup of peppercorns, which is generous but not excessive.  It's best to store peppercorns in a sealed container to prolong freshness, so we opted against a super large reservoir (and corresponding height) that would take home users a long time to empty.Plus the Pepper Cannon is so easy to refill that it's no longer a chore.  Pop the top, pour in fresh peppercorns, and click the top back on.  No need to remove, replace, and recalibrate the Pepper Cannon just to refill it.  Will the Pepper Cannon come pre-filled with peppercorns?The Pepper Cannon will ship empty, but we're researching options to include high-quality peppercorns as an add-on (in a separate sealed container) after the campaign ends. We hope to source various peppercorn varieties from multiple locations around the globe so you have an amazing selection of the World's best pepper to go with your favorite new seasoning machine.   If you wholesale fresh organic peppercorns, email info AT mannkitchen DOT com.  Can I grind red peppercorns, and white peppercorns, and green peppercorns, and coffee, and cloves, and fennel, and anise, and coriander in it?Yes.You should get one Pepper Cannon for each of those things though, or your coffee will taste extra bold & special. Will the Pepper Cannon be available in different colors?  I want one for each spice!Currently, to minimize costs and simplify fulfillment the Cannon will only be available in black. We're looking at the possibility of adding silicon sleeves and/or extra tops of differing colors down the road. How do I clean my Pepper Cannon?Wipe the exterior with a warm damp cloth or paper towel.  It is recommended to keep the interior of the Pepper Cannon dry.  If you must wash it, be certain to dry the interior thoroughly before refilling as it uses dry bearings, and they need to be kept dry.Do not put the Pepper Cannon in the dishwasher. What if I don’t like pepper?Purchase a Pepper Cannon to give away to someone who loves cooking. Right now you're thinking of someone who would love this.  Get one for them.  But, I’m satisfied with my existing pepper mill, aren’t I?Remember when you used to get up early to harness your horses to the carriage and the horses would poop so much-and it was everywhere?  And then you got a Tesla?  Replacing your pepper mill with a Pepper Cannon is like that. You won’t want to go back to the old way. Isn’t $199 expensive for a pepper mill?Yes, it is.  And a new car is expensive compared to a bicycle.The Pepper Cannon was engineered and built for performance and it performs exceptionally well.  We could have made it less expensively, but it wouldn't be the same quality.Hopefully one day we'll be able to order material in enough quantity to bring the cost within reach of more people because no one should have to continue grinding pepper the old way.That said, the Pepper Cannon will never be as inexpensive as ordinary mills because there's nothing ordinary about it.Also, backers will get $40 OFF + FREE Shipping to all US locations!  Will you ship outside the US?Yes, flat rate USPS shipping outside the US is $22.  Shipping stays at $22 even if you order multiple units.  If I'm outside the US, will I have to pay taxes and duties?Taxes and duties differ between countries, but if your jurisdiction taxes goods shipped internationally, yes you will have to pay them when your Cannon arrives.    Can I grind Salt in it?No, salt will corrode even stainless steel eventually.  Plus, inside each salt crystal is… more salt!  It doesn’t have any added flavor/aroma qualities that are improved by grinding, and it doesn’t degrade like pepper when pre-ground.  A salt shaker (or box, or bowl) with the size salt you want is fine, unlike a pepper shaker, which is a crime against flavor.     Will there be a salt grinder? Salt and steel don't always play well together for prolonged periods, so a salt mill would require ceramic burrs and other internal changes.  We anticipate less demand for a premium salt mill because grinding salt fresh does not change the flavor/aroma, only the texture.    But I like cranking my pepper mill many, many times every time I eat.That’s not a question.     What's the downside of the Pepper Cannon? It can't be all sunshine and butterflies...You'll probably go through more pepper. Also, the Pepper Cannon grinds more peppercorns at once so it requires more force to turn than ordinary mills at some settings.Oh, and dinner guests will try and steal it.  What does MÄNNKITCHEN mean?Männ is old Norse for “my”, so männkitchen means "my kitchen".  So, in a way-my kitchen is your kitchen, and your kitchen is my kitchen!  Which reminds me- you're out of cheese.  Who are you?I’m a guy who cooks a lot and appreciates kitchen tools that work exceptionally well. My background is in design, and I enjoy short walks on the beach.  Did your Mom really say you were a difficult child?Not out loud within my hearing.  Yet.  Yes, the other testimonials are real.   What if you take my money and run?I understand that running adds years to your life, but all those years are spent running. Plus I'm still working on my "before" picture. We had a successful crowdfunding campaign for the MK9 chef knife last year that was delivered on-time and got rave reviews, and that was way more fun than running. *I reserve the right to engage in non-running activities with your money.Like flying.  And skipping. Ok, so can you actually deliver?Yes. The Pepper Cannon has been in the works for over 2 years.  We have working prototypes in the hands of amazing cooks right now, and we have manufacturing partners ready to get to work.If there are unexpected delays, we will be transparent throughout the process and offer the option of a full refund to those who decide not to wait.  Why would anyone need a pepper cannon?Professional kitchens need it to save time and increase the consistency/quality of their black pepper.  You need it for the same reasons, plus to prompt envy in dinner guests.  I’m against firearms, is a pepper cannon a violation of my moral code?Yes, but in the best way possible.  I’m from England where firearms are illegal, and even pointy objects are coming under increasing government scrutiny.  Can I still get one?Absolutely!  Is the Pepper Cannon loud?It is the quietest cannon we've tested.  Is the Pepper Cannon better than a pepper shaker?The Pepper Cannon is better than a pepper shaker in the same way that eating your favorite meal is better than a mouthful of cat litter.   Why aluminum?Building it out of metal enables us to machine precision parts that fit together with exact tolerances so the results are consistent and fast. Also, aluminum is the most plentiful metal on Earth, is the easiest to recycle, and can be recycled again and again, indefinitely.   Do people really like me, or do they just come over because I have a Pepper Cannon?They really like you. Aaaand the Pepper Cannon helps.  What should I do with my old pepper mill?  Looking at it brings back unpleasant memories…Forgive your old pepper mill.  It served you as best it could.     Why didn’t you make this years ago?I know, right? We tried for 2 years and it took longer than expected to get the details right.  Share this link with someone who could use it! https://www.indiegogo.com/projects/pepper-cannon-the-pepper-mill-for-pepper-lovers/x/22555573#/ Not awkward. It's NOT!

story:
Highlights

  • We're announcing a new way of using apps; first adapted to TWIC-apps

  • You can access functions not included in the app you are in without leaving the current one

  • No annoying detour by exiting one app to access another anymore

  • Help-Icon provides help wherever you are

  • TWIC-apps should replace pre-installed apps

  • An API is going to allow other developers to use the two way connection to make their apps more efficient and enlarge our network

  • TWIC will be released on Android first


WHO WE ARE:

We are two students (Jonathan Michel, Patrice Becker) from Frankfurt, Germany.

 


WHAT WE DO:

We’ve been working on this project for nearly a year. There have been ups and downs but finally we're able to present you an idea which makes your apps much more connected than they ever were before. For us it's important to provide different views on topics; especially today's software should be questioned.


WHY WE DO WHAT WE DO:

We noticed that our apps and programs are a very important part in making the world more connected. But on the other hand, we can not see apps or software interacting with each other. In our day to day lives, we can make connections where we think there is none. It's magnificent to have more than one solution to reach a goal. We do what we do because we think we can convert this biological and natural concept into an app to make your daily routine easier. 

If you support us you can expect you will change the future by helping the two way connection to come to life. By doing so, we want to build the first apps with those features including a calendar, gallery, mail, notes and news app. (What's behind them will be explained below.)

                                                                                                                                                    


APPS AND FUNCTIONS MORE IN DETAIL:

A new generation of connected apps/ software, designed to make your daily life easier – Two way connection and views for everyone.

Looking for connected apps which provide a more real life feeling for your Android phone? Introducing twic

TWIC has one purpose, we want to show everyone that we should connect apps and our software to connect our life even better. Our dream is that one day, one app could replace all apps of the same kind with a much higher usability and the feeling just to use one app.

But to do so, first we have to make a much smaller beginning/start.

We think most of us are using standard applications such as mail, calendar, gallery and notes. With those, we want to show you what the way of connected apps through a two way connection could be like.

For every app a short introduction:

                                                                                                           


                                      TWIC:

This app includes all the following: the app which shows you the most important information. With only one look, your latest mails, your next appointments and your latest notes will be shown in the news app; we just call it twic.

                                                                  CALENDAR

Like we all know, appointments have a huge impact on/in our daily lives. To make sure you'll never miss one, we’ll first show you your next appointments and also give you the opportunity to change between: week, yesterday, tomorrow and every day in the current month. For creating a new one and all others that were mentioned before/previously, you only need one step.

          

                                           

                                                                MAIL

Regarding your mail, it is important to us that everything is clear and that you get as much information as possible in a way of being happy to see much.

         

         

After creating a note in Mail, you can access the note with the context it was created in, even in the Mail-app.

                                                                                                                                    

                                                                   GALLERY

                                           Pictures will follow soon

Gallery is where your moments with your friends, family or colleagues are saved. To guarantee that: the way of sorting and views is going to change. As soon as the final design for our gallery is finished, we'll inform you.

                                                                                                

                                                       NOTES

Notes are a key/main frame in our connection based project. To every previous app, you can take a note. It will be saved in the Notes-app and you can access it even in the app where it was created and also the content will still be there.

                                                                                         


MORE SOLUTIONS THROUGH TWO WAY CONNECTION:

Two way connection includes that you have access to different things in different ways - Like you have it in real life. You have more solutions to go there in whichever way you want to.

                       

SEARCH & HELP SYMBOL:

You get help where you need it.

On every screen you'll find a search and a help symbol to guide you when you don't know what to do.


OUR DREA IS ONE FOR ALL:

One app for all and someday even an app for everything. The two way connection starts a new generation of apps. It will show us the way; let's realize our dream with your help!


OUR SCHEDULE IF EVERYTHING IS GOING TO BE LIKE WE HOPE:

We did a cost estimate before starting this project. Asking several companies,  every cost estimate we got was around €80,000-120,000.

So we've chosen the amount in between that range.

After helping us the get the required money, we wanted to do everything with a company we trust and which seems to fulfil everything for the amount we received.

The dream of connected apps we are currently realizing includes offering our new technologies to other app developers, with other apps we can simplify your workflow even more and enlarge the network of apps we already have.

To do so, we want to offer a documented, easily usable API, which can be implemented by any developer and provides them everything to be a part of it.

The Beta should be finished in the fourth quarter of 2015.


                                 



TWIC BENEFITS & AWARDS

TWIC helps you to do things faster, in different ways designed for your needs. So you don't have to dig around.

TWIC is simple, innovative and connected.

TWIC will be developed for Android. The result is an Android mobile phone experience that is as unique as you are. As soon as possible, iOS will be supported aswell.


1$  Little Supporter

5$ Regular

5$ Early Bird

7$ Almost Early Bird

8$ Late Early Bird 

10$ TWIC Silver

15$ Special: Fulfilling Dream

20$ Family Pack

25$ TWIC Gold

40$ Friends + Colleagues Pack

50$ TWIC Fashion Shirt

50$ TWIC Two Way Connection Shirt

250$ TWIC Dinner 

550$ TWIC Deluxe



FAQ

What platforms does TWIC work with?

TWIC is going to be developed for Android first. The reason for that: most users use Android. As soon as possible, we're going to add iOS.

Does TWIC work for my Android phone as well as tablet?

First, it'll only be available for phones. We thought about where it's most useful for everyone; we decided phones are more important because you take it with you where ever you are. Of course the two way connection is also very useful for tablets but to provide the best user experience we can only do one at the beginning.

Why do you start this project with Crowdfunding?

We love sharing ideas and Indiegogo is a great platform for doing so. We hope that you and all others who see our project share it because we believe that it can change the world of apps.

If TWIC strikes a deal with an OEM, what will happen to the software? Will everything be cancelled?

Our mission is not just to build this app. We want software and especially apps to get connected. If an OEM has the same view, we'll do whatever we can to succeed in our mission. But that doesn't mean that we won't build those apps, the money we get will be used for building them. But of course we always have to look if the market is about to change, if someone is doing the same as we do. We'll let you know if our schedule is changing.

I pledge 5$, what will happen when the App is available?

As soon as the app is available, you'll get access.

What kind of language support will there be?

Even though english is priority number 1, we do have plans to offer TWIC in other languages too.

Can I be involved in testing or translating?

Surely you can, just send us a mail and we'll inform you.


Credits:

OnePlus Mockup - Antonin Fels

story:
Get your own steampunk lamp from


Want to know something more about our project? 

1. Intro                                       (something from and about us)

2. Our project                           (goals of the project, beautiful pictures)

3. What we offer?                    (maybe some perks?)

4. About us                               (who are we? )

5. Contact                                 (phone numbers, shoe sizes, facebook)

6. IndieGoGo campaign         (first time on IndieGoGo? let us help?)

7. Other ways you can help     ( can't contribute? spread the word!) 

It all started about a year ago. We wanted to find a perfect gift for our friends wedding. The goal was clear - a steampunk lamp. After weeks of searching we've decided. We need to do this by our own!  


Our journey begun!  

iBiomech is the result of months of studying and experimenting with different designs and optimal construction methods for developing the best possible product. The final result is better then we ever imagine. 

When we decided to establish a brand to represent our craft, it was important that every aspect of design and construction was held to the highest standard of quality. Made from the best quality materials, strongest wood and tons of creativity and imagination this extraordinary lamp will make every space look better. 

WHAT WE NEED?

Goal of our project is to accumulate an adequate amount of money to promote and start mass production for our iBiomech project. Why 5000 € ? Because we don't have it... but seriously...we don't have it. Ok, do the point:

First of all, to buy finest materials that will ensure the highest quality of products. In addition to this - the relevant promotion that will allow entering with product to the wider market, presenting him to as many people as we can.  Something else?


Of course ... to make the production faster and the product better we need more precise tools. Better CNC router, saws, paints. Thats only a tip of an iceberg. Other important things? Yes... But not for 5K... Unless we manage to exceed our main goal. 

Without a relatively large inventory on hand, successful e-commerce though our website is unrealistic. With the capital raised during this campaign, we will re invest into new equipment, develop new products and build inventory to sell through our website. 

Can we do it? Can you help? :) 


SOME HIGHLIGHTS:

- FINEST WOOD: Each lamp is made individually from high quality Polish wood. 
No lamp is exactly the same.

- STYLISH & UNIQUE: Our lamps were made to fit right in with the latest design trends, while at the same time, stand out from all the other out there. 

- ORIGINAL DESIGN: Lamps are 100% designed by us. Our vision how a cool lamp should look like.

- HAND-MADE: Although some parts are cut by our CNC router, most of the work is done by our own hands. Grinding, painting, assembling - it is all handmade.

WHY WE NEED YOUR HELP?

- buying materials ( best / finest )

- promotional purposes

- better, more precise tools & equipment

- to face unexpectable production  challenges

1. iBiomech Mini 

Dimensions:

height: 18-26 cm  (7"-10,2")

width (length): 20-40 cm (7,8"-15,7")

materials: wood, steel

light source: Edison lighting bulb E27 (110-230V)


2. iBiomech Tripod

Dimensions:

height: 21-32 cm  (8,2"-12,6")

width (length): 23-40 cm (7,8"-15,7")

materials: wood, steel

light source: Edison lighting bulb E27 (110-230V)


3. iBiomech One

height: 20-41 cm  (7,8"-16,1")

width (length): 25-52 cm (9,8"-20,4")

materials: wood, steel

light source: Edison lighting bulb E27 (110-230V)


4. iBiomech Tripod + iBiomech Mini

5. iBiomech One + iBiomech Mini

6. iBiomech One + iBiomech Tripod

7. iBiomech One + Tripod + Mini

8. Your iBiomech

New, original project made only for You and with You. We will design and make a lamp, including all your suggestion, guidance and desires. You want to have a beautiful thing that will be envied by all your friends? That's the right choice :-)


TIME LINE


3 guys, crazy idea and a lot of passion.  This is us, and we're proud to be here! 

Born 1982. A self-taught master of artistic
composition in wood. CNC routers specialist. Without him, no project could come to life. Thanks to him, the final version of the concept becomes better than any assumptions. A real workaholic.

Head designer and father of iBiomech project.
PhD student, Faculty of Maritime Technology at the West Pomeranian University of Technology. Co-founder and member of „Lake of the Crown of the World” expedition, which is known for 2 world records for diving in the mountain lakes.Professional diver – III class. Equipment specialist. 

Born 1985. The guy from the clip :) Second designer. Man who initiated all this madness.  PR and Social Media Ninja.  He don't know to much about woodworking but fair enough to by a smart-ass. A real fan of terrible music and even more terrible movies. 

DESIGN PROCESS

In the design process, the very first step was the idea of a shape through sketches. We've tried to make the first model as cool and attractive as it ever could be.


In the second stage, the model was transferred into a 3d model and we could focus on new functionalities.


In the third stage several physical hand-made prototypes were made for testing and improving the features.

After evaluating the proper changes our first final model called iBiomech 1.01 . We will not show it to you - we are bored with it :-)

Few months later, after a lot of thinking, improving and argueing we came up with three new lamps, that really makes us proud. Meet iBiomech Mini, Tripod and ONE :)



Getting a new product to market can be a difficult process and unfortunately delays can happen due to unforeseen circumstances. Facing mass production for the first time can by challenging. We have taken every precaution to make sure our lamps meet strict quality standards.


We anticipate a production timeline of 8 weeks after reaching our goal, and then a shipping timeline of 6 weeks (max), which includes preparing the shipments. The time of shipment should not exceed 6 weeks, but will depend where the perk will be send.


We are confident with this timing, plus or minus a few weeks. We have managed out the unknowns to the best of our abilities, but as people who care deeply about our product and reputation, we will communicate with you throughout the process so that you know exactly when to expect your shipment.

We promise to do our best to make sure that everything is done efficiently and effectively. We are excited to bring iBiomech lamps to life. Thank you for your support! 

Other Ways You Can Help


Can't contribute? No problem. Help by spreading the word! Just click the share button!

Get your own steampunk lamp from










Want to know something more about our project? 

1. Intro                                       (something from and about us)
2.  Our project                           (goals of the project, beautiful pictures)
3. What we offer?                    (maybe some perks?)
4. About us                               (who are we? )
5. Contact                                 (phone numbers, shoe sizes, facebook)
6. IndieGoGo campaign         (first time on IndieGoGo? let us help?)
7. Other ways you can help     ( can't contribute? spread the word!) 



It all started about a year ago. We wanted to find a perfect gift for our friends wedding. The goal was clear - a steampunk lamp. After weeks of searching we've decided. We need to do this by our own!  



Our journey begun!  
iBiomech is the result of months of studying and experimenting with different designs and optimal construction methods for developing the best possible product. The final result is better then we ever imagine. 
When we decided to establish a brand to represent our craft, it was important that every aspect of design and construction was held to the highest standard of quality. Made from the best quality materials, strongest wood and tons of creativity and imagination this extraordinary lamp will make every space look better. 





WHAT WE NEED?
Goal of our project is to accumulate an adequate amount of money to promote and start mass production for our iBiomech project. Why 5000 € ? Because we don't have it... but seriously...we don't have it. Ok, do the point:
First of all, to buy finest materials that will ensure the highest quality of products. In addition to this - the relevant promotion that will allow entering with product to the wider market, presenting him to as many people as we can.  Something else?



Of course ... to make the production faster and the product better we need more precise tools. Better CNC router, saws, paints. Thats only a tip of an iceberg. Other important things? Yes... But not for 5K... Unless we manage to exceed our main goal. 
Without a relatively large inventory on hand, successful e-commerce though our website is unrealistic. With the capital raised during this campaign, we will re invest into new equipment, develop new products and build inventory to sell through our website. 
Can we do it? Can you help? :) 





SOME HIGHLIGHTS:
- FINEST WOOD: Each lamp is made individually from high quality Polish wood. No lamp is exactly the same.
- STYLISH & UNIQUE: Our lamps were made to fit right in with the latest design trends, while at the same time, stand out from all the other out there. 
- ORIGINAL DESIGN: Lamps are 100% designed by us. Our vision how a cool lamp should look like.
- HAND-MADE: Although some parts are cut by our CNC router, most of the work is done by our own hands. Grinding, painting, assembling - it is all handmade.

- buying materials ( best / finest )
- promotional purposes
- better, more precise tools & equipment
- to face unexpectable production  challenges

materials: wood, steel
light source: Edison lighting bulb E27 (110-230V)

materials: wood, steel

story:
Thanks to Dori you will never have to water your plants again. It uses multiple sensors and our proprietary irrigation system to care for your plants.

 

No more forgetting, and no more dying plants.

It happens to often, we buy or are gifted a new beautiful plant, and after few weeks it is all dry and looking ugly, and only then we realize that it was last watered two weeks ago. With Dori this will never happen again!

Easy setup with one button

Dori has only one button which is used to turn it on, select one of five levels of watering and display low power and water reminders. It couldn't be simpler. We also know that nobody wants more unnecessary apps, that’s why we decided to make Dori totally independent from your smartphone. 

it is also versatile, Dori works well with all kinds of plants, from cacti to peace lilies. Five different watering levels ensure that every plant will receive right amount of water.

 

Reminders

When the water level or battery is low Dori will let you know using RGB LEDs. Displayed notifications are simple and easy to understand. 

 

Peace of mind on holidays

No more asking neighbors to attend your plants for holidays, thanks to 1L water tank Dori can work for around 2 weeks and with special water saving mode* enabled it can work for up to a month.

*this mode is not yet fully developed and is not guaranteed to be available in final product

 

Saves water 

Thanks to special irrigation system that delivers water straight into the roots, the water evaporation is dramatically decreased. Of course this will not solve drought problem, but every bit helps.

Filling up

Refilling dori is simple, water inlet is conveniently placed and easily accessible. It is also surprisingly fast

 

Perfect size

When engineering Dori we wanted to make it as universal as possible, that’s why it’s size is suitable for most home plants. It won’t look to big or too small in your apartment. It also has modern and clean design.

 

Specifications

We fitted Dori with 5 distinct sensors:

Soil capacitance and resistivity sensors, key components of our pot, data from those sensors is used to calculate amount of moisture, and fertilizer in the ground.

temperature + humidity sensor, this sensor complements data from moisture sensor, it increases accuracy of our measurements, and at the same time allows us to specifically tailor amount of water delivered for every climate.

 

How does it work?

Even though it seems that because Dori has so many features it has to be complex, it really isn’t. Dori’s operation boils down to three basic steps:

  1. Collect information from sensors
  2. Decide whether or not plant needs to be watered
  3. If yes, water the plant.

Of course we could delve deeper into the details of processing data, and what are exact roles of data from each sensor, but we would rather keep it as secret, due to possible competition. Keeping that in mind we can assure you that we utilize all of the sensors to the fullest, and the resulting precision and quality of watering is as high as it could possibly be.

 

Timeline

 

What we have done so far

We have created multiple prototypes, conducted significant part of needed research, and tested viability of our pot. At this point we are sure that with your support we will be able to finish development of Dori in couple of months, and start manufacturing and delivering soon after. We think that this is best time for Indiegogo campaign, because we are in final stage of development which means that most of the risks associated with developing innovative product are gone, so that you can confidently buy Dori without worrying about its completion. In addition to that with your support and feedback we will be able to make Dori even better.

 

Meet the team

Our story

We are both students of Technical Physics at Lodz University of Technology. The idea for Dori came when during our study we were faced with a problem of designing a watering solution for a holiday break during our PBL project. We quickly realized that our design should work for a whole year round and not only holidays since we as well as many other friends had problems with remembering to water our plants. Then after some time another breakthrough occurred when Jarek had an idea to leverage 3d printing and modern electronics to fit our system inside a regular looking pot. After some time we had our first working prototype. A lot has changed since then, but without this prototype Dori would not exist.

Risks

We strongly believe that Dori will make great addition to every house and that's why we already invested hundreds of hours into this project, and we are determined to make dori happen, regardless of circumstances.

However as all businesses our undertaking is facing some risks, but thanks to the fact that we already have working prototype and the viability of our pot is proven, most of them are behind us. Those that are left are limited to risks related with team disagreements(improbable), competition(somewhat probable) which would lower our ability to collect additional revenue, legal action(improbable) and possible manufacturing difficulties such as inability to negotiate reasonable price(highly improbable) which could result in lack of revenue on our side. As it is easy to see most of the risks are improbable and not fatal to our project. This combined with our experience in engineering and management will hopefully result in success.

All of this means that if we reach our funding goal you can expect Dori to arrive to your house on time and without any problems.

 

FAQ

How come international shipping is $30?

We want our deliveries to be a balance of cheap, fast and secure, and after some investigation we decided that the golden mean lies around the price of 30$

What is the current status of technical development?

We have a working prototype, but it currently uses several pre made components such as arduino pro mini which we would like to replace in our final product. There are also some minor areas that require more development time(for example we are still deciding on the best placement of temperature and humidity sensor). All of this is taken into account in our timeline.

Why can't I select the color/size I want?

For now we are only selling one size of a pot in one color, we hope that in the future we will be able to provide bigger selection.

Will Dori work with my plant?

In most cases yes, although you have to consider the size of our pot, and the amount of water your plant needs. If its more than a cup of water daily than you are probably better off without Dori since you would have to refill tank really often.

 

Find us on Facebook

story:
Want to do more with your Arduino or Raspberry Pi projects?

All the benefits of traditional 'smart' switches, but with all the flexibility of your Arduino/RPi + your sensors.

Control and measure 110V/240V without touching a single high voltage wire.

Same problem every time, nothing easy, nothing safe!

Unlike most smart switches ControllerX gives YOU the ability to bring the smarts - new Arduino/RPi, just swap out your old tech for new tech!

ControllerX gives you the power to turn on or off your mains/line voltage power under whatever scenarios you can program an Arduino or RPi to do.

What to control and monitor

Lights, fans, pumps, air conditioners, freezers/fridges, routers/modems, laundry equipment, pool equipment, security/safety around the office or home - basically any regular household electrical device or appliance!

How to control

Online, offline, wifi, bluetooth, LoRA, USB or anything you can imagine - bring your own device and shields where the possibilities are endless.

Add your own sensors, think temperatures with thermistors (thermometers), sound activation (microphones), motion detection, distance monitoring, moisture sensing, air quality control.

ControllerX has been designed for you to bring your own device.  Our low voltage bay gives you enough space to house an Arduino with up to 2 additional shields, Raspberry Pi with up to 2 additional shields or your own custom circuitry/MCU etc.

Unlike other wifi enabled ‘smart’ switches we truly give you the capability to flick the switch, be it online or offline, with whatever logic you want.

We bring the safety, you bring the smarts.

We live in a dangerous high voltage appliance world - Many of the great devices around us are driven by electrical voltages that can do amazing things, however these higher voltages can also be deadly if handled poorly.

The team behind ControllerX believes there are many of us that can create great solutions to common problems if only they had a switch that they could control/manipulate without having to touch dangerous wires.

ControllerX solves this problem - giving young and old ‘makers/tinkerers’ alike the ability to fully control the power around them - be it online, offline or with smart/custom sensing built right into the design.

Features

ControllerX gives you a low voltage bay to house your Arduino, Raspberry Pi etc

ControllerX gives you a reliable DC power supply.

ControllerX gives you full 15amp current sensing device available to be read by your device. Now you can monitor the current your appliances are using and intervene if necessary - maybe a pump is drawing too many amps (out of water/inlet covered etc), instantly cut the power and save your hardware.

Controller X has an inbuilt I/O connectivity with a customisable backplate to mount your device securely and safely - while showing off your project through the see through window to the low voltage enclosure. 

International standardised IEC plugs save all of us the hassle of where you can use the device, as there are many off-the-shelf cord combinations to solve your more complex problems.

Flexibility

Your ability to add your own micro controller (or other controller devices - RPi etc) and all your own sensors allows you to do remarkable things, with flexibility that you haven't seen before.

For instance, we have successfully:

Monitored our solar inverter. When excess power is available we turn on our pool pump. If there is still excess power we send a smart phone notification saying now is a good time to run the dishwasher or washing machine. If the pool pumps sucks air or exceeds a particular temperature the pump is turned off, the owner notified via push notification. Meanwhile logging all of your pool pump times allowing you to adjust if you're not happy with the end result - and giving you the added bonus that you can 'pause' the pool pump if you want to go for a peaceful swim. Add some speciality sensors and you can monitor pH, salinity and probably more things than we can think of! 

Add an exhaust fan to your roof, that only turns on when the internal roof temperature exceeds a threshold, or is greater than the outside ambient temperature and only in summer. 

The possibilities are endless, and although you can never remove all risks when working with electricity - we give you the safest way to control your world!

Safety features

  • Overload protection
  • Surge protection
  • High/low voltage separation
  • No need to open high voltage bay
  • DC short circuit protection

If you can use a wall power point, then the ControllerX Smart Switch is good to go.
