the cooling energy for the hot season is zero, the house does not have any air conditioning system on the summer. Inside temperatures slightly rise above comfort for a short period of time during the day, but only for a few days out of the year.

The family living in this house is complete satisfied of its decision, very happy with the comfort and the very low costs of energy bills. They are aware that they could easily made the mistakes of regular construction. They would have ended up in an uninhabitable house in the summer without the help of cooling systems and would have increased their winter energy bills by four times. Plus they would have had to deal with the inevitable mold and fungi that lives in a traditionally-built house. 
The family is now life-long believers in the EIOS system.
 

Soon after inventing the Non-Permissive insulation for wall systems, the inventor realized that this system should apply also for roofs in connection with the walls to complete a building enclosure.

Roofs are always made out of moisture sensitive materials, are made less airtight, and are the most exposed to the vicissitudes of nature.  
This is why the EIOS concept branched out to EIOS Sky, the Non-Permissive insulation system for roofs in 2013.
The most common feature of roofs is that they have very little to no existing air tightness.

If you have the resourceful idea to have a living space in the attic instead of a cold/hot attic, you face the technical dilemma of making the roof more airtight and having moisture accumulation problems or to make in-wall ventilation that lets intentional airflow through the walls to manage moisture but ends up having very less thermal efficiency.
Real construction is somewhere in between, and home owners deals with exposure to toxic indoor molds and pay unreasonably high energy bills.
As a revolutionary solution, EIOS Sky solves all these problems with the Non-Permissive Thermosystem.
 

EIOS Sky is always Non-Permissive-connected with the exterior wall insulation such as the EIOS System. 
The less-airtight roof decking is the perfect substrate for applying EIOS Sky.

EIOS Sky is placed in the best location for protecting the building, which is certainly on the outside of the structure. 
The system creates an insulation shell that eliminates in-wall condensation, drastically reduces the energy demand, and protects from water infiltration, germs, and pollutants.  This results in a reduction to or even elimination of mechanical systems (in not-extreme climates).
 

The structural element (roof frame) uses less material to build, less chemicals to protect for moisture, foils and water/air/vapor barrier is not longer used, the design requirement to accommodating in-wall insulation is eliminated, and this is also an important saving for the investor, and for our natural resources.
The living space can be simply created, natural and pleasant, and always dry and comfortable.

A win for the builder, the owner, and the environment. 
If this concept suits your construction needs, do not hesitate to acquire one of our perks, and you are in for the best journey from solution to completion.
The Moisture-Free Lifetime Warranty also applies to this system.
EIOS Sky Projects
An old building in Bucharest, Romania was remodel and has been given a new look and utility.
The building owner chose to convert the old cold-attic in an office space. Being aware of the moisture and cooling/heating problems that this space will face, he searched for the best solution. He found EIOS.   
On October 2016, the old roof framing was replaced with a new one, and EIOS settled the solution to install the environmental separator - EIOS Sky.

 
Being a massive brick-masonry construction (with walls not sensitive to moisture) the facades ware insulated and finished with the classical face-sealed EIFS, connected with the Non-Permissive EIOS Thermosystem applied on the roof.
During construction and interior finishing, no-condensation water was noticed on the entire roof (regardless the high RH level). It is well known that a roof system containing vapor barrier produces some kg/m² of condensation water in the cold season. Comparing this with not-a-drop on the entire roof, the building owner feels privileged. 
The main visible feature of the new attic was the ease in which it was heated in the winter, and the less running of air-conditioning in the summer.
The owner is very happy with his decision and finds the price of EIOS Sky very affordable and lower than price to build with classical insulation system and moisture control solutions.
The most preferred roof systems in association with EIOS Sky are the Tiled Roof Systems, which ensures good exterior-to-exterior ventilation and a convenient attachment system.
 

On-the-roof insulation is not always suitable for real construction solutions and renovation purposes.
Converting an attic into a nice, comfortable living space or designing the last floor of a building to be a mansard or penthouse is very efficient for living but is also very challenging for moisture control solutions and thermal efficiency.

The main characteristic of attic rooms is that it cannot be inhabited in the summer without air-conditioning and the air clogs because of mold grown in the structure.   
Again, EIOS expands its application domain to be the complete solution for loft conversion and mansards as well.
An old attic with virtually zero air-tightness and exposed to high levels of cold and heat is the perfect place to install EIOS.

The environmental separator EIOS applied to the ceiling will immediately change the indoor environment once installed.

The special sealing ensures a vapor-impermeable insulation and guarantees that the unlimited Zero Condensation, Moisture-Free feature is applied to the entire surface.

EIOS now separates the two environments - your interior living space and the exterior. The roof framing is kept in one environment where in the summer the wood is dried by the heat and in the winter will be sterilized by the cold.
    
The reinforcement layer Lamina creates the perfect support that never cracks, for the plastering finishes.

EIOS Thermosystem again gives you a comfortable and healthy indoor, moisture-free and incredibly thermally efficient space – all lifetime guaranteed.

 
The roof of every house or building accentuates the nobility and charm of the construction, but the attic is not always suitable for living.

We strongly recommend that the living space be separated from the exterior environment by a Non-Permissive Insulation Assembly for moisture-free, high thermal-efficiency reasons. The thermal envelope of the building needs to be connected and completed with the ceiling of the living space.
The ceiling is the area most exposed to vapor-flow and to the thermal-flow from the interior, so a special protection is needed on this part also.
Today’s common practices always leaves the insulation fragmented and with zero airtight capabilities after installed, and the control layers are inexistent or difficult to be applied and very ineffective.

In alternative, we give two options for EIOS Thermosystem applied to ceilings to cover all construction situations:
EIOS for Ceilings with Lamina for direct finishing of the surfaces

or EIOS for Ceilings with an attachment system.

In many situations, the design requires a suspended ceiling to accommodate electrical and mechanical systems.
Also, it is well known that the poorly performing duct system in the cold/hot attic contributes to lost energy, condensation, and mold problems of the air-ducting system.  
We solve all those problems by applying a continuous EIOS Thermosystem as the environmental separator on the ceiling, provided with a strong attachment system for the suspended ceiling, and for other mechanical attachments.


All ducting can be installed in the interior conditioned environment with obvious advantages.
 
EIOS for Ceiling Projects
Of the many projects EIOS has, we want to introduce you to one that we did not expect to become a reality so soon.
This project is an eight years old house that has been lived in for five years by a young family with two children. It was extended in 2016 with a living room and a utility room on the ground floor and a master bedroom and a closet room in the upstairs living attic.
The house has two more bedrooms in the attic, so the homeowner knows very well how expensive it is to live in this kind of designed construction, both in winter and in summer. Searching for the best insulation solution for the new part of the house, the owner found EIOS.
In December 2016 an EIOS team installed the Thermosystem on the roof-ceiling and completed it with the Lamina for plastering finishing.

 
The extreme cold outside makes it very expensive to heat the inside, which is heated by a wooden pellets furnace.
After completing the EIOS on the ceiling, something unusual happened: in the extension of the house attic, the temperature inside rises above the rest of the house temperature.  This was only with the heat lost by the furnace downstairs and the insulated chimney flue that passes through the upstairs living space.
The homeowner made a decision: He wanted to remodel the entire house with this new concept. He wanted to have EIOS on the entire roof and ceiling.
In early February 2017, the drywall ceiling of the entire house was demolished and replaced with EIOS Thermosystem.

 
The insulation was already infested with the black mold.

The house uses at least two times less energy for heating in the winter and more than ten times less energy for cooling in the summer. This saving applies while the living space is almost doubled.
 

This campaign is all about how your house or building can be built more thermally efficient with walls containing zero moisture. It will require less money invested, less money in construction costs, and getting a Lifetime Warranty for those features. All of these benefits are available while sustaining a revolutionary way to build for this world. 
EIOS Thermosystem is the perfect solution for everyone who engages in projects involving house/building remodeling, cladding change, home improvement, improving thermal efficiency, and of course anything involved with constructing a new building enclosure.
Please join in spreading the Principle of Avoiding Condensation and participate in adopting and implementing this new principle of technique in practice.
 

Your vote for the new concept. Thank you
All contributors, large and small, will be considered Ambassadors of this new concept of construction and will be mentioned in a Book of Fame that will contain the names of the supporters who contributed within the first 30 days of the start of this campaign.
If you are inspired by this concept and want to have your building made accordingly, you have the opportunity to ask the founders your questions and get answers.
 
  
You will find answers to your building-dilemmas and specific solutions to your moisture problems and much more.
This is for personal enquiries only, not for professional use. 
Please provide your name, location (state, country), and your email address.
For building professionals to avoid struggling with concepts and details on their first attempts, we are here to answer questions. 
   
  
Please provide your name, location (state, country), your email address, profession, company, and position. 
 
Remember that EIOS is engineered specifically for your building and is not something that can be sent or delivered.
For this reason, we offer flexible input perks for those contracting EIOS Thermosystem.
We will move EIOS in the United States this year where it belongs and where it was first invented. 
For all home owners, building owners, designers or builders that want to have the best ever insulation system, contract EIOS during this campaign!
To make things simple and easier to purchase, we offer 5 Perks according to the estimated square-footage of the thermal envelope of the building where EIOS Thermosystem will be applied.

Each Downpayment will represent a 5 to 10 percent of the total contract price for the completion of the project.
The Reservation will be fully deducted from the total contracting price, being considered a down payment, which is normal in construction practice between reliable contractors.
The final price will be calculated from design drawings estimates for the new construction, or from real measurements on retrofitted buildings based on the table following. It contains the price per square-foot according to the project EIOS Thermosystem application (System, Sky, Ceiling) per specific surface, new construction, or renovation. 
 
The total price will be explained and discussed in detail with each building-owner/investor before signing the contract. 
For building remodeling, EIOS will inspect the location, take related measurements, find technical solutions according to the owner’s wishes, EIOS requirements, and work with the designer's demands and builder's schedules.
The discounted total on the contract will stay basically as established with prices per ft² and even discounts on the total price for simple-design projects. However, keep in mind that we will need to add supplemental costs for trims, complicated facades, ornamental joints and bands other than normal code requirements, on-the-roof elements, and details that usually increase any normal construction budget.
As construction professionals, the EIOS team will find the most advantageous way to collaborate with any person participating in the project.
Back Early to lock in an exclusive 100%-Perk discount for your EIOS building/remodeling project. The discount applies to the total price of the contracting project and represents the amount of Perk (your Perk is your 100% saving) for the first three size-category projects 3X5 out of 100. 
In addition, for the friends that share our campaign or individuals having more than one project, we offer a 2% discount for the total contracting price for two or more projects closer than 50 miles.  
 

 
We provide all package materials with the best quality and technical characteristics. 
 

 
We also provide the technical support and the installation of EIOS for every project. 
 

 
We will not charge for estimates and will travel to location for renovation evaluations and solutions.  
 

 
For various types of construction, with walls that are sensitive to wetting and also for carrying out various EIOS behind facade systems, the EIOS specialists are available for finding the complete and personalized technical solution.

The estimating and contracting of EIOS projects will start as soon the campaign ends, but we will contact you earlier than that for information on how to get blueprints from you or your contractors and to get information about the stage of the project, timeline, and location. Most importantly, we will establish the time when the EIOS installation can start.
Order today and build whenever you want!
 

When it comes to insulation, few may know that the actual solutions have two major issues:

The vapor diffusion paradigm and moisture accumulation and
The low insulation effectiveness of R-value and air-tightness weaknesses of the building.

The two principal issues fully resolved and associated with further EIOS advantages will give you the vision in setting goals that result in benefits.
Applying the Principle of Avoiding Condensation for a healthy home to design, construction, renovation and maintenance do not have to result in cost increases. By understanding the interactions between EIOS and building systems without trade-offs, cost savings combined with building improved performances, we can give a general view of how to save with EIOS Thermosystem.

Here are some special advantages of EIOS Thermosystem over EIFS (the closest insulation system to EIOS):

Any building and home can benefit today from the design technology to eliminate condensation and the use of insulation materials in ideal conditions, for an unlimited term, at the same price as deficient or illusory insulations.
 

The unsolved problem of moisture in the building envelope of every enclosure comes to an end.By contracting EIOS for your house or building investment, you will be one of the first to own a house with zero moisture in the walls due to harm from the exterior environment.Water can get in every regular construction by vapor movement and condensation, or via direct entry. EIOS is the first construction system in the world that claims to completely eliminate this issue.   
We all know that every single house/building without exception contains water/air/vapor barriers in the form of foils, fabric, or membranes. Even the European mineral brick wall built houses contain vapor barriers on the roof system. This practice is supposed to solve the problem of moisture in envelope walls by controlling vapor flow and water entry.  
Water passes barriers in different forms but always because of forces in action.Driving forces can be gravitational, capillarity, wind washing, or pressure forces occurring because of the temperature differences between the conditioned space and the exterior environment (air/vapor pressure differential).Water gets inside of walls because of those forces in action, but when we want them to dry out, there are no forces to drive water and vapors out of the walls.
 
Of course, this problem is not solved by classical vapor barriers, air/vapor permeable insulations, air flow through walls, drainage or wall-ventilation systems. Water that sill damages buildings is impetuous called: intruding water, incidental water or remnant humidity. In fact, the vapor barrier become a condensation plane in various heat loads along with other materials which acquire a dew point temperature. This vapor barrier always prevents this water from drying.Drainage-planes also do not work to prevent moisture. Porous materials that absorb water will not drain out until the material is saturated, containing 100% of the humidity which that material can hold. You can imagine what that’s mean for the cladding and exterior insulation…
The results can be seen nearly everywhere, especially when repairs and renovations are required.
This is the reality, but the accepted advice is to follow published regulations and guidance on combining insulation, air barriers, and the permeability of materials for walls to control condensation…
 


Instead, EIOS is custom-made and created on your house/building as an insulation system that is 100% waterproof, 100% airtight and 99.9% vapor-impermeable. This will keep any form of water out of the insulation.


EIOS is consistently vapor-tight when applied to the building, including intersections with windows/doors and other penetrations, so no fluid leakage can occur.  
EIOS complete separates the different environments, so as the structural element of the building is entirely in one environment. Because EIOS is usually installed on the exterior, the supporting structure has the same temperature as the interior vapors, prohibiting condensation. The dew point of the warm moisture-laden air is always inside of the EIOS system, remote from the inner surface, which never become a condensation plane.Along with the water impermeability and complete air-tightness, the imperviously-created EIOS Thetmosystem solves all moisture issues that can harm your house for an unlimited time, guaranteed.
 


 


The energy efficiency of walls is not only based how much insulation you install, but also on how much the building uses the insulation installed in order to reduce the heat flow.
Besides accumulating condensation/intrusion water and decay, walls are a big waste of energy. Thicker or doubled walls are promoted to support more cavity insulation and to provide places for installing in-wall vapor barriers.   
The wasted money and time used to build those walls and to provide energy to heat or cool the environment comes out of your pocket.
Energy assessment audits are made exclusively by using software. The program used no matter which will simply take the R-value specified for the insulation product used (the laboratory tests for λ, R) and applies it to the building according to the wall measurements. Reduction coefficients are applied only for thermal bridges, solar exposure, etc. and are not realistic for in-cavity convection, around windows, and through the walls phenomenon (looping convection, through insulation convection, infiltration end ex-filtration, reduction of R-value by increasing the humidity content, air flow, etc.). Those phenomenon are the major source of wasting energy, water accumulation, and mold growing in the envelope walls that surround you and the problems are hidden in the case of every cavity. These issues with all the consequences can be extended to every insulation system permeable to water/air/vapors combined with the classical water/air/vapor barrier.
It is very important to understand that in-cavity convection and the related wasting of energy does not depend on the air tightness of the wall construction.
The in-cavity looping convection is generated by the two fronts of air generated by the high thermal conductivity of sheathing, air/vapor barrier, and cladding on the exterior, as well as the gypsum sheathing enclosure on the interior which passes a lot of heat/heat-deficit inside of the walls.
The two fronts of air and the air pressure differential creates air movement, looping of the insulation and direct convection.
 

Insulation becomes an object put inside the walls that does not use its insulation value.
The R-value of insulation is just a laboratory number determined and is not very often applied to the building envelope.
 
We present this case because of two main reasons:
1. With very few exceptions, most people believe that if an insulation is 95% airtight, the insulation will be about 90% effective. In fact, for a 95% air tightness of insulation, the effectiveness of R-value is less than 30% from the specifications of the insulation material installed. 
The “leaky pot effect” (see video) makes it easy to understand the energy lost inside of walls because the insulation is not 100% airtight. 
2. EIOS was “compared” in thickness with other insulation systems. To achieve code requirements, designers, builders, and home owners know that the building envelope  not supposed to fall below a specified R-value, which is transposed in practice in thickness of the insulation and many times in the thickness of the walls in order to achieve the minimal energy efficiency requirements. 
With the R-value of 100% effective, a regular 3-inch (7.62 cm) EIOS proves in practice a thermal efficiency above a 1 foot (30 cm) cavity padding insulation. 
 
The effectiveness of the thermal envelope R-value of the building is decreased by the air leakage of the walls and the low air tightness of the insulation.
 

The R-100% effectiveness of EIOS Thermosystem makes the difference between Non-Permissive and other permissive insulations.
 

R-effective (the insulation value applied to the building in real construction) is very different than the R-Specified (the insulation value of the insulation material).
 
So in translation, those who ignore these factors and do not choose the correct solution for its thermal insulation system, buys in vain thinking that it can bring a long-term continuous saving. An envelope wall, thermal inefficiency, and exposure to moistening, mold, and degradation can now be replaced with a wall that is extremely efficient, permanently dry, without the hazard of growing mold and degradation. The EIOS wall maintains a pleasant and healthy ambience to the interior.
Code requirements all over the world specify insulation values according to climate zone.
For example, in the US, the code requirements for new construction, roof systems are:
R30 in Miami, FL Hot-Humid climate
R49 in Minneapolis, MN Cold climate (BTU unit system)
 
By comparative observation on real projects, we estimate that an EIOS building envelope will be at least two times more thermally efficient than other buildings that meet standard code requirements. This is estimated on EIOS R17.5, 3 inch (7.62 cm) of Non-Permissive Insulation. Obviously this is not based on the R-numbers. It is a result of poor-effectiveness of air-based, permissive insulations, and of course, by the 100% Effectiveness of EIOS.
Conclusion: Do not compare EIOS with codes and requirements, just because non-permissive insulations are not yet specified by codes. 
In the case of the in-cavity installed, air-permeable, air-leaky insulations, the thermal efficiency of the wall is based mostly on the air-layer enclosed in the airtight-cavity (which is not taken into consideration by energy assessment software and pros), and not by using the insulation value and conductivity of the insulation.
If the first goal of EIOS is the elimination of moisture issues, increasing the thermal efficiency of your building all at a lower construction price is just as powerful. 
 


 

Before launching the EIOS brand as an integrated concept technology and details to insulate and clad buildings, tests and experiments were made to prove the true attributes and how the product will perform in practice.
 



EOTA is the European Organization for Technical Assessment in the area of construction products, based in Brussels. 

 

What makes homes unhealthy?
Basically speaking, a house is healthy as long as it is dry, but it becomes sick when moisture rises above normal levels.  When non-permissive insulation was first applied, either experimentally or on actual projects, the primary concern was to verify moisture content in the materials of supporting structure both before and after the insulation system was put to function as an environmental separator for a specific period of time.
When differences of temperature apply, usually the humidity of a wall structure increases during vapor movement from warm to cold and condensation occurs in the cold area of the enclosure walls. The nice surprise was that in every case, the humidity of structural materials decreased after heat/cold loads, instead of increasing.When we made the first experiments on non-permissive insulation, the exciting results revealed the decreasing of wood content humidity when normally a vapor-permeable constructed wall should increase its water content due to condensation.
For the inventor of EIOS, this was the first confirmation that the concept is right and that the system functions better than expected.Simulation programs reveal water accumulation from condensation in the quantity of 4 kg/m² (about 1 lb/ft²) for almost every wall configuration in a continental climate (non-extreme climate) on every cold season of the year.Comparing this with zero condensation and an actual decrease of moisture content, we believe that this is the best option for your structure.
At first the inventor founds this phenomenon baffling and named the effect Unidirectional Drying.Later, the explanation for this phenomenon became clear that a low heat flow passes through the non-permissive insulation without allowing any vapor to pass through. This small amount of heat creates a difference in temperatures from the surface of sheathing right behind insulation and the exterior environment, and other cold materials.
This temperature difference makes existent vapors move and water to evaporate.After finding this explanation, the inventor called it the Drying Effect.
Two situations are identified, depending on the thermal flow relative to the structural element of a non-permissive insulation:

when the structure is on the side with the thermal flow and
when the structure is on the opposite side from the heat flow.

The video presents the physical phenomenon that creates the Drying Effect in the situation when the Structural Element is on the cold side of the separated environments.

 
Some people that have benefited from the EIOS advantages call this phenomenon the "EIOS Effect".  
The Drying Effect is not yet a certitude as the Avoiding Condensation phenomenon, but it is still an observation of facts and empirically given explanations.We hope with your support to have more funds for research in this new field of building science. We also hope that more institutions, laboratories, and even authorities will join our effort to implement the Zero Moisture Concept.
 


 
Why EIOS needs help
 
There are two main reasons why EIOS needs crowd support.
 
One is that the construction industry and building science is too well set in their ways with the current moisture control practice. The Avoiding Condensation concept involves a drastic change in mentality, which is not easy after thousands of years of building according to the techniques of merely controlling water, air, and vapors in buildings. More than this, by following the building codes, everyone involved in construction is absolved of responsibility, even if they know that more or less, sooner or later buildings will end up having moisture problems.
So, why should we make a change, and who needs to?
So far, except for a few building owners that understand the problem/solution, we could not find any builder or architect to adopt this new concept and use this new product on its buildings.
The next problem is to have the XPS extruded polystyrene EIOS Sealboard invented to suit’s the needs of double-sealing with polyurethane foam, manufactured in this shape by the industry producer.

We need projects using an industrial-producing amount of XPS, so the producer will modify its production line and only charge the conventional marketable price.
So far all EIOS projects were made by hand cutting every edge of insulation board. This is very labor extensive, and EIOS cannot afford to install it in the U.S. at a competitive price.
Our marketing strategy is to provide all package materials with the best quality and technical characteristics, as well as to provide the technical support and installation of EIOS for every project.
Every product in construction has an installation contractor that is more or less trained by the producer. EIOS is a new type of construction in many ways, so projects cannot be given to inexperienced contractors because failing is not an option.
Every project contracted through this campaign will be directly planned and led by trained specialists, and the inventor of this new concept will be available for all EIOS applications.
We face the common problems of startup lack of capital and slow marketing.
While preparing the EIOS brand to launch, our full-featured product for early adopters is an entire construction fitted with the new insulation system.  
 
Risks and Challenges
 
We believe that while we have projects totaling 20,000 ft² and above in the U.S. the challenge will be to make the perfect job on every single project.
So far there have been no errors or defects of any kind on any EIOS project, and this is because of the high standards of the team members on the site and the direct guidance of the inventor. By contracting EIOS during this campaign, contractors will benefit directly for their contribution and effort.
EIOS will take the projects from this launching campaign on its own, to get each team ready to install the product, for the best quality control on providing materials, solutions, detailing, site organization, and workmanship.
This is not a simple task, but we have prepared teams of people with many years of experience in this field to help switch to the new concept.   
Not many future EIOS projects will get this much attention and the Moisture Free Lifetime Warranty. 
 
Experience you can trust 


If you could not find what you are looking for here, please check our website or contact us through info@eios.co
Join us in redefining thermal insulation!

story:
ABOUT

Project Purpose
We develop AI technology that intelligently links facial expression and health metrics to feelings, which would allow communication between those who cannot speak with words. In this project we aim to enable communication between newborn baby and parents using this technology as well as a set of wearables.

Backed By Government Initiatives
Our project is selected as Hong Kong government backed program as well as Japanese Public Interest Incorporated Foundation projects. The technology is co-researched with HKUST and have attracted much attention from media worldwide. Currently the system development and product testing is under way in Hong Kong and Japan.

Why We Need You
We have the final design of the product and ready to create a working prototype for wider testing! The amount we raise would go to the cost for the prototypes. We’d like to have more users to test and evaluate our product to make it as perfect as possible.

 

PRODUCT

Baby Look is a product to support parents of 0 to 2 year-olds.
・Reveals your baby’s mind using AI
・Monitors both baby and mother’s health conditions
・Promotes communication between caregivers

Through these BabyLook will alleviate first time mother’s stress and worries.


 

Baby Look consists of 2 wearables, for baby and mother, and our AI system that links baby's facial expressions with feelings.

 

Feeling Recognition App Powered with AI

BabyLook’s signature feature AI estimates your baby’s feeling with just three steps and display it on the app.


Go to DEMO website

 

Integrated analysis of baby's facial expression and health metrics from the wearables

Since 2016 we have made alliance with various kindergartens and nurseries, collecting relevant big data from 0-6 year olds and researching correlation between their facial expressions and feelings. Currently we focus on detecting most important, life saving information such as fever, respiratory insufficiency, fatigue, lack of sleep etc.
BabyLook also improves its analysis by having supporting data from the wearables. Combining the baby’s expressions and their bio information, the app analyse and reveals the baby’s current feelings.

 

Health Monitoring App

The app also monitor you and your baby’s health conditions to support your every day child rearing.

  • Watching Heart Rate (Baby)
  • Watching Body Temperature (Baby)
  • Watching Sleep (Baby & Mom)
  • Watching your fatigue level (Mom)
  • Communication and data sharing

 

Wearable for Baby and Mom

・Band designed to perfectly fit baby ankles
・Medical grade silicon for top safety
・Lightweight for both baby and mom
・Made waterproof (IP5 level)


 

SCHEDULE


Since BabyLook will be worn by your precious babies, any kind of defect is unacceptable. In this aspect, it is possible that our plan would change due to future hardware or software issues that arise in the future.

 

PROJECT BACKGROUND

It all started from a small talk with one of our staff who just her first baby. "I'm so anxious every day if I'm doing the right things for my baby. If only I could talk with her!”

We conducted a questionnaire globally to find that many mothers have similar anxieties.
“Child rearing must be more enjoyable if we could understand baby’s needs better”
“What could we do to help solve this problem using our facial analysis technology?”

After countless discussions, we came up with the idea of Baby Look.

 

OUR TEAM

USA Team

  • Kyo Ueda : Founder / Engineer
  • Keisuke Yamamoto : Founder / Enginee
  • Charles Park : US Founder
  • Augela Qu : Promotion Director
  • Maki Iguchi : Assistant Director

Hong Kong & China Team

  • Yuko Shirataki : Manager
  • Sertaq : Designer
  • Cazuya Zac Maekawa : Marketer
  • ALL HKUST Team : Engineer

Japan Team

  • Yuki Dison Dikyoku : Engineer
  • Nao Falcon Shimizu : Engineer

Singapore Team

  • Dipti Chandra : Marketing Director

Advisory Board

  • Huamin Qu : HKUST Professor
  • Shuichi Matsuda : Honorable professor in Waseda University
  • Takaaki Kamio : Business model adviser
  • Takatoshi Nakao : Promotion model adviser
  • Masayo Urano : Risei Social Welfare Corportaion Chairman
  • Yousuke Hirota : Fukuyama City University Associate Professor

Go to DEMO website

 
Integrated analysis of baby's facial expression and health metrics from the wearables
Since 2016 we have made alliance with various kindergartens and nurseries, collecting relevant big data from 0-6 year olds and researching correlation between their facial expressions and feelings. Currently we focus on detecting most important, life saving information such as fever, respiratory insufficiency, fatigue, lack of sleep etc.BabyLook also improves its analysis by having supporting data from the wearables. Combining the baby’s expressions and their bio information, the app analyse and reveals the baby’s current feelings.

 Health Monitoring AppThe app also monitor you and your baby’s health conditions to support your every day child rearing.
Watching Heart Rate (Baby)
Watching Body Temperature (Baby)
Watching Sleep (Baby & Mom)
Watching your fatigue level (Mom)
Communication and data sharing
 Wearable for Baby and Mom・Band designed to perfectly fit baby ankles・Medical grade silicon for top safety・Lightweight for both baby and mom・Made waterproof (IP5 level) SCHEDULESince BabyLook will be worn by your precious babies, any kind of defect is unacceptable. In this aspect, it is possible that our plan would change due to future hardware or software issues that arise in the future. PROJECT BACKGROUNDIt all started from a small talk with one of our staff who just her first baby. "I'm so anxious every day if I'm doing the right things for my baby. If only I could talk with her!”We conducted a questionnaire globally to find that many mothers have similar anxieties.“Child rearing must be more enjoyable if we could understand baby’s needs better”“What could we do to help solve this problem using our facial analysis technology?”After countless discussions, we came up with the idea of Baby Look. OUR TEAMUSA Team
Kyo Ueda : Founder / Engineer
Keisuke Yamamoto : Founder / Enginee
Charles Park : US Founder
Augela Qu : Promotion Director
Maki Iguchi : Assistant Director
Hong Kong & China Team
Yuko Shirataki : Manager
Sertaq : Designer
Cazuya Zac Maekawa : Marketer
ALL HKUST Team : Engineer
Japan Team
Yuki Dison Dikyoku : Engineer
Nao Falcon Shimizu : Engineer
Singapore TeamDipti Chandra : Marketing DirectorAdvisory Board
Huamin Qu : HKUST Professor
Shuichi Matsuda : Honorable professor in Waseda University
Takaaki Kamio : Business model adviser
Takatoshi Nakao : Promotion model adviser
Masayo Urano : Risei Social Welfare Corportaion Chairman
Yousuke Hirota : Fukuyama City University Associate Professor

story:
About

We have developed what we honestly believe is the world's most functional apple grinder and presser for home-juicers who have apple trees growing in their garden. We are raising funds in Indiegogo to make it available to everybody. Samo is named after a Finnish apple cultivar.

 

Why Samo?

Samo is a novel and innovative apple grinder and presser that’s going to change the way apples are juiced. Once you try it, you don’t want to go back to yesterday’s methods! 

Grinding apples has been slow and laborious: whether your grinder is hand-cranked or runs with a motor, they often jam and generally don’t work very well. You may even have to chop apples into smaller pieces before your grinder accepts them. Moving the ground apple pulp into a presser is the next chore: you may have to wrap the pulp inside pieces of cloth or mesh to hold it together for pressing. Only then you get to actually press, which again takes a lot of time and finally, you have to extract the dry pulp and prepare the presser for the next batch, and eventually clean everything when you have finished.

Too much work? Not with Samo! The idea of Samo was born out of frustration towards apple grinders and pressers currently on the market. With Samo, the juicing process is streamlined. First, pour apples in Samo’s upper keg and put the lid on. Next, run Samo’s super-fast grinder with your regular power drill. In a matter of seconds, the apples are ground and apple shreds have fallen down into the lower keg. Repeat to make the lower keg full of grind. Replace the upper keg and the grinder with the presser. Secure it in place and you are ready to start pressing. Use your power drill to screw the presser rod down and finish the pressing with a wrench if needed. As you press, the juice begins to run into the container of your choice. Cleaning? Just detach the lower keg and push the dry apple pulp out of it and you're ready to fill the presser again. When you have finished juicing, spray all modules clean with a garden hose and leave them to dry.

With Samo, we want to make juicing apples a fun chore everybody can do with ease, and without having to buy large and heavy equipment for it.

 

Product features

One Samo consists of:

  • Lid
  • Feeder
  • Grinder
  • Presser top
  • Presser bottom
  • Presser rod
  • Pressing disc
  • Juice bowl
  • 2 × Kegs
  • 3 × Locking bars

 

Samo is a modular system

Samo consist of modules that stack upon each other. For grinding and pressing, you use different module combinations. Modules help to minimize the amount of parts and material needed, and make the workflow of making juice smoother and faster than with any other presser. Samo's 19 litre keg takes roughly 6-7 kg (13-15 lbs) of apples.

    When working with Samo, you combine different modules when grinding or pressing. 

         

        The Grinder

        Grinding the apples is one of the biggest bottlenecks in the whole juicing process - it’s very time-consuming. In the initial stage of Samo’s development we paid very close attention to the existing methods of grinding apples. One of the biggest reasons for difficulties in grinding is insufficient force. Another key factor contributing to the performance of the grinders currently in the market is the design of the grinder. It’s not enough to grind apples just somehow. There’s a significant difference in how much juice you get out of an apple depending on how it is ground. You want to make shreds that yield the apple pulp’s juice out easily when pressed.  

        Samo’s grinder has been designed so that it sucks apples in and doesn’t get stuck which is a common problem. With Samo’s specially designed blades, it is also not needed to push apples in with a stick to feed them: it’s enough that you pour them in the keg, close the lid and start grinding! 

         

        • The tooth profile of the blades bites into apple, grabs it and cuts through it.
        • The twin-axle design forms a maw that sucks apples in and helps prevent clogging.
        • The arrangement of the blades contributes to the sucking effect: during a revolution of an axle, there are always blade teeth grabbing apples and pulling them into the maw.
        • The positions of the blades are synchronised so that there are never openings through which large apple pieces could fall through.
        • The material used for blades and gears is strong and stiff POM plastic, a durable and low-friction polymer, perfect for blades and gears. The POM we use is food-grade.
        • The axles are geared at both ends which stabilizes them and improves the grinder’s life because there’s less torque and less stress per one pair. Also, should it happen you get a broken tooth on other pair, the grinder will still run with just one pair.
        • The axles have ball bearings in both ends to provide long life, low friction and allowing high running speeds. The ball bearings' lubricant is food-grade.
        • The drive axle has milled hexagonal end for easy and safe fastening of drill chuck. The axles are food-grade stainless steel, just like all Samo’s metal parts. 
        • Thanks to open-structure design, the grinder is very easy to clean after use. Just spray it clean with a garden hose and leave it to dry.

         

        The Presser

        The presser consists of the presser bottom and the presser top, a keg between them, the pressing disc that presses the apple pulp inside the keg, and three locking bars that keep the presser's modules together during pressing. The juice runs into the juice bowl and into the container of your choice.

        A major thing we wanted to improve in apple-pressing is how you have to move the apple pulp into a presser after grinding it. With existing methods, you either have to scoop the pulp from your grinder into a presser, or worse still, make "cakes": wrap small portions of pulp in pieces of cloth or mesh, stack them in the press and then press them. Both methods are time-consuming and messy, because the pulp is moist and sticky. With Samo, the pulp falls directly from the grinder into the presser and the entire stage is skipped! 

        The keg's diameter and length have optimal ratio for pressing:

        • Sufficient pressure is generated with minimum force to yield maximum amount of juice.
        • The juice flows evenly out of the keg to all sides, unobstructed.
        • The pressing distance is short which contributes to easy and fast operation.
        • The pressing disc is disconnected from the presser rod,  floating freely on the pulp and contributing to the ease of use: It's effortless to put in place and pick up after use, and easy to clean.
        • There is no need for extra plates that have to be added in the presser during pressing, as some pressers require you to do. The presser rod is long enough to press all the way from start to finish, yet it is fast to screw fully in and out, thanks to the optimal ratio of the keg's diameter and length.

         

        The High Speed Kit

        With an extra keg, presser bottom and juice bowl, you can double your working speed:

        1. Stack Samo's modules in the grinding mode. Grind enough apples to fill the lower keg with pulp.
        2. Lift off the grinder along with the upper keg and put it atop another presser bottom and keg.
        3. Start grinding again! Now, while you are filling the second keg with pulp, your friend can press the pulp in the first keg.
        4. Switch places! While one of you grinds, the other one presses! This way, you will make your apples into juice in no time.

         

        The materials

        Samo's parts are made of four different materials: bamboo, stainless steel, and POM and ABS plastics.

         

        Bamboo

        Samo's wooden kegs are a nod to the traditions in juice and cider making, and wood gives Samo a nice and warm appearance. Bamboo  was chosen because it is one of the hardest woods around which makes it an ideal wood for Samo. It also has some natural anti-bacterial qualities. Bamboo is also a sustainable choice since it grows so rapidly. The bamboo we use is from China, and the parts are made in a certified factory that makes also other food-related products such as bamboo cutting boards.

         

        Stainless steel

        All Samo's metal parts are made of SAE 304 stainless steel, commonly used in food-handling products and household appliances.

         

        POM and ABS plastics

        POM stands for polyoxymethylene, a strong and durable polymer. It is used for all Samo's plastic parts except for the lid and the juice bowl, which are made of ABS (acrylonitrile butadiene styrene). Both plastics are safe to use for food-related products.

         

        Samo's hexagonal shape!

        Why is Samo hexagonal and not round like other pressers in the market?

        There are a couple of reasons for this. When we started to develop then unnamed Samo, we pondered between different shapes for the device. With fruit grinders the shape doesn’t really matter, but most pressers are round for a reason: a cylinder is one of the strongest shapes to withstand pressure.

        When a pressing force is applied to matter inside a cylinder, this matter tries to expand to other directions, that is, towards the cylinder walls. The walls must be strong enough to counter the pressing force so the force is applied only towards the direction of pressing.

        Round shape is the strongest, but also demanding to make: with the traditional apple presser construction, you need a lot of narrow wood strips for walls. Also, you need strong bands around the cylinder to hold the strips together and to reinforce the structure to withstand the pressure.

        A lot of strips means a lot of pieces with a lot of holes, which requires a lot of screws to attach the pieces together. The more parts, the more expensive it gets, and everything has to be very precisely manufactured. Hexagon is a kind of a shortcut from a perfect circle. But it’s also a very practical shape! It's almost round and much stronger than eg. a square, and can be formed with six straight lines - or walls, which equals to much less pieces required than for a cylinder. The steel bands holding the hexagonal keg together can also be constructed from pieces, which contributes to cheaper manufacturing and makes it easy to flat pack the product.

        Narrow openings in the keg's corners make a natural way to run the juice out during pressing without having to perforate the walls. It doesn’t hurt either that a hexagon is a very distinguishable shape and helps Samo to stand out from the crowd!

         

        Samo's story

        Samo is an apple grinder and presser like no other! It’s a compact yet super efficient apple juicer for everybody who has apple trees growing in their garden and who wish to make their own juice.

        The idea of Samo was born out of frustration towards apple grinders and pressers currently on the market. They just don’t function as well as they should, thought Antti, a craft cider and wine enthusiast, who was struggling to make apple juice for his cider. 

        It took a whole day from him and his father to grind and press a cart of apples into juice at their family’s summer house. Despite they worked together, it was a laborious task they had to spend all day with. As a result, they barely got a bucket of apple juice for their own craft cider. What’s more to it, the apple presser and grinder they had was big and bulky, cumbersome to move around and took a lot of space in the car.

        Team Samo: Ilmari, Sid and Antti.

        Antti began to think there had to be a more efficient way to juice apples. He asked help from two of his friends, Ilmari and Sid, to join him in his quest to develop the world's best apple juicer. So the three began to search for better solutions concerning the whole process of juice-making: from grinding the apples to pressing the juice out of the grind, running the juice into a container, extracting the dry pulp from the presser and finally, to the cleaning the equipment after use. 

        It appeared they were not alone with their thoughts: social media was full of videos of people showing their own solutions for grinding and pressing apples. These DIY inventions were of varying quality: some were very efficient in one particular task, but were often very crude and nevertheless had a lot of room for improvement, and none really catered for all steps of the juicing process. What was most surprising to Antti, there were few commercial products available and they were not even better than some of the solutions devised by fellow apple-juicing enthusiasts. 

        It seemed there was a pressing need for an apple juicer in the market for home juicers that would

        • be compact in size, yet have a good working capacity
        • grind apples fast, without having to chop them into smaller pieces beforehand 
        • press juice out of the ground apples efficiently and easily
        • be easy to clean
        • be safe to use 

        Antti, Ilmari and Sid were sure such a machine could be developed and made available to everybody struggling with the same challenges as Antti and his father. Antti as an engineer and Ilmari and Sid as industrial designers were sure this was an issue they could solve. 

        So begun two years of tinkering, researching and prototyping to find the most innovative solutions, the most functional materials and the greatest usability any juicer has ever had. The hard work has paid off and now the team of three fellows is proud to present you Samo, the novel and innovative apple juicer like no other!

         

        Budget and funding

        We need €90 000 worth of backing for an initial production run of 200 units. The profit from these exclusive first Samos made for Indiegogo backers will be invested in ramping up the production, boosting Samo's marketing and getting the business running. Every backing counts, let's make this happen!

         

         

        Project timeline

         

        Risks and challenges

        We have constructed 15 prototypes in the last two years. The latest four – the final prototypes – have been built with the same parts by the same manufacturers who will deliver parts for the production run. This has enabled us to ensure the quality of the parts is what promised and to make sure all materials are food-grade. We have established good working relationships with our manufacturers and pre-deals for the initial Indiegogo production run have already been negotiated, so if we get the backers we need, we have everything ready for manufacturing. Then all we have to do is call our partners to start making the pieces. This gives us confidence we are able to deliver to our backers in the Indiegogo community.

        Most parts are manufactured in Asia and will be first shipped to Finland for pre-assembly. The different perk packages with pre-assembled parts will then be shipped to backers. 

        We are very grateful for your support in making this happen!

         

        Shipping

        Samo is a compact little wonder and doesn't take much space, but it's built to last and as such, not a featherweight: weighing 18 kg, it's expensive to ship internationally. We currently offer shipping to 8 European countries but if you live elsewhere, do not hesitate to ask us about shipping to your country: we will find out the shipping costs, get back to you and let's see what can be done! If the Indiegogo campaign is successful we will be able to sell Samos through our website later on with more shipping options.

Samo is a compact little wonder and doesn't take much space, but it's built to last and as such, not a featherweight: weighing 18 kg, it's expensive to ship internationally. We currently offer shipping to 8 European countries but if you live elsewhere, do not hesitate to ask us about shipping to your country: we will find out the shipping costs, get back to you and let's see what can be done! If the Indiegogo campaign is successful we will be able to sell Samos through our website later on with more shipping options.

story:
The Symmetry Shower System

Hi, my name's Mirela, and I’m part of the team that developed the Symmetry System.

I'm a designer, and for years we have put up with shower curtains that drift against our skin, right when we're not expecting it! Yuch!

It's surprising how few products are out there that tackle curtain cling. Yes, there are weights and magnets, and I've tried curved shower poles in the past, but they're clunky, and while they do offer some extra space, for me, it's just not enough. 

So, I set out to design a shower curtain that would give me all the washing space I needed, without ever having to worry that the curtain might drift in to bother me. I also wanted a simple, elegant, flexible solution, that fits a standard straight shower pole. Not too much to ask surely?

Occasionally in design, you start off in the wrong section of the project, and that's what happened to me. My early ideas concentrated on the space I wanted within the shower curtain itself. I had a great time creating fabulous designs of all shapes and sizes, building many prototypes and experimenting with how to support each design within the shower curtain.

 

Then I hit a design wall. This short video explains the issue:-

 

 

That moment of revelation was a real buzz, and I'll never forget it. I later sat down with my husband Chris and explained my idea on how to offset gravity and create the lift that would bring my idea to life. He was impressed and as always, very enthusiastic.

My husband is a product designer who at that time was developing a modular building design for a disabled bathing facility. Chris's broad experience in advanced composites helped in the next process of the development of the product, and we began prototyping and testing in the search to include our four design principles for the curtain:-

  • Simplicity
  • Versatility
  • Practicality
  • Creative Space

On completion of our working design, it was a great thrill to clip the new Symmetry Rings to the shower pole and throw that curtain wide. Turning that shower on and watching the water cascade into the glorious space I had created was a fantastic sensation.
My husband scratched his head, and I heard him say, "Crikey, Mirela, I think you've done it!"

 

Distribution of Symmetry Canopy

 

Symmetry Curtain Canopy view looking upward

Showering for me now has become my favourite time of the day. I may be biased, but having all that space is my dream come true.

The purpose of exhibiting our product on Indiegogo is to look for your help to bring this product to a wider audience. Any help will be fantastic, especially in helping others to experience this wonderful showering experience, but also, being part of this exciting adventure.

Thank you for reading my summary. I hope you enjoyed my story, and I hope you can contribute to this appeal.

 

 

Manufacturing

During development, we sourced a variety of quality manufacturers concentrating on those with established quality control and who, dependent upon their field of expertise, manufacture to a British Standard or better, on a default basis.

My husband's career has always been in manufacturing, sales and distribution so, having him involved has resulted in a streamlined operation capable of delivering a quality product on time, combined with 100% after sales support.

The performance of the Symmetry System is completely dependent on the unique design of the Symmetry Ring, and taking the process forward to offer a broader scope of supply has been challenging. However, working with very talented people have been both rewarding and exciting, and for that, we would like to thank The University of Plymouth.

 

The Symmetry Ring going through the design process

 

Delivery Cost

All delivery prices are based on Royal Mail International and National information. Through experience, delivering products Worldwide is best served by customer and supplier, by the use of the tracked and signed format. It is slightly more expensive, but it does give you, the customer, the ability to know at any time where your package is.

 

The information below displays more data about the Symmetry System, both through images and written information.

The following images indicate the options that were available at the time of deciding to develop a better shower curtain solution. Our family bathtub is as described below, one of the European standard models.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Like all shower curtains, opening this design simply means pulling the curtain across the rail, and the spaced Symmetry rings open and deploys the shower space in an instant. 

 

Closing and storage of the curtain after use are equally as simple. Leaving the curtain to dry naturally after showering helps prevent mould growth but once dry it can be slid to one side and stored.  

 

This drawing of the curtain shows the primary dimensions of height - drop - and width.
The curtain will operate on any standard straight shower curtain pole. Please read instructions before fitting. This product is not recommended for use on a curved shower pole.

 

Colours & Designs

With all the fabulous colours and designs available to us, we have had to adjust choice with cost. Therefore, our opening display of colours makes use of some strong primary shades adjoined with bright White.
All curtains have a 100% Polyester White curtain with a coloured canopy top. Further contrast is offered on the canopy, with white rod sleeves. The curtain header is manufactured in the same colour as the canopy with white grommets.


The colours are:-

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Symmetry Ring Colours

 

For now, White will be the default colour of the Symmetry Ring which is also fully recyclable.

Thank you for taking time to read this information.

If you would like a more comprehensive overview of the product, you can find it at www.symmetryshowers.com

story:
Short Summary

Victor@pookiie.com

 

Victor (Black owner) Robinson 

Greetings Indiegogo,

Don’t read if you not going to donate / help.

 


Green Grass Means Green Money 

Providing us with capital $10k +  to help us scale you will get free($1k + will get 50 % for life) for life POOKIIE LAWN INC

OverviewProject Outline Application’se Narrative:-

POOKIIE LAWN INC. is considering a solution for Lawn service app Mobile Application. In which the customers will be able to view and avail services from the Lawn service app in their area. They will be able to book a service and will pay for the service online by using this application. The service providers will receive the request by application after acceptance and perform services booked by the customer. The Application will be available in English.

 
 

User Roles:- User roles described as SRS documents are as follows: User Role

Customer


Customers are the user who will view the service providers on the map at his location & will reserve the service via request to service provider and will pay for the service by Application by monthly subscription.


Residential home

 

Proposed Solution:-

● Mobile Application for Customer (Android, IOS & Web).

● Web Panel for Admin (Web).

Application Features:

Application & Website Features (Customer):-

Following features will be included in customer applications (Android & IOS) & website.

Application Use Case:-

● Customers will choose current location or any other location on the map.

● Customer will request a service & application & can choose single or multiple service types &

application shall send request to most suitable service provider.

● Services type are following & are subjected to Clients requirements.

○ Cut yards

○ pest control

○ weed control

○ fertilization

○ soil testing

○ aeration

○ seeding

○ deep root feeding for trees and shrubs and irrigation.

○ Etc etc.

● Customers can select date and time for the service.

● Customers will pay via Application using following methods upon acceptance of request

by service provided.

○ Visa/Mastercard

○ Debit/Credit Card

● Customers can select date and time for the service.

● Customers can view the following details of service providers.

○ Services names.

○ Prices

○ Images/icons

○ Customer review

Before and after

Additional Features

These features will be included in the user application.

● Sign Up/Sign In:

○ Customers will be able to sign up/sign in to the application by simply by phone number.

○ Customers will have other following options available for sign up/sign in.

■ By Facebook

■ By Google

○ Remember me option will be available for sign in.

○ The Forget Password option will be available to customers.

● Review:

○ Customers can rate a service provider by star rating & feedback upon service completion.

● Cancel subscription:

○ Customers can cancel requests after booking by choosing a reason & can be charged with some fee.

● Favorite List:

○ Customers will be able to add a service provider to their favorite list for easy rebooking.

● Contact Us:

○ Customers will be able to contact the support team from application several options will be provided.

■ By Phone

● History:

○ Customers can view their service history as well as upcoming appointments.

■ Payment

■ Date & Time

■ Service Provider Name & ID

■ Service Type

● Reporting:

○ Customers will have the ability to report a service provider with an explanation.

● Profile (View & Edit):

○ Customers will be able view their profile & will be able to change details such as.

■ Name

■ Password

■ Phone Number

■ Address

■ Saved Address

● Sign Out:

○ Customers will be able to sign out of the application.

● Notifications:

○ Customers will receive the following notifications.

■ Service Provider Trip status updates.

■ Promos

■ Service request accepted

■ Payment

 

●

Following features will be included in the Admin Panel.

Admin Reports:

Admin can generate different reports based on following Data Items.

○ Users City/Area.

○ Services Type

○ Phone numbers

○ Service types

○ Received Payments

○ Revenue

Payment Reports & Details (View & Assignment):

Admin can generate & view different payment reports based on following Data Items.

○ Payments by users based on Date Monthly.

○ Payments by Users based on City/Area/Region.

○ Payments to Service Provides.

○ Total Payment.

○ Total Earnings

○ Total Deduction

○ Profits

○ Conflicted Payments

○ Assignment of Payments to rightful service providers

●

Admin Panel Features (Admin):-

●

Dashboard (View):

Admin will be able to view the following reports in the admin panel dashboard for that date.

○ Total services booked

○ Total services cancelled

○ Most active region/city

○ Least active region city

○ Most active service provider

○ New Users

○ New Referrals

○ Total Received Payments.

○ Total deducted commission

○ Total Revenue

User Management (View & Manage):

Admin will be able to view the following user data items in the admin panel.

○ All Customer data

○ Flagged customer by reporting

○ Most active customers

○ Delete Customer

○ Ban Customer by Phone number

○ All Service Providers

○ Details of Services

○ Details of bookings

○ Service provider account approval

●

 

Intellectual Property Rights:-

All materials, including, but not limited to, software, programs, source code and object code, comments to the source or object code, specifications, documents, abstracts and summaries thereof developed by us shall belong exclusively to POOKIIE LAWN INC.All patent and copyright interests, and agrees to execute all documents reasonably requested.

Termination of Agreement:-

If POOKIIE LAWN INC. intends to terminate or close the project immediately during the project development with the exception of Delay & fulfillment!

In Case of delay & failing to fulfill requirements by our end if issue is not resolved within 1 week POOKIIE LAWN INC. is liable to refund 50 percent payment in case of termination.

 

Let’s GO!

Milestones

      Phase

Milestone

 Requirements Specification Documents Approval.

 - Accountant Consulting $150 Hr

 - Lawyer / Business Structure $200 hr

 ● Total development cost of the project will be 3000$.

● Complete Source code & all resources will be provided to POOKIIE LAWN INC.

Other Features with cost estimate other than development cost:

○ Estimated hosting cost will be between 200$ to 400$ decided later after project completion.

○ Social Media Marketing integration cost will be discussed after complete the project.

○ Support charges will be $350 per month.

○ 250$ per Language.

○ Play Store fee to publish Android App will be $50 and AppStore fee will be $150.

○ Technical Upgrade depends upon features complexity can be discussed on the time of upgradation.

○ SSL fee will be $100.

○ Third Party Resources are not covered in the cost.

 

Project Development Timeline:-

Note: Development timeline of design is subjected to Client’s Approval.

    Phase

   Timeline

     Design

     1 week

   Frontend Development

 2 weeks

    Finalized Development

Project Team: -

story:
Iona captures Viruses including the Coronavirus.

 

Hi Backers - We have a mission to improve people's wellbeing with safer air using ionization technology. We are looking to raise $120,000 to develop our a unique two-part Ionization system that we call Iona.

We believe that the world needs Iona now because it is proven to capture and render harmless airborne Viruses.

Read Our Letter of Hope

 

 

Help us bring clean air everywhere!

With Iona we are bringing the same technology that has been used for decades to protect the medical & high tech industry into the home. 

 

 

 
 
 

With Iona you plug it in and you're good to go.

 

There are no filters to replace and it costs only pennies a day to operate.

 

 

 

In the eye of a needle

 

Iona captures the smallest particles; .001 -.3 microns, the most dangerous and the ones others cannot get.

 

 

The Challenge of Ultra Fine Particles

 

 

Ultra Fine Particles particles are so small that they go right through our lungs and right into our bloodstream. Those tend to cause the most irritation and ultimately disease. Iona captures ultra fine particles in your indoor space and destroys them.

 

 

Sphere of Influence

 

 

Unlike other air purification devices that push air through a single unit, Iona creates a Sphere of Influence between two units, a negative (emitter) and positive (collector).

This is more expensive to produce, but it creates more coverage and is of much higher quality. We have chosen quality instead of cost cutting. 

 

 

Iona Captures Viruses

 

Iona’s two-part air purification system captures particles as small as viruses. When viruses are drawn to ions released by the emitter they are taken to the collector where they are obliterated upon impact. It’s similar to insects being zapped on an electronic insect killer device but with viruses its smaller than the eye can see and silent. They are rendered dead when they come into contact with the collector.

 

Iona Kills Mold & Bacteria

 

Iona kills airborne mold and bacteria. An average person breathes on average 12,000 breaths or 200 cubic feet of air on a daily basis. This includes floating mold and bacteria with each breath. With Iona mold and bacteria are drawn to the collector as they take on a negative charge and are killed when they come into contact.

 

Iona Clears Smoke & Odors

 

The Iona clears spaces of smoke particles and odors. As Ions flow between the emitter and collector they attach to pollutants such as smoke and over a short period of time remove it from the air. In an enclosed space smoke will eventually disappear as the Iona is left running.

 

 

Get a more restful sleep

 

 

We are interrupted often from challenges with breathing clearly. You want to have the cleanest possible purest air you can have while you're sleeping. Purify your air with Iona and get better more restful sleep.

 

 

Breath is life. We can only live a few minutes without it.

 

Help us bring clean air everywhere!

 

 

 

FAQ's

 

How does it work?

Everything that's a particle, whether it's a bacteria, mold, smoke, virus-infested particle, is going to be affected by the negative charge (emitter). Therefore, it can be collected from your space and drawn to a positive charge (collector) where it is destroyed.

 

Does Iona capture the Coronavirus?

Yes, Iona does capture viruses such as the coronavirus. It is a great supplementary device to use along with CDC recommendations such as social distancing, mask wearing, and washing hands.

 

Can I use more than one set?

Yes, you can add it dynamically and add more collectors and emitters to your space to add coverage. 

 

When will I receive my Iona?

The Iona is in development now with the first run of devices anticipated to be completed by March 2021. You can follow the production process on our Blog where status updates will also be posted.

 

Does Iona have any filters?

No. This is one of the main benefits with Iona over other Air Purification systems. With Iona every 3-4 months you simply pull out its collector surface and wipe it clean, then reinsert it. There are no extra parts to keep it going.

 

How much does it cost to operate?

Only Pennies a day. The Iona is designed to plug into any standard home outlet costing only pennies a day in electricity costs to operate. You simply plug it in and turn it on.

 

Does Iona create Ozone?

No. The system does not produce or generate any ozone. 

 

Does Iona have a warranty?

Yes. Iona Solutions warrants the Iona-branded product contained in the original packaging against defects in materials and workmanship when used normally for a period of two years.

 

What is your return policy?

If you are not satisfied with the Iona you can return it within 30 days of delivery using our self addressed stamped return sticker. Just close the box up and apply sticker and send it back. You will receive a full refund.

 

 

Quality & Safety

 

 

 

Iona will meet all UL requirements for electronic safety.

It will be tested by industry standard CADR, which is a Clean Air Delivery Rate Test that is done by the American Home Appliance Manufacturers Association. 

 

 

Our Story

 

 

Ted Flittner has had a lifelong quest to understand breath, breathing, and how to breathe easier. And in so doing he has come across some of the technology that enables everyone to breathe easily, healthily, and effortlessly.

View Ted Flittner's History

The Story of Iona - Video

 

 

Bill Kunde has over 30 years of clean room design and management experience. He has travelled the world installing clean rooms. He has worked on the design and build of clean rooms for Apple and IBM. His dream has always been to bring an Ionization consumer product to life based on best practices from his lifelong experiences in clear room design and engineering.

View Bill Kunde's History

story:
Hey Everyone! Our names are Chadwick Bruce and Jennifer Schnabel, and we are the Co-Founders for the New Solution, Bathroom Tree™! We are a family startup company based out of Northern New York located near the 1000 Islands Region and are so excited to introduce this Patent-Pending Solution known as "The Bathroom Tree™". Bathroom Tree™ is a toilet tools concealment device in the disguise of an Indoor House Plant that will enable us to store and conceal those nasty and wretched Toilet Brushes and Plungers.  As we develop and grow through a successful campaign with Indiegogo, will be able to offer different plant and flower pot variations for both the Toilet Brush and Toilet Plunger! As the company progresses, ultimately, we will transition in a Bathroom inspired boutique store offering several decor and interior variations! 

Our Campaign is extended the full 60 day period to ensure maximum results and offer this opportunity to everyone for as long as possible. Our Goal is to reach $20,000 amount to cover the remaining start up expenses and launch our first official batch of orders to all of you! This Campaign is important to us here at Bathroom Tree™ as it is the first step in propelling us to the next level, launching us into the production phase! Your help and contribution will help make our dream come true! (While also providing you with an awesome new bathroom decor that everyone is going to love!)

Whether for yourself or a friend, Bathroom Tree™ is the perfect gift for Weddings, House Warmings, or any other special occasion! Ideal for any home or business environment that's finally ready to transform their bathroom interior into a more welcoming atmosphere! 

Simple. Elegant. Undetectable.

Our Patent-Pending Solution will immediately transform your bathroom from looking like a public and overused rest stop, into your own personal sanctuary. 

What We Need & What You Get

Bathroom Tree™ is campaigning with the goal of reaching $20,000.

By contributing to Bathroom Tree™ - Not only will you be among the first to acquire this industry revolutionizing product, you'll be adding significant value to the company by enabling us to open our doors to the public and allowing us to propel into reality. This will enable us to finalize Manufacturing Molds for production and begin producing/distributing Bathroom Tree products. Help in making Bathroom Tree™ come to life, Help in transforming one bathroom at a time!  

The Ficus Elastica Robusta, also known as the Rubber Plant, Rubber Bush, or Rubber Tree. 

Relax peacefully in your safe haven as you admire the new aesthetic tone thats been set, or an addition too for those already plant lovers! Perfect for that corner next to the commode, your new Bathroom Tree™ is sure to draw attention and admiration from all your guests! 

This addition to your bathroom will instantly brighten up the atmosphere while aiding in that alluring environment! No longer are we required to stand the unbearable sight of that Toilet Brush or Toilet Plunger any longer! With your new Bathroom Tree™ not only are you investing in a new aesthetic that will last you for years, you're finally tackling the problem of placing and concealing those ugly items out of sight. Bring home your next decor addition today!

HOME AND OFFICE: Bathroom Tree™ Requires No Maintenance and is Perfect For Your Home or Office Bathroom With No Limitation To Improving Your Overall Décor. 

PERFECT GIFT - for Housewarming, Birthday, Valentine's Day, Mother’s Day, Christmas’s Day, Baby Shower, Wedding Gift, Dinner Party Present; for your friends, family and loved ones.

PREMIUM & DURABLE MATERIAL - Our artificial tree is made of a durable&PP material (real touch, waterproof, eco-friendly)with a High Quality Precision made Potter.

The posture of these green plants can be adjusted freely. Due to the influence of long-term logistics, the leaves may be squeezed. When you receive them, please comb the leaves to get the best appearance. Will House most Toilet Plungers or Toilet Brushes w/ Caddy. (Not Included)

Color: Potted White W/ Ficus Elastica 

Brand : Bathroom Tree™

Material : Silk

Item Dimensions : LxWxH (8 x 8 x 24) inches

Item Weight: 4.2 Pounds

The Perfect Decor. The Perfect Concealment.

 

The First Among The Bathroom Tree™ Community! 

 

 

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Bathroom Tree™ will only grow with your help! You are among the first group to be a part of our first official batch of orders! We ask you to SHARE SHARE SHARE with all your friends and family :)! We can all think of at least one person that would LOVE adding this new solution to their homes!
