story:
Short Summary

I came to this work five years ago and I worked in a company that specialized in pools, containers and many other similiar products made from plastic. In this company I inovated reducing material in production and I made these products myself. I didn't get the space needed for selfrealization so I decided to try it alone.

I tried making this cellar for two years. There were very high costs for the prototype so it was difficult. After two years I finally made it and started testing it. We had tested the prototypes many times in many different conditions. The first ones had a few mistakes but with every new model we got rid of more and more of these mistakes. Today is the cellar in a perfect condition.

How you can help 

You can help me mainly with machine purchases which will help make to make the building of the cellar easier and the price as well. I need the money primarely for purchasing these machines for speeding the building process. If the goal is not reached I will use every euro for purchasing these machines

Why is this project good for people

This cellar is made from polyprophylene which is used in food industry and it's fully recyclable as well. It's very durable and it can withstand high pressure without cementing it. It can also be put in fast, with good conditions in around 1 and a half hour. Rodents don't like this material and it doesn't taste them and there is no risk of mold either.

With this said, it's perfect for people that didn't thought of putting in cellar when build the house. This cellar is perfect solution becouse it can be put in fast.

Risks & Challenges

My accomplishments are minimizing the building costs and i minimized the waste from 8-10% to 3-5%. I also inovated way of reinforcing of the cellar so they're very durable.

To not involve in any risk we tested these cellars in many different conditions, but we can't quarantee that there won't be any issues. If any issues occur we will be solving them as soon as possible.

Other ways to help

If you would like to help in any other way you can share the link to this project on your social media.

Big thank you to everyone who helped in any way.

story:
US Holiday Lights Use More Electricity than El Salvador Does In a Year



 





The rational use of natural resources, first of all amongst all the energetic ones, is one of those challenges on which  the future of humanity and the planet is based. After decades of wasteful consumerism ,there is need for a  profound technological  and cultural change. A real revolution where we are all asked  to help. 

Energy equivalent to 6 bilions euro! That is what the planet consumes just on Christmas lights in December. This means that in fact, we invest 6 bilions euro every year during the Christmas period, in pollution. Do we want to do something concrete to change this next year, 2016?     




L’ impiego razionale delle risorse naturali, prime fra tutte quelle energetiche, è una delle sfide sulle quali si gioca il futuro dell’umanità e del pianeta. Dopo decenni di consumismo sprecone e scellerato, urge un profondo cambiamento tecnologico e culturale. Una vera e propria rivoluzione alla quale tutti siamo chiamati a contribuire.   

Energia pari a 6 miliardi di euro! Tanto consuma il Pianeta con le luci di Natale nel mese di dicembre. Questo tradotto vuol dire che investiamo 6 miliardi ogni anno, a dicembre, in inquinamento. Vogliamo fare qualcosa di concreto per cambiare da quest'anno, 2016?

                                                               
                                                    
     






                                      

       



One of the highlights of this form of technology is the use of photovoltaic cells which are applied to recycle the light emitted from other sources, which are in themselves already lit up. Thanks to these photovoltaic cells, which are placed close to the lit bulbs, more energy is generated. Hence no electricity consumption.



Uno dei punti forti di questo sistema è l’utilizzo di celle fotovoltaiche per riciclare la luce emessa da fonti luminose comunque utilizzate. Per effetto fotovoltaico, le celle posizionate nei pressi delle lampadine accese generano energia che, senza aiuto di accumulatori alimenta direttamente i diffusori di luce led. Da qui il non consumo.






                                      





The XMAS LIGHTS is the first product we have designed and tested ... and it really works!

                                                                    




                                                                                                                 


300mm x 300mm x 30mm









Four photovoltaic cells, 48 colored balls LED illuminated and some aluminum elements.

Il kit si presenta così: quattro celle fotovoltaiche, 48 palline colorate contenenti led disposti lungo un filo elettrico e alcuni elementi in alluminio.





It is assembled like in the picture: photovoltaic generator, white wire (3mm diameter), a 15m wire of which 10 m contains the LED balls (diameter 15mm) , one every 20 cm.

Ed eccolo assemblato: il generatore fotovoltaico collegato attraverso il filo bianco (sezione 3mm, lunghezza 15 m) alle 48 palline/led.






Four photovoltaic cells, three aluminium elements and four white insulating elements.

Quattro celle  fotovoltaiche, tre elementi in alluminio e quattro isolanti bianchi.





The assembled structure shows how the aluminium elements should be placed.

La struttura assemblata indica come vanno posizionati gli elementi in alluminio.






Image of the back of the generator. Once the aluminium structure is assembled, the four photovoltaic cells are then inserted.

Visuale del retro del generatore. Una volta composta la struttura in alluminio, vengono infilate le quattro celle fotovoltaiche






Image of the front of the generator.

Visuale del davanti del generatore. 






Bend the aluminum rods...

Piegare le astine in alluminio…





Insert the photovoltaic cells...

Inserire le celle fotovoltaiche…






Unscrew the bulb of any lamp, insert the generator, screw the bulb...

Svitare la lampadina di una qualsiasi lampada, inserire il generatore, avvitare la lampadina..





Light the bulb...

Accendere la lampadina…






And there you are! In this way, with this technique we have cut down the cost of electricity on the Christmas tree lights by using photovoltaic cells, which are attached to the lights within our own homes.

Ed ecco! In questo modo, con questa tecnica abbattiamo i consumi di energia elettrica per le luci dell’albero di Natale utilizzando celle fotovoltaiche applicate alle luci che teniamo comunque accese dentro casa.
story_txt:
US Holiday Lights Use More Electricity than El Salvador Does In a Year
 
The
rational use of natural resources, first of all amongst all the energetic ones,
is one of those challenges on which  the
future of humanity and the planet is based. After decades of wasteful
consumerism ,there is need for a 
profound technological  and
cultural change. A real revolution where we are all asked  to help. 

Energy equivalent to 6 bilions euro! That is what the planet consumes just on Christmas lights in December. This means that in fact, we invest 6 bilions euro every year during the Christmas period, in pollution. Do we want to do something concrete to change this next year, 2016?     
L’
impiego razionale delle risorse naturali, prime fra tutte quelle energetiche, è
una delle sfide sulle quali si gioca il futuro dell’umanità e del pianeta. Dopo
decenni di consumismo sprecone e scellerato, urge un profondo cambiamento
tecnologico e culturale. Una vera e propria rivoluzione alla quale tutti siamo
chiamati a contribuire.   
Energia pari a 6 miliardi di euro! Tanto consuma il Pianeta con le luci di Natale nel
mese di dicembre. Questo tradotto vuol dire che investiamo 6 miliardi ogni anno,
a dicembre, in inquinamento. Vogliamo
fare qualcosa di concreto per cambiare da quest'anno, 2016?                                                                                                                        


















                                             


One of the highlights of this form of technology is the use of photovoltaic cells which are applied to recycle the light emitted from other sources, which are in themselves already lit up. Thanks to these photovoltaic cells, which are placed close to the lit bulbs, more energy is generated. Hence no electricity consumption.




Uno dei punti forti di questo sistema è l’utilizzo di celle fotovoltaiche per riciclare la luce emessa da fonti luminose comunque utilizzate. Per effetto fotovoltaico, le celle posizionate nei pressi delle lampadine accese generano energia che, senza aiuto di accumulatori alimenta direttamente i diffusori di luce led. Da qui il non consumo.





                                      









The XMAS LIGHTS is the first product we have designed and tested ... and it really works!

                                                                    



                                                                                                                 

300mm x 300mm x 30mm











Four photovoltaic cells, 48 colored balls LED
illuminated and some aluminum elements.

Il kit si presenta così: quattro
celle fotovoltaiche, 48 palline colorate contenenti led disposti lungo un filo
elettrico e alcuni elementi in alluminio.





It is assembled like in the picture: photovoltaic
generator, white wire (3mm diameter), a 15m wire of which 10 m contains the LED
balls (diameter 15mm) , one every 20 cm.



Ed eccolo assemblato: il generatore fotovoltaico collegato attraverso il filo
bianco (sezione 3mm, lunghezza 15
 m) alle 48 palline/led.






Four photovoltaic cells, three aluminium elements and four white insulating elements.

Quattro celle  fotovoltaiche, tre elementi in alluminio e quattro isolanti bianchi.





The assembled structure shows how the aluminium
elements should be placed.

La struttura assemblata indica
come vanno posizionati gli elementi in alluminio.



Image of the back of the generator. Once the aluminium
structure is assembled, the four photovoltaic cells are then inserted.
Visuale del retro del generatore. Una volta composta la
struttura in alluminio, vengono infilate le quattro celle fotovoltaiche





Image of the front of the generator.

Visuale del davanti del generatore. 


Bend the aluminum
rods...

Piegare le astine in
alluminio…




Insert the photovoltaic cells...

Inserire le celle
fotovoltaiche…







Unscrew the bulb of any lamp, insert the generator,
screw the bulb...
Svitare la lampadina di una qualsiasi lampada,
inserire il generatore, avvitare la lampadina..





Light the bulb...

Accendere la lampadina…







And there you are! In this way, with this technique we
have cut down the cost of electricity on the Christmas tree lights by using
photovoltaic cells, which are attached to the lights within our own homes.
Ed ecco! In questo modo, con questa tecnica
abbattiamo i consumi di energia elettrica per le luci dell’albero di Natale
utilizzando celle fotovoltaiche applicate alle luci che teniamo comunque accese
dentro casa.

story:
The Name:

To introspect, is to examine one's own thoughts or feelings, to develop and better oneself. Minimalism is the intentional promotion of the things we most value and the removal of everything that distracts us from it. I want to produce a product range which merges these philosophies.

The Project:  

Funding of this project will allow me to divert all of my time into its development. I have all of the manufacturing processes ready. This page will be continuously progressed throughout funding. 

I am a product designer, with years of qualified manufacturing engineering and freelance product design experience. I want to create a product range which has a new, original aesthetic, which echos my own design philosophies. This is the first product of a wide, planned range. This will be expanded more once it gains motion in funding.

Financial Goals:

£2000+: Prototyping

Will allow for much faster product progression. To be spent on improvements through prototyping. I have all the facilities available currently on loan, I am able to make small batches at this stage which will be also used to progress to the next goal.

£10,000+: Manufacturing

Able to invest in manufacturing facilities to start production. In-house manufacturing also ensures high quality control. Manufacturing will be kept in Devon, UK, to support the highly skilled British industry. I have connections with many carpenters and other specialists all within Devon.

£25,000+: Up-scaling 

The manufacturing is designed fundamentally easy to up-scale. This goal will allow production to be larger, and so, an online store will be started, and negotiations can start with store partners. At this stage, other products (which are also at the prototyping stage) can be released.

Simplified funding plan

The First Product:

The Introspect One is a lamp which is 174.6mm high, 120mm wide.

It has an E27 screw socket, which will come with a high quality, high efficiency 'Edison' style bulb. The cable is braided, and will come in a range of colours and lengths depending on customer preference.

The base is currently teak wood veneer, however a production version of the lamp will then have a range of solid hardwood bases. 

The shade is printed using bioplastic originating from wasted corn starch.

The Introspect One prototype

Respecting the beauty and synergy of new and old manufacturing techniques

The range:

The range will be eventually expanded, which will be a range of different designs. This will include designs for different usage cases (wall mounted, ceiling etc.), and different shapes sizes and aesthetics.

More will be revealed as this campaign progresses. Feel free to contact me for more information or enquiries. I will respond within 24 hours:

www.ConnorNorvall.com  

www.instagram.com/ConnorNorvall  

www.linkedin.com/in/ConnorNorvall

NorvallDesign@Gmail.com

And finally:

THANKYOU

All contributors will have some form of product discount, signed products, or anything they want depending on their contribution.

story:
SMALT is primed and ready to entertain and delight your guests anywhere you choose to dine. It's easy to stream music, switch up the mood lighting, or dispense salt using the device or get advanced features with the app. SMALT can be use with iOS and Android and is compatible with Alexa, so there's more than one way to have fun and interact with this versatile centerpiece.

 

 

CLICK HERE FOR THE MEDIA KIT

 

 

SMALT features everything you need to enhance your dining experience and add flavor to your meal!

  • A fun and intuitive salt dispensing system
  • Crisp & powerful bluetooth speaker to stream your favorite music 
  • Multi-colored lights to set the mood right
  • App and device enabled functionality
  • Interfaces with Amazon Echo

 

SMALT dispenses salt with a shake/pinch of your smartphone screen or simply turning the dial manually, allowing you to be in control of the amount of salt you serve. Simply choose the amount of salt you desire and it will dispense into a small, removable tray. It's easy and SMALT does all the measuring for you!

Turn it up a notch with one of the best performing portable bluetooth speakers. Stream your favorite music to get the party started or relax at dinner with your favorite Jazz music. Want to take it outdoors? Sure, it’s meant to go wherever you go.
 
 
 

Enhance your dining ambiance with color-changing mood lighting.  Transform your everyday dining into an extraordinary experience.

 

SMALT - The Perfect Meal Companion!

 

 

1 in 3 Americans have high blood pressure and many more are at risk. Because of this, many Americans have to control their salt consumption. SMALT offers an easy and fun way to monitor and control your consumption using smart tech. Whether it’s a pinch or an exact measured amount, SMALT can be an entertaining way to keep you on track towards a healthier heart.

 

 

 

Clean and modern, SMALT is ergonomically designed to fit perfectly in one hand. Place SMALT on the dining table, kitchen counter, patio area, rooftop, or take it camping.

  • The perfect fit at 7.25 X 2.75/3.63 
  • Sleek, modern design makes SMALT a sexy way to entertain
  • Conversation piece
  • Rechargeable batteries that last up to 4 hours

 

 

SMALT is easy to use with or without the app. Featuring intuitive design, SMALT makes setting the mood with light and sound an easy way to maximize your dining experience.

  • Single control button on the back makes switching between modes easier.
  • Bright LCD screen offers a convenient user interface.
  • A dial on the device allows you  access to all standard features manually. Play music, adjust the lights, or measure & dispense salt all with the touch of a button. Many of the advanced functions are available when used with the SMALT app.
  • Can be used with Amazon Echo.

 

 

 

 

Use the app for advanced features, as well as a fun way to get the right amount of salt!

  • Supported by iOS and Android.
  • Use the app as a hassle-free way to dispense salt.
  • Adjust the amount of salt from a pinch to a tablespoon and any amount in between

You can also dispense salt virtually with intuitive hand gestures! Simply shake your phone to shake out salt or pinch the screen of the smartphone to dispense a pinch of salt. There’s also a function if you just want to “eyeball” the amount.

  • SMALT connects with Amazon Echo to provide users with voice interface! Simply ask Alexa to dispense the desired amount of salt and SMALT takes care of the rest!
  • Use the SMALT app to track your sodium consumption. Users can set the app to reduce intake over time.

 

Get ready to rock or mellow out with your favorite tunes streamed right through your SMALT!

  • High-end Bluetooth speakers
  • Powerful mood lighting
  • Control the powerful ambiance light and amazing sound quality from the unit itself or the app
  • Stream your favorite music with SMALT

 

One of the most basic human needs is the need for belongingness. For centuries, one of the ways we have fulfilled this need is by gathering around the dinner table, a place where we connect, appreciate and feel appreciated. SMALT is our effort to further enhance this experience - all with the important benefit of watching your salt intake. Our goal is to entertain and engage you, your friends, and family with an enhanced dining experience that let’s you set the mood and monitor your sodium intake

 

Q: How is salt dispensed from SMALT?

A: Simply use the button and dial system on the device to choose and dispense the desired amount of salt or use the app for more advanced functions. Once the salt is dispensed into the tray below, simply remove it and add salt to your dish or pick up the SMALT itself and sprinkle on your plate.

Q: How is SMALT different from Amazon Alexa?

A: Alexa is a voice interface for connected home devices. Using a simple voice command you can ask Alexa to dispense salt from your SMALT.  SMALT has a built in mood- light and SMALT measures and dispenses salt. Alexa does not have these functions.

 

Q: Can I put pepper in SMALT?

A: No, because SMALT is only designed to measure, track, and control salt. 

 

Q: How do I change the mood light color?

A: You can control the mood light directly from the SMALT unit by turning the dial or from your smartphone via the SMALT App, which gives you the freedom to choose the desired color and set the perfect ambiance for any occasion.

 

Q: Do I have to have the SMALT App to operate SMALT?

A: No, all standard functions are available on the SMALT unit itself.  You can change the mood light color, control the speaker, and dispense salt easily with the touch of a button.

 

Q: Do I need the SMALT app?

A: All standard functions are available on the SMALT unit itself,  but you need the SMALT App to access other additional features such as  the Shake, pinch, and pour feature, mood light programming,  and salt tracking .

 

Q: How long is the battery life?

A: SMALT comes with a 3.6V rechargeable battery. Normally it takes a couple of hours to charge the battery and when fully charged, the battery lasts up to 4 hours.

 

Q: Does SMALT pair with other devices besides Amazon Alexa?

A: Currently you can integrate SMALT only with Amazon Alexa. We will integrate SMALT with other platforms in the near future.

 

Q: How can I stream music from SMALT?

A:  You can pair SMALT with your phone to stream music through SMALT’s Bluetooth speaker.

 

Q: How much is the shipping cost?

A: Shipping cost varies depending upon the perk you choose and your location. Select the country in the checkout process and shipping cost will be shown instantly.

 

Q: How can I clean my SMALT?

A: The Best way to clean your SMALT is with a damp cloth. 

 

Q: Can I really shake salt from my Smartphone?

A: Yes, you can!  Using the SMALT app, you can shake your phone or pinch the screen to dispense salt.  With these simple actions  the desired amount of salt gets dispensed in a small removable tray at the bottom of your SMALT.

 

Q: What different types of salt can I use with SMALT?​

A: SMALT is designed to be used with common table salt.

 

Q: Can I use SMALT to grind sea salt or other coarser salts like Himalayan salt?

A: SMALT does not grind salt.  You can use any pre-ground with a consistency similar to the table salt  with SMALT.

 

Q: How do I know what setting to use when I am preparing different foods?

A: You can dispense salt in amounts as low as a pinch or as high as one tablespoon with several denominations in between.  The amount you pick is dependent on your taste or dietary restrictions.

 

Q: How can I track my sodium with the SMALT App?

A:  Every time you dispense salt, the amount of sodium gets logged.  Each serving of sodium is tracked by the app.  You can track each family member’s consumption separately.

 

Q: How can SMALT help me if I am on a restricted sodium diet?

A: Excessive salt consumption is becoming a big health problem worldwide. Most Americans consume twice as much salt than what’s recommended by the American Heart Association.  When cooking with SMALT, you can choose the low sodium meal setting from your SMALT App.  This setting helps with preparing low sodium meals conveniently as recommended by the AHA guideline.

story:
Spin On is a fun twist to your traditional house appliances. Unlike your other "boring" machines with their "boring" buttons, Spin On actually asks you to play with it before it turns on.

Spin On is switched on by spinning a special top over it and switched off when the top stopped spinning.  The top is specially made and can spin perpetually as long as the base is being powered. Meaning you don't have to ever worry about having to repower your Spin On every time you flip a page!

Inside the base is a electromagnet that keeps switching on and off to push the magnet inside of the spinning top to keep it spinning. If you are interested in how it works, you can find out here with James from The Action Lab.

Here at Tree Top, we think it is important to bring out our inner child every now and then to remind ourselves how we used to view this world. How we were able to be easily amazed and always curious about everything around us. How we were always faced with problems and how we over came them. This will give us strength to handle our daily problems with an optimistic attitude.

And we get that you aren't always in the mood of using a spinning top to turn on the lamp. We understand that there will be times when you wake up in the middle of the night with numb fingers. Therefore, Spin On is also installed with a touch sensor that allows it to switch on with a light tap of your finger.

In addition to the fun that Spin On will bring you, it is also very durably built. The interior is encased with 2 piece of solid pine wood and a beafy acrylic ring that will endure any temper during mail. If you back your Spin On from Kickstarter now, you will be getting our Kickstarter exclusive deal of up to 25% off the retail price. Spin On will be a perfect gift for anyone and it will certainly brighten up their day for days to come.

Here at Tree Top, we think it is important to bring out our inner child every now and then to remind ourselves how we used to view this world. How we were able to be easily amazed and always curious about everything around us. How we were always faced with problems and how we over came them. This will give us strength to handle our daily problems with an optimistic attitude.

And we get that you aren't always in the mood of using a spinning top to turn on the lamp. We understand that there will be times when you wake up in the middle of the night with numb fingers. Therefore, Spin On is also installed with a touch sensor that allows it to switch on with a light tap of your finger.


In addition to the fun that Spin On will bring you, it is also very durably built. The interior is encased with 2 piece of solid pine wood and a beafy acrylic ring that will endure any temper during mail. If you back your Spin On from Kickstarter now, you will be getting our Kickstarter exclusive deal of up to 25% off the retail price. Spin On will be a perfect gift for anyone and it will certainly brighten up their day for days to come.

story:
My Story

Ever since I was a child, I loved working around the house with my dad.  Somehow it just wasn't work anymore, it was an experience.  There's something about a box with all the necessary tools to fix almost anything.

Now I would like to return to that sector and offer sturdy, durable tools to a new generation of DIYers and their families, as well as to those steady DIYers still in the game.  I want to give that same satisfactory feeling of having a box full of tools to get a job done.

What I need:

  • A rental place to store the tool kits ( about $1,000 a month)
  • Funding for advertisements and a team ($15,000)
  • Funding for assembling, shipping, and selling of the tool kits ($17,000).
  • Funding to pay Indiegogo & miscellaneous fees ($7,000)

I know I cannot do it alone. 

That is why I am reaching out to you.  I would be so thrilled if you would help me build this business up. In the process, we would be

  • Helping America build! That alone is something very necessary.
  • Help a business to grow which would eventually lead to more job creation.
  • Make a girl very, very happy to be dealing with tools again!

My Old Lemonhead Project

This is the biggest project I've ever undertaken.  I used to write and illustrate "The Lemonheads" children's books under the alias, Gila Ran.  (You can check those out on Amazon. ) That took a lot of dedication, a lot of hours, a lot of push.  I know this will require much more of a push and I'm ready and willing to do what it takes to get the business up and running.

Consider the Impact

There are many minority or Black-owned or women-owned businesses that are waiting to be born.  We have been held back, but we want to contribute to America and to the world. Helping this business take off would be a step in this direction.

Again, I know I should not embark on this alone.  I hope to team up with accountants and advisors to ensure all I's are dotted and all T's are crossed. And if you want to contribute with advice, that is welcomed as well.

Thank you to Indiegogo for this platform.  And thank you so much to all who contributes.

story:
Aprons are supposed to keep you clean from messes in the kitchen... but too many aprons actually bleed through when wet, ruining the clothes underneath with stains.

 

 

Infrequently washed aprons harbor sickness-causing bacteria and that can spread throughout the kitchen. This cross-contamination of bugs can lead to higher chances of foodborne illness.  

 


 

Above all, an apron should keep you clean and protect your clothes underneath. With a unique double-layer fabric, Spyce blocks any water from passing through. This prevents stains on the clothes that you care about.

 

 

Spyce aprons kill 99% of bacteria, reducing the risk of foodborne illness from cross-contamination in the kitchen. With thousands of minerals embedded in every thread, this apron stays anti-bacterial even through repeated washes. Welcome to the new era of clean. 

 

Heavy aprons can strain your neck. With Spyce, every fiber is designed to mimic a feather's structure. Coming in a total of 5.7 oz, this apron is so light you’ll forget it’s there.   

Durable, aesthetic, and sleek. Cheap plastic doesn’t belong anywhere in a kitchen where it is prone to melting and falling apart. That’s why we replaced them with high-quality metal clasps and genuine leather. Adjusting your apron has never been easier.

 

The textile industry heavily overuses harsh, corrosive chemicals like dyes and bleaches. We believe this doesn't belong anywhere near your food. That’s why Spyce aprons use medical-grade fabric that is hypoallergenic. 

A standard apron should be washed after every use to prevent the growth of bacteria. With anti-bacterial technology, Spyce can be washed much less frequently meaning it's better for the environment and saves you money too! 

We use the same silky smooth fabric on our straps as the rest of the apron and craft it with a thicker more comfortable design. There’s no cotton webbing or digging into your neck.  

 

We focused on detailed craftsmanship in designing these aprons. To provide the highest quality product, we manufacture these aprons in Los Angeles to ensure careful oversight of the process. 

 

 

 

 

We use a molecular-level infusion process to embed and crystalize natural minerals directly into every thread. This more involved technology permanently locks them within the fibers, enhancing the fabric with anti-bacterial characteristics, even after repeated washes. These minerals (including titanium, zinc, and zirconium) kill 99% of bacteria.

Underneath this mineral-infused polyester is a water-repellent membrane which has nano-sized pores that are too small for water to pass through but large enough to remain breathable. This double-layer system blocks any water from passing through, protecting your clothes from any spills or stains.

 

 

We've made it our mission to help you live healthier through innovatively designed products. After testing dozens of fabrics and sourcing materials that uphold our mission, we’ve combined detailed craftsmanship with cutting edge technology to create a one of a kind apron. Staying clean has never been this easy. 

At the age of 10, I was diagnosed with Leukemia and spent my childhood constantly aware of how dangerous exposure to bacteria could be. Having survived, I set out to find solutions to minimize our exposure to harmful bacteria so we can live healthier and cleaner lives.

Many charitable organizations helped me survive this challenging experience and I was inspired to give back in meaningful ways. With OURA, our mission is to improve lives with products that heal and inspire others to give back.

- Keane, OURA co-founder 

 

 

 

 

Risks & Challenges

We are a team of scientists, designers, and operational experts. We deeply understand what is required to craft and manufacture this product, having successfully done so in the past.

Our US-based factories are ready to begin production immediately and are capable of handling massive order quantities. We have already produced a sample run, working out all kinks that may occur during manufacture.

We anticipate being able to fulfill orders within 10-12 weeks, but predicting delivery times can be inexact. Should our volumes surpass our expectations, it may take slightly longer to fulfill orders but we have full confidence in being able to ship our products by September 2019.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you love what we are doing but aren't able to reserve an apron for yourself, we would love to get some love. Share our story on Instagram, Facebook, Snapchat, WhatsApp, Weibo, or with Karen in the break room. We would love anything you do to spread our mission!

story:
Attractive Accessories

We are a family company designing products to improve your bathroom accessories.  Our story begins with our son's suctioned cupped toy shaving mirror crashing to the ground at 2:37 AM. After allowing our adrenaline filled bodies time to recover we realized there had to be a better way to attach a shaving mirror in the shower that was safe and secure.  

Fast forward a few weeks, I returned home from a trip with the kids and my husband has multiple sketches and our first prototype.   (Note to self....never leave your husband unattended)  From there our product developed and went through many changes and remodels.  You are now looking at, and investing in, the final product.   

Our product is patent pending and we are raising money to bring this product to market.  The money raised will give us the funds to create more accessories to make your life easier and more organized.  

 

 

This shower organizer is designed to be easily adjustable to any height.  There are no messy mounting tapes or fixed features to deal with.  It can hold up to two razors and three loofahs.

 

The accessory plate can be removed to hang below the mirror leaving everything neatly organized and at your fingertips. 

 

Please share our product with friends and family! 

Thank you for your help!  

 

*Fog-free mirror works best within a 25 degree temperature differential between bathroom and shower temperature.  This is why the mirror can be easily removed from the organizer.  If fogging does occur simply place the mirror under the shower water for 10-15 seconds.

story:
Equipped with auto-keystone technology, K5J automatically adjusts any distortion within +/- 40 degree within a second.  It makes ceiling projection and any evaluation angle projection super simple.

 

 

 

 

The patented 90 degree rotating mechanism makes K5J Transformer the only projector that can play in multiple directions without repositioning. 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

K5J is built-in with Google Play, where you can download thousands of apps for the projector, including YouTube, Facebook, Netflix, and many, many more.

*App availability may vary due to location.

 
 
 
 

 
 
 
 

 

 
 
 
 

 
 
 
 
 

 

 

 

 

 

Established in 2006, KIXIN is a professional DLP projector manufacturer. With R&D and operations in Hong Kong, and production in Shenzhen, KIXIN has developed many popular products which are widely sold in over 80 countries.

story:
Project summary

This project is the tribute to all of those who suffered at least once from depleted stock of coffe, sugar, flakes, rice etc. ;) Although it sounds tongue in cheek, in innCraft we do believe that whats precious - should be monitored. That is why we launched Balboa - connected jar, a first step in building high level home inventory management system as seen in modern manufacturing companies.

But not only that. Did you realise the problem below?

Balboa as a container with weight measurement system will tirelessly monitor the product consumption and calculate the aproximate days you have on hand. Balboa will also help you do the shopping, basing on your real consumption data you'll avoid excess inventory and food waste. Of course you will get notified before its too late to go shopping.

What we offer is two products:

1. Balboa - handmade glass container

It is a mixture of glass, wood and newest technology built-in. Detachable base provides weight measurement while the glass container is food and dishwasher safe.

All our jars are handmade and comes from traditional glassworks company located in heart of the Europe. You may be sure that you'll have a piece of art in your hands.

The bamboo base hides the sensors, PCB and all the electronics. All powered with use of a typical li-ion rechargeable battery. There were 14 PCBs revision and prototypes needed before we finalised the design. Now we're confident that our algorithms and components used will make it durable and power efficient. It is confirmed with the tests that Balboa will stay on-line for over a year on a single charge.

Battery charging should not bother you much but in case its needed Balboa will let you know upfront. It takes about 2h to recharge the battery. During that time Balboa is fully operational.

 
Bottom of the jar holds the informations and functions allowing you to connect your jar to Wifi network. This is done with use of a dedicated app.
 

2. Android and iOS app

Dedicated app provides features such as:

  • current stock given in grams or % of container,
  • consumption trend,
  • average daily consumption,
  • low stock or low battery notifications,
  • shopping calendar based on estimated stock-end dates.

Much more still to come with app updates.

Use an app to connect your jars to Wifi network so they can work autonomously while you're away. You will do it in 3 steps:

  1. Hold the touch button for 3 sec. to enter pairing/setup mode
  2. Scan QR code with use of app and connect to your jar
  3. Write your Wifi credentials into jar's Flash memory

A timeline

What We Need & What You Get

  • We need a minimum of $15,000 to move from prototyping to volume production phase. This ammount will make comercialy viable ordering a production lot from glassworks and wood producer. We will also cover iOS and Android application improvement cost.
  • With this ammount we'll be rady to ship first 500 pcs to our backers in January but we will strengthen our efforts to ship them still before New Year's Eve.

Risks & Challenges

We've finished prototyping, development and long endurance tests. We've also made over 20 pilot jars to be used by our focus groups. We have a ready product with robust design.

We do see a risk in components delivery delays so we qualified 2 glassworks and 2 wood manufacturing suppliers.

Our app is still in development phase yet not meeting the premium qality standard we strive for. We'll put to work our subcontractors over the next 2 months to make the app ready ahead of schedule.

We will be notifying and kept up to date anyone backing this project with any changes or challenges we may encounter.

story:
Connecting Home-Owners with Rated and Trusted Professionals Nearby.

The World is Your Office. Instant messaging allows you to connect with potential leads and clients on the go -  anytime, anywhere!

Showcase your pictures & prices to the City and Category of your choosing.

 

All homeowners understand the trouble of finding that perfect contractor for home projects, whether you’re simply adding a fresh coat of paint or remodeling the entire kitchen. Many owners google search the best options for hours on end only to come up with mixed reviews, a wide range of prices, timetables that don’t fit your goal and many more issues. So, you could say choosing the right contractor is essentially a shot in the dark, which is why most homeowners end up asking friends and family for recommended contractors since they personally know the quality and scope of their skills. Word of mouth marketing is by far the most trusted way of finding your perfect match, so why not get trusted results from experienced customers outside of your own circle?

 

 

RenoRated is here to put an end to this guessing game so that you always finish your home projects with the results you wanted. Similar to freelance websites like Upwork and other gig-oriented platforms like Thumbtack, RenoRated will rate the services of each contractor so that there aren’t any surprises down the line. Each and every service professional will be verified and background checked to make sure you receive a trusted & reliable home professional.

 

 

So start your next home project today and go from RenoRated to Renovated worry free. RenoRated.com, homeowners helping each other one trusted review at a time!

 

Using RenoRated to find and hire your perfect home contractor match is as easy as 1-2-3!

 

 

Create an account & explain your desired project goals.

Automatically get connected with the top contractors in your area or conduct your own search based on the provided criteria.

 

 

Receive quotes and proposed time frame from all professional candidates.

 

 

See each contractors ratings & reliability and decide. It's that simple!

 

The World is Your Office. Connect with leads and clients on the go - anytime, anywhere.

 

 

For a limited time only on INDIEGOGO, we are offering

$5, $7 and $10 OFF

the monthly Pro ($19) and Gold ($49) Membership plans!

** IMPORTANT: each discount can only be used for on account/package. Any attempt to abuse the discount will result in a full void of the reward **

 

 

So you can always feel confident in the contractors you HIRE!

 

 

 

RenoRated needs to reach its funding goal of $10,000 in order to take the next step towards the website’s completion, including the following:

~ Marketing strategy

~ Hiring experienced sales people

~ Updating the website’s UI

~ Maintaining company infrastructure

 

 

 

Eli Mantis, Founder and CEO of RenoRated, is a young entrepreneur from Montreal, Canada. 

After having completed his college studies at Marianopolis, Elias began pursuing his interest in web development & marketing and successfully became a self-taught entrepreneur.

Since then, he has project managed the development of many websites.  Deciding to finally go ahead and develop a website for himself. He decided to develop RenoRated.com, a website which was needed to offer a quick, fair and resourceful solution to homeowners in need of trustworthy professionals.

Elias is a highly motivated, knowledgeable and hard-working individual who continuously strives to achieve the utmost best in all of his endeavors and as such never fails to deliver an excellent product. His short and long-term goals are to continue developing innovative websites & creative products.

story:
Carell, the world's most comfortable child monitor, keeps you and your child safe for sleep with peace of mind.

 

Meet Carell, the world’s most comfortable child monitor, with the world's first non-adhesive temperature trend monitoring. Comfortable and convenient, it allows you to go to bed knowing that you’ll be alerted if your child’s fever spikes throughout the night. We’re creating a fuss-free way to monitor your child so that both you and your child gets the rest you need for a better tomorrow.

In early 2017, Boon Sain’s daughter had a serious fever, rising beyond a safe threshold of 40 degrees Celsius. It even refused to go down with medication! Panicked, all he could do was worry about his precious daughter. He and his wife didn't get a wink of sleep that night!

Scarred by the frightful experience, he set out to make sure no parent had to go through what had happened to him again. Over the years, we’ve surveyed parents around the world and discovered that many had gone through the same thing and that strengthened our resolve to tackle this problem.

 

Thus, Carell was born as a way to give parents some peace of mind while they sleep for the night.

With Carell, simply let your child wear the device and go to bed! Using a proprietary algorithm that monitors your child’s temperature trends, it will alert you with a loud alarm, allowing you to take action quickly in times of trouble. Convenient and safe for you and your child.

 

Monitor your child’s temperature trends throughout the night to alert you of any unusual spikes. It’s easier and more comfortable for both parent and child. Never disrupt your child’s sleep again.

 

Doctors sometimes prescribe a cocktail of medications that can be hard to track. Easily monitor what medications your child has taken with convenient reminders. Your doctor will thank you for this comprehensive medication log!

 

Developing children need their sleep. Monitor their sleep duration and ensure that they’re getting the proper rest they need. Carell can also detect unusual sudden movements throughout the night, giving you a precise time of event to consult your doctor with.

 

When we're not looking, children tend to slip away. Acting quickly is critical to ensure they don't run off into danger. The proximity alarm notifies you when your child leaves a 1-3m radius of you, allowing you to act quickly should the worst happen.

 

Young children go through a teething phase, making hard objects around them dangerous. Carell is encased in FDA-approved TPU, which is non-toxic and BPA-free. This means teething babies won’t be harmed if they chew on the strap.

Teething children can't hurt themselves with the soft, food-safe strap!

 

The soft, BPA-free strap encases the hard shell, preventing scratch injuries too!

 

Young children are more vulnerable to radiation. Carell comes equipped with an offline mode that disables the radio transmitter on the device. Simply set the calibration profile over a week of use before using the device in offline mode.

 

Parenting is difficult. That’s why we’ve made Carell as easy to use as possible! Simply use the app to setup the device over Bluetooth and strap it to your child. You’ll be able to have peace of mind knowing that the device is looking after your child.

 

Carell is designed to last, being suitable for a wide age range of children, from toddlers to school-goers. In this age of fast consumption, Carell stands out as being a device that you only need to buy once for multiple functions as your child grows up.

 

Carell comes with a free Android and iOS application for use with the device.

 

Download the app onto your smartphone.

 

Charge the device using any certified USB charger.

 

Press the button on the device and connect to it.

 

Strap the watch onto your child’s wrist, or baby’s upper arm.

 

Strapping it onto the wrist like a watch also works for older children, as long as it sits snugly to maintain contact.

 

Relax for a peaceful night’s sleep!

 

...unless something goes wrong, in which case you’ll be alerted to react quickly.

 

We have been prototyping and testing Carell for the past year with our talented team of engineers. Hardware is notoriously one of the most difficult projects to pull off with a steep learning curve, but we can confidently say that we’ve already passed that barrier. We’ve put in thousands of hours of hard work to make Carell a product worthy of your support.

A 3D breakdown of Carell's internals:

And now, we need your help to bring us through manufacturing. We’ve prepared the manufacturing process and are looking for your support to make Carell a reality!

The idea for Carell was birthed from Boon Sain's struggle with his daughters' fever, so he worked closely with his daughter to come up with a solution. Together with Ming Jie, they overcame the technical hurdles of product development to reach the manufacturing, testing and certification stage.

 

Partners

Rapid prototyping and manufacturing house - all under one roof. We partnered with Trilogy Technologies to create prototypes of our electronics and mechanical designs and are proceeding with manufacturing after the campaign.

UOZDesign, a design house that explores the possibility of working intimately with our clients by providing reliable design services. It is not about creating beautiful works but working with our clients to design meaningful works.

Professional video production house with experience in corporate and lifestyle cinematography. Scott has been extremely helpful in setting up the cinematography for the campaign and product photography, and is very experienced in his line of work.

 

 

Where we ship

We're currently able to ship worldwide. As Carell contains a battery, there are additional costs In the event that we are unable to ship to your country, we will issue you a refund. VAT and GST are not included in the shipping costs.

When we ship

We intend to ship Carell by March 2020*. We will update you on our progress and notify you of any changes to the expected delivery date of your order.

*Actual ship dates may vary, we will keep you notified of your product shipping date

Why order now?

Not only will you get Carell at an exclusive discount off retail price, you’ll join the VIP team of backers that help shape the journey of Carell with your feedback. For future generations of the product, you’ll be the first to know about them before we release them to the public!

 

Currently, Carell has reached the stage of small batch production and we are proceeding with testing and certification. Our manufacturing partner has over 10 years experience in electronics manufacturing and we have been using their facilities for rapid prototyping in-house. The next step is to prepare for testing at scale to fine-tune the product and user experience for our backers - you!

Creating a product is difficult. We can't guarantee that there won't be any problems, but we can guarantee that we will be transparent with our backers about any challenges that we encounter. If you have any questions about the product, don't hesitate to reach out to us!

story:
KAMPALA — Welsh mum Ziz York was fed-up with her young children complaining they were poor – so took them on a ‘life-changing’ trip to Uganda to show them the real meaning of poverty.

The aid worker believes the two-week trip to Uganda has made daughters Nia, nine, and eight-year-old Robyn realise how fortunate they are to have been born in the UK.

The 35-year-old mum, from Wrexham, hopes her children will think twice about moaning about not getting everything that they want, after seeing first-hand the difficulties faced by kids growing up in the developing world.

Ziz works as Overseas Project Coordinator for Welsh humanitarian charity Teams4U – a charity given a £36,000 UK Government grant to support its educational work on menstrual and sexual health in Uganda.

She explained: “Before we went to Uganda, my daughters had been complaining ‘Oh, we’re so poor’ because they’d seen friends get holidays to Disney World or getting X-Boxes for their birthdays and stuff like that.

“I turned round and said ‘You have a roof over your head, we have loose change in our pockets, we can buy pretty much what we want in a supermarket, you have freedom of movement, we are in the top five per cent richest in the world’.

“Nia said ‘No we’re not. We don’t have a mansion or servants’, but after taking them to Uganda and going ‘This is the reality for most of the world’, it made her think.

“It made things a lot easier for Christmas because for the first time ever they were not asking for ridiculous things. They have an understanding now that they are lucky to have much more than most kids do.”

Wrexham-based charity Teams4U received a £36,000 grant in September 2018 through the UK Government’s Small Charities Challenge Fund, a scheme run by the Department for International Development (DFID).

The funding is supporting Teams4U’s work helping improve menstrual and sexual health education in Uganda.

Ziz paid for her children to accompany her on a visit to the project last year.

And she said: “We do live in a suburban bubble, so Uganda was mind-blowing for them.

story:
> 繁體中文版




A beautifully crafted and ergonomically designed smart water fountain for cats that is easy to clean, encourages better water-drinking habits and helps you keep tabs on your kitten’s water-intake right on your smart phone.

Pura in the media

Let’s face it, curiosity doesn’t kill a cat, dehydration does.

In fact, urinary system diseases are one of the leading causes of death. According to statistics, 46.8 % of cats have suffered from urinary system issues such as urinary calculus, cystitis, renal failure or urethral obstruction at least once in their lives. 


Help your cat to maintain a good health

Automatically monitors how much water your cat drinks

PURA can accurately detect and calculate the water-intake of each cat. We spent an enormous amount of time perfecting the stability of our hardware with unique algorithm. Now, even flowing water can be accurately measured.

Bright, Minimalistic and Ergonomic Design

Our design greatly decreases the neck stress for our furry friend and creates a joyful water-drinking experience without wetting their whiskers.

Easy to Refill: Hassle-Free & Patent-Pending Water-Changing System

Fifty thousand germs would be generated each day if the water feeder is not cleaned daily and would result in cats’ unwillingness to drink water and therefore affect their health. NoaCare’s hassle-free water-changing system makes it easy for water changing and refills. It is safe, easy and intuitive.

Multiple Puras for Multiple Water Sources

Cats are wired to be adventurous and it is in their nature to find multiple water sources. By placing multiple Pura at various locations of the household, it increases the chance for your beloved kittens to drink more water. In addition, Pura's auto sync feature allows all Puras to be connected and automatically sync the data to your phone. The more Pura fountains you have in the house, the better chance your kitten would drink more water and the better you understand his or her health.


Pura App:  Keep Tabs On Your Cat's Water-Intake 

Pura allows cat owners to monitor the water-intake of their beloved kittens and determine if he or she is having enough water even when you are not around. Based on the profile info you enter for your cat on the Pura APP and the analytics of his/her water-drinking activities, the Pura app will offer you relevant health suggestions and alerts for your kitten accordingly. With Pura, you can prevent underlying health issues and seek veterinary care for your cats even before it is needed. Now you can spend more quality time with your beloved kitten which brings so much joy to your life.



Features of PURA App

  • Cat Profile
  • Required Water Consumption Calculation
  • Water Consumption History  
  • Affection Level
  • Abnormal Behavior Notification
  • Daily Water Changing Reminder
  • Filter Change Reminder
  • Cat Care Tips
  • Affection Level Ranking
  • Pura LED Light Options

Ancient cats lived in the deserts and they acquired the necessary fluid from their preys. These preys contained about 70% of water which is the major water source for cats. Because of that, people often make the false assumption that cats don't need water or they are afraid of it. However, the truth is, they do need water but they just don't know it. 

Jumping to present days, cats now eat a lot of dry food which has low water content (only 10%) and they need extra water to maintain a healthy body. As a result, for cats who do not like to drink water and only eat dry food, they'll be more likely to suffer from inadequate water consumption and develop urinary issues, renal failure and even kidney deterioration. All these can lead to critical health condition of our beloved cat and it is not something we want to see.



Pura is an advanced smart water feeder with artificial intelligence, sensing and robotics.

In Traditional Intelligent system always usually consist in automobile robotics  system, today we realize intelligent technology on our smart fountain: Pura. We hope use this change can save more cats' life and prevent further tragedy.

In order to provide the best solution for our loving cat owners, we optimized our AI algorithm and Bluetooth 4.0 BLE communication protocol and were able to reduce Pura's cost by 75% and allow it to be possible for mass production. We also embed a flash memory to log cats’ water-intake. Pura also has a built-in Real-Time Clock/Calendar (RTCC) with backup battery so that data can continuously be logged onto the flash memory for at least half an year even without power.



NOA Collar ID &  NOA 360 Cat Sensing Technology

With the NOA Collar ID and the Noa 360-Degree Cat Sensing Technology, even if you have multiple cats and multiple Pura fountains, Pura App can still keep track and monitor the water-intake status of each cat. The Noa ID is a sleek and cute pet collar that is waterproof and dust-proof. Think of it as an ID card for your cat. Once it is synced with Pura, Pura will recognize the ID and transfer necessary information about the kitten’s fluid-intake and feeding habit to the Pura APP. Everything is neatly logged. No more fumbling through messy hand-writing or missed entries on your pet logs. 


Cat Behavior Recognition A.I.

The built-in high accuracy scale within Pura can accurately gauge the water volume change in seconds. However, when with multiple cats, doing a precise record and tracking accurate water measures is not that simple. There are many factors to take into consideration. Such as, when cats are playing water bowl, when cats drink water at same bowl at same time, water evaporation rate, and other unpredictable events. These factors can easily cause the error rate to increase. In order to solve these issues, we invented an Artificial Intelligence(A.I.) to interpret cat’s drink behavior. With this advanced technology, Pura can precisely recognize what is cat’s real water consumption.


Dynamic Filter Algorithm

The electric water fountain allows continuous water flow but the water movement and vibration can interrupt the water gauge accuracy. Hence, we developed Dynamic Filter Algorithm to overcome the problem of accurately gauge water volume even with a running motor and moving water. 

Specification


We started Pura with a heavy heart.

15 years ago, Neo, our beloved Design Director lost a family member due to acute renal failure, Moka, the cat he has had for 14 years. It was a difficult time for him and the family and we are sure he wasn’t the only one who has ever experienced that pain. 

According to statistics, one out of four (25%) cats suffers from kidney failure due to the lack of water intake.

With insufficient knowledge about pet care, it is easy to miss out on the opportunity to prevent, discover illness and seek veterinary care before it is too late. Without a monitoring device and appropriate logging, it is hard to know what really has been going on with your pets and the trip to vet clinic will only make you even more frustrated.


15 years have passed, we still felt like nothing has been done to remedy the situation and that is when we started the mission to make a change. As cat owners ourselves, we took it to heart to create something that is what we would want for our cats and Pura is exactly that.

As of now, we are an efficient small team working our way to ensure we’ve done everything in our power to make things right when it comes to developing Pura for our cats. This is a life-long mission and we are hoping that you’ll be joining us on this exciting ride, giving us feedback, suggestions and support to make it even better. Let’s give ourselves and our beloved kittens the quality of life they deserve.


For the past few months, we've been heads down designing, prototyping, coding, testing, breaking and building.






Custom Noa Collar ID

The announcement for offering customized Noa Collar ID (for different colors and engraving names and phone numbers) will be available after the campaign and when the Stretch Goal is reached.


UNiQE: Creative Design Thinking 
Copywriting, Indiegogo campaign consultation, film consultation, script and narration, global marketing materials editing, global PR

Backer Founder
Copywriting consultation,Campaign consultation, Film production, pre-marketing campaign, Marketing material and press release


Health

How many times do I have to change the water?
Pura keeps your water safe and fresh. We still suggest you to change the water every day to have the best water quality.

How much water does a cat drink per day?
A normal cat's daily water consumption ranges from 5 to 10 fluid ounces per day (or an average of 60 ml/kg/day). Cats eating canned food will receive much of their daily water needs from its food, since canned food is about 70 to 80 percent water. *The amount is for reference only.


Features

Do we get to choose colors for the Collar ID?
There are currently black and white only; however, we are looking forward to provide more colors in the future. 

Does it work with dogs?
Pura APP is designed for cats only. Nevertheless, Pura water fountain can be used for dogs, too, and provide them most refreshing taste of water!

What kind of cleaning tools do I need to clean the bowl?
Normal dishwashing tools are fine. Professional cleaning tools will be available soon.

Is the water circulation motor easy to maintain and clean?
We are still working on modularizing and simplifying the motor. Will keep you updated.

That's the contact surface for the water feeder? 
When my cat drank from plastic bowls she got papule on her jaw.The contact material SAN-certified non-toxic plastic. Just like Brita water materials, they won't cause any papule reactions. 

Do my cats have to wear Noa Collar ID?
Yes, currently this is the only way to detect and identify your cats. We are working hard on coming up with new ideas to make it easier for you and your cats!


Software

Software compatibility?
We support both iOS and Android system but we are starting with iOS first and release Android App later due to bluetooth compatibility issues. We will keep it up with regular iOS upgrades to give you the best experience and continue to work on the Android system. 


Hardware

How much is the filter?
We are trying our best to get the best price and quality for you right now. If there's any update, we will notify you as soon as possible and will post it on our website. Our goal is to match the price close to market price of other filters.

Will there be any changes to the design after pre-order?
Most of the design are final but NOA is always committed to make our products better and make you and your cat happier. So expect small improvements but nothing will be major.

Can I buy the powerhead water circulator somewhere else? 
No, this is a custom made water circulator so the any other ones won't fit.

Is Noa Collar ID waterproof?
Yes, Noa Collar ID is waterproof and dustproof. 

How do you connect to Pura?
You can connect it with your smart phone via bluetooth 4.0+

How much water does the container hold?
The container can hold 1.5 litres (or 50.72 fl oz), easy to change with one single hand. 

What's the detection range for Pura?
Pura can detect your cat's presence within 8cm (3.1 inches). When your cat is near, Pura will know. 

Is it dangerous when the motor is free running?
If Pura is pushed or flipped over, the motor will sense the situation and it will safely shut itself down.

Multi-points connection capability?
Yes. More Pura water fountain will increase the water consumption by your cats. Please see www.noacare.com for more details.

Can I use it outdoor?
Pura is designed to be water resistance, but we recommended indoor use only.

Country of manufacture?
Taiwan

Specs
Net: 4.4 lbs (2kg) / Gross: 6.6 lbs (3kg)

Any consumable materials or filters?
There are two parts in the water filtration system. First layer of the filtration system blocks out cat hair and food crumbs. The second layer is the activated carbon filter; it takes away the impurities. We recommend both layers to be replaced once every two months. 

Is there any magnetic wave that will affect my cat's health?
Pura water feeder produces a minimal amount of magnetic wave that is safe both human and cats. Noa Collar ID doesn't produce any magnetic waves by itself.

Is the power connector safe?
Yes, very safe unless you try to hurt yourself. 

Voltage
100V-240V. For more information please see www.noacare.com/design/


Sales

When will I receive my Pura?
We are still fine tuning Pura to perfection. Our estimated delivery time is before April 2016. 

Warranty?
Warranty information will be announce when mass production starts. As we strive for the best quality, it will be our primary concern and we are working hard on this issue to make it available to you as soon as possible. 

Can I return the product?
We are still working on the reverse logistics for this lovely product and will give you updates as soon as possible.

I have many cats at home, is it possible that I can purchase one Pura fountain with 3 Noa ID?
Yes! You can back just the Noa Collar ID individually for extra IDs for your furry friends. Please see www.noacare.com for more information!


Cat Behaviors

All cats suitable using PURA system?
We suggest your cat to be at least age of 6 months

Is it often that the cat flips or spills over Pura?
Pura weights 3.5kg (7lbs), and along with the slid resistance design, it is hard for cats to flip or spill Pura.

Does the light affect cat's water drinking behavior?
No, we tested on more than 10 cats and they loved it

Is the water circulation motor loud?
NOA uses ultra quiet motor and the stream of water is silent. You won't hear anything. 

My cat doesn't wear collar ID, what should I do?
Collar ID will provide you insights on the water feeding patterns. Nevertheless, Pura works well with or without the collar ID.


If you can't find your answers here, please feel free to reach us at info@noacare.com

References

>Website
>Press Kit
