Pura allows cat owners to monitor the water-intake of their beloved kittens and determine if he or she is having enough water even when you are not around. Based on the profile info you enter for your cat on the Pura APP and the analytics of his/her water-drinking activities, the Pura app will offer you relevant health suggestions and alerts for your kitten accordingly. With Pura, you can prevent underlying health issues and seek veterinary care for your cats even before it is needed. Now you can spend more quality time with your beloved kitten which brings so much joy to your life.

Features of PURA App



Cat Profile


Required Water Consumption Calculation


Water Consumption History  


Affection Level


Abnormal Behavior Notification


Daily Water Changing Reminder


Filter Change Reminder


Cat Care Tips


Affection Level Ranking


Pura LED Light Options







Ancient cats lived in the deserts and they acquired the necessary fluid from their preys. These preys contained about 70% of water which is the major water source for cats. Because of that, people often make the false assumption that cats don't need water or they are afraid of it. However, the truth is, they do need water but they just don't know it. 
Jumping to present days, cats now eat a lot of dry food which has low water content (only 10%) and they need extra water to maintain a healthy body. As a result, for cats who do not like to drink water and only eat dry food, they'll be more likely to suffer from inadequate water consumption and develop urinary issues, renal failure and even kidney deterioration. All these can lead to critical health condition of our beloved cat and it is not something we want to see.

















Pura is an advanced smart water feeder with artificial intelligence, sensing and robotics.In Traditional Intelligent system always usually consist in automobile robotics  system, today we realize intelligent technology on our smart fountain: Pura. We hope use this change can save more cats' life and prevent further tragedy.In order to provide the best solution for our loving cat owners, we optimized our AI algorithm and Bluetooth 4.0 BLE communication protocol and were able to reduce Pura's cost by 75% and allow it to be possible for mass production. We also embed a flash memory to log cats’ water-intake. Pura also has a built-in Real-Time Clock/Calendar (RTCC) with backup battery so that data can continuously be logged onto the flash memory for at least half an year even without power.






NOA Collar ID &  NOA 360 Cat Sensing TechnologyWith the NOA Collar ID and the Noa 360-Degree Cat Sensing Technology, even if you have multiple cats and multiple Pura fountains, Pura App can still keep track and monitor the water-intake status of each cat. The Noa ID is a sleek and cute pet collar that is waterproof and dust-proof. Think of it as an ID card for your cat. Once it is synced with Pura, Pura will recognize the ID and transfer necessary information about the kitten’s fluid-intake and feeding habit to the Pura APP. Everything is neatly logged. No more fumbling through messy hand-writing or missed entries on your pet logs. 


Cat Behavior Recognition A.I.
The built-in high accuracy scale within Pura can accurately gauge the water volume change in seconds. However, when with multiple cats, doing a precise record and tracking accurate water measures is not that simple. There are many factors to take into consideration. Such as, when cats are playing water bowl, when cats drink water at same bowl at same time, water evaporation rate, and other unpredictable events. These factors can easily cause the error rate to increase. In order to solve these issues, we invented an Artificial Intelligence(A.I.) to interpret cat’s drink behavior. With this advanced technology, Pura can precisely recognize what is cat’s real water consumption.

Dynamic Filter Algorithm
The electric water fountain allows continuous water flow but the water movement and vibration can interrupt the water gauge accuracy. Hence, we developed Dynamic Filter Algorithm to overcome the problem of accurately gauge water volume even with a running motor and moving water. 






Specification









We started Pura with a heavy heart.15 years ago, Neo, our beloved Design Director lost a family member due to acute renal failure, Moka, the cat he has had for 14 years. It was a difficult time for him and the family and we are sure he wasn’t the only one who has ever experienced that pain. According to statistics, one out of four (25%) cats suffers from kidney failure due to the lack of water intake.With insufficient knowledge about pet care, it is easy to miss out on the opportunity to prevent, discover illness and seek veterinary care before it is too late. Without a monitoring device and appropriate logging, it is hard to know what really has been going on with your pets and the trip to vet clinic will only make you even more frustrated.15 years have passed, we still felt like nothing has been done to remedy the situation and that is when we started the mission to make a change. As cat owners ourselves, we took it to heart to create something that is what we would want for our cats and Pura is exactly that.As of now, we are an efficient small team working our way to ensure we’ve done everything in our power to make things right when it comes to developing Pura for our cats. This is a life-long mission and we are hoping that you’ll be joining us on this exciting ride, giving us feedback, suggestions and support to make it even better. Let’s give ourselves and our beloved kittens the quality of life they deserve.For the past few months, we've been heads down designing, prototyping, coding, testing, breaking and building.








Custom Noa Collar IDThe announcement for offering customized Noa Collar ID (for different colors and engraving names and phone numbers) will be available after the campaign and when the Stretch Goal is reached.






UNiQE: Creative Design Thinking Copywriting, Indiegogo campaign consultation, film consultation, script and narration, global marketing materials editing, global PR
Backer FounderCopywriting consultation,Campaign consultation, Film production, pre-marketing campaign, Marketing material and press release


Health


How many times do I have to change the water?Pura keeps your water safe and fresh. We still suggest you to change the water every day to have the best water quality.
How much water does a cat drink per day?A normal cat's daily water consumption ranges from 5 to 10 fluid ounces per day (or an average of 60 ml/kg/day). Cats eating canned food will receive much of their daily water needs from its food, since canned food is about 70 to 80 percent water. *The amount is for reference only.



Features


Do we get to choose colors for the Collar ID?There are currently black and white only; however, we are looking forward to provide more colors in the future. 
Does it work with dogs?Pura APP is designed for cats only. Nevertheless, Pura water fountain can be used for dogs, too, and provide them most refreshing taste of water!
What kind of cleaning tools do I need to clean the bowl?Normal dishwashing tools are fine. Professional cleaning tools will be available soon.


Is the water circulation motor easy to maintain and clean?We are still working on modularizing and simplifying the motor. Will keep you updated.


That's the contact surface for the water feeder? When my cat drank from plastic bowls she got papule on her jaw.The contact material SAN-certified non-toxic plastic. Just like Brita water materials, they won't cause any papule reactions. 
Do my cats have to wear Noa Collar ID?Yes, currently this is the only way to detect and identify your cats. We are working hard on coming up with new ideas to make it easier for you and your cats!



Software


Software compatibility?We support both iOS and Android system but we are starting with iOS first and release Android App later due to bluetooth compatibility issues. We will keep it up with regular iOS upgrades to give you the best experience and continue to work on the Android system. 



Hardware


How much is the filter?We are trying our best to get the best price and quality for you right now. If there's any update, we will notify you as soon as possible and will post it on our website. Our goal is to match the price close to market price of other filters.


Will there be any changes to the design after pre-order?Most of the design are final but NOA is always committed to make our products better and make you and your cat happier. So expect small improvements but nothing will be major.
Can I buy the powerhead water circulator somewhere else? No, this is a custom made water circulator so the any other ones won't fit.
Is Noa Collar ID waterproof?Yes, Noa Collar ID is waterproof and dustproof. 
How do you connect to Pura?You can connect it with your smart phone via bluetooth 4.0+
How much water does the container hold?The container can hold 1.5 litres (or 50.72 fl oz), easy to change with one single hand. 
What's the detection range for Pura?Pura can detect your cat's presence within 8cm (3.1 inches). When your cat is near, Pura will know. 
Is it dangerous when the motor is free running?If Pura is pushed or flipped over, the motor will sense the situation and it will safely shut itself down.
Multi-points connection capability?Yes. More Pura water fountain will increase the water consumption by your cats. Please see www.noacare.com for more details.
Can I use it outdoor?Pura is designed to be water resistance, but we recommended indoor use only.
Country of manufacture?Taiwan
SpecsNet: 4.4 lbs (2kg) / Gross: 6.6 lbs (3kg)
Any consumable materials or filters?There are two parts in the water filtration system. First layer of the filtration system blocks out cat hair and food crumbs. The second layer is the activated carbon filter; it takes away the impurities. We recommend both layers to be replaced once every two months. 
Is there any magnetic wave that will affect my cat's health?Pura water feeder produces a minimal amount of magnetic wave that is safe both human and cats. Noa Collar ID doesn't produce any magnetic waves by itself.
Is the power connector safe?Yes, very safe unless you try to hurt yourself. 
Voltage100V-240V. For more information please see www.noacare.com/design/



Sales


When will I receive my Pura?We are still fine tuning Pura to perfection. Our estimated delivery time is before April 2016. 


Warranty?Warranty information will be announce when mass production starts. As we strive for the best quality, it will be our primary concern and we are working hard on this issue to make it available to you as soon as possible. 
Can I return the product?We are still working on the reverse logistics for this lovely product and will give you updates as soon as possible.
I have many cats at home, is it possible that I can purchase one Pura fountain with 3 Noa ID?Yes! You can back just the Noa Collar ID individually for extra IDs for your furry friends. Please see www.noacare.com for more information!

Cat Behaviors
All cats suitable using PURA system?We suggest your cat to be at least age of 6 months
Is it often that the cat flips or spills over Pura?Pura weights 3.5kg (7lbs), and along with the slid resistance design, it is hard for cats to flip or spill Pura.
Does the light affect cat's water drinking behavior?No, we tested on more than 10 cats and they loved it
Is the water circulation motor loud?NOA uses ultra quiet motor and the stream of water is silent. You won't hear anything. 
My cat doesn't wear collar ID, what should I do?Collar ID will provide you insights on the water feeding patterns. Nevertheless, Pura works well with or without the collar ID.
If you can't find your answers here, please feel free to reach us at info@noacare.com





References

>Website>Press Kit

story:
Growsafe helps you keep a house full of beautiful plants, in style without ever having to worry about mosquitos breeding.  We designed Growsafe specially for people who live in tropics, and are concerned about mosquito-borne diseases. But it if you travel a lot, or are just a bit lazy this also works perfectly for you.

Travelling and keep your plants watered can be a real pain.  Growsafe keeps your plants watered for weeks, so you don’t have to worry when you travel.  It works by entirely naturally principles so you don’t have to have to worry about batteries or electricity.

DITCH THE TRAY ! Growsafe removes the need for a drip tray, which is a breeding ground for mosquitos.  

According to government studies 48% of mosquito breeding sites are found in our very own homes, and the key place they are found is in standing water in plant pots. Mosquitos in the tropics carry dangerous diseases like Zika and Dengue and we need to do everything we can to stop this. 

Works both inside and out.  Growsafe is designed to withstand the external elements, and works just as well inside.

Growsafe works through entirely natural, principles meaning it doesn’t need any batteries or electricity.  It uses a patent pending self-watering system to keep your plant perfectly watered.  The water reservoir which feeds the plant is completely sealed off to insects, meaning no mosquitos can get inside and breed.

We have been through dozens of iterations and prototypes of Growsafe, testing different watering mechanisms, shapes, sizes , and of course testing a huge variety of plants.  After nearly 2 years of design, development and testing we have arrived the perfect combination of size, functionality and cost.

 

Using Growsafe is super simple.  Plant your plant, add water, and your done!

Timeline

Why we need your help

For the past 2 years we have been developing the Growsafe, through multiple prototypes and designs.  The product is now ready to bring to the market, however we need to support in producing the moulds the make the parts for Growsafe.

In return you will be one of the first to receive a discounted Growsafe, and bring us one step closer to a Dengue and Zika free world.

 

The Team

 

 

Brighten up your home in style, and grow your own food

 

Thank you

We would like to say thanks to all of our supporters, and all the people who have provided us with feedback and ideas for the product. It's been an exciting journey!

Even if you can’t contribute, but still want to participate please help us share this project with your green thumbed friends.

 

About the inventor

Adam has been designing and developing consumer products for the past 14 years.  He has worked in several major home appliance companies producing complex products for the home.  He has worked across the complete product development life cycle and has a lot of experience in designing products and bringing them into production.  He has been living in South East Asia for the past 10 years and has seen the problems with Dengue, and more recently Zika.  Being a keen gardener he has always been keen to make sure his plants don’t pose an unnecessary risk, and combined with his love of travelling decided to bring a solution to keep his plants well watered, but in a safe way.

story:
Meet The Peep Smart Doorbell

Smart and affordable home security for all.

Peep is the smart doorbell that replaces your existing doorbell. It is a Wi-Fi enabled device that allows you to interact with visitors at your door with two-way audio and a camera, remotely view your home's entrance and receive alerts for any motion detected at your door. All from an app on your smartphone. Also, don't worry your Peep will still ring your existing doorbell's chime!

Press

Peace of mind wherever you are

Don't ever worry again who's at the door. Whether you are across the world or in your bedroom you can always answer with Peep.

 

Stay notified

 

 

Stay notified of any motion at your front door whether it’s your newspaper arriving in the morning or an intruder attempting to case your home.

Why Choose Peep?

 

We want to work together!

Security is a very personal feeling. People build relationships with the people that protect them. We want to build a relationship with you. Your home isn't just a valuable asset, it is a feeling. Let's collaborate.

Here at Peep we want to build a community driven product. We believe it is extremely important to listen to your user base and interact with them in anyway possible and actually put into application their feedback! If we work together we can build great products for homes everywhere.

Colors for every doorway

 

 

Requirements

  1. We recommend Peep if you have a pre-existing doorbell. However if you do not have a pre-existing doorbell we offer an installation kit for $15.
  2. Peep needs at least 2 Mbp/s upload speed to operate. A online tool like Speedtest.net works great to measure this.
  3. Please see our FAQ for details on installation.

Technical Specifications

The App and Services

One of our primary goals is to finish creating our powerful application platform. We strive to build a user friendly interface that is easy for any skill level to use that is also reliable and dependable like any security for your home should be. Our app is included free of charge with no monthly service fees. There shouldn't be a monthly fee or contract to protect your home. 

Accessibility is key. Peep's App will be available on all mobile operating systems. 

Why?

There aren't any home security companies that truly care about their user base. Home security should be a personal business but a lot of companies don't see it that way. We hope to change the way you think about home security and truly listen to you to help improve any aspect of our company. 

Most home security products are overpriced, unreliable and sometimes both. The average initial cost to add a security system to your house can range from $250 to $1000. Most charge a monthly fee on top of that. Plus; If you do the research you can see that customers aren't content with the cheaper products. They simply do not perform. 

Crime is an ongoing issue. You never know the intentions of unknown persons at your door until you open your door. Why expose yourself to danger? Have the peace of mind that you can safely answer your door with your smartphone and protect your most prized possession. Your home. From thieves while you may be anywhere in the world.

The best security can be ambiguity. If you don't know the person at your door, don't give them an opportunity to case your home. With Peep you can answer your door without ever exposing your family or your house to danger. You can be anywhere and they would not know if you are home or not. 

Facts

Our Team

Development Status

 

Peep is currently a functional prototype! Our next steps are:

  • Putting the finishing touches on our final product
  • Developing and optimizing our application platform
  • Developing an user friendly interface
  • Iterating our mounting bracket design for maximum security. 

Once we are finished with making Peep the most reliable home security device. We will shift our focus to:

  • Official product certifications
  • Package design
  • Mass Production

FAQ

 

Setup and Specifications

 

What is the maximum amount of Peep Smart Doorbells that I can use?

There is not a maximum. Our application will support as many as you need. Your network's capacity may be your only constraint as each Peep requires 2mbp/s upload. Our app supports multiple Peep devices on your account.

 

What is the installation process?

Anybody can install The Peep Smart Doorbell. The install is done in 5 easy steps.

  1. You remove your pre-existing doorbell.
  2. Ensure that you have a voltage source of 8-36VAC (Almost all doorbells run at this voltage).
  3. Install our mounting bracket.
  4. Attach the wires to the terminals on our mounting bracket.
  5. Mount The Peep Smart Doorbell onto the mounting bracket with the two provided screws.

 

How big is the Peep Smart Doorbell?

 

The Peep Smart Doorbell measures at 3.4 in x 1.3 in x 0.98 in.

 

Shipping and Purchasing

 

Why is there an additional fee for an installation kit if you do not have a pre-existing doorbell?

 

Since there is no pre-existing doorbell, we need to provide you with extra equipment in order to successfully complete the install.

 

What are your shipping costs?

We provide free shipping to anywhere in the United States. If you are a international customer there will be an additional charge of $20. If we are unable to ship to your country for any reason you will be fully refunded.

 

When do I get my Peep Smart Doorbell?

Our estimated shipping dates for Peep is April 2017. We are aiming to ship ahead of that timeframe but we would rather ship a great product late, than a faulty one early. We are working our absolute hardest to get this device to you as soon as possible.

 

Technical Questions

 

Can multiple users use The Peep Smart Doorbell?

Absolutely, all users will get alerts and full functionality. However, only one person can answer the door at a time. 

 

Does the Peep Smart Doorbell pickup random motion?

Peep’s motion detection is software based so it is very easy to control sensitivity and which zones you want to actually want to detect motion in.

 

What voltage does the Peep Smart Doorbell operate at?

Peep is powered by 8-36VAC.

 

Is my info safe with Peep?

Peep contains bank-grade encryption. All communications are encrypted between the cloud, you and your Peep Smart Doorbell.

 

What if Peep loses power?

Peep will remember all of its configuration and will return to normal operation once power has been restored.

 

What platforms will Peep be available on?

We plan to release our free mobile application on iOS, Android and Windows Phone.

 

More questions? Feedback? Please ask or let us know!

story:
An evolution of the toilet brush that is long overdue, the Balance Brush brings together much-needed functionality with striking design.

A perfectly balanced redesign allows the Balance Brush to sit up and drip-dry over the toilet bowl after cleaning, disposing of wastewater down the toilet, preventing a build up of swampy waste when stowed in its holder.

A dry brush truly is a healthy brush. Drying out the excess waster from the brush before stowing, reduces the ability for harmful bacteria to otherwise thrive - not to mention an unsightly swamp of unmentionables…

So say goodbye to the swamp, wipe that grimace off your face, and welcome a hygienic and visual masterpiece into your bathroom.

 

 

 

To take Balance Brush from prototype to your bathroom, we need your help! Production molds and setup come with a hefty price tag, which is why we need your pledge today.

In return for your pledge, we will reward you with your very own discounted Balance Brush hot from production.  Choose from a single or save a friend from the swamp too with the twin pack. We also have a 4 pack, so you can save the neighbors as well (or one for every bathroom in your castle).

So stop languishing in disgust at your toilet brush - support Balance Brush now and be first to say goodbye to the swamp!

 

 

We are already working closely with our manufacturer and fulfillment partners and have a clear path forward, securing costs and action plans taking us almost right into your bathroom!  

Below is a general timeline of events.  If crowdfunding shows promise early in the campaign, we can begin on some of the tooling early, expediting the entire process, allowing you to wipe that grimace off your face even sooner!

Our team has worked in plastic manufacturing before, and know what to expect.  This together with the simplicity of design, allows us to eliminate risk, and deliver efficiently and without compromise.

 

Here are answers to some of the more frequent questions you may have.  Check back, and we'll update as the campaign evolves.

 

1. Do you ship worldwide?

For now our perks are only open to the US.  Once we are well on track to our funding goal, we may open up other countries, otherwise the added shipping costs can skew our funding target.

 

2. Will you offer other colors?

To start we are focused on raising enough to get Balance Brush off the ground. If we go over and above our target, we may introduce a secondary color option, so keep an eye out!
story_txt:
An evolution of the toilet brush that is long overdue, the Balance Brush brings together much-needed functionality with striking design.
A perfectly balanced redesign allows the Balance Brush to sit up and drip-dry over the toilet bowl after cleaning, disposing of wastewater down the toilet, preventing a build up of swampy waste when stowed in its holder.

A dry brush truly is a healthy brush. Drying out the excess waster from the brush before stowing, reduces the ability for harmful bacteria to otherwise thrive - not to mention an unsightly swamp of unmentionables…
So say goodbye to the swamp, wipe that grimace off your face, and welcome a hygienic and visual masterpiece into your bathroom.


 


 

 

To take Balance Brush from prototype to your bathroom, we need your help! Production molds and setup come with a hefty price tag, which is why we need your pledge today.
In return for your pledge, we will reward you with your very own discounted Balance Brush hot from production.  Choose from a single or save a friend from the swamp too with the twin pack. We also have a 4 pack, so you can save the neighbors as well (or one for every bathroom in your castle).
So stop languishing in disgust at your toilet brush - support Balance Brush now and be first to say goodbye to the swamp!

 
 

We are already working closely with our manufacturer and fulfillment partners and have a clear path forward, securing costs and action plans taking us almost right into your bathroom!  
Below is a general timeline of events.  If crowdfunding shows promise early in the campaign, we can begin on some of the tooling early, expediting the entire process, allowing you to wipe that grimace off your face even sooner!

Our team has worked in plastic manufacturing before, and know what to expect.  This together with the simplicity of design, allows us to eliminate risk, and deliver efficiently and without compromise.
 



Here are answers to some of the more frequent questions you may have.  Check back, and we'll update as the campaign evolves.
 
1. Do you ship worldwide?
For now our perks are only open to the US.  Once we are well on track to our funding goal, we may open up other countries, otherwise the added shipping costs can skew our funding target.
 
2. Will you offer other colors?
To start we are focused on raising enough to get Balance Brush off the ground. If we go over and above our target, we may introduce a secondary color option, so keep an eye out!

story:
The Night Guardian

 

Sudden Infant Death Syndrome

Sudden Infant Death Syndrome (SIDS), also known as cot death, causes the death of more than 255 babies every year in the UK. The risk of SIDS is higher for babies under six months old. 

At the top of the list of NHS recommendations to prevent SIDS is the advice, “always place your baby on their back to sleep.”

The Lullaby Trust is a leading UK charity, working to raise awareness of sudden infant death syndrome. The trust provides parents with expert advice on safer sleep.

Their advice mirrors that of the NHS. They say: 
“You should always place your baby on their back to sleep and not on their front or side.
Sleeping your baby on their back (known as the supine position) every night is one of the most protective actions you can take to ensure your baby is sleeping as safely as possible.”

But there’s no way of knowing if your baby has rolled over into a vulnerable position during the night.  

Until now.

 

What is the Night Guardian?

The Night Guardian is a revolutionary product that helps your baby to sleep safe.

 
The Night Guardian uses smart e-textile technology to turn your baby’s sleepsuit into its own alarm system. This technology was developed by Pireta, a global leader in creating innovative and wearable smart technology.  Radical new technology developed by Pireta involves printing interconnected sensors directly onto fabric. Using this technology, Pireta can transform any cot sheet or item of baby sleepwear into a smart e-textile which can then be utilised as an alarm. It's important to note that this technology is already used in healthcare applications.

We will work directly with Pireta to develop our Night Guardian prototype.

 

Why I’m raising money to create a Night Guardian prototype


I remember how anxious I was as a new parent. The transition from Moses basket to cot was difficult and I struggled to sleep with my new baby in another room, out of sight. My hope is that the Night Guardian will prevent SIDS cases and give parents peace of mind that they’re doing all they can to protect their child. 


The Night Guardian is a patented invention that has undergone a basic feasibility study with NHS innovations accelerator (NIA). NIA exists to support high-impact innovations that will benefit the health of the population and found The Night Guardian to be a 'simple yet effective way to alert the caregiver the infant has moved into a high risk sleeping position'.


I am seeking funding to create a market-ready prototype of The Night Guardian. With a prototype I can: 

 

  • Calculate exact manufacturing costs and affordability for low income households.
  • Identify the right manufacturer to produce The Night Guardian transmitter technology and smart application
  • Refine the technical details of the production process
  • Conduct consumer research 
  • Gain the appropriate British product standard accreditation. 
  • (The Nightwear (Safety) Regulations 1985 (SI 1985 No. 2043); The General Product Safety Regulations 2005 (SI 2005 No. 1803); BS 7907:2007 Code of practice for the design and manufacture of children's clothing to promote mechanical safety.)

This invention could lower the risk of SIDS. I will keep the cost of the invention as low as possible to ensure it will be available to as many new parents as possible. 


Here is a simple breakdown of how I intend to spend the funding.
 

50% - Product development, including research of functionality and best materials. This will be lead by Pireta who have vast experience in this sector. 


25% - Research into transmitter technology. (range; battery life; charging time and security).  


15%- Application design. (Secure network, password encryption; system health alerts; battery life of the transmitter unit.)


10% Safety testing of the beta model prototype. 


 

The Night Guardian is an easy but effective way to help with the prevention of SIDS. We just need the means to get the concept to market.

Contact: info@nightguardian.co.uk

 

Thank you.

story:
WE got 10 lucky packages for the first 10 customers. If you like our product, don't hesitate now. Only takes you $79 to get a Dyson-quality hairdryer plus a hand dryer? Why Wait?

 

​

Do you spend too much time drying your hair with a super noisy hairdryer and always trouble storing the hairdryer after use?


Do you wanna reduce tissue usage to protect the planet? Do you like to save your time washing your towel every week and have better hand care?

We have found our solution-CIVISOLO All-in-one Hair & Hand Dryer for you. Check this out!

Convenient, dry your hair in 3 mins, high negative ions, the CIVISOLO hairdryer is the smart option for your hair dry without harming your hair.

The perfect combination of straight air duct and powerful brushless motor brings the strong wind up to 18-18.5m/s. The wind pressure is up to 100g and gets your hair and hands dry quicker. Most of the hairdryers can only produce 6-7m/s air flow.

A brushless motor up to 110,000RPM brings stronger airflow. Installed with capacitors reduce the noise and maintain a long motor life. CIVISOLO Unidryer brings a quiet and fast-drying experience.

The installed anion launcher release over 300W high negative ions. It will reduce the static and smooth the hair when blowing your hair. It is designed to prevent irritable and bifurcated hair. 

Healthy hair can reflect the sunlight. Installed with the heat control chip, the CIVISOLO Unidryer controls the temperature of airflow to prevent hair damage caused by overheat airflow. In one word, we are looking for a healthy and efficient hair drying experience.

According to new research from the University College London, you should be looking at washing your hands around 6-10 times a day – with the findings suggesting that washing on such a regular basis will help lower your chances of contracting coronavirus. We hope CIVISOLO can bring you a great hair dry experience. At the same time, we hope it can be your health guard. Meanwhile, together we can protect our planet starting by using less tissue today. This is why we need your support CIVISOLO-A hand dryer for your everyday use.

When you place the hairdryer back in the storage box, it will turn into a hand dryer.No extra power supply needed and the fashion design of our hand dryer will upgrade your bathroom immediately.

With the installed infrared sensor and smart chip, the hand dryer is 100% automatic. The automation better product quality, improved safety, and accuracy. More importantly, it helps maintain a longer life of the hand dryer.

Since the Covid-19 outbreak, people wash hands more often and it became the first important thing to do when home. The number of used tissue has been increasing and more trees have been cut. People also worry about the health problem caused by using a towel full of bacterias. Now we have found the best solution for you.

According to the study of Statista and our test data, you can save at least $178.3 a year per family. Also, you save at least 1/5 of the big tree being cut, it is the combination of money-saving and contribution to the environment.

In a study, Charles Gerba, a microbiologist at, University of Arizona, found 90 percent of bathroom towels to have been contaminated with coliform bacteria while 14 percent of them were found to carry E Coli. Many of us may unknowingly use such towels but in the process, the bacteria rubs on the body, which is harmful. To avoid that, you have to wash your towel twice a week with hot water and change it every 3 months. It will cost you more time and money to keep your towel clean than using a hand dryer.

A family with 4 members uses 26.8lbs of tissues every year (dry hand 5 times a day)and about 1/5 tree is cut down for tissue making. It might look like a small number. But do you know over 27,000 trees are cut down every day for tissue making? Every year over 9,855,000 trees are cut down for tissue making. Your first step of replacing tissue with a hand dryer will be part of the big step of protecting our planet.



The brushless motor brings strong wind and cooperates with the high-power heat to guide your hair drying. It is not tight. Through infrared induction, magnetic switch, and other components, it can quickly turn into a Pro hand dryer.

We design 3 temperature modes and 2 wind modes. The accurate heat system protects your hair from overheat. Meanwhile, three million negative ions would bring you a more enjoyable hair care experience. 

By connecting the hairdryer, there is no extra power needed for the hand dryer. It improves safety and saves your electricity when you are not using the hand dryer.

We have designed a smarter air duct for you. It reduces running costs by up to 50% compared to a traditional hand dryer and dries your hands in 15 seconds. The wide air duct design also prevents your hands from getting heat at one point. That will protect your hand skin and brings better hand care. 

Starts working when detecting your hands by infrared sensor and stops when your hands are left. It is efficient and saves you electricity fees.

The hermetic design of the hand dryer ensures no water can get into the machine even in the wet bathroom with moisture. The cable is also waterproof to ensure user safety.

The security design is designed for the situation that it is not in use properly. When the cover is not 100% closed and hermetic, the hand dryer would cut down the electricity to protect you. It will guarantee that no water can get into the system at any time.

The modern design of our CIVISOLO Unidryer matches with different home styles no matter it is modern, vintage, or ape Cod.

Light and small the CIVISOLO Unidryer is the perfect hairdryer you can travel with. It would only take a small corner of your suitcase and it is only 320g. Bringing it with you can make sure your hair looks perfect anywhere, anytime.

Light and small the CIVISOLO Unidryer is the perfect hairdryer you can travel with. It would only take a small corner of your suitcase and it is only 320g. Bringing it with you can make sure your hair looks perfect anywhere, anytime.

Wind level test 

Up to 18-18.6m/s. Most of the top brands(Price is over $300) reach 18.

WaterProof Test

We have done over waterproof tests in over 3 different bathroom types and over 1000 waterproof tests from 4 different angles to ensure the use safety of the hand dryer.

Yep，you are right. Installing our unidryer is not that hard. No SCREWS and GLUE needed. Just stick the backing on any tile or glass surface for a mess-free installation in seconds. We already got everything you need in the box. You can stick the backing on any tiles, glass, cabinets.CIVISOLO unidryer uses a Type A plug that is commonly used in the US, Canada, China. An adapter would be required for countries that use a different type of outlet. It doesn’t matter in what part of the world you live in, CIVISOLO will definitely work.

2 years ago it started with the question of our colleague: why the hand dryer in our office building is ugly and not comfy to use it. At the first beginning, we were thinking to create a cool handler and then we came up with the idea of creating a unit dryer that can also help our colleagues to dry their hair in the office building sometimes when raining. We can't stop after that. we then have lots of brainstorming after that. We built up a project team and started working on this project. What we hope is to create a uni dryer that can let our customers enjoy hair drying and protect the planet more by using fewer tissues.

CIVISOLO is a home tech gadget brand that aims to bring better, healthier, more eco-friendly life quality to our customers. With a team of many experts from Alibaba and Oracle, the team got many awards such as the German RedDot award and owns 50 patents of different home tech products. We are still improving and creating based on more new customer demands. In one word, CIVISOLO wants to be the friend of your comfy home.

We have started our first mass production on the 27th of May. Before that, we have done QA tests and safety tests. We aim to deliver the quality our customers are happy with. We hope you will be excited and enjoy using it when you get our CIVISOLO Unidryer.

CIVISOLO Unidryer has got the FCC Certification. We are strict with every product we produce no matter in quality or safety.

;

Short Summary

Laundry is a chore that few people enjoy doing, but it always needs to be done. Exchanging the clothing from washer to dryer is an unnecessary task – and having two large machines is cumbersome, inefficient, and a waste of both electricity and useful space. Being a creative problem solver, I have invented a machine to make doing laundry easier and more efficient.    .     

.         Washes and dries in one machine.

·         Easy to load and remove laundry.

·         Saves time, space, and energy.

·         Saves money on electricity bill 

 

I passionately feel a sense of pride about my concept and believes that it deserves immediate attention. Because of the widespread market that exists for such a concept, she wholeheartedly believes in the positive impact its development and production will have on individuals and the market(s) to which it will be promoted.

 

As currently designed in the technical drawings and 3-D models ONE SHOT has unique features not presently available in the marketplace. Although it is still in the developmental stages, an explanation of its functionality is as follows: Top and front-loading all-in=-one washing machine and dryer with automatic dryer sheet options.

I envision ONE SHOT appealing to everyone who does laundry including:
 

·         General public seeking an efficient home appliance.

·         Hospitality companies such as hotels and spas.

·         Hospitals and other health care facilities.

·         Colleges and apartment complexes.

·         Laundromats.
 

Today’s society is always seeking new and easier ways to use advanced technology to make necessary tasks easier to accomplish. This is precisely why this product is being developed.

story:
Water while you shower?

Imagine every time you showered, you could water your garden?

It's the most straightforward way to reuse household water, with the lowest risk.  If you look on the internet, you can quickly find many knowledgeable landscape gardeners who will help you set up a legal sub-surface irrigation system.

If you read no farther, read this: This campaign is to bring failsafe shower water diverter valves to the market, and I want you to buy a Diverta shower water drain for your garden to help this come about. 

BACKGROUND

The challenge with using shower water is simple: how do you get that water out of your house according to the building code?  If you say, "Who cares about the building code?", the code is there to protect you and your house.  If a shower water diverter drain passes the tests and requirements of codes and standards made for it, there is less risk to your house in ways that you mightn't have thought of before watching the video above explaining the Diverta drain.

OS&B is a local company that has made drains for North America for 40 years.  The company knows shower drains, and knows the codes and standards that the drains have to meet.  It seemed sensible to work with a capable manufacturer to build a legal, safe, diverter valve for your new shower install to feed your sub-surface irrigation system, whether or not you have installed one.  

But the Diverta is not your standard drain, so in order to convince OS&B to make this wonderful new shower water diverter drain for the world, I have to convince them that there is a potential demand out there.  All kinds of market research has been done on the need for an accessible under-shower diverter valve that is easy to use and to code ... but taking that first giant step is a biggie, and I am asking for your support, please.

WHO AM I?

I am Christopher Adam McLeod.  I design, patent, and build better drains for our bathrooms, but my background is in environmental science.  While studying in Japan, I came to see how much change we can effect through simple decentralized technology.  Sometimes a key piece of simple & affordable technology at home is all it takes.  For gardeners that technology is the Diverta Shower Drain.

A SHOWER DRAIN FOR ALL OF US
A shower drain for building inspectors?  Inspectors want to see a shower drain that is marked certified to meet the requirements of the only plumbing fixture fitting standard referred to by all three North American building codes.

A shower drain for gardeners?  Gardeners want to divert their shower water to their parched gardens.  In the USA there are good best practices established for safe sub-surface irrigation of gardens with shower water fed directly by gravity - we just need a codeworthy shower drain.

A shower drain for both.  Building inspectors want home safety & public health. Gardeners want green & cheap watering.  The Diverta delivers.

If you install a UPC-certified Diverta Shower Drain in your shower, and hook it up to your garden sub-surface irrigation system, you directly contribute to saving one third of your household water consumption during the growing season.  That's 365 days of the year in Arizona and California.  So pre-ordering a Diverta on Indiegogo is not only helping to produce green technology, it is a tool by which you can start saving money, protect the water environment,  and grow flowers!

FIG. 1 : The Prototype Diverta just back from a successful third party testing lab gig.

What We Need & What You Get

We seek $15,000 in support toward getting the Diverta Shower Drain going.

In return for your $99 ( + $20 shipping) you get your own, first edition Diverta Shower Drain (a $149 value): first in world, patents pending, certified to code and ready to be installed, or used as a model to sell to your customers.    In the box will be the drain base, a sealing gasket, a flange, a diverter/hair catcher, and a turning knob, as well as full instructions.  As a special surprise, a high quality gorgeous shower drain flange and strainer will be part of the package.

For a $25 donation to our campaign, we will ship you a stainless steel hair catcher designed to fit inside your bath drain so that you can plug the drain on top of it.

For a $5 donation to our campaign, we will keep you on a mailing list toward developing a conversation on shower water diverter fittings.  Your e-mail will not be divulged to other parties.

What will it cost us to produce this drain?  Why is $15,000 necessary as seed?

Certification and Manufacturing are our two biggest barriers:

Certification:

I designed this drain to pass the tests required of it in the drain standard referred to by all building codes: ASME A112.18.2-2012/CSA B125.2-12, as well as the UPC which has extra requirements.  The cost of testing and certification by IAPMO to the standard and the UPC building code in California of this drain is about a third of this cost. 

Manufacturing:

This drain has been designed to work in concert with three pieces from existing shower drains.  This still leaves the the cost of making molds for the key pieces, as well as paying for the first order of injection molded pieces.  Thanks to OS&B, arranging the actual manufacture and distribution is just a matter of product development, and I can get the best production prices.  But this valve is expensive: the base requires large molds, and the top two pieces, borrowed from a high-end shower drain not yet released on the market, are expensive thick-chromed brass.  The diverter insert also must be molded.

Have we succeeded before?

My most recent design & produce development success with OS&B was the Island Drain, a new drain debuting in late 2013 that secures to the floor and allows reversible installation of the those big standalone tubs without access from below. This certified drain is a hit success all across North America, in this just its first year of sales. From concept to hit product in mere months.

Will the Diverta happen?

A Diverta shower drain is unlike other shower drains: the customer has to need it instead of a regular drain.  Normally for a new product, OEM customers, or wholesalers, or even contractors will provide that crucial first order. 

Half of the journey in getting a green drain to market for gardeners is bridging the big gap between the manufacturer and the home owner/interior designer team.   The traditional plumbing products people are not going to be pioneers in this product without some pull from gardeners needing it. Toward this end, I will be presenting on the concepts of shower water diverters at North America's largest show, the 2015 Kitchen and Bath Show this January in Las Vegas. 

This will be the starting point for the Indiegogo campaign to gather public interest in seeing this drain built. 

    The Impact

    Climate change is affecting our everyday environment.  Some places in North America are wetter, some, like California & Arizona, are in desperate need of simple, safe, and economical tools to promote water conservation.  And yet gardeners have to garden to avoid moonscaping of their communities.  That's green too.

    The Diverta Shower Drain delivers both water conservation and water to garden.

      Risks & Challenges

      We've come a long way in developing a compact shower water diverting drain that will make a lot of people who want to reuse shower water happy.

      This drain is the fruit of years of experimentation and development, accompanied by careful alterations to the relevant drain standard (and so too the building codes that refer to it), and finally independent third party testing on the prototype to see if the proposed product would pass certification.  All necessary manufacturing quotes have been gathered from regular suppliers and compared.  Accordingly, the greatest risk is the gap between financial investment and product sales.  The information gap between gardener and indoor plumbing is larger than regular for a novel drain, where plumbers promote products they know.  And yet gardeners must have this fitting to safely divert shower without putting their house at risk.  So here's our path:
      Plan:
      Design: (2009 to 2014), Complete
      Prototyping: (June 2014), Complete
      In-House Prototype Testing: (July 2014), Complete
      3rd Party Pre-Certification Testing : (Dec 2014), Complete
      Raising Awareness in Greywater Community: (Nov 2014), A challenge!
      Pre-Certification Testing Results: (Dec 2014), Received with pleasure
      Design Modifications: (Dec 2014), Finished
      Indiegogo Campaign Launch: (Jan 19, 2015), Planned
      &
      Debut at 2015 KBIS Kitchen & Bath Show: (Jan 22, 2015), Planned
      Molds Manufacture: (March 2015), Planned
      Production: (April 2015), Planned
      ETA: (May-June 2015), Planned
      Packaging and Shipping: (June 2015), Planned

      Other Ways You Can Help

      Please spread the Diverta word!  This is the perfect Christmas present for the gardener.  If you know any gardeners who could benefit from a Diverta, please spread the word by sharing this campaign.

But the Diverta is not your standard drain, so in order to convince OS&B to make this wonderful new shower water diverter drain for  the world, I have to convince them that there is a potential demand out there.  All kinds of market research has been done on the need for an accessible under-shower diverter valve that is easy to use and to code ... but taking that first giant step is a biggie, and I am asking for your support, please.
WHO AM I?
I am Christopher Adam McLeod.  I design, patent, and build better drains for our bathrooms, but my background is in environmental science.  While studying in Japan, I came to see how much change we can effect through simple decentralized technology.  Sometimes a key piece of simple & affordable technology at home is all it takes.  For gardeners that technology is the Diverta Shower Drain.
A SHOWER DRAIN FOR ALL OF USA shower drain for building inspectors?  Inspectors want to see a shower drain that is marked certified to meet the requirements of the only plumbing fixture fitting standard referred to by all three North American building codes.A shower drain for gardeners?  Gardeners want to divert their shower water to their parched gardens.  In the USA there are good best practices established for safe sub-surface irrigation of gardens with shower water fed directly by gravity - we just need a codeworthy shower drain.
A shower drain for both.  Building inspectors want home safety & public health. Gardeners want green & cheap watering.  The Diverta delivers.
If you install a UPC-certified Diverta Shower Drain in your shower, and hook it up to your garden sub-surface irrigation system, you directly contribute to saving one third of your household water consumption during the growing season.  That's 365 days of the year in Arizona and California.  So pre-ordering a Diverta on Indiegogo is not only helping to produce green technology, it is a tool by which you can start saving money, protect the water environment,  and grow flowers!

FIG. 1 : The Prototype Diverta just back from a successful third party testing lab gig.
  What We Need & What You Get We seek $15,000 in support toward getting the Diverta Shower Drain going.
In return for your $99 ( + $20 shipping) you get your own, first edition Diverta Shower Drain (a $149 value): first in world, patents pending, certified to code and ready to be installed, or used as a model to sell to your customers.    In the box will be the drain base, a sealing gasket, a flange, a diverter/hair catcher, and a turning knob, as well as full instructions.  As a special surprise, a high quality gorgeous shower drain flange and strainer will be part of the package.
For a $25 donation to our campaign, we will ship you a stainless steel hair catcher designed to fit inside your bath drain so that you can plug the drain on top of it.
For a $5 donation to our campaign, we will keep you on a mailing list toward developing a conversation on shower water diverter fittings.  Your e-mail will not be divulged to other parties.
What will it cost us to produce this drain?  Why is $15,000 necessary as seed? 
Certification and Manufacturing are our two biggest barriers:
Certification:
I designed this drain to pass the tests required of it in the drain standard referred to by all building codes: ASME A112.18.2-2012/CSA B125.2-12, as well as the UPC which has extra requirements.  The cost of testing and certification by IAPMO to the standard and the UPC building code in California of this drain is about a third of this cost.  
Manufacturing:
This drain has been designed to work in concert with three pieces from existing shower drains.  This still leaves the the cost of making molds for the key pieces, as well as paying for the first order of injection molded pieces.  Thanks to OS&B, arranging the actual manufacture and distribution is just a matter of product development, and I can get the best production prices.  But this valve is expensive: the base requires large molds, and the top two pieces, borrowed from a high-end shower drain not yet released on the market, are expensive thick-chromed brass.  The diverter insert also must be molded.
Have we succeeded before?
My most recent design & produce development success with OS&B was the Island Drain, a new drain debuting in late 2013 that secures to the floor and allows reversible installation of the those big standalone tubs without access from below. This certified drain is a hit success all across North America, in this just its first year of sales. From concept to hit product in mere months.
Will the Diverta happen?
A Diverta shower drain is unlike other shower drains: the customer has to need it instead of a regular drain.  Normally for a new product, OEM customers, or wholesalers, or even contractors will provide that crucial first order.  
Half of the journey in getting a green drain to market for gardeners is bridging the big gap between the manufacturer and the home owner/interior designer team.   The traditional plumbing products people are not going to be pioneers in this product without some pull from gardeners needing it. Toward this end, I will be presenting on the concepts of shower water diverters at North America's largest show, the 2015 Kitchen and Bath Show this January in Las Vegas.  
This will be the starting point for the Indiegogo campaign to gather public interest in seeing this drain built.  

  The Impact Climate change is affecting our everyday environment.  Some places in North America are wetter, some, like California & Arizona, are in desperate need of simple, safe, and economical tools to promote water conservation.  And yet gardeners have to garden to avoid moonscaping of their communities.  That's green too.
The Diverta Shower Drain delivers both water conservation and water to garden.

  Risks & Challenges  We've come a long way in developing a compact shower water diverting drain that will make a lot of people who want to reuse shower water happy.

This drain is the fruit of years of experimentation and development, accompanied by careful alterations to the relevant drain standard (and so too the building codes that refer to it), and finally independent third party testing on the prototype to see if the proposed product would pass certification.  All necessary manufacturing quotes have been gathered from regular suppliers and compared.  Accordingly, the greatest risk is the gap between financial investment and product sales.  The information gap between gardener and indoor plumbing is larger than regular for a novel drain, where plumbers promote products they know.  And yet gardeners must have this fitting to safely divert shower without putting their house at risk.  So here's our path:


Plan:
Design: (2009 to 2014), Complete


Prototyping: (June 2014), Complete



In-House Prototype Testing: (July 2014), Complete



3rd Party Pre-Certification Testing : (Dec 2014), Complete



Raising Awareness in Greywater Community: (Nov 2014), A challenge!



Pre-Certification Testing Results: (Dec 2014), Received with pleasure



Design Modifications: (Dec 2014), Finished


Indiegogo Campaign Launch: (Jan 19, 2015), Planned&Debut at 2015 KBIS Kitchen & Bath Show: (Jan 22, 2015), Planned



Molds Manufacture: (March 2015), Planned



Production: (April 2015), Planned



ETA: (May-June 2015), Planned



Packaging and Shipping: (June 2015), Planned



  Other Ways You Can Help

Please spread the Diverta word!  This is the perfect Christmas present for the gardener.  If you know any gardeners who could benefit from a Diverta, please spread the word by sharing this campaign.

story:
A path to new furniture innovation

How to make living room gaming even more exciting?

Hello!

My name is Mika Myllylä. We have a two-person Finnish family company Living Spaces Ltd together with my wife Sanna. Our furniture project started when two people with special skills met each other. Collaboration as a couple in a product development quest proved to be a blessing. I'd like to introduce our new innovation in the field of upholstered furniture.

Owning a couch has many challenges. I and my wife Sanna were both moving quite a lot. Carrying heavy upholstered furniture was such a drag that I often abandoned sofa into a recycling centre before relocation. Sanna gave away her modular sectional because it was full of animal allergens. Her previous bed sofa was destroyed by a cat's claws. Our latest sofa was ruined by wet hair which caused dark rings to emerge into the upholstery. After our daughter hurt her head to sofa arm while bouncing on the couch we decided we had enough of traditional sofas.

We wanted to give our daughter the most educative, active and safe environment possible. We also wanted complete, unlimited freedom to decide how we would like to use the living room.

After five years of intensive research and development, the BiT is complete

Definition of couch according to Merriam-Webster dictionary: An article of furniture for sitting or reclining.

Our idea was to create furniture that could be reformed to meet everyone's daily needs regardless of age. We put safety and cleanability to our first priority.  Safetyness and low weight were achieved by making every piece frameless. That, in turn, helped to leave out lots of traditional sofa's components: BiT doesn't contain glue, wood, paints, lacquer or solvents. Our sub-contractors use high-quality materials with production methods specially developed for BiT elements. Manufacturers are working continuously and closely to further develop production methods and logistics. 

BiT adapts to a variety of everyday situations such as surprise guests, changing social situations, children's physical play and demanding project and gaming environments. We wanted a soft companion to follow us everywhere for years instead of months. The sofa shouldn't be a disposable product.  

In our home, we use the living room actively. Sanna piles elements away when she's doing yoga or dance. She constructs a table from the BiT elements for fabric cutting when she has an inspiration to sew. Our four-year-old daughter Taika is primarily constructing huts, castles and ball pits with her friends. I build different project-specific home offices and simulation game cabins for tournaments with neighbors. 

Having this type of construction freedom has provided us with lots of joy and a socially active lifestyle. Through this Indiegogo project, we'd like to share this reshapeable furniture set with You. We sincerely hope You can experience the same comfort, happiness and laughter we've had during these testing years with BiT elements.

The BiT has permanently changed the way we use our living space and brought a whole new functional way to spend time with family and friends. Wardrobe full of mattresses for guests, inflatable (and leaking) extra beds and next to impossible couch cleaning projects are all things in the past.

Together we can expand the definition of the couch.

For gamers everywhere: We Salute You. Sit back and enjoy!

Risks: During these five years we have overcome a lot of challenges. Our manufacturers have tested every phase and they are ready to start the production. We are doing our best to deliver everything on time together with Amazon.

We hope you ask a lot of questions. Some of them will be answered through a video. You might get lucky and hear Sanna's accent a bit more!

Product categories

Products are divided into the following groups:

Small construction pack
Toddler Basic
Toddler Extended

Big construction packs
Kid Basic
Kid Extended
Kid Mega Pack

Furniture expansion sets
Basic Cushions & Sofa Back
Sofa Arms

Ottomans and tables
Ottoman Basic
Ottoman Special
Table Basic
Table Special

Armchair basic sets
Armchair Basic 
Armchair Special
Armchair Extended

Armchairs with pillow
Armchair + pillow Basic
Armchair + pillow Special
Armchair + pillow Extended

Armchairs with memory foam sofa back
Armchair +back Basic
Armchair +back Special
Armchair +back Extended

Couch basic sets
Couch Basic
Couch Special
Couch Extended

Couches with pillows
Couch +pillow Basic
Couch +pillow Special
Couch +pillow Extended

Couches with memory foam sofa back

Couch +back Special
Couch +back Extended

Furniture set

Gaming armchairs
Games FPS Armchair
Games F1 & IndyCar
Games Car Simulator Armchair
Games Fighter Jet Armchair

Gaming couches

Games Dual FPS Couch
Games F1 & IndyCar Couch

For ultimate co-op or co-op-not gaming
Games The Duel Ultimate

 

free worldwide shipping

 

Web pages
