story:
A world first in high performance ice Coolers!

                   

“ICE COLD CANS NOT ICE COLD HANDS”

Creating the world’s first ice Cooler with a system to maximise the ice preservation was the goal, along with everything you need to make anything involving a Cooler an incredible experience..

MR COOLIT is 105 quarts\100 litres of incredible design ,and strength with long range capability keeping your food, drinks and Solar charged power sustained for the longest time possible.  An all in one system so versatile and easy to use, this cooler is a game changer.

When you are with family and friends you can set up MrCoolit the way you like.  A can out the front, a bottle out the back - take your snacks out without affecting the rest of your food that is freshly packed.

We also have the kids covered! Water bottle in the rack, mineral water, soft drinks on one side of the MrCoolit can dispensers and it’s all so easy for them to use - not to mention keeping those little fingers from freezing. 

The drinks come out of the cooler with tiny icicles having direct contact with the product ensuring the drinks are just like you have pulled them out of a normal cooler full of ice.

“YOU JUST CAN'T BEAT ICE”

Just think how many times you open the lid; well it’s pretty simple every time you need to get a can or bottle. When you do need to open the lid the ice cold shelf gives a protective ice cold shield from the ice below.

 

The Story

The game changer.

Going on family holidays has been a tradition for 30 years. Two years ago my brother Clint and I were watching Josh, my son going through the cooler - well we were all laughing! His hands were frozen by the time he got his can. Clint turned to me and said "mate, we can fix this", and that’s the moment the MrCoolit concept was created. We have brought high end coolers as long as they have been around and use them on camping holidays, fishing trips - you name it! Every day, the lid is constantly opened by us and the kids and unless is kept closed the ice melts quickly and we're replacing it every day in the heat of summer. Since then we have designed the systems to maximise the ice preservation so you can use it and make the most out of an expensive high end cooler.

We have put a lot of thought into high end coolers and they're great!  It is no doubt the best ice preservation you can buy and we are still replacing the ice!  Frozen hands, soggy and wasted food - all because everyone is using it... and now we have improved it out of sight!  

MrCoolit lasts 3 to 4+ times longer than any other cooler when using it, and it will still do its original function if you choose to close it up.

                        

Let’s go through it.

 

Renderings

 

COOLIT Can Dispensing System​

 

What an ice saver

This is so easy to use; once you load it up forget it!  “Ice cold cans not ice cold hands” is the perfect way to sum up how this works. After many years of digging around in the cooler looking for that illusive can and the chore replacing ice, we thought  there is a way to solve this and the MrCoolit can dispenser was created. It’s so effective and the can’s are perfectly chilled and crisp all without freezing your hands. Hot air is drawn to cold air so when you open the cooler lid it wants to get in, and once  it’s in there’s no escape. Ice cold air sinks to the bottom of the cooler so when you open the dispenser door to get your bottle or can, the cold air is blocking the hot air radically reducing the opportunity for hot air to get in - when you open the lid, then close it, you trap the hot air in. The  size difference between the can dispensing door opening and lid opening alone makes it an incredibly effective system.

We designed the MrCoolit can dispensers with a trap door inside the cooler so you can get the can’s and if there's one who is misbehaving you can easily fix it!  We use the slowly melting ice to our advantage, plastic mesh casings allow the icicles and ice cold water to have contact with cans and also blocking larger ice pieces from falling through jamming the can’s from rolling into position.

 

COOLIT Bottle Storage

 

It's all about the ice

Not everyone drinks cans and having access to water, soft drinks, wine or any other bottled drink was a major consideration when designing MrCoolit, creating an easy to use and accessible bottle rack system with out opening the lid, freezing your hands and trapping in the hot air was just as important. The same principles apply as the can dispenser with the cold air being pushed out and blocking the hot air all while your bottle is being perfectly chilled and crisp.

Storing a massive 1.5 litre bottle is a huge advantage, having the capacity to keep hydrated on those scorching hot  summer days and being able to access  ice chilled water to quench your thirst and knowing your not burning through your ice supply .”We love saying that part!” .

                    

The Cooler

The Heart

This is all about performance and having the best possible support system you can buy in ice coolers.  The cooler is in the centre of any adventure with family and friends no matter where you go - camping, fishing, hunting or BBQ’s,  it’s the most used item you take and depend on.  Everyone’s using it and that’s the reason why we created MrCoolit.

This cooler has awesome quality and performance from having duel seal’s in the lid;  double insulation thickness lid to provide double insulation from the top where most radiant heat enters the box;  high density multi compound polyurethane insulation injected under high pressure; dual seal feature creates air lock between seals;  separate high quality food grade inner liner;  large bung with 'O' ring threaded to access tap water;  fully integrated anchor points;  marine grade stainless steel latch's for locking down lid and fully molded hinges with corrosion resistant pins.  You are investing in a commercial grade ice box!

 

 

Entertainment

The Soul

This is where we thought what do you need; one of the most important things is power and light.

Having a powerful solar charging lithium battery on board is the way to go - place it out in the sun for top up charging and take it literally anywhere you go!  It has 100000 mAh of grunt; it’s portable, accessible and has plenty of features.

The LED in this is amazing, the ambient light it cast’s enough to light up the campsite for everyone with out blinding you, no more holding the torch when your tying on your hook and it will last 10 hrs + off a full battery - the illuminated push button  on/off switch is a nice touch and looks really cool.

Having built in USB 2.0 ports and the power to back them up is a perfect way to all keep charged all of the time.

Waterproof blue tooth speaker - this is a mini speaker with great sound to keep everyone in the groove.

Keeping your phone in a safe place to charge and out of the sun with easy access in a ventilated position keeping it cool, along with the battery in a separate position, to hold the doors closed. We have used earth magnet’s - they are a perfect way of not using latches that can break or jam and these little magnets snap shut tight.

 

Cool Cart

Optional - RRP $60.00

Please Note:- Cool Cart is an additional cost of $51.00 to be added to both Perk purchases.

After many, many years of carrying and using coolers with wheels  like an old shopping trolley after a week of heavy work - dragging them all through rough terrain… and we can't say coolers are not heavy when there packed, they weigh a ton!  Designing the right tool for the job was something we felt was long overdue.  The cool cart is designed for the long run and to be used as a multi-versatile tool.  The diameter of the wheels give great clearance and ease going over almost any surface. With a detachable handle from the base frame to make life easy if your setting up to travel.  It’s a tough unit!

 

The Perks

 

 

Why We Need Your Help

Our investment into MrCoolit to date is $105K USD, which we hope you shows our commitment to the project. We have secured the Cooler manufacturer and they are one of the best!

Techni Ice for those who don't know them - they a Global leader in Cooler's. 

The question has been raised, how do we deal with the crowdfunding controversy with a project that is a similar product to ours, this is how.

MrCoolit has no investment to make in the cooler box. We have a supply arrangement with Techni  Ice Australia a division of  Global National Australia. Pty Ltd.

Our most costly investment is the tooling, and investing in parts and components will be purchased according to the orders generated. 

Assembly and infrastructure will be accommodated to the required level to ensure production flow and efficiency on all levels.   

 Its time for us to ask for your help to make this project a reality and to manufacture the first cooler of its kind. With your help, we can revolutionize the industry in ice coolers.

We have done our due-diligence on costing and understand the costs associated with a product with many parts and expensive investments in tooling molds, and all necessary components and infrastructure to get MrCoolit ready to go.

 Our family have a great deal of experience in the refrigeration and cooling industry completing  100s of specialized project’s over the last 50 years!  We have all been involved in this project  and we all know if you build a cheap product it shows sooner rather than later, this why our price reflects the quality of MrCoolit.

Your contributions will help us bring MrCoolit to the production phase and into so many campsites, BBQ‘s, fishing trips all the outdoor adventures you can think of all over the world with family and friends – now that’s cool.

 

The Schedule

 

The Team

Troy has been involved in refrigeration since he was a small boy growing up in the industry with Glenn his father who designed and manufactured fruit ripening system's in the 80's.  Keeping products cold and fresh is his passion, with extensive experience in design and manufacturing and he has also obtained an Associate Degree of Applied Science Refrigeration at Oklahoma State University.  

   Clint also grew up in the refrigeration industry as a little fella with his father Glenn working and learning, took another path in the glass industry, accumulating many national awards in innovation, design and manufacturing.  He has come back to the family roots of the cold and fresh industry designing systems with Troy to bring you MrCoolit.

Eddie has been running a successful business since the ripe old age of 20 in diverse industries and has been a family friend of the Troy and Clint for 20 years.  He is experienced in team management with great skill in accounting and an all rounder.  He brings a wealth of knowledge to the team.

The three of us have all been camping our whole lives and that is what brings this team together for we have all had similar experiences over the years. And we believe it's time to bring  MrCoolit to the people!

 

Managing The Project

We have dedicated a great deal of time and knowledge to put in place the necessary procedures to minimize the risks and unforeseen challenges of a project like MrCoolit.

Our price and schedule are based on years of experience, development, fine tuning and strategy.

This is not to say we will we will simply put this together, but if we can get a home ground advantage this sure will give us the edge.

In a lot of ways this has been a complex project and in other ways it has come together beautifully giving us the confidence in our design, product and the way we will deliver MrCoolit to the awesome indiegogo community and beyond.

 

Fine Tuning & Adjustments

In general there will be a few adjustments along the way and we have put the right team together to handle these moments swiftly.  We don’t see problems only challenges and fortunately we have ironed out most of the kinks before we begin.

We have allocated the time in testing MrCoolit and the results are outstanding.  From a number of BBQ tests, having quite a few cans and bottles put through the dispensers from family and friends at home, to the hot room for days on end of testing.  We're happy and positive you will be.

 

F.A.Q.

Q. How do I order my  MrCoolit?

A. You can order directly through our campaign.

Q. How does it work?

A. The cans are a gravity and weight system; they simply roll into position.

Q. What are the can dispenser frames made of?

A. 5mm wire frame with nylon dipped protective coating.

Q. How are the can dispensers fixed in position?

A. A stainless steel fixing holds the back in position and the front locks into the door housing frame.

Q. Why doesn’t it jam up with ice?

A. There is a plastic mesh casing allowing ice water and icicles’ to pass through.

Q. What happens if a can gets dislodged?

A. In the dispenser frame there is a trap door on top you open and re-adjust the can.

Q. Are the doors insulated?

A. Yes, we use a silicone insulation.

Q. Does it hold water?

A. Yes, 8 litres before you need to drain.

Q. Are the console, can dispenser doors and cap seal for the bottle rack made of metal?

A.No, ASA plastic compound ,UV stabilized.

Q. How do I get the perk?

A. Order you MrCoolit during the campaign.

Q. How long does the battery last?

A. The LED will last for 10+ hrs on a full charge.

Q. Does the battery solar charge?

A. Yes, depending on the UV light will depend on how quickly it will charge.

Q. Will I be able to use MrCoolit in the U.S.A/UK or EU

A. Yes, the battery will be supplied to voltage required for that country.

Q. How long does the speaker last before recharging?

A. Approximately 3hrs. Don’t forget you can always keep it charged off the lithium battery.

Q. What is the LED life span?

A. The average life span is 50,000hrs

Q. How often do you release the water?

A. For the best results once or twice a day to save ice retention.

Q. Are the hinge pins stainless steel?

A. Yes, 316 stainless steel.

Q. How is the door housing fixed to the cooler?

A. A silicone seal will be applied for an air tight seal.

Q. Do you have warranty?

A. Yes, we will warranty parts for a 12 month period.

Q. How is it packed for freight?

A. Cardboard will protect the console, dispenser doors and bottle rack cap then plastic wrapped.

Q. Does it come in any other colours?

A. At this stage we are only selling white.

Q. Why is the cool cart not included in the price?

A. We don’t believe every one will need the cool cart.  You could set it up and leave it in your RV or Caravan Park or any other permanent location.

Q. What are the costs for international shipping.

A. Estimated shipping cost $160.USD + any import duties or government taxes. 

Based on Container quantity sales shipments direct to Miami U.S. Estimated cost $60.00 USD + transfreight across the U.S dutys or taxes.

Cooler Dimensions: 520mm H x 470mm W x710mm L

Q. What are the shipping costs for destinations apart from the U.S. or Australia?

A. Shipping costs can vary, depending on which country you live in. Please

email us (link below) with your destination Country and we will work out the most cost effective method for shipping direct to you,

                  

 

CONTACT US

www.mrcoolitcooler.com.au

FEEL FREE TO DROP US A LINE OR ASK ANY QUESTIONS

info@mrcoolit.com.au
story_txt: A world first in high performance ice Coolers!                   “ICE COLD CANS NOT ICE COLD HANDS”Creating the world’s first ice Cooler with a system to maximise the ice preservation was the goal, along with everything you need to make anything involving a Cooler an incredible experience..MR COOLIT is 105 quarts\100 litres of incredible design ,and strength with long range capability keeping your food, drinks and Solar charged power sustained for the longest time possible.  An all in one system so versatile and easy to use, this cooler is a game changer.When you are with family and friends you can set up MrCoolit the way you like.  A can out the front, a bottle out the back - take your snacks out without affecting the rest of your food that is freshly packed.We also have the kids covered! Water bottle in the rack, mineral water, soft drinks on one side of the MrCoolit can dispensers and it’s all so easy for them to use - not to mention keeping those little fingers from freezing. The drinks come out of the cooler with tiny icicles having direct contact with the product ensuring the drinks are just like you have pulled them out of a normal cooler full of ice.“YOU JUST CAN'T BEAT ICE”Just think how many times you open the lid; well it’s pretty simple every time you need to get a can or bottle. When you do need to open the lid the ice cold shelf gives a protective ice cold shield from the ice below. The StoryThe game changer.Going on family holidays has been a tradition for 30 years. Two years ago my brother Clint and I were watching Josh, my son going through the cooler - well we were all laughing! His hands were frozen by the time he got his can. Clint turned to me and said "mate, we can fix this", and that’s the moment the MrCoolit concept was created. We have brought high end coolers as long as they have been around and use them on camping holidays, fishing trips - you name it! Every day, the lid is constantly opened by us and the kids and unless is kept closed the ice melts quickly and we're replacing it every day in the heat of summer. Since then we have designed the systems to maximise the ice preservation so you can use it and make the most out of an expensive high end cooler.We have put a lot of thought into high end coolers and they're great!  It is no doubt the best ice preservation you can buy and we are still replacing the ice!  Frozen hands, soggy and wasted food - all because everyone is using it... and now we have improved it out of sight!  MrCoolit lasts 3 to 4+ times longer than any other cooler when using it, and it will still do its original function if you choose to close it up.                        Let’s go through it. Renderings COOLIT Can Dispensing System​ What an ice saverThis is so easy to use; once you load it up forget it!  “Ice cold cans not ice cold hands” is the perfect way to sum up how this works. After many years of digging around in the cooler looking for that illusive can and the chore replacing ice, we thought  there is a way to solve this and the MrCoolit can dispenser was created. It’s so effective and the can’s are perfectly chilled and crisp all without freezing your hands. Hot air is drawn to cold air so when you open the cooler lid it wants to get in, and once  it’s in there’s no escape. Ice cold air sinks to the bottom of the cooler so when you open the dispenser door to get your bottle or can, the cold air is blocking the hot air radically reducing the opportunity for hot air to get in - when you open the lid, then close it, you trap the hot air in. The  size difference between the can dispensing door opening and lid opening alone makes it an incredibly effective system.We designed the MrCoolit can dispensers with a trap door inside the cooler so you can get the can’s and if there's one who is misbehaving you can easily fix it!  We use the slowly melting ice to our advantage, plastic mesh casings allow the icicles and ice cold water to have contact with cans and also blocking larger ice pieces from falling through jamming the can’s from rolling into position. COOLIT Bottle Storage It's all about the iceNot everyone drinks cans and having access to water, soft drinks, wine or any other bottled drink was a major consideration when designing MrCoolit, creating an easy to use and accessible bottle rack system with out opening the lid, freezing your hands and trapping in the hot air was just as important. The same principles apply as the can dispenser with the cold air being pushed out and blocking the hot air all while your bottle is being perfectly chilled and crisp.Storing a massive 1.5 litre bottle is a huge advantage, having the capacity to keep hydrated on those scorching hot  summer days and being able to access  ice chilled water to quench your thirst and knowing your not burning through your ice supply .”We love saying that part!” .                    The CoolerThe HeartThis is all about performance and having the best possible support system you can buy in ice coolers.  The cooler is in the centre of any adventure with family and friends no matter where you go - camping, fishing, hunting or BBQ’s,  it’s the most used item you take and depend on.  Everyone’s using it and that’s the reason why we created MrCoolit.This cooler has awesome quality and performance from having duel seal’s in the lid;  double insulation thickness lid to provide double insulation from the top where most radiant heat enters the box;  high density multi compound polyurethane insulation injected under high pressure; dual seal feature creates air lock between seals;  separate high quality food grade inner liner;  large bung with 'O' ring threaded to access tap water;  fully integrated anchor points;  marine grade stainless steel latch's for locking down lid and fully molded hinges with corrosion resistant pins.  You are investing in a commercial grade ice box!  EntertainmentThe SoulThis is where we thought what do you need; one of the most important things is power and light.Having a powerful solar charging lithium battery on board is the way to go - place it out in the sun for top up charging and take it literally anywhere you go!  It has 100000 mAh of grunt; it’s portable, accessible and has plenty of features.The LED in this is amazing, the ambient light it cast’s enough to light up the campsite for everyone with out blinding you, no more holding the torch when your tying on your hook and it will last 10 hrs + off a full battery - the illuminated push button  on/off switch is a nice touch and looks really cool.Having built in USB 2.0 ports and the power to back them up is a perfect way to all keep charged all of the time.Waterproof blue tooth speaker - this is a mini speaker with great sound to keep everyone in the groove.Keeping your phone in a safe place to charge and out of the sun with easy access in a ventilated position keeping it cool, along with the battery in a separate position, to hold the doors closed. We have used earth magnet’s - they are a perfect way of not using latches that can break or jam and these little magnets snap shut tight. Cool CartOptional - RRP $60.00Please Note:- Cool Cart is an additional cost of $51.00 to be added to both Perk purchases.After many, many years of carrying and using coolers with wheels  like an old shopping trolley after a week of heavy work - dragging them all through rough terrain… and we can't say coolers are not heavy when there packed, they weigh a ton!  Designing the right tool for the job was something we felt was long overdue.  The cool cart is designed for the long run and to be used as a multi-versatile tool.  The diameter of the wheels give great clearance and ease going over almost any surface. With a detachable handle from the base frame to make life easy if your setting up to travel.  It’s a tough unit! The Perks  Why We Need Your HelpOur investment into MrCoolit to date is $105K USD, which we hope you shows our commitment to the project. We have secured the Cooler manufacturer and they are one of the best!Techni Ice for those who don't know them - they a Global leader in Cooler's. The question has been raised, how do we deal with the crowdfunding controversy with a project that is a similar product to ours, this is how.MrCoolit has no investment to make in the cooler box. We have a supply arrangement with Techni  Ice Australia a division of  Global National Australia. Pty Ltd.Our most costly investment is the tooling, and investing in parts and components will be purchased according to the orders generated. Assembly and infrastructure will be accommodated to the required level to ensure production flow and efficiency on all levels.    Its time for us to ask for your help to make this project a reality and to manufacture the first cooler of its kind. With your help, we can revolutionize the industry in ice coolers.We have done our due-diligence on costing and understand the costs associated with a product with many parts and expensive investments in tooling molds, and all necessary components and infrastructure to get MrCoolit ready to go. Our family have a great deal of experience in the refrigeration and cooling industry completing  100s of specialized project’s over the last 50 years!  We have all been involved in this project  and we all know if you build a cheap product it shows sooner rather than later, this why our price reflects the quality of MrCoolit.Your contributions will help us bring MrCoolit to the production phase and into so many campsites, BBQ‘s, fishing trips all the outdoor adventures you can think of all over the world with family and friends – now that’s cool. The Schedule The TeamTroy has been involved in refrigeration since he was a small boy growing up in the industry with Glenn his father who designed and manufactured fruit ripening system's in the 80's.  Keeping products cold and fresh is his passion, with extensive experience in design and manufacturing and he has also obtained an Associate Degree of Applied Science Refrigeration at Oklahoma State University.     Clint also grew up in the refrigeration industry as a little fella with his father Glenn working and learning, took another path in the glass industry, accumulating many national awards in innovation, design and manufacturing.  He has come back to the family roots of the cold and fresh industry designing systems with Troy to bring you MrCoolit.Eddie has been running a successful business since the ripe old age of 20 in diverse industries and has been a family friend of the Troy and Clint for 20 years.  He is experienced in team management with great skill in accounting and an all rounder.  He brings a wealth of knowledge to the team.The three of us have all been camping our whole lives and that is what brings this team together for we have all had similar experiences over the years. And we believe it's time to bring  MrCoolit to the people! Managing The ProjectWe have dedicated a great deal of time and knowledge to put in place the necessary procedures to minimize the risks and unforeseen challenges of a project like MrCoolit.Our price and schedule are based on years of experience, development, fine tuning and strategy.This is not to say we will we will simply put this together, but if we can get a home ground advantage this sure will give us the edge.In a lot of ways this has been a complex project and in other ways it has come together beautifully giving us the confidence in our design, product and the way we will deliver MrCoolit to the awesome indiegogo community and beyond. Fine Tuning & AdjustmentsIn general there will be a few adjustments along the way and we have put the right team together to handle these moments swiftly.  We don’t see problems only challenges and fortunately we have ironed out most of the kinks before we begin.We have allocated the time in testing MrCoolit and the results are outstanding.  From a number of BBQ tests, having quite a few cans and bottles put through the dispensers from family and friends at home, to the hot room for days on end of testing.  We're happy and positive you will be. F.A.Q.Q. How do I order my  MrCoolit?A. You can order directly through our campaign.Q. How does it work?A. The cans are a gravity and weight system; they simply roll into position.Q. What are the can dispenser frames made of?A. 5mm wire frame with nylon dipped protective coating.Q. How are the can dispensers fixed in position?A. A stainless steel fixing holds the back in position and the front locks into the door housing frame.Q. Why doesn’t it jam up with ice?A. There is a plastic mesh casing allowing ice water and icicles’ to pass through.Q. What happens if a can gets dislodged?A. In the dispenser frame there is a trap door on top you open and re-adjust the can.Q. Are the doors insulated?A. Yes, we use a silicone insulation.Q. Does it hold water?A. Yes, 8 litres before you need to drain.Q. Are the console, can dispenser doors and cap seal for the bottle rack made of metal?A.No, ASA plastic compound ,UV stabilized.Q. How do I get the perk?A. Order you MrCoolit during the campaign.Q. How long does the battery last?A. The LED will last for 10+ hrs on a full charge.Q. Does the battery solar charge?A. Yes, depending on the UV light will depend on how quickly it will charge.Q. Will I be able to use MrCoolit in the U.S.A/UK or EUA. Yes, the battery will be supplied to voltage required for that country.Q. How long does the speaker last before recharging?A. Approximately 3hrs. Don’t forget you can always keep it charged off the lithium battery.Q. What is the LED life span?A. The average life span is 50,000hrsQ. How often do you release the water?A. For the best results once or twice a day to save ice retention.Q. Are the hinge pins stainless steel?A. Yes, 316 stainless steel.Q. How is the door housing fixed to the cooler?A. A silicone seal will be applied for an air tight seal.Q. Do you have warranty?A. Yes, we will warranty parts for a 12 month period.Q. How is it packed for freight?A. Cardboard will protect the console, dispenser doors and bottle rack cap then plastic wrapped.Q. Does it come in any other colours?A. At this stage we are only selling white.Q. Why is the cool cart not included in the price?A. We don’t believe every one will need the cool cart.  You could set it up and leave it in your RV or Caravan Park or any other permanent location.Q. What are the costs for international shipping.A. Estimated shipping cost $160.USD + any import duties or government taxes. Based on Container quantity sales shipments direct to Miami U.S. Estimated cost $60.00 USD + transfreight across the U.S dutys or taxes.Cooler Dimensions: 520mm H x 470mm W x710mm LQ. What are the shipping costs for destinations apart from the U.S. or Australia?A. Shipping costs can vary, depending on which country you live in. Pleaseemail us (link below) with your destination Country and we will work out the most cost effective method for shipping direct to you,                   CONTACT USwww.mrcoolitcooler.com.auFEEL FREE TO DROP US A LINE OR ASK ANY QUESTIONSinfo@mrcoolit.com.au

story:
OkieDokie is the disaster kit for everyone.

 

 

1. Supplies

We narrowed it down to the most important stuff as recommended by FEMA and the Red Cross.

Food: 3600 calories of emergency rations. These taste like a sugar cookie and have an unbeatable shelf-life of 5 years. 

Hand Crank Radio + Flashlight: When something major happens, cell phone towers become overloaded and often drop service. The towers might even may be destroyed for weeks. This device will keep you informed on the latest recovery efforts. It's also a flashlight. The Hand Crank will keep it charged as long as you have arms to crank it. 

Multitool: This tool has 12 functions and hundreds of applications. 

Water Filter: This water filter will let you drink from almost any water source buy filtering out 99.9% of bacteria. Compact and light design, good for a home kit or Go-Bag. 

First Aid: We've partnered with an amazing First-Aid kit company offering over 100 items, including a CPR kit, bandages, scissors and antiseptic wipes. 

Space Blanket: These foil blankets are surprisingly efficient. We include a couple extra in case you are in the cold for several days. 

Goggles and Face Mask:  In the event of excess dust or smoke from a natural or manmade disaster, this will help you breathe easy and keep you not-blind. 

Hygiene: We've included tampons, 5-gallon plastic bags and hand sanitizer. No reason to live without a place to dispose of waste and stay clean. 

Plus: Extra batteries,  A Whistle and Matches

Rugged Waterproof Bag: Many other disaster bags have dozens of pockets and complicated pieces. We asked "Why?" and couldn't find any good answers. In the spirit of simplicity, we decided to pack everything in a simple dry bag. Easy to grab and go or hang in the closet. The strap makes it easy to carry hands-free if you're getting out quickly, or carrying a small child through mountains of rubble. 

 

2. Planning Guide +

Document Copies

A fill-in-the blank guide to planning escape routes and meeting spots, including important contact information that may be inaccessible when you need it most. 

We also outline the most important documents you should absolutely make copies of. 

You'll even get a fillable PDF version so you can access it from all your devices.

  

 

Why is The OkieDokie Kit better

than building a kit myself? 

 

1. It's Cheaper 

Check out this article on the Sweethome. They suggest you buy 30 separate items totalling $1,933. Then you have to assemble all of it, which brings us to....

2. You'll save hours of your life

It takes a long time to comb through the FEMA website, compare prices and figure out how to plan. And who knows if you did any of it correctly?  This kit will probably save an entire weekend of work, which brings us to....

3. Let's be honest, you probably won't build it yourself. 

Putting together a disaster kit is a giant pain in the butt. It feels both very urgent and totally avoidable at the same time. There's a reason you haven't done this yet. 

 

Who is making this? How can I trust you? 

 

Archie Archambault was living in Portland, Oregon when he learned about a giant earthquake headed directly for the region. It was terrifying. When he headed to the grocery store to assemble a kit, he realized there were a lot of details. What kind of food is best? What tools do we need? Where do I store this thing? How do I choose a meeting place? 

Archie used the knowledge of Emergency Managers from Portland to New York to answer these questions. He assembled the most efficient collection of supplies and planning materials and tested at least six variations of every piece of equipment to make sure he found the most efficient and trustworthy solution. 

 

Do I really need a disaster kit? 

Yes. FEMA has been bugging you to assemble a basic disaster kit for years, and there's a reason. It's going to take awhile for anyone to show up and help, usually around 72 hours. Local emergency Departments are prepared for the worst, but it's going to take awhile for them to get to you. 

Read these scary articles based on where you live. 

CALIFORNIA: A section of the San Andreas fault close to L.A. could be overdue for a major earthquake by Rong-Gong Lin II, LA Times.

NORTHWEST: The Really Big One by Kathryn Schulz, The New Yorker

GULF STATES: Tampa Bay's Coming Storm by Darryl Fears, Washington Post

TORNADO COUNTRY: Preparing for a Tornado, by Missouri Storm Watch

What are my risks?

(CONSEQUENCE) x (PROBABLITY)=RISK

The consequences of a disaster are very high, but what is the probabilty? 

Here's a breakdown the risk of disasters based on geography, and what to think about in case one of them hits.

Earthquakes

 

Tornadoes

 

 

Hurricanes

 

Blizzards

 

Please note: Assembling a kit of 100+ items is difficult. Some brands and packaging shown in this campaign may need to be changed for products of equal quality due to availability.

story:
With laptops and tablets getting smaller and thinner, the amount of storage space and number of USB ports has taken a hit. You'll end up swapping between devices, or using bulky add-ons like a multi-port hub or dongle, even if all you need is the common configuration of extra storage while charging or using a device, such as a phone, mouse, or camera. So we developed ThrUSB.

ThrUSB resolves the problem of port scarcity on modern portable devices, when plugging in external USB devices. With high capacity super-speed flash storage and a full power pass-through USB port in one, you can use or charge another device while accessing your portable data, all from the one USB port.

We are keeping the rewards/perks pretty simple, just like our idea.

Memory pricing fluctuates, and we determined that 32/64 options were far more viable, and far better value than initial 16/32GB, mentioned in our video.

All  perks will include a USB Type C adaptor cable.

-

For the duration of the launch campaign everyone can get either a 32GB model, or a 64GB model at early bird discount (30%) pricing. Following our launch campaign, assuming we reach our funding goal, additional backers will be able to purchase a 32GB or 64GB ThrUSB at pre-retail pricing.

At any stage of the campaign, we will also have corporate branded packs of 100 x 32GB available in a colour of your choice with a black or silver logo, as well as the limited edition framed and signed demo boards for those that want to spice up their tech space with a bit of wall hanging bling.

Of course, backers who just want project updates can also pitch in to help speed things along in reaching our funding target.

ThrUSB was developed with compatibility in mind, by using components that are both high quality, and (where required) have drivers already loaded and ready to go. ThrUSB works on every USB 3 capable Mac, Windows and Linux computer we tested. ThrUSB is also compatible with operating system encryption apps such as BitLocker and FileVault to allow whole-device password protection.

*Size demonstration pictured. Final size and design subject to change.

We've gone from a hacked-together proof of concept built in one weekend (Startup Weekend 2015), to a hand built USB 2.0 prototype board with 8GB memory (2015-2016), to a fully functional  hardware demo board with a full 5GBPS hub, and 32/64GB of super-speed storage (2016-2017).

We have used high quality components from industry leading vendors so you can be sure your data remains safe and accessible for the life of the product; a life measured in years, not months.

(video opens in new tab/window)

We even got covered by NowThis Future in our infancy!

The current hardware demo board has all our high-speed components onboard with a 3D printed case. It represents the final product as a demonstratable proof-of-concept, but on a hand assembled scale using the smallest components that do not require the precision of a professional pick-and-place machine.

What we need now is your backing so we can refine and compact our design into a commercially ready size, and get it into your hands, your computer, and on the market.

While USB Type-A (the larger rectangular port) is still the most common USB interface, USB Type-C (the smaller reversible port) is soon to soon become mainstream, and already exists on most recently released laptops. USB Type-C and USB 3.1 (and soon 3.2) presents manufacturers with new challenges as the specifications are virtually quadrupled, so designing and testing is beyond our initial launch budget. However, we have already started investigating a move to this new specification.

Currently, our USB demo board employs a 5GBPS USB 3.0 integrated circuit from Texas Instruments. We'll be utilising USB 3.1 Gen 2 USB controllers (capable of upwards 10GBPS) from VIA Labs in the final ThrUSB you'll receive, however this will require a few weeks of re-engineering post-campaign.

In the intermediate period, we've decided to bundle all ThrUSB orders with a Type-C converter for users with newer machines. If we hit our stretch target, the surge demand will allow us to immediately fund and develop ThrUSB as a USB Type-C device, and skip the adapter entirely!

Press

We employed a simple 3-point design philosophy with ThrUSB from the start:

  1. A clean & sturdy chassis design
  2. High quality components
  3. The ability to ‘just work’ with the host device.

These were all crucial components of our minimum viable product, and have continued through all iterations to date. Employing a minimalist design ethos guarantees ThrUSB does what it says on the tin, and will work straight away with any device it is used with, be it a Macbook, Microsoft Surface, games console, laptop, or traditional desktop computer.

In May of 2015, we teamed up with some other developers to invent something at a local Startup Weekend. As with all weekend events, there was a lot of movement on the original idea, and a lot of coffee and sleepless nights, but the end result was something quite amazing - when we announced what we were doing during an update presentation, we had people queuing to pre-order one!

But why did this product come about, and why hasn’t it been done before? It turns out the number of things we plug in to laptops has never been the issue, it’s been the shrinking footprint of our devices. Having hardly any USB ports on our tablets and laptops meant that we had to use large powered USB hubs just to use and charge our gadgets, even in a common setup of using a flash drive with a mouse or charging a phones. We thought that there had to be a better solution than that!

We experimented with different solutions, and we discovered in market research that people loved the idea of a flash drive with a USB port on the back, as it allowed them to have extra space for files, or to backup & transfer their data, while also letting them use or charge a device, in the one compact package - in the one USB port!

We trialed and 3D printed many different designs, but we ultimately settled on a unibody design to keep production costs and engineering down, and rigidity and simplicity up!

We've been working on the development of ThrUSB from a hacked-together proof of concept, to a functional USB 2.0 prototype board using little more than internet searches, homebrew PCBs, and hand-soldering. Since then, we’ve moved on to a fully tested and functional USB 3.0 demo unit, fitted with the components we want to use in the final production devices (albeit scaled for hand-soldering and to get testing equipment in).

We commissioned 40 prototypes for burn-in and compatibility testing, hand built with the smallest pieces we could work with, but these are still not commercially acceptable to the general public due to size. Throughout our campaign we'll be optimizing, shrinking, and finalizing our demo board design into a commercially ready product for you to use, as well as publishing continual updates so you can follow our progress.

If you want one of our USB 3.0 demo boards, you can always bump up your pledge and receive one of the limited-edition framed boards in addition to your ThrUSB. How cool would that look on the wall of your makerspace?

We also plan to release our USB 3.0 Demo Board as an Open Source Hardware platform, once this campaign is completed for the maker & tinkering community. You’ll find the intermediate USB 3.0 expansion pads on the underside of the board, ready to accept virtually anything you may wish to solder on, using a USB 2 or 3 interface.

Our USB 3.0 proof-of-concept board makes use of a Texas Instruments USB host, and Samsung flash storage. However, the final product specifications will be as follows;

  • Connectivity - USB 3.2 Gen 2 with Type C Adapter/Converter cable
  • Processor - VIA Labs USB 3.2 Gen 2 Hub Chip
  • Storage - Internal Samsung UDP Flash Chip, 32GB/64GB
  • Chassis - Anodized alloy with a soft Mac-like finish
  • Pass-through - USB 3.2 Gen 2; 10GBPS speed, at 10W power for charging.
  • Safety - Dual ESD diodes on data lines

We compiled a development risk assessment of the campaign, as well as added extra information;

  • Our production timeline will run over Christmas and into 2018, due to further refinement and R&D. However, we anticipate and strive to have pledges after Chinese New Year 2018. Extra refinement ultimately means a better product in your hands.
  • All manufacturing will take place in China, with all units shipped to our backers from Hong Kong or Shenzhen. Key suppliers are in place for our key components, in quantities as needed, and our Chinese production partners are on standby, awaiting the final design.
  • Shipping will be completed in the same order as pledges, depending on batch quantities.
  • As production requirements scale based on orders, production times may increase for the later orders and shipping might take a little longer however we may have the opportunity to move production to a much larger factory if this really gets going.
  • Currently, ThrUSB utilizes a controller at USB 3.0 speeds on our technology demo boards. We acknowledge new USB speed standards and we plan to equip a faster controller on our final commercial unit, for faster pass-through speeds, and to future-proof memory & connectivity options.
  • OEM/Bulk Branded orders available, inquire for details.
story_txt:
With laptops and tablets getting smaller and thinner, the amount of storage space and number of USB ports has taken a hit. You'll end up swapping between devices, or using bulky add-ons like a multi-port hub or dongle, even if all you need is the common configuration of extra storage while charging or using a device, such as a phone, mouse, or camera. So we developed ThrUSB.ThrUSB resolves the problem of port scarcity on modern portable devices, when plugging in external USB devices. With high capacity super-speed flash storage and a full power pass-through USB port in one, you can use or charge another device while accessing your portable data, all from the one USB port.We are keeping the rewards/perks pretty simple, just like our idea.Memory pricing fluctuates, and we determined that 32/64 options were far more viable, and far better value than initial 16/32GB, mentioned in our video.All  perks will include a USB Type C adaptor cable.-For the duration of the launch campaign everyone can get either a 32GB model, or a 64GB model at early bird discount (30%) pricing. Following our launch campaign, assuming we reach our funding goal, additional backers will be able to purchase a 32GB or 64GB ThrUSB at pre-retail pricing.At any stage of the campaign, we will also have corporate branded packs of 100 x 32GB available in a colour of your choice with a black or silver logo, as well as the limited edition framed and signed demo boards for those that want to spice up their tech space with a bit of wall hanging bling.Of course, backers who just want project updates can also pitch in to help speed things along in reaching our funding target.ThrUSB was developed with compatibility in mind, by using components that are both high quality, and (where required) have drivers already loaded and ready to go. ThrUSB works on every USB 3 capable Mac, Windows and Linux computer we tested. ThrUSB is also compatible with operating system encryption apps such as BitLocker and FileVault to allow whole-device password protection.*Size demonstration pictured. Final size and design subject to change.We've gone from a hacked-together proof of concept built in one weekend (Startup Weekend 2015), to a hand built USB 2.0 prototype board with 8GB memory (2015-2016), to a fully functional  hardware demo board with a full 5GBPS hub, and 32/64GB of super-speed storage (2016-2017).We have used high quality components from industry leading vendors so you can be sure your data remains safe and accessible for the life of the product; a life measured in years, not months.(video opens in new tab/window)We even got covered by NowThis Future in our infancy!The current hardware demo board has all our high-speed components onboard with a 3D printed case. It represents the final product as a demonstratable proof-of-concept, but on a hand assembled scale using the smallest components that do not require the precision of a professional pick-and-place machine.What we need now is your backing so we can refine and compact our design into a commercially ready size, and get it into your hands, your computer, and on the market.While USB Type-A (the larger rectangular port) is still the most common USB interface, USB Type-C (the smaller reversible port) is soon to soon become mainstream, and already exists on most recently released laptops. USB Type-C and USB 3.1 (and soon 3.2) presents manufacturers with new challenges as the specifications are virtually quadrupled, so designing and testing is beyond our initial launch budget. However, we have already started investigating a move to this new specification.Currently, our USB demo board employs a 5GBPS USB 3.0 integrated circuit from Texas Instruments. We'll be utilising USB 3.1 Gen 2 USB controllers (capable of upwards 10GBPS) from VIA Labs in the final ThrUSB you'll receive, however this will require a few weeks of re-engineering post-campaign.In the intermediate period, we've decided to bundle all ThrUSB orders with a Type-C converter for users with newer machines. If we hit our stretch target, the surge demand will allow us to immediately fund and develop ThrUSB as a USB Type-C device, and skip the adapter entirely!PressWe employed a simple 3-point design philosophy with ThrUSB from the start:
A clean & sturdy chassis design
High quality components
The ability to ‘just work’ with the host device.
These were all crucial components of our minimum viable product, and have continued through all iterations to date. Employing a minimalist design ethos guarantees ThrUSB does what it says on the tin, and will work straight away with any device it is used with, be it a Macbook, Microsoft Surface, games console, laptop, or traditional desktop computer.In May of 2015, we teamed up with some other developers to invent something at a local Startup Weekend. As with all weekend events, there was a lot of movement on the original idea, and a lot of coffee and sleepless nights, but the end result was something quite amazing - when we announced what we were doing during an update presentation, we had people queuing to pre-order one!But why did this product come about, and why hasn’t it been done before? It turns out the number of things we plug in to laptops has never been the issue, it’s been the shrinking footprint of our devices. Having hardly any USB ports on our tablets and laptops meant that we had to use large powered USB hubs just to use and charge our gadgets, even in a common setup of using a flash drive with a mouse or charging a phones. We thought that there had to be a better solution than that!We experimented with different solutions, and we discovered in market research that people loved the idea of a flash drive with a USB port on the back, as it allowed them to have extra space for files, or to backup & transfer their data, while also letting them use or charge a device, in the one compact package - in the one USB port!We trialed and 3D printed many different designs, but we ultimately settled on a unibody design to keep production costs and engineering down, and rigidity and simplicity up!We've been working on the development of ThrUSB from a hacked-together proof of concept, to a functional USB 2.0 prototype board using little more than internet searches, homebrew PCBs, and hand-soldering. Since then, we’ve moved on to a fully tested and functional USB 3.0 demo unit, fitted with the components we want to use in the final production devices (albeit scaled for hand-soldering and to get testing equipment in).We commissioned 40 prototypes for burn-in and compatibility testing, hand built with the smallest pieces we could work with, but these are still not commercially acceptable to the general public due to size. Throughout our campaign we'll be optimizing, shrinking, and finalizing our demo board design into a commercially ready product for you to use, as well as publishing continual updates so you can follow our progress.If you want one of our USB 3.0 demo boards, you can always bump up your pledge and receive one of the limited-edition framed boards in addition to your ThrUSB. How cool would that look on the wall of your makerspace?We also plan to release our USB 3.0 Demo Board as an Open Source Hardware platform, once this campaign is completed for the maker & tinkering community. You’ll find the intermediate USB 3.0 expansion pads on the underside of the board, ready to accept virtually anything you may wish to solder on, using a USB 2 or 3 interface.Our USB 3.0 proof-of-concept board makes use of a Texas Instruments USB host, and Samsung flash storage. However, the final product specifications will be as follows;

Connectivity - USB 3.2 Gen 2 with Type C Adapter/Converter cable

Processor - VIA Labs USB 3.2 Gen 2 Hub Chip

Storage - Internal Samsung UDP Flash Chip, 32GB/64GB

Chassis - Anodized alloy with a soft Mac-like finish

Pass-through - USB 3.2 Gen 2; 10GBPS speed, at 10W power for charging.

Safety - Dual ESD diodes on data lines
We compiled a development risk assessment of the campaign, as well as added extra information;
Our production timeline will run over Christmas and into 2018, due to further refinement and R&D. However, we anticipate and strive to have pledges after Chinese New Year 2018. Extra refinement ultimately means a better product in your hands.
All manufacturing will take place in China, with all units shipped to our backers from Hong Kong or Shenzhen. Key suppliers are in place for our key components, in quantities as needed, and our Chinese production partners are on standby, awaiting the final design.

Shipping will be completed in the same order as pledges, depending on batch quantities.
As production requirements scale based on orders, production times may increase for the later orders and shipping might take a little longer however we may have the opportunity to move production to a much larger factory if this really gets going.
Currently, ThrUSB utilizes a controller at USB 3.0 speeds on our technology demo boards. We acknowledge new USB speed standards and we plan to equip a faster controller on our final commercial unit, for faster pass-through speeds, and to future-proof memory & connectivity options.
OEM/Bulk Branded orders available, inquire for details.

story:
A new way to check the water in your Christmas tree

We all love the benefits of a live Christmas tree - the fresh scent, the festive beauty and it's better for the environment! But we are all guilty from time to time of not giving our tree the attention it needs during the holidays. During the holiday hustle and bustle, remembering to check the tree becomes a chore.

Forgetting to water has caused over 17 million dollars in damages each year! Evergreen Elf was created to take the chore out of monitoring the water level in your tree stand, keeping your tree fresh and your family safe

People Love Evergreen Elf!

2017 was a great year! Word is spreading and people love the little Elf who just wants to keep your family safe this Christmas!

The Evergreen Elf is hard at work

  • Automatically detects water levels in Christmas tree stands
  • Alerts when water volume falls below safe and acceptable level
  • Talking alert is fun and interactive, without becoming a nuisance
  • Light-Up alert is festive and won't detract from Holiday decor
  • Deters Christmas tree fires by helping to keep your tree hydrated
  • Fits all commercial tree stands
  • Easy to use, no complicated instructions
  • Durable product is battery operated, batteries are included!
  • Keeps your hands clean!

Our Story

After asking his aging mother how she checks the water in her Christmas tree stand, Ted Sullivan, owner and creator of the Evergreen Elf, learned that she was risking her knees and back climbing over presents and under branches only to discover the tree was bone dry.

That same year when his wife asked him to check the water repeatedly in his own tree stand, he was determined to make life easier for everyone. Realizing the importance of keeping his family and his extended family safe, he developed a new way to check the water in the Christmas tree stand and the Evergreen Elf was born.

 

 

A great gift that says you care

Every contribution to the Evergreen Elf carries the knowledge that you are funding a product designed to spread joy and reduce tragedy in people's lives:

  • We are seeking $10,000 for marketing funds to help us spread the word. Every Elf sold could be a Christmas tree fire prevented!
  • If you don't buy an Elf from us, your contribution is still greatly appreciated and will off-set the initial investment spent to bring Evergreen Elf to life.
  • We are all about the Christmas cheer! Buy one for yourself - or buy four! They will be packaged, wrapped and ready to gift. Evergreen Elf makes a perfect hostess gift to any holiday party. Keep a couple in your prize closet and be ready for the occasion!
  • Check out our Complete Christmas option! Buy a Christmas tree from us, along with your Evergreen Elf to keep it fresh, and you will receive a world-renowned North Carolina Frazier Fir, sweet sugar cake for Christmas morning all kinds of other Christmas surprises. See the complete list in the option and just know that we will do our best to fill your box with Santa-style goodies!
  • Our warehouse in North Carolina is now fully stocked and ready to fulfill orders!

The Impact of Your Purchase

Imagine turning on the news around Christmas and not seeing a single story of a Christmas tree fire. This is the goal for Evergreen Elf.

Spread the word and help us put an Evergreen Elf in every home this year!

story:
Who are we? 

We are a group of three enthusiastic global problem-solvers. 

The true story behind the invention of ARUSUNO 

A couple of months ago, staying at our friend’s place for a few days, we came across to a very serious problem. Apartment hosting six, had a single toilet, making almost impossible to avoid the awkward situations related to smelling what other’s did in the toilet. Furthermore, oftentimes, warning someone verbally to abstain from entering the toilet was even more embarrassing. 
And this was our moment of Eureka! 
What if we had a simple device that could serve the function of notifying people about the proper time for entering the lavatory? That device could have avoided all the discomfort of warning a toilet successor to abstain from going in, and at the same time, would have dramatically reduced the statistics of people smelling what others did in the toilet. 

And this is how ARUSUNO was born. 
Later we realized that the problem we faced at our friend’s place was not idiosyncratic, but rather more generic. And that was often observed not only in residential buildings, but also in offices and co-working spaces, or even at the restaurants. 

 

The research by Hardston University shows that 97% of all individuals have experienced this problem at least once in their lifetime (Note: This is not a scientific research result, and there is no Hardston University in the world).

 

With this Kickstarter project, we present ARUSUNO - a unique solution that can be used in any environment for mitigating all the toilet-related awkwardness and drastically reducing the frequency of smelling other people's stool.  

Design

ARUSUNO has a modular design, consisting of three separate parts, the Core with a timer and two Headers with individual icons depicting respectively fresh air or a bad odour inside the bathroom.

 

The colors and the work of art visual design of ARUSUNO have been meticulously crafted to fit all sorts of toilet doors across the globe.  

 

One of the most revolutionary features of ARUSUNO is a built-in ringing bell made of ding-dongium metal to make sure that you always enter the toilet right time. 

 

Additionally, limited only to our Kickstart Wizard backers, we will allow an option of self-designing header icons each of which could also be used as a USB stick. 

 

Project timeline

With YOUR invaluable support, ARUSUNO will ensure that we live in a world in which no one will ever have to smell other's stool again!

story:
Hey there! My names Kennedy Gillette and I’m a young mother from Upstate NY. The recent COVID-19 pandemic has managed to knock our family off of our feet making this start-up exceedingly difficult. Since I’m the full-time caretaker of our daughter while her father works, I haven’t been able to bring any income into our family and I would really like to change that.

I have always enjoyed candle making and I’ve studied the process for quite some time now. If I’m able to get some help for the start-up costs of equipment I’ll be opening my own handmade candle shop online. All of my products are made with 100% Organic/Natural waxes, fragrances, essential oils, and dyes. I also plan on setting up a program where returning customers can send their glass gars back to be repurposed for a discount on their next order!

There will be different sections on my product page for “New Candles” or “Repurposed Candles” and with the goal of being 100% eco-friendly in mind I will be using hemp or wooden wicks with recyclable labels. My ultimate goal is to set up a good future for my daughter, and I believe opening a business that I truly enjoy will push our family in a positive direction!

Risks and Challenges

The initial challenge I’m facing is start-up costs. Occasionally, a candle may be accidentally poured improperly. However, I will be using reusable containers, along with eco-friendly hemp/wooden wics and 100% organic soy wax and beeswax! No product is wasted as I can give imperfect candles to local community members for free, and the jars can be sent back for reuse.

Other Ways You Can Help

I completely understand if you’re unable to make a donation, however, if you could share this campaign it would mean just as much to me, thank you all!

story:
HYFER Globe is a sphere that hovers in mid-air over a hexagonal base with a modern marble design. It is not just a simple decorative article. The fact that the ball floats and spins without losing the spin or the height makes it come alive and thus brings more life into the room. 

By using marble in combination with metal optics, HYFER Globe stands for modernity and simplicity by still impressing the viewer.

-"It reminds you that the world keeps turning no matter what."

 

 

Hi! We are Elisabeth and Elvedin, two students from the Technical University of Munich. We founded HYFER because of our interest in technology combined with our vision to give everyone around the world a bit of life back. We are so happy that we achieved so much in such a short time and that we can present you our heart project! We are both curious and motivated to put our complete energy into this project and we want to see HYFER Globe in places all around the globe! Please back us and let's achieve this goal together! 

 

 

The sphere is suspended with no support other than magnetic fields. It stays at its place and spins around its axis. You can place your hand between the sphere and the base without deflecting it. Due to this technology HYFER Globe can even hang on a wall.

-"Lifting force and stability in perfect balance."

 

 

The ball still hovers in the middle, with the same distance in-between and it doesn’t fall down. If HYFER Globe hasn't been an eye-catcher so far, it certainly is now!

 

 

 

 

We started to develop a simple but symbolic design and integrated the magnetic technology. This is the reason why HYFER Globe looks and fascinates exactly the way it does. 

A lot of time passed until we were satisfied with our prototypes. Founding a company next to our studies gave us more and a totally different kind of motivation to aim for the best results. With assistance from our friends, family and people from our university we were able to make it this far, now we need your help! We have put a lot of time, passion and commitment into this product and the only thing missing is start-up capital to finally start the production of HYFER Globe.

-"Finally putting what you have learned into practice is inspiring."

 

 

There are numerous places where you can place HYFER Globe. These are just a few examples.

 

 

Pimp up the atmosphere in your clinic’s waiting room. It is a stressful situation for most of your patients anyways so let them be reminded that everything will be fine. 

 

 

HYFER Globe is perfect for your home office. Inducing more energy around you and revitalizing your work desk.

 

 

The first thing people see when they enter a room is important. Or as we say in Germany “der erste Eindruck zählt”. Let them be impressed by having HYFER Globe hovering right in front of them. They will remember you!


 

 

The living room is a place where we spend a lot of time. It is where we feel home. Where we feel safe. So there is no place as important as the heart of our house. Let it be special and give it a living touch, to support the calming atmosphere.

 

 

Not only a simple vase for your shelves again. Bring them to the next level, by including HYFER Globe. One, two or more. Whatever you like most!

 

 

Complete your spa day with the magic of HYFER Globe. Next to candles it can hover and make every second a little more precious to you. 

There is nothing more important than caring about yourself, so do it perfectly.

 

 

Fun fact: we gifted our first products and prototypes to our family and friends. It is an ideal gift for different occasions, as a birthday present, for a wedding, for a new home, as a company gift or just to say “Thank you!” to somebody.

 

 

Unfortunately, we will not be able to deliver the product before Christmas, but this does not mean that you cannot give it away for Christmas anyway. HYFER Globe is worth waiting for. We have designed a gift card for this purpose. You can select this option at the checkout and we will send you the card via e-mail.

 

 

There are four different designs you can choose from: Black and silver like the moon at night. White and gold like the sun during the day. Black and gold like a star at night. White and silver like a cloud in the sky.

 

 

Through the marble design we ensure that each product has a unique aspect and that each person receives that uniqueness. 

Additionally, as a healing stone for the soul, marble is used in the areas of courage and new beginnings. White marble shows new perspectives and paves the way for a change of life. It helps to find imaginative solutions to problems and thus contributes to more satisfaction.

These facts have inspired us to integrate exactly this into our product.

-"Hover unique."

 

 


Due to the handy size, the HYFER Globe can shine by its appearance. You can place it anywhere in your home without it looking too obtrusive. Even more than one can be perfectly integrated into your home.

-"Small but excellent."

 

 

The hexagonal base makes HYFER Globe a modular product, which makes it possible to place several pieces next to each other, switch the spheres and still look chic. Mix different coloured products or let all shine in one colour.

-"Strong together."


 

The symbol of the sphere means the totality of all possibilities in the finite world, eternity and the cyclical movement of renewal. Through the colour gold, spheres also represent the personality of the hero or heroine in fairy tales. This symbolism, we find, reflects even more the strong appearance of our product.

-"In antiquity the sphere was considered the soul of the world."

 

 

Let HYFER Globe impress you even more with the reflection of the sphere in the base. The polished-look acts like a mirror and it almost seems like there are two spheres.

 

 

As a German company, we care a lot about quality. It is just as important as the design and the technology of the product. Without it, the product would lose its beauty. Each product will be checked and tested before it is sent to you to ensure the best possible quality. You shouldn't expect less, so HYFER Globe can be the eyecatcher of every room it “lives” inside.

 

Take the ball carefully in both hands.

Slowly move your hands (starting at around 20cm/8inches distance) towards the middle of the base until a counter-pressure is felt.

Now carefully release the ball.  

 

 

We are excited to be offering free, international shipping. Please note we are not responsible for additional duty and taxes that may apply to your local importation laws.  

 

BACK US.

 

Follow us on Instagram and Facebook for announcements and discounts!

 

@hyfer.official

    @hyfer.design

 

or sign in with your e-mail address on our website: 

 

www.hyfer.de

 

OUR PERKS FOR YOU:

 There are numerous places where you can place HYFER Globe. These are just a few examples.  Pimp up the atmosphere in your clinic’s waiting room. It is a stressful situation for most of your patients anyways so let them be reminded that everything will be fine.   HYFER Globe is perfect for your home office. Inducing more energy around you and revitalizing your work desk.  The first thing people see when they enter a room is important. Or as we say in Germany “der erste Eindruck zählt”. Let them be impressed by having HYFER Globe hovering right in front of them. They will remember you!  The living room is a place where we spend a lot of time. It is where we feel home. Where we feel safe. So there is no place as important as the heart of our house. Let it be special and give it a living touch, to support the calming atmosphere.  Not only a simple vase for your shelves again. Bring them to the next level, by including HYFER Globe. One, two or more. Whatever you like most!  Complete your spa day with the magic of HYFER Globe. Next to candles it can hover and make every second a little more precious to you. There is nothing more important than caring about yourself, so do it perfectly.  Fun fact: we gifted our first products and prototypes to our family and friends. It is an ideal gift for different occasions, as a birthday present, for a wedding, for a new home, as a company gift or just to say “Thank you!” to somebody.  Unfortunately, we will not be able to deliver the product before Christmas, but this does not mean that you cannot give it away for Christmas anyway. HYFER Globe is worth waiting for. We have designed a gift card for this purpose. You can select this option at the checkout and we will send you the card via e-mail.  There are four different designs you can choose from: Black and silver like the moon at night. White and gold like the sun during the day. Black and gold like a star at night. White and silver like a cloud in the sky.  Through the marble design we ensure that each product has a unique aspect and that each person receives that uniqueness. Additionally, as a healing stone for the soul, marble is used in the areas of courage and new beginnings. White marble shows new perspectives and paves the way for a change of life. It helps to find imaginative solutions to problems and thus contributes to more satisfaction.These facts have inspired us to integrate exactly this into our product.-"Hover unique."  Due to the handy size, the HYFER Globe can shine by its appearance. You can place it anywhere in your home without it looking too obtrusive. Even more than one can be perfectly integrated into your home.-"Small but excellent."  The hexagonal base makes HYFER Globe a modular product, which makes it possible to place several pieces next to each other, switch the spheres and still look chic. Mix different coloured products or let all shine in one colour.-"Strong together." The symbol of the sphere means the totality of all possibilities in the finite world, eternity and the cyclical movement of renewal. Through the colour gold, spheres also represent the personality of the hero or heroine in fairy tales. This symbolism, we find, reflects even more the strong appearance of our product.-"In antiquity the sphere was considered the soul of the world."  Let HYFER Globe impress you even more with the reflection of the sphere in the base. The polished-look acts like a mirror and it almost seems like there are two spheres.  As a German company, we care a lot about quality. It is just as important as the design and the technology of the product. Without it, the product would lose its beauty. Each product will be checked and tested before it is sent to you to ensure the best possible quality. You shouldn't expect less, so HYFER Globe can be the eyecatcher of every room it “lives” inside. Take the ball carefully in both hands.Slowly move your hands (starting at around 20cm/8inches distance) towards the middle of the base until a counter-pressure is felt.Now carefully release the ball.    We are excited to be offering free, international shipping. Please note we are not responsible for additional duty and taxes that may apply to your local importation laws.   BACK US. Follow us on Instagram and Facebook for announcements and discounts! @hyfer.official    @hyfer.design or sign in with your e-mail address on our website:  www.hyfer.de OUR PERKS FOR YOU:

story:
Short Summary

Contributors fund ideas they can be passionate about and to people they trust. Here are some things to do in this section:

  • Introduce yourself and your background.
  • Briefly describe your campaign and why it's important to you.
  • Express the magnitude of what contributors will help you achieve.

Remember, keep it concise, yet personal. Ask yourself: if someone stopped reading here would they be ready to make a contribution?

What We Need & What You Get

Break it down for folks in more detail:

  • Explain how much funding you need and where it's going. Be transparent and specific-people need to trust you to want to fund you.
  • Tell people about your unique perks. Get them excited!
  • Describe where the funds go if you don't reach your entire goal.

The Impact

Feel free to explain more about your campaign and let people know the difference their contribution will make:

  • Explain why your project is valuable to the contributor and to the world.
  • Point out your successful track record with projects like this (if you have one).
  • Make it real for people and build trust.

Risks & Challenges

People value your transparency. Be open and stand out by providing insight into the risks and obstacles you may face on the way to achieving your goal.

  • Share what qualifies you to overcome these hurdles.
  • Describe your plan for solving these challenges.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

  • Ask folks to get the word out and make some noise about your campaign.
  • Remind them to use the Indiegogo share tools!

And that's all there is to it.

story:
UPDATE!! Due to YETI also releasing a new lid in the coming months we have decided to pull the campaign. 



Oso Lids - The easy solution to your lid needs

Have you ever been enjoying a cold or hot beverage from one of the best cups around, just to realize a straw won't fit in your lid, or just filled your cup to have your kid knock your cup over and spill your drink?  This lid is the solution to your problem. 

The Oso 30 is a lid for the Yeti Rambler 30oz.  It is a BPA free design lid, with room for a straw with a closure to minimize any spilling. 

We have successfully prototyped the lid and are drinking out of it right now.  What is left is to get production molds built.  This will take a little time for the international sourcing.  Though we have factored time for small mold changes, if something bigger comes up while making the mold our product timeline could be delayed.

If you can help us reach our goal then we would like to expand our product offering to a 20oz cup as well.
