story:
The riflo Story



riflo: an organic embodiment of Now & Here

It’s often inconvenient to open apps on smartphones or computers to connect to appliances. So we develop affordable and easy-to-use products that are able to recognize signals simultaneously and respond to them as you desire. As more devices become internet-connected, the various digital signals surrounding us will increase exponentially. Easy ways will become desirable to deal with all these signals.


Our first project is ‘riflo’

-What is riflo?

It’s a totally unique combination of a speaker and a multi-color LED light fixture that is wifi-controlled.

-Why riflo?

The name is a combination of ”ripple and flow” which is about visualizing spreading signals.) Once you put a riflo(bulb) into a socket in your living room or over your dining table, you’ll marvel at how. you can turn on its unique functions at your command with the sleek hand-held button(controller).

Relax to the lovely light settings and beautiful music riflo delivers. Voice messages, too. It even winks at you.  And your user preferences will be retained in riflo’s memory and become a natural part of your life style.


-About riflo

We created riflo to be communicative. riflo is the first system that flows the users’ experience.


Key Features



Wink



Wink comes up in color signal when there is necessary information for you. You can simply ignore it or keep it connected.


Automate this

The Wink function comes up in color signal when there is necessary information for you. You can simply ignore it or keep it connected.


Voice Message

The Voice Message function will let you know the information you’ve told riflo you seek, such as schedules, weather reports, or your very own wake-up alarm. Moreover, you can play recorded sounds with an app when ever you desire.

  • “Today’s weather is cloudy. The lowest temperature is 73.4℉(23℃) and the highest is 89.6℉(32℃). The probability of rain is 70%.”

  • “Charles arrives in 3 minutes.”

  • “Tomorrow is our wedding anniversary.”

  • At 12pm, your message “It’s time to eat your sandwich. You’ll find it  in the refrigerator.” will be played in your child’s room.


Wifi Speaker

You can listen to music streamed from the internet through riflo’s built-in wifi speaker without needing any other apps. Also you can play music in your smartphone with riflo by wifi music streaming apps (i.e. Share On).


Various Light & Sound

You can select the right lighting for various moods with riflo’s preset or customized colors and sounds. (i.e.,  Party, Night, Wake-up, Relax, or other suggested colors, etc.)




Variable Function

riflo’s settings are easy to configure and edit. You can change everything anytime. Whatever is connected to riflo, can easily be re-set as you wish. 

Examples: combinations of function cards

  • Close to home + soft lights on + FM radio on
  • NY times + articles in health category + send wink
  • Push Button + find my smartphone


Some Example Integrations

You can control Open API internet programs as follows by connecting them to riflo platform with the button. 


You can configure your own functions for riflo, like smartphone finder, Emergency SMS, Set an alarm, let’s count something, Timer, Selfie, etc.




Modern Design

riflo is a sleek neutral grey color. When you feel like having different atmosphere, you don’t have to work hard to change the mood with riflo. Simply replace your ordinary light bulb (E26 Socket Type) with riflo, and start enjoying the magic it brings to your living environment.

riflo, as an IoT platform, is created to connect us to other IoT products around us. This will become the norm before long. riflo is focused on simplifying the creation, sharing, and modification processes through standardization. Ecosystems created by riflo,  enable you to shape your environment to suit your purposes.




Button Details

riflo’s button is a sleek ergonomic marvel in its own right. The “smart button” downloads the proper tasks for Now & Here and intuitively operates all of the functions. For example, when you get an email from a certain person, you will see that riflo blinks with blue lights. If you push play on the button, riflo will announce the title of the email.




Automate This

Operate pre-set functions with a button and check them with riflo. You can easily automate a other functions with riflo’s button.


Specifications

  • Wifi controlled color LED light and sound speaker
  • E26 socket type for easy power connection
  • Color LED ring to show current state of the product
  • Remote control customized with frequently using functions


Service Specs

‘Task’ is as a basic application unit to share user experiences. Users’ experiences will be specified by Task and may be shared with other users. Of course users can easily modify shared Task according at will.



3rd Party Apps & Compatibility

riflo is able to set through the most commonly-used web browsers, including those compatible with:


Also, iOS & Android Mobile apps are available. 


Perks


Timeline





Members

Eugene : CEO &  Executive Hacker

Gene : Product Hacker

Duk : Product Hacker

Vicky : Creative Hacker

Dan : Server Dev Hacker

Yoobin : Front End Dev Hacker 

Flo :  Service Design Hacker

facebook.com/ttadag


and

 Yeo Minjung : Paper art for intro movie 
instagram.com/_yeominjung_/

Sungwoong YOON : Visual editing for intro movie
oldtownmarket.co.kr 




Risks & Challenges

We have extensive backgrounds in electronic circuitry, electronic device design, and software creation.) We are applying our collective experience to riflo., We continue our quest to provide the perfect product. We consider that the real value of riflo will be affirmed by user experiences. So internet connection is essential for the products and why we use wifi.  

riflo will evolve everyday by collecting and sharing user experiences through internet. We need your support to make riflo connected and operated to our everyday life.


Other ways you can help

Share our campaign with your friends.

story:
Introducing Hexastor, an alternative to cloud storage and video conferencing.

 

 

 

Hexastor is a personal cloud storage and video conferencing device.

  • Add as much USB storage as you want
  • access and store files securely in a centralized location
  • chat with family and friends from anywhere, any time

 

  • Takes 5 minutes to setup
  • Offers the convenience of cloud storage
  • Acts as a virtual data-vault
  • Robust, AES-256 bit encryption for data at rest and in transit

Hexastor gives you the ability to:

  • connect drives up to 8 terabytes in size to each device.
  • mirror 2 identical drives or replicate between 2 devices 

Watch the file-sync in action

Hexastor also allows you to host secure video-conferences from the device

 

A built-in wireless module ensures that the device connects to any wireless access point / router. The result is a tiny, portable device that doesn’t require much power and is easy to configure and use.

 

Hexastor stands for Highly EXtensible STORage.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

We’ve worked hard and personally committed $20,000 to this project so far. Our project has a number of risks typically associated with Hardware startups. 

We’ve outlined a few risks and challenges below and given in detail how we plan to mitigate these risks.

Insufficient Initial Capital:  

Risk Mitigation: The most expensive components are the moulds required for the enclosure and the PCB. We have spent a lot of time perfecting our prototype and the designs we have for the enclosure and PCB are ready for manufacturing in terms of design and quality. This eliminates unexpected costs and delays caused due to a major redesign.

For rewards, most backers will get instantaneous, exclusive access to a hosted, secure video-conferencing program. This is one of the most robust, secure video-conferencing solutions in the market and will allow you to conference with your friends and family, no matter where they are. 

This instantaneous access ensures that we have the ability to provide you a nice perk right away, the moment you back us. 

Manufacturing delays: 

Manufacturing delays can be caused due to numerous reasons, including major redesign and availability of parts.

Risk Mitigation: Our designs are ready for launch and our suppliers have informed us that they can supply adequate quantities for large scale manufacturing. 

The first few releases of Hexastor will come with a modified version of Syncthing built into it. Syncthing is open source and is supported by a large community of software developers and users and this allows us to improve the product for the community that uses it and also gives our developers more time to focus on the security stack. 

The security stack is an important application that makes Hexastor so secure.

 

We would like you to be a part of our success story. Share using the links above and help us reach our target goal to allow us to bring this incredible device to reality.

 

 

1. Tell us more about your team

Hexastor is run by a bunch of people who believe that secure data storage and video-chat should be available and easily accessible at all times.

We have to admit that we are not the first ones to launch a 'personal cloud storage' device but we can promise you a device that's unique in terms of features, compactness, ease to use and extensibility. Most other devices fail to do that.

2. What do you mean by a prototype? How close is the prototype for manufacturing?

We worked on the first paper napkin design and made a 3D prototype in February 2016.A four layer circuit board was designed and samples were burn-in tested in January 2016. This testing allowed us to make further improvements to the final circuit board design which was ready by February 2016.

The final prototypes you see include production-ready internal components with 3D printed exterior shells.  So we are almost ready to produce these devices and need additional funds to engage manufacturers and suppliers who are motivated and are on standby. 

3. Give us a technical overview of how this device works 

We love open source, so we compiled our own Linux kernel and customised Syncthing for our device. Syncthing is hosted as an isolated container that sits on top of encrypted disks. The second container runs webRTC for video-conferencing and data in transit is always encrypted via a 256-bit tunnel.

The good news is that we have recycled a lot of open-source stuff and this will allow us to focus us on usability. Source code will be made available for free for everyone and we plan to contribute back to the open source community by releasing bug-fixes and enhancements.  

4. What is a Pi image and how do I use it?

A Pi image converts a Raspberry Pi 3 into a Hexastor device. We strongly recommend a 16 gigabyte class-10 microSD card for installation. Insert the microSD card into your Windows / Mac machine using an adapter and run the wizard to setup Hexastor.  This version of Hexastor does not support the video-chat feature.

story:
This is Appli

Appli is the world’ first deadbolt lock with the face recognition.

 

Appli is a smart door lock, designed and built to meet the needs of IoT, using face recognition, the most attractive biometric technology currently.

With Appli, your face will be become your new door key, you don’t need to have a key.

Also you can use the bluetooth feature of Appli to control and monitor it very easily.

Features

You will be able to use this affordable & easy-to-install door lock to make management of your home convenient and safe, and make your life more efficient and more comfortable.

You will find several remarkable advantages of the Appli.

Application

Home

  • Just register the faces of desired persons to allow them unlock the door.
  • Appli’s gyroscope detects the closed state of door and will lock it automatically.
  • The PIR sensor wakes up Appli when you are in front of door automatically which means you don’t have to press the power touch.
  • The random layout of PIN code prevents others from unlocking the door by stealing a glance at your pattern and trying to mimic it.
  • You can unlock the door in any part of house with remote unlock functionality.
  • If someone tries to remove the lock from the door, inside part of Appli sounds the alarm and sends the alert to you.

 

Office

  • If you are the manager of your office you don’t have to concern yourself about the keys. The faces of office members are the keys.
  • If someone is not willing to register their face they can unlock/lock Appli with a mechanical key or Bluetooth functionality.
  • Even if the door is locked or unlocked by mechanical key or manual handle of Appli, Appli detects and saves it in log data, so manager can inspect it at any time.

 

Villa

  • In cases where the lock is used frequently it can operates about 300 days (about 6000 times) with 4 AA batteries.If it is used less it can operates over 1 year with extremely small standby current.
  • You can get to know the battery level of Appli with smart phone and when it is low it sends alert to users in real time. Also in the case that the battery is totally run out you can operates it by supplying external 5V to the emergency power.
  • The remote unlocking request of Appli is that the owner allows unlocking after confirming the image of requested person.

 

USE CASES:

  • For security never worry about someone gaining access to your home with a Key you have lost.  Appli will only open for people who are in the stored database.
  • For convivence imagine getting home with a bag of groceries and having to dig in your pocket or purse for a key, or trying to unlock the door with your fingerprint. With Appli face recognition will make the process easy no need to put the bags down.
  • You are away from home and you have a maintenance man coming over for repair.  You can see who is at your door with your phone and allow for entry.

 

Use your face to open door

You can open door without touching the Appli by PIR wakeup function.

 

Unlock by PIN code

You can open by pin code on layout that is arranged randomly.

 

Manual Lock/Unlock

You can control Appli easily by pressing manual lock/unlock button of inside Appli.

 

Logs in Appli

You can review face logs, passcode logs and manager logs in Appli's menu on touch LCD.

 

Mechanical Features

 

Tech specs

Easy Install

The install of Appli is very easy, it need only 6 screws.

 

Long Battery Life

 

Appli Bridge

Appli Bridge has Bluetooth 5.0 and WiFi communication, it connects to cloud service for Appli.

With the Appli Bridge you can have remote access to Appli and review log data for family or visitors at your home from anywhere.

You can even receive smartphone notifications when someone opens your door or some events such as low battery status occur. One bridge can manage up to 4 Applis.

Access Remotely

The Appli app is designed for iOS and Android devices and gives you easy door access and tracking abilities. You can view the access logs in the app for detailed information such as face log data about who has opened your door at what times.

Because Appli and phone is communicated with Bluetooth, you can lock/unlock Appli with phone directly.

You can download Appli app from App Store or Google Play.

 

Why Crowdfunding?

We have developed several series of face recognition door locks on last years.

During producing and sales of products, we noticed there is not existed face recognition deadbolt door lock in the world.

We chose crowdfunding to determine users' needs and marketability for face recognition deadbolt door lock.

We really appreciate your feedback, support and cheer in order to make Appli smart lock a famous door lock in the world.

We sincerely hope that we obtain funds for mass production and manufacturing of Appli through Crowdfunding.

 

Stretch Goals

When funding goal for each item is met, corresponding item will be unlocked.

  • Appli-Z

Appli-Z is Z-Wave version Appli, it will be compatible with most of the products on the market, such as SmartThings, Vera Controller, WinkHub and others.

You will be able to remotely control and manage Appli by using the existing installed Z-Wave controllers.

  • Appli-Kit

Appli-Kit is a hardware and software kit that allows users to create some customized devices using face recognition modules. You can use it to create your own face recognition products, such as face recognition robot.

 

Choose your color

We provide following color option for Appli.

Timeline

 

 

About US

Zhuhai Yisheng Electronics Co., Ltd. is a science & technology-oriented company where R & D, production and sales of biometric technology and intelligent security products are integrated. The company is located in the cutting-edge industrial area of Zhuhai, a beautiful coast city of South China.

The company specializes in technical research and development of biometric products and solutions and its self-developed iris and face recognition algorithms have participated in FRVT2013 and ICIR2013, biometric competitions sponsored by international organizations, and won championship and excellent results respectively.

For more detail information for performance of our face recognition algorithm, you can refer http://english.easen-electron.com/news/gsxw/64.html

Depending on self-owned biometric technologies, it has introduced three product series, which is face recognition intelligent door lock, face recognition time & attendance device and iris recognition time & attendance device as well as provides with intelligent face recognition real-time video analysis system, intelligent face recognition video playback analysis system, AB entrance guard system and face recognition visitors management system.

Our company’s products and solutions can be widely used in many areas like intelligent furniture(intelligent door lock, intelligent safe), time & attendance / access control system, public security, information security, finance, public welfare, education and so on.

For our products, you can refer following URL.

http://www.easen-electron.com/product/

 

Meet Appli Team

The Appli team includes several experienced engineers and product designers.

They developed several face recognition products in last years, Appli will be a famous smart lock in the world within short time by their high skill, rich experience and hard working.

 

FAQ

How many batteries are in the Appli?

Appli uses 4 x AA batteries for power.

How long is battery life?

Appli is powered up to 6,000 times access by 4 x Alkaline AA batteries(2600mAh). That says battery life is up to 1 year on an average use of 15 times access per day. You will also get low battery alert via beeps and notifications in app when the Appli can still be unlocked/locked for 50 times more.

Can the Appli replace the old deadbolt door lock?

Yes, you can simply install Appli in place of the original Deadbolt door lock.

Can I see the information of the people who came in through the door lock?

Yes, you can use the bridge connected to the Appli to see the photos and times of the people coming in through the Appli in real time.

Does the Appli have anti-thief function?

Yes, if the Appli is slightly away from the door by an outside intruder, alarm will sound.

How many users can be registered?

Appli can register up to 50 users.

After an external intruder sees the PIN code input from afar, can he mimic it to open the Appli?

No, Appli's PIN code layout changes randomly every time, so he can’t open the door even if imitated.

How can guest send the door unlock request?

When the screen is turned on by pressing the power button, a phone icon appears on the bottom right of the LCD. If you touch the icon, a request to open a door with your photo will be sent to the phone connected with Appli.

If I am outside and the battery is fully discharged, what can I do to unlock the Appli?

You can use the emergency power connector to power the Appli.

How can I use remote unlock/lock functionality?

This is very simple. You can use your phone to lock/unlock the Appli, even if you are everywhere.

How much is the size of Appli?

Outside is 185.3mm(height) x 74.2mm(width) x 48mm(depth), inside is 160mm(height) x 80mm(width) x 35.5mm(depth).

How long is the warranty of Appli?

1 year

Where can be shipped for Appli?

It is possible for Appli to ship worldwide.

Can I lock/unlock Appli using my phone directly?

Yes, you can directly lock/unlock the Appli by using the app that we provide on the phone with Bluetooth 4.

How are personal data such as user's face data stored and transferred?

Personal data is stored in an encrypted form in the only Appli itself and is not backed up or transmitted to others.
The user's log data is also transferred in encrypted form and only the user with the appropriate privilege can view it. The control by bluetooth is also proceeded safely based on 2-way authentication.

Does the Appli have a battery alert functionality?

Yes, if the Appli is turned on when the battery is below any limit, the “Battery is Low” alarm is displayed on the LCD.

It also sends an alert to phone connected on the Appli through Bridge.

Are iOS and Android app available?

Yes, you can download the apps from App store or Google store.

Does Appli integrate with Apple Home Kit?

No yet. If we are successful on the campaign, this work will be next stage.

Does Appli integrate with Amazon Echo?

No yet. If we are successful on the campaign, this work will be next stage.

Can a person trick Appli with a picture of me?

No. Any picture of a registered host can’t be tricked Appli.

How Secure is personal data in Appli and how does Appli Security respect my privacy? 

Appli stores user’s face data on the device’s internal storage in an encrypted format and does not transfer or store it on the Cloud. No one can get the facial stored data from the Appli’s internal storage and even if someone succeeded to get it, they cannot recover the original facial data from it because of encryption. 

When using Appli, user’s face image thumbnail is transferred to IBM Cloud server as a log and it can be read on the phone by only the authorized and registered user. Furthermore, the resolution of face image thumbnail that is transferred as a log is very small, so it cannot be used as personal information.

Bluetooth connection is established through two ways & two-layer encryption, so an unauthorized phone or device cannot be connected to Appli. Authorized devices can only issue commands such as unlock and lock so the user’s privacy data is protected thoroughly.

During the development process of Appli, we have consulted thoroughly with lawyers in the field of user’s privacy and now we can assure that we never collect or leak out any privacy data.

We will do our best to assure customers that our products are safe.

Appli’s gyroscope detects the closed state of door and will lock it automatically.
The PIR sensor wakes up Appli when you are in front of door automatically which means you don’t have to press the power touch.
The random layout of PIN code prevents others from unlocking the door by stealing a glance at your pattern and trying to mimic it.
You can unlock the door in any part of house with remote unlock functionality.
If someone tries to remove the lock from the door, inside part of Appli sounds the alarm and sends the alert to you.
 Office
If you are the manager of your office you don’t have to concern yourself about the keys. The faces of office members are the keys.

story:
Robots and AI machines are taking their positions in the world. To master the tide we must arm ourselves with programming and engineering skills, even for kids.

 

We want to combine learning process with playing, so that kids can lean coding skills in a more favorable way. This is where Qoopers comes in, it’s easy to build, and a fun robot to play with.

 

 

 

The best armor for a robot is metal! Qoopers has an aluminium made body to endure the hardest bumping or dropping.

 

 

 

Before you start to build, pick your favorite character to begin with! Qoopers has 6 members and each of them has different look and functions! From left to right they are:

  • The Dozer
  • The Li'l Guardian
  • The Cavalier
  • Captain Alloy
  • The Voyager
  • Scorpoid

Li'l Guardian and Aluminium Parts

 

 

 

 

Qoopers has emotions, and apart from the presets, you can define more emotions using the LED Dots Matrix Customizing interface.

 

 

 

 

Relax and just play! The ultrasonic sensor contributes to an obstacle avoiding mode. You're not gonna hurt your Qoopers, or your furnitures.*

 

*Attn: ultrasonic sensors aren't designed to be placed on all official forms, but you can totally add one as you like.

 

 

 

Meet the Robobloq app, the playground for everything about Qoopers:

 

In the app, you can find assembling instructions for each official form. You can control Qoopers to move, play sounds, make faces, or even act to your programs!*

 

*Robobloq app runs on iOS and Android devices.

 

 

 

The Interface

 

The easiest programming environment EVER!

The "My Application" center is a graphical programming environment based on Scratch 3.0. You can not only control Qoopers' actions in sequence, you can also use variables and loop commands to create sophisticated programs. 

 

Full-Body Programmable 

When coding, you can access to Qoopers' motors, LED Panel, RGB lights, Ultrasonic Sensor and its buzzer. You get to decide what route it goes, what face it shows, what sound it makes and how it blinks!

 

 

 

Pick up your Lego blocks and play them the new way! Stack them on Qoopers and make a colorful robot!

 

 

 

Aluminium Construction Platform

Qoopers is an ever-growing platform with an expanding list of components and sensors. With the world around Qoopers growing, there’s endless possibilities of what you can accomplish!

 

We're running out of names...

The Robobloq’s world of electronics is ever-growing. Aluminum parts, sensors...the list of electronic components continues and it’s a great world waiting for you to explore.   

 

Open-Sourced and Arduino Based

Qoopers is based on Arduino and is open-sourced. If you want to modify Qoopers to the core, the door is open.

 

 

 

 

 

 

We’re Robobloq, a Shenzhen-based team of passionate designers and engineers with sheer amount of experiences in smart electronics. We came together in May 2017 and we decided to create exciting robots for kids.

 

 

 

We had the idea of Qoopers since last year. There were already some other teams making programmable robots aiming at kids, but they were either too complicated or unfriendly looking. There’s a balance between functions and design, and we had our own thinking about it.

With the ideas in mind, we dived into the ocean of drafting and simulations, followed by 2 to 3 final designs for 3D printed models. We brought these models to schools, where we had the models exposed to cheerful kids. After we collected adequate amount of feedback, the designing continued and multiple iterations were created.

Qoopers is now ready for production. We've found a production partner and run a small batch trial production. What's shown in the pictures is workers packaging Qoopers.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

When’s shipping?

We’ll start shipping a month after Qoopers is successfully funded. That’s January or February 2018.

 

Who’s Qoopers for?

Kids above 8 years old and beginner robot lovers.

 

Is it safe for kids to play?

Making sure that Qoopers is safe for kids is our priority, and we’ve done a lot of improvements on Qoopers. We recommend that kids under 8 years old should play in their parents’ company.

 

How many forms can Qoopers be?

There are 6 official forms, but there is no limit of customized forms.

 

Is product instruction included?

The product instruction is in the Robobloq app.

 

Does Qoopers come with batteries?

Batteries are not included. Qoopers is powered by six AA batteries and you need to buy them on your own.

 

Can I play Qoopers without phone or iPad?

Qoopers works with iOS or Android devices that has Bluetooth 4.0 and above, and it can also be controlled by PC.

 

What system does the Robobloq app run on?

Android 4.3 and above, iOS 8.0 and above.

 

What language does Robobloq app support?

Now English and Chinese. More languages are on their ways.

 

What certifications does Qoopers have?

Currently it has FCC, CE, Rohs and WEEE. We’re applying for certifications in other countries.

story:
Power Mate

The Power Mate gives you the convenience of 2 USB ports and 2 AC outlets at the edge of your bed or couch.

Never again will you have to crane your body across the room to reach your phone charging at the nearest outlet, or dread getting out of bed to turn the lamp off once you've almost successfully read yourself to sleep.

How often have you gone to lie in bed & finish reading an article, check email or scan facebook only to find your phone is about to die and that alarm you set for work isn’t going to go off. With a Power Mate behind your bed you can simply reach to the edge of your bed and plug in your phone!

The Power Mate sits out of site behind your furniture and at its edge for easy access. Avoid the clutter on your nightstand and floor that other solutions offer and back our campaign today!

 

Bed Defender (BD)

The Bed Defender is a simpler version of the product w/o power that’s solely intended to reduce the risk of bed fires by creating a safe permanent gap between your bed and any wall outlet behind your bed. About 5 mattresses catch fire every day in the US due to these electrical malfunctions. See fire risk details further below.

 

Installation is a Breeze

Simply attach the devices to the bed frame or headboard (or other furniture) with provided hardware and you will have a permanent safe gap to any electrical outlet and great convenience for charging your electronics at your side!

 

 

What makes the Power Mate better than a power strip?   

We're glad you asked! Check out this chart to see how it compares to a regular power strip.

 

 

 

Meet the team

Hello, my name is Anthony Noto, founder of Notable Creations, Inc. I am a mechanical engineer by education and have over 30 years of experience in product development including engineering management, program management, product design and manufacturing. A few years ago I started my own company to create innovative products and bring them to market. This will be my first product launch. See www.dressthenimpress.com for another product I hope to launch next.

On the personal side I have a wife & 3 grown children who are starting families of their own. I love music, spending time with family, the outdoors and am passionate about health & healing. As our product lines grow a large percentage of profits will be donated towards research to advance the most promising healing sciences.

Lauren Romer is our Marketing & Social Media Specialist. She is a recent graduate of NCSU with a degree in Public Relations. Maeve Bell has recently joined us as an intern to help & learn during her 3rd year at NCSU. Lastly, I have several other engineers in the family who will participate & consult in various areas as needed.

 

 

Where will the $40K go?

 

          

Please follow and show us some love on the below platforms! Thank you in advance for helping make this campaign a success.

 

 

Fire Risks

Our devices can help reduce risk for a type of electrical fire that occurs about 5 times every day in the US.

Most people are not aware of the risks in their own home and we would love to raise awareness and help save lives. By contributing to the campaign & using our products you’ll begin to spread awareness of fire safety and directly help to reduce the 43 deaths, 183 injuries & $66M in property damage each year!

      

      

While creating Bed Defender we started noticing news reports of homes catching on fire due to mattresses pressing up against electrical outlets. Check out a few of the most eye opening stories and photos we found!

"When firefighters arrived, they checked the wall to see the extent of fire damage, which was limited to the outlet itself and to the edge of a mattress against the wall. The flames tore through a bed sheet and charred bits of the mattress itself....  [Click for Full Story]    

"While moving out of my last house, I pulled back our guest bed and found that a power cord had left a burn mark right up near the plug and on my mattress.....  [Click for Full Story]

"Investigators say the fire was started by an electrical power cord plugged into the wall. The mattress caught fire when the bed pressed up against the cord and the cord shorted out.....

"Fire investigators determined that the fire started when an electrical outlet in one of the bedroom walls overheated... "It is extremely important to maintain adequate clearance between electrical outlets and combustible materials such as mattresses and bed spreads to prevent fires like this one from happening…" said Fire Marshal....   [Click for Full Story]

"I had an outlet next to my bed once...and didn't know it was a hazard...the cord plugged into the outlet caused the inside wiring to become exposed from the bed constantly bumping into it, the wires touched each other and got hot, my bed caught on fire, no problem right, small fire I was in the room, put out the fire, my mom called the fire department anyways, good thing... I had no idea the stuffing inside the mattress was glowing red hot ready to ignite into a very, very huge fire.....   [Click for Full Story]

"Fire Commissioner Daniel Nigro said, "The fire originated at an air-conditioning unit electrical cord, which was pinched between a bed frame and the wall of Apartment 19B." An FDNY source told the News… [Click for Full Story]

 

We hope you won't be the next story we read about in the news!

Protect yourself and your family with a Bed Defender or Power Mate. 

 

You need a Bed Defender or Power Mate if any of these are true:

  • You have any beds in your home without an attached headboard
  • Your headboards do not provide at least 2.75" of space between your wall and your mattress
  • Your headboard's legs are too close to an outlet with plugs protruding
  • You simply desire a power outlet or USB charger at your bedside
story_txt:
Power MateThe Power Mate gives you the convenience of 2 USB ports and 2 AC outlets at the edge of your bed or couch.Never again will you have to crane your body across the room to reach your phone charging at the nearest outlet, or dread getting out of bed to turn the lamp off once you've almost successfully read yourself to sleep.How often have you gone to lie in bed & finish reading an article, check email or scan facebook only to find your phone is about to die and that alarm you set for work isn’t going to go off. With a Power Mate behind your bed you can simply reach to the edge of your bed and plug in your phone!The Power Mate sits out of site behind your furniture and at its edge for easy access. Avoid the clutter on your nightstand and floor that other solutions offer and back our campaign today! Bed Defender (BD)The Bed Defender is a simpler version of the product w/o power that’s solely intended to reduce the risk of bed fires by creating a safe permanent gap between your bed and any wall outlet behind your bed. About 5 mattresses catch fire every day in the US due to these electrical malfunctions. See fire risk details further below. Installation is a BreezeSimply attach the devices to the bed frame or headboard (or other furniture) with provided hardware and you will have a permanent safe gap to any electrical outlet and great convenience for charging your electronics at your side!  What makes the Power Mate better than a power strip?   We're glad you asked! Check out this chart to see how it compares to a regular power strip.   
Meet the teamHello, my name is Anthony Noto, founder of Notable Creations, Inc. I am a mechanical engineer by education and have over 30 years of experience in product development including engineering management, program management, product design and manufacturing. A few years ago I started my own company to create innovative products and bring them to market. This will be my first product launch. See www.dressthenimpress.com for another product I hope to launch next.On the personal side I have a wife & 3 grown children who are starting families of their own. story:
Huddle up everyone !!!

 

 

Huddle up and claim more space !!!

The world's first eco-friendly plates that cuddle each other, and vertically snap together with ease

No racks. No stands. No cupboards

-----------------------------

What is huddle made of?

 

 

Huddle is made out of 100% plant based materials, It is eco-friendly and do not contain any plastic. This product is an alternative to traditional plastic dishware. To extend the life of our products, we've combined biodegradable bamboo fiber, a highly-renewable natural resource, with corn starch. 

-----------------------------

Some Cool features !!!

 

 

 

 

 

The unique feature of huddle lets you use it anywhere. Be it your kitchen, office cafeteria or outdoor dining. Huddle blends well with any space and looks great everywhere. 

-----------------------------

Secret of huddle

 

If its magnets, why don't the plates repel? Well... that would be the case if the magnets are stationary inside the plates.

 

Our patented arrangement allows the magnets to constantly rotate and align to polarity. Enabling plates to be stuck in any direction.

-----------------------------

Stretch goals

 

 

-----------------------------

The story of Huddle

 

Huddle was created for people with small dining tables and less storage spaces. But now, we are gaining active interest from trekkers and people with caravans and RV's. We never imagined it could be helpful in so many ways.

Please let us know how you would like to use your huddle ...

It took us almost two years and 30 prototypes to develop huddle. The concept may look simple but it took us lot of effort and time to make it this simple. Major part of our effort went in understanding how would a single plate stand on its own. Much later we released, it could if all the plates support each other. Hence the name Huddle !!!

 

-----------------------------

Meet the Creator

 

-----------------------------

Risk and challenges

 

We have spent the past two years completely on perfecting the design of huddle. After numerous rounds of prototyping we're finally at manufacturing doorstep. Our manufacturer and material supplier is secured and we are really confident in the work they do.

Mass manufacturing does have its challenges, but based on our past experience we are completely prepared for high-volume production and confident we can get huddle shipped by Feb 2019 (or sooner !).

With your help, we can kick off production to get huddle to you as quickly as possible. Thank you!

The Huddleware Team

 

-----------------------------

 

FAQ

 

Does huddle break on fall?

No huddle won't break on fall. Bamboo may be a grass, but it has the strength of steel while being lightweight, easy to clean and naturally stain-resistant.

 

Is it dishwasher friendly?

Yes, the plates are dishwasher friendly.

 

Are the plates microwavable?

No the plates are not microwavable. 

 

Are magnets bad for food?

No, magnets don't have any effect on food.

 

Will the magnets attract spoon and fork?

No, Since spoons and forks are made of stainless steel. Stainless steels have very less iron content to be attracted to magnets. 

 

How long does the plate last?

These plates are durable for years.

 

What is the rough weight of each plate?

Each plate would roughly weigh about 220 gms.

 

Is there gap between the plates when arranged vertically?

Yes when arranged vertically there would be a small gap between each plates. This has been provided to enable air circulation and for the water to drain.

 

Will the colored line along the edge fade?

No, The colored line is not a sticker or paint. It is achieved by double injection molding process. Where the colored rim is fused to the white part.

 

Who is responsible for any additional taxes, duties or VAT?

The backer is responsible; please check your country's import duties before purchasing. It should be 0% in the US and varies internationally. 

 

Other questions?

If you didn't find your answer here, contact us at: team@huddleware.com

story:
1. Control the way you want to
  2. User-friendly in-app programming
  3. No more central hub
  4. Convenient, built-in sensors
  5. Easy, affordable alternative to smart systems

 

Apps take time to open up, but turning this lamp off and on with your smart watch doesn’t!

Because of its compact and modern design, CANNY Smartplug will not block adjacent sockets, so you can convert everyday appliances to smart devices without any disruption.

Best of all?  This device is small and precise, featuring all the functionalities and sensors you need to turn your home into a truly smart space!

Function & Beauty Combined

CANNY Smartplug is the smart plug that gives you easy, simple control over all your electronic appliances directly through your smartphone, tablet, smart remote control, or wearable device. Just set up your ideal conditions and then use the sensors however you like. The possibilities are endless, and the decisions are entirely up to you.

Plus, much, much more. You are in control!

              

   

Cutting-Edge Control – Wherever you are, you can turn your devices on and off using our free app for IOS, Android, MAC, or Windows.

Automate Your Household, Automate Your Life – Forget all about switching lights on and off. You can create your own plan and define your sensors however you want them to work for you.

Simple Installation – CANNY Smartplug is easy to set up: you turn the smart plug on, pair the application with it, and set up everything in the CANNY app.

Modern and Effective Design – CANNY Smartplug is compact and intelligently-designed, and it will never block adjacent sockets.

Monitor in Real Time – Can’t remember if you turned an appliance on? Want to change the temperature, monitor movements, or turn something off? You can do so remotely and in real time!

Device Statuses - Find out if there is anybody in the room, what the temperature is, what the moisture level is, and how intense lighting is in the space. You can do all this and more in the CANNY app!

             

 

            

CANNY Smartplug programming does not require deep technical skills. User programming is simple to pick up!

 

Connect CANNY Smartplug into your electrical network, download the application and choose “Add new device,” and after entering your wi-fi network password, just click on the “Pair” button.

Click on “Rules” in the application, select the light sensor, and set up your first condition – value when the plug switches on, then setup the second condition, the lightning level at which it switches off.

After pairing the app with your smartwatch in conditions, choose what the plug should perform when each button is pressed.

In the app, you can set up how the lights should react in case a movement is detected in the room.

Take your TV remote control, pick the unused button, and set up what the plug should perform after pressing the button.

Choose what you want to have displayed on the plug screen (time, date, room temperature, on/off...).

Setup the mutual influence between the two independent devices. Once the first plug switches on, the second one does the same based on the proximity sensor activity.

CANNY Smartplug enables you to control all your devices: coffee machines, jug kettles, lamps, moistening appliances, heaters, irons, TV sets, and more devices, directly via your smartphone, tablet, smartwatch, or even TV remote control.

How was the idea for CANNY born?

All currently existing smart plugs miss advanced features, and we have worked those features into CANNY. We put our heads together and developed plugs unlike anything the market has seen before. Each of us contributed to the project with an original idea, coming up with a plan for what features would enrich CANNY most and make it truly unique. CANNY is the first multifunctional plug to market, and we are ready to set a trend with it!

                    

 

Remote control:

  • To remotely control and monitor the sensors status over the internet
  • Switched off by default, user can enable or disable it in the settings anytime he wishes to
  • Communication to server is encrypted

Cloud:

  • For allowing other users to control your CANNY Smartplug
  • Switched off by default
  • Cloud account to be created in CANNY app does not use any sensitive personal data or any household name (the password is enough)
  • Communication with the cloud is encrypted

Firmware over the air:

  • For updating CANNY Smartplug firmware (new functions, bug fixing, etc.)
  • Switched off by default, user can activate or deactivate it in the settings at any time
  • No personal data to be sent out and in

Our security and privacy morals:

  • We have created our own communication protocol that will prevent unauthorised use of your CANNY Smartplug
  • CANNY Smartplug as well as the app/software neither needs nor receives (processes) nor sends out any user data or any other types of data (such as statistical) that do not directly relate to device control or configuration.
  • In case user does not trust anything connected to the internet, CANNY Smartplug can be used to almost fully within the user’s home wi-fi network, i.e. with no connection to the internet. What is more, after configuration and program setup is made, CANNY Smartplug is able to work in autonomy mode without connection to wi-fi at all.

In the future, we would like to release a full-featured system for intelligent household. We want to achieve this goal by developing other modules. One of them will automate Venetian blinds, and based on the lightning conditions, it will autonomously recognize whether they should be opened or closed.

Decide together with us which direction will CANNY go in from here! Everybody who supports our campaign financially will be given a unique code to vote on the modules or integrations he is interested in. Voting forms will be published after we have fully funded our project!

 

It takes a lot of time and money to do the development work we are doing on CANNY. We will use all the money we raise to continue doing our work, and whatever is left over, we will divert to future improvements on CANNY.

Can’t afford to support us financially? We appreciate you sharing our campaign on any social media platforms you use!

 

We are three young guys from various parts of Slovakia. We have worked in IT for several years, and our work in IT has inspired us to come with this idea. Our goal is to bring something new, simple, attractive, and helpful to consumers worldwide.

1. Is it possible to control one CANNY Smartplug through more devices?

Yes.

2. Which fitness trackers and smartwatches are supported?

  • Xiaomi Mi Band
  • Xiaomi Mi Band 2
  • Pebble
  • Misfit

Plus, we are working on adding more brands as we go.

3. Does CANNY need central hub?

It does not need any additional device, each device is a standalone product and smartphone is only necessary to:

  • first CANNY initialisation
  • configure the conditions (rules)
  • control the device via watchband and at sleep detection

4. Which TV remote controllers are supported?

The most of TV remote controllers.

story:
Keep messages on your desk

Welcome to the next step of messaging. Flushino is a desk notes machine that turns your average texts into a real experience. With features like built-in Wi-Fi, bluetooth and offline queue you will never miss a message, anywhere you will be, at home or at your office. 

Flushino is very easy to use, all you need is a Wi-Fi connection and a socket, then you are ready to start receiving messages. It is the first device of its category, you can use it for a large variety of purposes, from business messages to text your girlfriend.
Keep messages on your desk, the revolution of messaging is coming, are you joining ?

The past in the future

When I thought Flushino, I was inspired from two inventions that belong to the past: the fax and  the voicemail. My intention was to give birth a new way to communicate giving the right emphasis to important messages that often are treated like any other.

I called it Flushino because of the ancient idiom "Panta rhei " that we can translate as "Everything flows", the word flush is used in that sense, the paper flows as the whole thing. The final part "ino" derives from the fact that it is a small device and in Italy we use to put "ino" at the end of the words for tiny objects. 

If you have to tell something to somebody use Flushino! 

Configuration

The configuration of Flushino is very simple, The first step is to teach to Flushino the name of your WiFi network, to do that we have designed a specific application that uses the bluetooth of your phone.

 

This step can be also performed via WPS button that will be added when the production chain will begin. Then you are ready to receive some messages from your friends, colleagues and so on.

Send a message

Flushino works with a telegram bot, in this way send messages is very easy !
Open the Telegram application and look for Flushino bot. Start the bot and specify the address of your Flushino, it is indicated at the rear of your packaging. You have now associated your device with the Flushino bot  the work is done.

Printing Images

Flushino is also able to print images, like emoji and small images. You can print out black & white photos without wasting any ink cartridge because Flushino works with the heat!

Risks & Challenges

I've been modular during the design process, have built and tested the prototype for more than a month, have established a network of partners designing a true timeline, but there are always risks that can delay the process before Flushino gets into your hands.

Technology: The prototype worked very well, however I want to design all in one PCB  for industrialization and unexpected problems may emerge. A WPS button will also be added during the review of the hardware to make the configuration easier.

Production: So far I have produced just two prototypes that I gave to my friend to know their response, when the production chain will start, a bigger series of devices will need some small changes and some risks related to the producers.

Design: We would like to improve the package design for the future models, an idea could be make the box of wood making Flushino looks like a vintage product.

But don’t worry: I will do all the necessary to ensure that Flushino will be a high quality product when it will be shipped.

What We Need & What You Get

I put a lot of effort dealing with the suppliers to keep as low as possible the price of a single Flushino. But that's not all, the crowdfunding campaign price includes also the FCC and CE certifications to guarantee the respect of applicable laws.
But, even if we do not reach the final goal, you will put your hands on Flushino anyway. Your Flushino will be right there on your desk and will work every single day to transform your messaging  experience in the biggest way.

Why you should support

I think the we can innovate our way to communicate, messages will be reality for everyone with Flushino.

Imagine the scene, you are on your sofa reading a book and suddenly you hear Flushino printing a message, so you stand up and run towards your desk to know who is texting you. Maybe is your wife that sends you a recipe for a new cake or maybe is your boss that congrats with you for the good job you did with the last deal.
Using Flushino you will not waste ink as normal printers and you will reduce significantly wastes because a roll of paper can last up to a year with the average of 20 daily messages. Flushino will be the device with the lowest power consumption in your home due to its idle mode.

Thank you so much for joining the Flushino journey and helping us on our mission.

The Impact

    I'm now launching Flushino through Indiegogo to establish a community of early adopters and innovators. With your support we can finalize the development of our technology, produce and ship Flushino to you and take it to the next level. My vision is to introduce new and better devices for smart home that gives the right importance to communication.

    Imagine to tell your wife that you love her, with Flushino your message will be taken into account more than a simple one on a screen. The communication on your Flushino is reserved to a little élite of people that you will choose, this selection process improves the communication between fellows and make them feel closer.

      Timeline

      We are working hard because we would like you to find Flushino inside your Easter egg !

       

      Other Ways You Can Help

      There are other ways you can assist or contribute.

      Endorse me - Share the campaign. Copy & Paste the campaign link above to your: Facebook, Tweet It (Twitter), Pin It (Pinterest), Picture It (Instagram), Blog It (Blogger/WordPress/Tumblr...), or Link It (LinkedIn). Social Media is a key marketing technique and will be a vital factor for the success of this campaign. 
      Tell people to help spread the voice about Flushino!
story_txt:
Keep messages on your desk
Welcome to the next step of messaging. Flushino is a desk notes machine that turns your average texts into a real experience. With features like built-in Wi-Fi, bluetooth and offline queue you will never miss a message, anywhere you will be, at home or at your office. 
Flushino is very easy to use, all you need is a Wi-Fi connection and a socket, then you are ready to start receiving messages. It is the first device of its category, you can use it for a large variety of purposes, from business messages to text your girlfriend.Keep messages on your desk, the revolution of messaging is coming, are you joining ?
The past in the future
When I thought Flushino, I was inspired from two inventions that belong to the past: the fax and  the voicemail. My intention was to give birth a new way to communicate giving the right emphasis to important messages that often are treated like any other.
I called it Flushino because of the ancient idiom "Panta rhei " that we can translate as "Everything flows", the word flush is used in that sense, the paper flows as the whole thing. The final part "ino" derives from the fact that it is a small device and in Italy we use to put "ino" at the end of the words for tiny objects. 
If you have to tell something to somebody use Flushino! 
Configuration
The configuration of Flushino is very simple, The first step is to teach to Flushino the name of your WiFi network, to do that we have designed a specific application that uses the bluetooth of your phone.
 
This step can be also performed via WPS button that will be added when the production chain will begin. Then you are ready to receive some messages from your friends, colleagues and so on.

Send a message
Flushino works with a telegram bot, in this way send messages is very easy !Open the Telegram application and look for Flushino bot. Start the bot and specify the address of your Flushino, it is indicated at the rear of your packaging. You have now associated your device with the Flushino bot  the work is done.

Printing Images
Flushino is also able to print images, like emoji and small images. You can print out black & white photos without wasting any ink cartridge because Flushino works with the heat!

Risks & Challenges
I've been modular during the design process, have built and tested the prototype for more than a month, have established a network of partners designing a true timeline, but there are always risks that can delay the process before Flushino gets into your hands.

But don’t worry: I will do all the necessary to ensure that Flushino will be a high quality product when it will be shipped.

But that's not all, the crowdfunding campaign price includes also the FCC and CE certifications to guarantee the respect of applicable laws.But, even if we do not reach the final goal, you will put your hands on Flushino anyway. Your Flushino will be right there on your desk and will work every single day to transform your messaging  experience in the biggest way.

I think the we can innovate our way to communicate, messages will be reality for everyone with Flushino.
Imagine the scene, you are on your sofa reading a book and suddenly you hear Flushino printing a message, so you stand up and run towards your desk to know who is texting you. Maybe is your wife that sends you a recipe for a new cake or maybe is your boss that congrats with you for the good job you did with the last deal.Using Flushino you will not waste ink as normal printers and you will reduce significantly wastes because a roll of paper can last up to a year with the average of 20 daily messages. Flushino will be the device with the lowest power consumption in your home due to its idle mode.
Thank you so much for joining the Flushino journey and helping us on our mission.
The Impact

I'm now launching Flushino through Indiegogo to establish a community of early adopters and innovators. With your support we can finalize the development of our technology, produce and ship Flushino to you and take it to the next level. My vision is to introduce new and better devices for smart home that gives the right importance to communication.
Imagine to tell your wife that you love her, with Flushino your message will be taken into account more than a simple one on a screen. The communication on your Flushino is reserved to a little élite of people that you will choose, this selection process improves the communication between fellows and make them feel closer.


Timeline
We are working hard because we would like you to find Flushino inside your Easter egg !


 
Other Ways You Can Help
There are other ways you can assist or contribute.
Endorse me - Share the campaign. Copy & Paste the campaign link above to your: Facebook, Tweet It (Twitter), Pin It (Pinterest), Picture It (Instagram), Blog It (Blogger/WordPress/Tumblr...), or Link It (LinkedIn). story:
How it works:

The Connectors- After extensive research and numerous iterations, we have simplified the hardware down to 3 extruded aluminum profiles. The extrusions are cut into 1” sections, surface finished, and clear anodized (with the possibility of colors).

The Boards - We use sustainably harvested, FSC certified (Forest Stewardship Council) furniture grade plywood, laminated with formaldehyde free glue, made by Columbia Forest Products. The plywood is pre-finished with maple or walnut veneers. The boards are made from 15 layers of wood, totaling ¾” thick, making them extremely strong and durable.

The Geometry- We designed the connectors to friction fit with the boards. By inserting a ¾” board into the connector, the aluminum is forced to flex and compress on the neighboring board, further increasing the friction. The properties of the hexagon forms reinforce each other, creating inherently strong structures.

The Benefits:

Tool Free - No more missing allen wrenches and strained relationships. Furniture assembly is hassle free with our easy to use hardware connectors. Simply snug the connectors and boards together

Made to Change - Whether you’re moving to a new place or think your shelf might be better suited as a coffee table, we’ve got you covered. Our furniture is easily reconfigurable to whatever suits your needs. Get creative. 

 High Durability - The solid birch and alder veneer cores result in superior strength and high structural integrity. Similarly, the anodized aluminum connectors allow for constant assembly and disassembly.

The plywood is pre-finished with maple or walnut veneers. The boards are made from 15 layers of wood, totaling ¾” thick, making them extremely strong and durable.The Geometry- We designed the connectors to friction fit with the boards. By inserting a ¾” board into the connector, the aluminum is forced to flex and compress on the neighboring board, further increasing the friction. Furniture assembly is hassle free with our easy to use hardware connectors. Simply snug the connectors and boards togetherMade to Change - Whether you’re moving to a new place or think your shelf might be better suited as a coffee table, we’ve got you covered. Our furniture is easily reconfigurable to whatever suits your needs. Get creative.  High Durability - The solid birch and alder veneer cores result in superior strength and high structural integrity. Similarly, the anodized aluminum connectors allow for constant assembly and disassembly.

story:
What are Sonoff and Slampher?

Sonoff and Slampher are smart WiFi Wireless products which will connect with your home appliances and lights by WiFi, allowing you to remotely turn devices on or off, set timing schedules, check devices status through the APP in your smart phone.Slampher can connect to light bulbs with E27 screw base while Sonoff can connect to various home appliances.

Sonoff and Slampher’s most significant difference from general smart home products is the 433 Mhz Remote Controller. You can control many devices through ONE such a controller indoor, neither smart phones nor WiFi network needed.

How do Sonoff and Slampher work?

Sonoff and Slampher will send data to cloud platform through WiFi Router, they pair with the wifi through the APP, thus you can control all added appliances and lights with your smart phone or tablet. The 433 Mhz receiver inside Sonoff and Slampher supports 433 Mhz devices indoor control.

APP Remote Control

As long as the phone has network(2G/3G/WiFi), you can remotely control all your devices. The APP supports
  - Checking all devices status
- Remotely turn on or off the devices
- Setting maximum 8 timing schedules

How to operate the APP?

- Register and log in
- Add devices(auto-search devices to be configured —select the device to be added—select the wifi to be paired with—configure)
- Control devices(remote turn on/off, set timing schedules, check status, share devices)

3 Ways to control Sonoff and Slampher

You can control your Sonoff and Slampher by 3 ways: by the manual switch, by the 433 Mhz Remote Controller or by the APP. No matter which way you use, the status are synchronous.


How to install Sonoff and Slampher?

To install Slampher, simply switch off the electricity source, screw the light bulb of E27 screw base into Slampher, then screw the Slampher into your original E27 screw light holder.

To install Sonoff, pay attention to the IN and Out mark on Sonoff. 1. Switch off electricity source
2. Open the two yellow shells at both ends
3. Connect the two electricity source cables(Live and Neutral) to the 2 ports with “IN” mark, one cable for one port, and there’s no limitation for which port to connect.
4. Connect the two appliance cables(Live and Neutral) to the 2 ports with “OUT” mark, one cable for one port, and there’s no limitation for which port to connect
5. Cover the shells and screw firmly

Amazon AWS Global Server

All ITEAD smart home products use Amazon AWS Global Server, which is very stable and easy to access. As long as your smart phone has 2G/3G/WiFi network,  you can control all your home appliances in your palm from anywhere at any time.

Perks:

Estimated Delivery

The estimated delivery time is January, 2016. Your parcel will be shipped in registered airmail from HK. It is expected 15-20 days to arrive at your place.

FAQ

Q1.If I control many devices at the same time, will them interfere with each other?

Answer: Each Sonoff or Slampher has a unique configured code, they work independently and will not affect each other.

Q2. How many devices can one 433 Mhz remote controller control? Will the 433 Mhz remote contr ollers mutual interfere if we use many at the same time?

Answer: Generally, one 433 Mhz controller can control 4 devices.The 433 Mhz controllers will not interfere with each other. They work individually.

Q3. When a power failure happens and later power on again, will the appliances work automatica lly?

Answer: Sonoff and Slampher will automatically work again if you don’t switch off the electricity. There is a switch button on Sonoff and Slampher, which supports manually turn on/off. 

Q4. Can the signal of 433 Mhz remote controller pass the wall？

Answer: Yes, of course. You can control your devices with 433 Mhz remote controller within your house.

Q5. Can I control all my devices through the APP without wifi access?

Answer: You need to ensure your house has wifi to connect with Sonoff and Slampher. As long as your mobile phone has 2G/3G/WiFi network, you can log in your the APP to control all your devices.

Q6. Are Sonoff and Slampher suitable for American or European voltage?

Answer: Yes, Sonoff supports voltage range 90-250V, current 10A; Slampher supports voltage range 90-265V, current <2A.

story:
What is iRulez

An IP based automation system with a central web portal.
Since it is completely based on opensource components, it is a cheap yet versatile system with a rich feature set.
The web portal allows you to create all the default features, available in the well-known commercial home automation systems.
In addition iRulez offers following features:

  • Integration in Telegram, so no need of a simbox or a payable service
  • Owntracks, use your smartphone as a location service to trigger programmable actions

You don’t need expensive switches to make it work, even for a dimmer.

iRulez is very attractive when you want to integrate AUDIO in your home automation. This part becomes very expensive when using commercial systems.

Since it is completely IP based, the system can interoperate between different sites, as long as they IP connectivity.

iRulez is an open modular system which makes it easy to write additional features available for everybody.

More info on www.iRulez.be

What We Need

At this point we already have a fully operational home automation system, already active in a small install base.
Until now we used a handmade prototype for our installations. With this crowdfunding we want to move our product to the next level. A smaller, optimized "plug & play" product so it will be possible to install it in the electrical cabinet of every house.
We also want to document everything, so developers can make their own extensions on this platform.

What You Get

Depending on the purchase backers receive all the information and software needed to easely install the home automation system. Every hardware component sent will be assembled and tested. The iRulez dev-team is also available on different channels to provide support.
