story:
Are you ready to fly with AIR BALLOON ?

“AIR BALLOON” is an evaporative type humidifier that was developed in order to alleviate dryness in our modern living environments. By using a natural evaporation technique, the water holding compartment of the humidifier can be detached completely, enabling easy washing and a safe solution to sanitation problems. As existing natural humidifier models' slow evaporation and lack of humidification presented a problem, an air circulation fan that promotes faster evaporation was attached.

Conventional humidifiers (ultrasonic, vaporizer) produce water droplets artificially, and droplets that are formed in this manner contain germs and bacteria from the water reservoir that will be released into the air. Conversely, AIR BALLOON produces water droplets naturally, and the droplets are free of germs or bacteria, replenishing moisture to our environment safely and hygienically.

AIR BALLOON is compact, stylish, and has built in LED lights that can be controlled using a remote controller. With a built in battery, it is compact and portable, and can be used in any location. The humidifier is also equipped with a hygrometer to check the humidity of the user environment.

AIR BALLOON’s fan speed can also be adjusted, and when the fan is turned off, AIR BALLOON can function as a regular evaporative type humidifier (for quiet operation - ideal for nighttime use).

  

Germ Free & Rapid Humidification 

 

Natural humidity control by relative humidity

Maintaining the optimum humidity 

In contrast to an ultrasonic / vaporization type humidifier, which has the side effect of excessively increasing the humidity, the evaporative humidifier works relatively to the humidity of its setting, allowing it to maintain a natural level of humidity.

 

Moisture particles size comparison

Solutions to concerns about bacterial growth and internal pollution release

Conventional ultrasonic methods produce moisture particles artificially, which makes the moisture particles large (1 ~ 5㎛). Internal pollutants (from the water reservoir) and air pollutants can easily bind to the moisture particles, generating the problem of contamination and release of fine dust particles into the air.

On the other hand, because AIR BALLOON is an evaporative humidifier, the size of the moisture particles it generates is closer to that of those found in nature (< 0.01㎛) which is smaller than the bacteria that may form in the water reservoirs. This eliminates the problem of bacteria binding to the moisture particles.

 

"Consumer Reports recommends evaporative humidifiers"

Consumer reports tested three types of humidifiers - evaporative, ultrasonic, and vaporizer - to see if they would release bacteria into the air. Of the 34 humidifiers tested, they found that the evaporative models produced bacteria-free water droplets.

 

“Air - accelerated Natural Humidifier”

  

Step 1:   Water gets absorbed into the felt

Step 2:   Fan circulates air

Step 3:   Air is filtered through the filter

Step 4:   Water evaporates

Step 5:   Humidification proceeds  

 

  • Size – Main body (Base) : 114*114*125 (WDH)
  • Humidification part (Upper) : D150 * H200
  • Humidification Rate : 200ml/h
  • Fan : 30CFM / 2000RPM (Max)
  • Battery Capacity : 4 Hours
  • Filter : Pre-Filter
  • Power : USB (Micro USB)
  • Water Capacity  : 250cc
  • Noise : 0~30dB

 

1) Take out the water bucket from the humidifier main unit

2) Fill the bucket with water

3) Put back the water bucket to the main unit

4) Place the evaporation unit in the bucket

5) Touch the power button

6) AIR BALLOON turns on and the internal fans operate to accelerate humidification

 

AIR BALLOON : Air accelerated, Natural Humidifier

 

 

The Evaporation Unit

AIR BALLOON is a natural evaporative type humidifier. The felt evaporation unit absorbs water from the tank using the capillary method and evaporates it into the air. The felt used in AIR BALLOON is made of safe material that even children use as learning aids in the classroom.

1. Honeycomb Type

2. DIY Kit: Templates for various designs of the evaporation unit and materials

 

HYGROMETER

AIR BALLOON has a built-in hygrometer that displays visually the humidity of your environment

 

BUILT IN FILTER

AIR BALLOON provides fresh, clean air to its user by filtering the air twice before it is released. The incoming air is first screened by a filter that is installed in the air inlet of the base, and it is filtered again as it passes through the felt at the upper part of the humidifier

 

RECHARGEABLE BATTERY & PORTABILITY

Equipped with a rechargeable battery, AIR BALLOON can be used for 4 hours at full charge without needing to be connected to a power source.

 

Easy to clean and maintain

AIR BALLOON has an open water bucket structure that is detachable, so it is easy to replace the water and clean the tank. This ensures that water will not become stagnant and rot inside of the humidifier body, making the device more hygienic.

 

MOOD LAMP

AIR BALLOON is equipped with LED lights of various colors, so it can be used as a mood lamp or a night light in addition to serving as a humidifier. The LED can be turned on and off independently of the humidifier.

 

INTERIOR ITEM

Using a hot-air balloon as a motif, AIR BALLOON has been designed to be modern and simple, providing emotional and aesthetic satisfaction in addition to benefiting the user’s health.

Completed with a unique shape, color and a harmonious design of the humidifier body, AIR BALLOON has been designed to function as an art object in your indoor environment.

The mood lamp function of the LED lights makes your living space even more beautiful.

AROMA DIFFUSER

When aroma oil is added to the water in the tank, wind from the circulation fan immediately evaporates the oil along with the water, filling the room with fragrance.

 

Natural Humidifier

When turned off, AIR BALLOON can be used as a conventional natural evaporative humidifier without noise.

 

 

 

 

 

The costs of tooling up for production are high, so we need to secure pre-orders before we can start production.  By pre-ordering a Air-Balloon, you are helping to make the AIR BALLOON become a reality.  Your pre-order dollars or donation

pledge go towards:

Injection mold production

Parts production

Felt production

Safety test and performance certification

Production and assembly

 

We want to be certain that the humidifier we deliver lives up to your expectations. We’ve tested our prototype over many months and have made many small refinements. We put in a lot of effort to maintain the highest quality for the right price, and strived to achieve the best in all fields. There are always challenges that arise when creating and manufacturing a brand new product, as we are often entering an unknown territory. We are confident that we have already worked through the hardships of the manufacturing process, and do not expect to find any challenges that can’t be overcome.

 

 

 

CodiBM is a company that has an integrated product planning capacity composed of experts in patent, design and product development. It operates in a system that is optimized for the needs of customers by putting experts in the right places using various external professional organizations and a system of collaboration.

A donation of even the smallest amount can go a very long way as it's not just you that's donating. Any small donation would be hugely appreciated as every bit counts and will help get my invention to market around the globe. If you just can't contribute right now, or you have but want to help out more, please share our campaign using the social media share buttons, and best of all, help out by 'liking' us on Facebook and tagging all your friends that might be interested in AIR BALLOON.

 

Can I exchange the batteries?

No. You cannot exchange the rechargeable batteries.

It is for safety reasons that the batteries are not exchangeable

Can I replace the evaporation part of the humidifier with my favorite material (felt, etc.)?

Yes! You can use the templates that are provided in the DIY customization kit to create your own evaporation unit.

Any water-absorbing material can be used to make an evaporation unit suited to your taste.

Is AIR BALLOON effective to use in all room sizes?

AIR BALLOON can be used in all room sizes, but we recommend using AIR BALLOON at about 30 square meter room for optimized performance.

Is it possible to operate Air-balloon without power line?

Yes, it has rechargeable batteries.

Is it possible to operate Air-balloon without power?

Yes, when the device is not turned on or not connected to a power source, you can still use AIR BALLOON’s natural evaporation function.

You may turn off the fan during nighttime (while sleeping ).

Is not the size of the water bucket too small?

Since bacteria can multiply quickly inside of a water tank, it is a good idea to replace the water two or three times a day. That way, you can reduce the chance of bacteria multiplying.

Is the felt in AIR BALLOON safe?

Absolutely! The felt in AIR BALLOON is made of safe material that is even used as learning aids for children.

Is it safe to keep AIR BALLOON plugged in?

It is perfectly safe to keep your AIR BALLOON device plugged in at all times.

It has been tested many times.

Will I be able to get a new evaporation part after the campaign ends?

Absolutely, various types of evaporation parts will be on sale when the campaign is over.

Does shipping cost include taxes?

Unfortunately, taxes vary from country to country and the IndieGoGo platform doesn't allow to us charge them. So please take into consideration tax payment rules according to import laws of your country when making your contribution.

Where do you produce AIR BALLOON?

We cooperate with companies that have expertise in manufacturing of consumer electronics to ensure the highest quality. Their production facilities are located in South Korea which is renowned for production of high-end consumer electronics.
story_txt:
Are you ready to fly with AIR BALLOON ?“AIR BALLOON” is an evaporative type humidifier that was developed in order to alleviate dryness in our modern living environments. By using a natural evaporation technique, the water holding compartment of the humidifier can be detached completely, enabling easy washing and a safe solution to sanitation problems. As existing natural humidifier models' slow evaporation and lack of humidification presented a problem, an air circulation fan that promotes faster evaporation was attached.Conventional humidifiers (ultrasonic, vaporizer) produce water droplets artificially, and droplets that are formed in this manner contain germs and bacteria from the water reservoir that will be released into the air. Conversely, AIR BALLOON produces water droplets naturally, and the droplets are free of germs or bacteria, replenishing moisture to our environment safely and hygienically.AIR BALLOON is compact, stylish, and has built in LED lights that can be controlled using a remote controller. With a built in battery, it is compact and portable, and can be used in any location. The humidifier is also equipped with a hygrometer to check the humidity of the user environment.AIR BALLOON’s fan speed can also be adjusted, and when the fan is turned off, AIR BALLOON can function as a regular evaporative type humidifier (for quiet operation - ideal for nighttime use).  Germ Free & Rapid Humidification  Natural humidity control by relative humidityMaintaining the optimum humidity In contrast to an ultrasonic / vaporization type humidifier, which has the side effect of excessively increasing the humidity, the evaporative humidifier works relatively to the humidity of its setting, allowing it to maintain a natural level of humidity. Moisture particles size comparisonSolutions to concerns about bacterial growth and internal pollution releaseConventional ultrasonic methods produce moisture particles artificially, which makes the moisture particles large (1 ~ 5㎛). Internal pollutants (from the water reservoir) and air pollutants can easily bind to the moisture particles, generating the problem of contamination and release of fine dust particles into the air.On the other hand, because AIR BALLOON is an evaporative humidifier, the size of the moisture particles it generates is closer to that of those found in nature (< 0.01㎛) which is smaller than the bacteria that may form in the water reservoirs. This eliminates the problem of bacteria binding to the moisture particles. "Consumer Reports recommends evaporative humidifiers"Consumer reports tested three types of humidifiers - evaporative, ultrasonic, and vaporizer - to see if they would release bacteria into the air. Of the 34 humidifiers tested, they found that the evaporative models produced bacteria-free water droplets. “Air - accelerated Natural Humidifier”   
Step 1:   Water gets absorbed into the feltStep 2:   Fan circulates airStep 3:   Air is filtered through the filterStep 4:   Water evaporatesStep 5:   Humidification proceeds   
Size – Main body (Base) : 114*114*125 (WDH)
Humidification part (Upper) : D150 * H200
Humidification Rate : 200ml/h
Fan : 30CFM / 2000RPM (Max)
Battery Capacity : 4 Hours
Filter : Pre-Filter
Power : USB (Micro USB)
Water Capacity  : 250cc
Noise : 0~30dB
 1) Take out the water bucket from the humidifier main unit2) Fill the bucket with water3) Put back the water bucket to the main unit4) Place the evaporation unit in the bucket5) Touch the power button6) AIR BALLOON turns on and the internal fans operate to accelerate humidification AIR BALLOON : Air accelerated, Natural Humidifier  The Evaporation UnitAIR BALLOON is a natural evaporative type humidifier. The felt evaporation unit absorbs water from the tank using the capillary method and evaporates it into the air. The felt used in AIR BALLOON is made of safe material that even children use as learning aids in the classroom.1. Honeycomb Type2. DIY Kit: Templates for various designs of the evaporation unit and materials HYGROMETERAIR BALLOON has a built-in hygrometer that displays visually the humidity of your environment BUILT IN FILTERAIR BALLOON provides fresh, clean air to its user by filtering the air twice before it is released. The incoming air is first screened by a filter that is installed in the air inlet of the base, and it is filtered again as it passes through the felt at the upper part of the humidifier RECHARGEABLE BATTERY & PORTABILITYEquipped with a rechargeable battery, AIR BALLOON can be used for 4 hours at full charge without needing to be connected to a power source. Easy to clean and maintainAIR BALLOON has an open water bucket structure that is detachable, so it is easy to replace the water and clean the tank. This ensures that water will not become stagnant and rot inside of the humidifier body, making the device more hygienic. MOOD LAMPAIR BALLOON is equipped with LED lights of various colors, so it can be used as a mood lamp or a night light in addition to serving as a humidifier. We put in a lot of effort to maintain the highest quality for the right price, and strived to achieve the best in all fields. There are always challenges that arise when creating and manufacturing a brand new product, as we are often entering an unknown territory. story:
Introducing 2cha

The Smartest Lamp in the World

 

2cha is the most unique lamp in the world. It is an interactive lamp with a powerful speaker system so you can play any music you like via any Bluetooth compatible device. It has 9 pre-made light effects that moves to the beat of your music. With built-in text-to-speech system, 2cha can even become your smart home assistant. What more can you ask from a smart modern lamp.

Professional sculptors from Kiev Central House of Artists create the 100% handmade outer layer. With Bluetooth connection to any device and smart home system integration, 2cha becomes not just any other lamp, but an essential part of any smart  home or office.

 

 

 

Features

 

Create the Perfect Mood for Any Situation

Direct light can sometimes be too bright and can create unpleasant glare. Indirect light can create a very pleasant ambiance. 2cha is the first lamp to easily change any room to get indirect light with different colors to choose from. 

 

Control 2cha with Your Device

Connect 2cha with your smartphone via Bluetooth so you can control it to play music, create light effects, wake you up in the morning, and more. No need to look for the light switches just to turn the lights on. 

 

Get Things Done with Alexa, Siri, or Google

    Today smart lamp can become not only source of light, but interaction point of your smart home system. 2cha will become not only your favorite lamp, but move your interaction with your home entertainment and productivity to a whole new level. Seamlessly connect 2cha with your smart home devices or assistant for a more personalized experience.

 

Fun and Unique Light Effects

2cha has 9 pre-made light effects that move to the beat of your music. But if you're feeling creative, you can also create your own effects by controlling each of the 156 LED lights using the mobile app. This brings you not only music, video, or gaming experience to a whole new level, but also allows you to perform any light effects limited only by your imagination.

 

 

 

Durable and Easy to Maintain

    We thought through every detail so each cloud shade is made of hypoallergenic non woven fabric which can be removed as pouch and cleaned using a hand vacuum or washed by hand with warm water. In addition, 2cha has 4 rubber pads to protect your furniture from scratches. 

 

2cha Mobile App

Connect to any Android or iOS device with the free mobile app. Control the intensity of the light, the color, or even create your own light effects using your iPhone or Android device via Bluetooth. With the app, you can even connect to other smart home device and assistants such as Google, Alexa, or Siri. The mobile app also allows you to upgrade firmware and develop new functions and light effects.

 

Each 2cha is Unique

We enlist the help of real sculptors from Kiev CENTRAL HOUSE OF ARTISTS so each 2cha will be 100% handmade (outer layer) and absolutely unique. With its unique design, 2cha can become an essential part of any room, from your living room to your office. Since each cloud is hand-made and unique in size, dimensions may vary.

 

Tech Specs

MEASUREMENTS

  • Dimensions: 23 x 19 x 9
  • Weight: 2 lbs (0.9 kg)

MATERIALS

  • Non woven hypoallergenic fabric outer layer
  • Matte aluminum stand
  • Soft touch base
  • Rubber padding

ELECTRONICS

  • 156 low energy RGB LED 
  • 2,700 lumens of maximum brightness
  • 16 million colors of light
  • 2 x 5w high quality speaker system
  • Bluetooth module
  • 60w PSU

MOBILE APP

  • Smart alarm function
  • 9 pre-installed light effects
  • Compatible with Alexa, Siri, Google, and TTS
  • LED light control

WIRELESS CONNECTIVITY

  • Bluetooth Supported
  • iOS and Android

 




 

Timeline

 

About the Team

We run an engineering business providing services for smart home automation. In our work, we face different task concerning home automation and internet of things, and one of them is smart light solutions.

The idea of 2cha came to me when my daughter was born. Everyone who had newborn in their house know that you get up from three to eight times every night. Every time person who gets up turns on the light, and it is hard to sleep when light is shining in your eyes. So I decided to create a smart lamp that can create pleasant indirect light that my daughter will also love.

 

FAQ

PRODUCT

Does it come with a light bulb?
Yes. 2cha comes with 156 LEDs. 

How long does the bulb last? 
The RGB LED bulbs are known for low energy consumption and for being long-lasting. The bulbs have a lifespan of 20,000 to 50,000 hours or from 2 to 5 years of uninterrupted light.

How warm does the 2cha get? 
The warmth of 2cha lamp depends on usage (color, brightness). 2cha is substantially cooler than standard LED bulb because the LED's are farther apart from each other (to make light effects happen), so you don’t need to worry about it becoming too hot to touch. 

Does 2cha use more power than a traditional light bulb?
2cha can give a lot of light when fully lit up to 2700 lumens of light which does of course cost power. When compared to a traditional light bulb that gives the same amount of light as the 2cha, it uses 85% less power. In maximum brightness mode it uses up to 60w.

Does the 2cha lamp replace my standard light in the room?
We didn't develop 2cha as a main source of light in the room so we do not recommend to use it as your only source of light. Although it can give enough light for small rooms.

How do you integrate with home automation systems (Siri, Google Home, Alexa, etc.)?
2cha can seamlessly connect to any device via Bluetooth so you can choose your desired light effects through the 2cha app, and also connect 2cha to your smart device to use as speaker system.

Will custom smart home system integrate with 2cha?
There are a lot of Intelligent Home Concept systems out there. If system is able to use Bluetooth speaker, you will be able to connect 2cha to it.

What material is the outer layer made of?
The outer layer is made of hypoallergenic non-woven material. This kind of material is used in winter clothes to retain heat.

Will it work with the power that is available in my country?
Yes, we use a switch mode PSU that goes from 100-240VAC / 50-60Hz. This covers most of the world, of course including EU, US, Canada, UK, and Australia.

What is length of the 2cha cable?
120cm.

Does 2cha collect dust?
Just like any other furniture, it can collect dust depending on the amount of dust in the room. But to make it easier to clean and maintain, we made the outer layer as pouch so you can simply take it off to clean by hand with warm water and soap. 

How should I clean 2cha?
The outer layer is detachable and can be washed with warm water. All other parts can be cleaned with microfiber and water.

What is base is made off?
Base will be made of plastic with soft touch coating. On photos you can see base from wood (we used that in prototype). 

Does it make any noise? 
Unless you play any music or sounds it won't make a sound at all. 

How do I switch the lamp on and off?
The lamp has an on/off switch just like any other lamp but you can also use the 2cha Mobile App and do it directly from your smartphone.

Is it safe to install in my children's bedroom?
2cha is definitely safe for your child, but we can’t guarantee that kids wouldn't want to paint 2cha or decorate it with some stars. 

COMPANY

Why did you call it 2cha?
In Ukrainian language, where we are from, 2cha (túča) means "clouds". 

Why did it take 1 year to make 2cha? 
Although the result might look simple its took a lot of time and effort to understand the right amount of LEDs and their positioning, and we started with just a cloud shape lamp, but now 2cha is far more than just a lamp.

Why did you choose the shape of a cloud as the shade?
We wanted to create a pleasant dim light in any room like natural evening light that comes through some clouds in the sky - that was when we got the idea. 

What changes are you planning on doing to the hardware part?
All visual material in the campaign is done with our prototype. We used some simplifying with the base (we carved base out of wood, and use external PSU). In the final product model, PSU will be inside the base and covered with protection plastic with soft touch layer.
Also every 2cha will be hand made, so it can be slightly different from one to another but our sculptor Natalia will help us to reach the premium level quality we are aiming for in every piece. 

SHIPPING

Do you ship worldwide?
Yes we ship worldwide. Select a perk and enter your shipping address to see the shipping cost for your location. 

Is the shipping fee included?
No. The shipping fee is not included in the perks and will be applied at check out.

How long will be the shipping transit time?
After shipping your perk, it could take 1 to 5 weeks, depending on the location.

I'm a business owner and would like to sell 2cha in my store.
Contact us at 2cha.lamp@gmail.com.

My question isn't listed here, what should I do?
Send it to us at 2cha.lamp@gmail.com.

 

Don't Forget to Share with Friends

 

Thank you for check our campaign out!

story:
We are WHYSgiving, a dedicated and passionate team of 5, aiming to change the way businesses interact with consumers and charities alike. We wondered how much a business could influence the world if it directed significant profits toward social good rather than into the pockets of investors. We realized the answer is A LOT!

That’s the reason we created WHYSgiving!

In fact, it is our mission to provide meaningful consumer experiences and unlimited funding for our sponsored charities. How do we do this? Through a global consumer platform supporting charitable work around the world above all else.

So how are we going to accomplish all this?

Through campaigns just like this one. You are getting in on the ground floor to something revolutionizing the way the business world works (thanks for being a trailblazer). 

It all starts with WHYSgiving creating high quality, designer-style products that are cleanly sourced, environmentally friendly and just all-round awesome. We then use eCommerce platforms like this one to provide amazing people like you with the opportunity to buy these designer products at a fraction of the cost.

 

 

You still with us? We hope so because this is where it gets really exciting. 

From here, we allocate 50% of our profits to carefully screened charities (more on how we screen them below, but trust us when we tell you it’s a pretty incredible system). These charities are making a positive difference on the ground, so our goal is to create a permanent and unlimited funding source for them, ensuring they always have funds to continue making the world a better place.

As you may have guessed by now, our first product (and cause) are designer throw blankets, in which 50% of our profits will go to help organizations that are fighting human trafficking.

Human trafficking is a $150 billion global industry selling both adults and children into forced labor and sex work. It is one of the ugliest things in the world today and many of us don’t realize it is happening to people all around us. It could be happening to our neighbors, friends, or even family. If you would like a little more information about the dangers of human trafficking and what you can do to help prevent it, check out our video below:

 

In order to make a positive difference, we need to raise at least $30,000 to manufacture and distribute our designer throw blankets. WHYSgiving pledges to give 50% of profits from the sale of these throw blankets to anti-trafficking charities that prevent, rescue, or rehabilitate victims of human trafficking. 

Our designer throws are made from 100% cotton, making them environmentally friendly and incredibly soft. They come in various styles, sizes, and colors—the perfect addition to any home. We will ship these designer throws worldwide!

Here are the details of our first two throws coming to market:

 

Criss-Cross Designer Throw

Our first designer throw is lightweight and absolutely perfect as that last layer of warmth. Ideal for a chilly winter night by the fire, yet breathable enough to be used as a light layer of protection against a strong summer breeze.

These Criss-Cross designer throws are 60" x 50" in size, are made from 100% cotton, and come in three stylish colors:

Pink and Grey

 

Blue and Grey

 

Yellow and Grey

No matter which color you choose, you can feel confident in the knowledge it will enhance the furniture and color scheme of any room.  

 

Large Plush Throw For Two

The large plush throw for two comes in yellow and has a soft, thick white backing for an extra layer of comfort. This larger, thicker throw blanket is 68" x 60" in size and is made from 100% cotton, so you know it will be soft, warm and extremely comfortable. 

Our second designer throw is warmer and more plush. We made it with one goal in mind—to keep you warm! Whether you want to snuggle up to watch a movie with your partner, or stay warm as you read a book on the front porch, this plush designer throw is perfect for any occasion. 

We wanted to give everyone an opportunity to get the blankets of their choice, which is why we created several different perks for this campaign. 

We decided to break up the perks into Early EARLY Bird, Early Bird Special and INDIEGOGO Special. The only difference between the three perk types is the cost.

For each perk type you have the opportunity to purchase the Criss-Cross Designer Throws (any of the 3 colors), the Large Plush Throw for Two, or a special combo package which includes 1 Criss-Cross Designer Throw and the Large Plush Throw for Two - this is a popular choice as you get the best of both worlds and save even more money!

The last perk is for anyone wanting to support their own cause. This perk will let you purchase 125 of our designer throw blankets (either style or color) that you can donate to a cause or charity of your choice...or you can just build an incredible blanket fort…the possibilities are endless.

Please note that there are limited quantities for the Early EARLY Bird, Early Bird Specials and Support Your Own Cause perks.

Buying from WHYSgiving rather than other online or luxury stores, means you’re making a difference in the world! 

WHYhelp? WHYcare? WHYact? - WHYnot? 

Helping us jumpstart WHYSgiving will ensure that the fight against human trafficking will be the first of many causes WHYSgiving and its consumers will stand behind! 

Grab an early bird special today, and together with the high impact charities we fund, we can make REAL CHANGE in our world! On behalf of our entire team and the high impact charities we support, we THANK YOU for making a difference with WHYSgiving. 

Regardless of the type or quantity of throw blankets you order, they will all be shipped at the beginning of November—just in time for the holidays anywhere in the world, if you wanted to get your shopping done a little early. 

We will not be shipping out in stages. In early November, we will have all throw blankets ready to go and shipped, so you can be sure to have it just in time for those chilly winter months. 

Our biggest challenge is making sure that our supply chain stays clean from the moment the fabric is sourced to the moment our product hits your doorstep. We take this very seriously and employ the highest standards to ensure a clean sourcing chain.

While we have run our factories through a rigorous testing period, the need to stay on top of this issue is important to us and to our customers.

Are you feeling as passionate as we are about ending human trafficking? Getting the word out and sharing this INDIEGOGO campaign on your social networks would be a huge step in the right direction.

We would be forever grateful for any support you can provide as we work towards ending human trafficking whilst pioneering a better business model. Thank you for all of your help!


Why is WHYSgiving doing this?

We recognize that charities need funding help to make a greater impact with their work. We realize that by working together, we can create much more positive change. Governments cannot fix our problems. People have to work together to make a real difference. 

We wondered how much a business could influence the world if it directed significant profits toward social good rather than into the pockets of investors. We realized the answer is A LOT! That’s the reason we created WHYSgiving. 

 

Are the throw blankets cleanly sourced?

We do our best to ensure that our supply chain creates our products with the highest ethical standards (no underpaid workers, no underage workers, no overworked employees), in line with the fight against human trafficking. 

Our manufacturers have passed in-country and international supply chain standards, allowing them to not only work with us, but also with other significant businesses like a well known global entertainment franchise and a national sports league.

 

How do I know the money is truly going to high impact charities?

Charitable organizations and nonprofits are assessed using the WHYSgiving Impact Score (WISe). WISe analyzes each facet of every potential sponsored organization’s operations by evaluating Program Efficiency, Compliance and Reporting, Financial Responsibility, Operational Expense Profile, Fundraising Efficiency, Fiscal Health, Revenue Profile, Net Assets and Institutional Endowment, and Self-Sufficiency. 

50% of WHYSgiving’s profits are disbursed quarterly to sustain our sponsored organizations‘ work. We also routinely monitor our sponsored organizations‘ operations to ensure they can remain qualified under the WISe standard.

 

Will there be other products?

Yes.

We plan to periodically add products to support the end of human trafficking, and other charitable causes.

story:
The purpose of our campaign is to raise funds to initiate global and broad production of our craftsmanship.  And of course, we are committed to produce the best quality products we can!

Introducing The Radiance

Art relics (painted ceramics) shed light on the mystery of ancient civilizations, and delivering the spirit of the past, therefore we call our campaign the Radiance.

Our product can be used as a complement to your kitchen arsenal and/or a refined detail of your home/office interior.

Design

Our unique plates are made of quality materials, such as, porcelain and ceramics. The materials we use allows you to enjoy the taste of food and drinks without fear for health. After all, it does not contain dangerous and harmful chemical impurities, and is absolutely harmless. Each drawing is applied with special inspiration and diligence.

At this stage we propose 3 different styles:

1 - Stella

2- Luna

3- Sol

In near future, if the campaign is successful we are planning to increase variety of products. 

 

Delivery  

Once our campaign goal has been reached, we will immediately place the materials and process production. Our goal is to start delivery in November-December 2017.

We will ship through DHL, worldwide known courier.  Backers can trace their order through DHL online system.

Thanks for you support...!

story:
• Tunnel Rat Technology is a small start-up organization whose objective is to make everyday tasks easier and more cost effective.
  • This campaign will help build a business that is pet friendly, helps by donating a percentage of profits to help homeless pets and will give discounts to 4H Club members.
  • The Whizz Washer line enhances both our customers and their pets’ lives.
  • A percentage of the profits will be donated yearly to highly rated Charity Watch pet/animal welfare organizations.
  • Your contributions enable our organization to get Whizz Washer to market, as well as grow and diversify our efforts to animals live a better life with your help
  • We want to make more products that make washing quicker, easier and less expensive and an all around better experience for our furry friends.
story_txt:
Tunnel Rat Technology is a small start-up organization whose objective is to make everyday tasks easier and more cost effective.
This campaign will help build a business that is pet friendly, helps by donating a percentage of profits to help homeless pets and will give discounts to 4H Club members.
The Whizz Washer line enhances both our customers and their pets’ lives.
A percentage of the profits will be donated yearly to highly rated Charity Watch pet/animal welfare organizations.
Your contributions enable our organization to get Whizz Washer to market, as well as grow and diversify our efforts to animals live a better life with your help
We want to make more products that make washing quicker, easier and less expensive and an all around better experience for our furry friends.

story:
Dimensions: 1,14m lenght (3.74ft)  1,70m height (5.58ft)  0,60m width (1.97ft)

My fish, my vegetables and I

  Hi, my name is João Pedro Pimenta and I'm an 18-year-old Portuguese that loves everything the world has to offer. In 2017 I was admited to medical school, but decided to leave after two months to follow some of my deeper passions: I want to become a writter, so I ended my first book and I'm starting the second of many who are to come (unfurtunatly, it's not published yet); I dream of being a flamenco guitar player, therefour, I'm compousing my inicial pieces and, the most important part of this campaing is that I have the urge to create a brand that incorporates what I thing a company should be. I want to build products that solve some of the world's problems by giving power to the people, never doing that at the expense of the environment or other human beings and helping, with the profits, to develop the arts, the sciences, the world and those in need. As a vegetarian, I really like to think about what I put in my mouth. «You are what you eat», we all know that, but to many times we end up filling our bodies with unwanted chemicals that are just there for things to grow larger and faster, not being able to do anything because we lack the soil to plant on. «What if I could have a garden in my apartment that gave me all I need without it being ugly and filling up to much space?», this is what I thought when I came up with this idea, and, as I learn more and more about the topic, I'm starting to believe even further in this technology.

  This project, for me, is more than just a dream: is a neurosis, something I cannot not do. I think about this every day, always trying to put myself in your shoes, the public, to see what can be done to achieve the point in which this is not just something you buy but is an investment that will return your money in the long run, and that will bust your health and help to develop what is important in every step of the way, through donations we'll be making to institutions we consider to be relevant. Isn't this what a product should be all about?

  Your funding is fundamental for all of this to happen.

It pays itself!

  By using this aquaponic system has the main source of fruit and vegetables, the average American should be able to pay for the system in, roughly, four to five years, but some might even lower that number!

Our goal is sustainability!

  We look for the mother earth in every step of the road, and that's why we will reduce transportations by constructing the systems in your hometown, while lowering the price that you pay for it, and we try to use materials with a low impact in the environment.

Why choose us?

  Aquaponics gives you the opportunity to grow your own food in a system that has almost no maintenance what so ever and that saves almost all the water in it while saving you money in groceries that will, over time, pay for all the costs of the system. Here are some of the benefits of our system:

  Also, we reduce the consumption of electricity with the use of a single pump and the use of physics to move the water in all the other places, and design the system in a way that it can retain the water in the case of that same pump breaking down. Like that is not enougth, we desing the system to have a sponge before the water goes to the tank again and we made it super easy to remove and put it again, and we have wells because filled with water, this system gets quite heavy, but we don't want you to be taking all the water if you ever decide you want to move it to another place, just pug it out and it's ready to go! With our system you will not only have something to talk about, you will also have the food we promise due to our area of growth, that is bigger than any other system designed specifically for houses.

What We Need & What You Get

I set my goal in 5,000 euros to pay for:

  • Indiegogo and bank fees - cost 500 euros;
  • Creating the company - cost 360 euros;
  • Printed publicity that I personally will distribute throughout, firstly, the big cities of Portugal (like Porto and Lisbon), and, in the near future, in other countries, organizing demonstrations that will be done in that places, and publicity on the internet - cost 640 euros;
  • Launch a website for online sells -cost 300 euros;
  • Ask for a patent for the logo we have designed -260 euros;
  • Pay a thank you pizza to my friend José and my girlfriend Florinda who both helped me take this project of the ground - cost 30 euros;
  • Have some capital to produce the first models to help to better grow the company - cost 2000 euros.
  • Other expenses that will come in the way - cost 1000 euros.

And what if we don't get the full amount? We have your priorities well defined to ensure that, even if we don't get the money we hope, be can still start the company and grow our brand, even though it would be a slower process.

Here are our perks for you:

  • T-shirt with our logo: Help us to take this idea to every home and take a peace of us with you everywhere you go. The logo can't be shown here because of the lack of patent to protect it, but believe us that it is gorgeous.
  • Hand knitted scarf: As a way of showing gratitude for your help, we will be knitting your scarfs for this winter one by one. They will be really comfortable and usable by both man and woman with the logo on the tip of it.
  • Discount cards: Pay now for a discount later! This is a way for you to be able to pay for your aquaponic system in smaller parts because you can accumulate, over time, the value of many discount cards, and even get another discount for helping us in this earlier stage. The value of the cards cannot be converted in money and is only usable in the use of aquaponic systems until the end of December of 2018. In the 50 euros discount card, the code that is provided to you unlocks a discount of 55 euros and, in the 200 euro discount card, the code unlocks a discount of 225 euros. These values are to be considered in the price of the system after the end of the Indiegogo campaign and the end of the price displayed in this campaign. The cards are sent through email with the information on how to use them. If you don't have enough discount cards to buy the system, you can pay the other part directly with money.
  • Pre-orders: Get the best deal of all by buying now your aquaponic system at the best price it will ever be in. We will also send you a special letter to acknowledge to those who helped us the most in your early stages. The delivery can be quick or take us some months, depending on the area that you live.

The Impact

  The creation of this company will have a much bigger impact in the world than just the products that will be sold. For starters, this will be a revolutionary good because it will actually provide a good amount of food and not only be capable of maintaining a couple of plants, reducing all the problems of agriculture and bringing more natural and healthier food to the table. But, more than that, has said previously, this will be a firm that will have an active role in the global community and its problems, and the donations to other organizations are just the start of what's to come. We will be involved with artists, scientists and the people all around the globe. We want to make this more than just a way to make a living, because I'll put my name on this, and I want to be able to look myself in the mirror every morning knowing that I put every drop of who I am in everything I do.

  Our products will also diversify from the agriculture branch, and we will create a team to develop some other ideas we've got, and also new things and new ways of solving some of the world's problems by giving power to the people.

Risks & Challenges

  The biggest problem in building such a thing is that, because the tank is made of glass, the final product is quite heavy and not good for transportations, and that is why we talk so much about making it in your home country: we want reduce our carbon footprint and the costs in transportations by building your system as near of you as possible. That means that we need to have manufactured all around the globe, what will certainly not be an easy task. But is one that can be done, mainly in this super-connected world we have today with instant communication. I'm not a person of not ending what I start and, for those who contribute, I guarantee you that you'll receive you product has advertised, even if I have to work at McDonald's to be able to pay for the thing from my own pocket.

  I might be young, but I have heard the advice from those who did it, and I have done my research and I'm ready for what I'm not ready for what's to come. This is an idea with potential, and I'm up to challenge and ready, if bad fortune hits me, to fail and rise again.

Other Ways You Can Help

  Don't just go away if you think that this is too expensive for you or if this is not what you want because there are a lot of ways you can help me in this battle. Do some noise about this, talk to your friends and strangers about this campaign, and don't forget to use the share tools of indigogo. Leave your mark on me and I will incubate it and project it to the world. Thank you!

Have some capital to produce the first models to help to better grow the company - cost 2000 euros.
Other expenses that will come in the way - cost 1000 euros.

And what if we don't get the full amount? We have your priorities well defined to ensure that, even if we don't get the money we hope, be can still start the company and grow our brand, even though it would be a slower process.
Here are our perks for you:


T-shirt with our logo: Help us to take this idea to every home and take a peace of us with you everywhere you go. The logo can't be shown here because of the lack of patent to protect it, but believe us that it is gorgeous.

Hand knitted scarf: As a way of showing gratitude for your help, we will be knitting your scarfs for this winter one by one. They will be really comfortable and usable by both man and woman with the logo on the tip of it.

Discount cards: Pay now for a discount later! This is a way for you to be able to pay for your aquaponic system in smaller parts because you can accumulate, over time, the value of many discount cards, and even get another discount for helping us in this earlier stage. The value of the cards cannot be converted in money and is only usable in the use of aquaponic systems until the end of December of 2018. In the 50 euros discount card, the code that is provided to you unlocks a discount of 55 euros and, in the 200 euro discount card, the code unlocks a discount of 225 euros. These values are to be considered in the price of the system after the end of the Indiegogo campaign and the end of the price displayed in this campaign. The cards are sent through email with the information on how to use them. If you don't have enough discount cards to buy the system, you can pay the other part directly with money.

Pre-orders: Get the best deal of all by buying now your aquaponic system at the best price it will ever be in. We will also send you a special letter to acknowledge to those who helped us the most in your early stages. The delivery can be quick or take us some months, depending on the area that you live.


The Impact
  The creation of this company will have a much bigger impact in the world than just the products that will be sold. For starters, this will be a revolutionary good because it will actually provide a good amount of food and not only be capable of maintaining a couple of plants, reducing all the problems of agriculture and bringing more natural and healthier food to the table. But, more than that, has said previously, this will be a firm that will have an active role in the global community and its problems, and the donations to other organizations are just the start of what's to come. We will be involved with artists, scientists and the people all around the globe. We want to make this more than just a way to make a living, because I'll put my name on this, and I want to be able to look myself in the mirror every morning knowing that I put every drop of who I am in everything I do.
  Our products will also diversify from the agriculture branch, and we will create a team to develop some other ideas we've got, and also new things and new ways of solving some of the world's problems by giving power to the people.

Risks & Challenges
  The biggest problem in building such a thing is that, because the tank is made of glass, the final product is quite heavy and not good for transportations, and that is why we talk so much about making it in your home country: we want reduce our carbon footprint and the costs in transportations by building your system as near of you as possible. That means that we need to have manufactured all around the globe, what will certainly not be an easy task. But is one that can be done, mainly in this super-connected world we have today with instant communication. I'm not a person of not ending what I start and, for those who contribute, I guarantee you that you'll receive you product has advertised, even if I have to work at McDonald's to be able to pay for the thing from my own pocket.
  I might be young, but I have heard the advice from those who did it, and I have done my research and I'm ready for what I'm not ready for what's to come. This is an idea with potential, and I'm up to challenge and ready, if bad fortune hits me, to fail and rise again.

Other Ways You Can Help
  Don't just go away if you think that this is too expensive for you or if this is not what you want because there are a lot of ways you can help me in this battle. Do some noise about this, talk to your friends and strangers about this campaign, and don't forget to use the share tools of indigogo. Leave your mark on me and I will incubate it and project it to the world. Thank you!

story:
How it works ?

Unpack the lamp, put it into the socket, get the mobile app running and you’re ready
to go!
Everything is controlled via the application. No buttons on Edge, we don’t like
them, because we thought of it as(of) a decoration lamp in the first place. You can
put it on a shelf in your living room and it will fit there perfectly!


Origins of Edge Smart Lamp.


We spent a lot of time, working on projects about lamps and lights. After tireless efforts and
failures, we can now introduce you - Edge! We started our project in November 2017. Back
then it was an ordinary lamp like any other, but we started to enhance it with upgrades. In
April 2018 we completed our first Edge lamp. Now we need your support to bring our lamps
to your homes.​

Everything is controlled with the mobile app!

Turning it on/off, change light colors, set time you want the Edge to turn on or off. If you have more than one lamp, you can easily add them to the mobile app and control them by your own. You don´t need to press any button to charge any device through USB port. Just plug it in and it will start charging immediately.
Wireless charger works just as the USB. Lay down your mobile phone on top of your Edge
lampand load it with energy. Wireless charger is able to charge your smartphone fully in 90
minutes, the same as the USB port. Don’t worry about the case on your smartphone, it will charge with no problem!


Edge is made of recycled materials!

chipboard and transparent plastic material, therefor we are saving the environment in a classy style. The dimensions are: 120x120x102mm. For us it is the best size to make Edge look stylish. 
From the esthetic point of view, these are the dimensions to leave the best impression
in you. When the campaign ends succesfully a happy end(-ing), we are going to do our best, to make it rechargeable, so you can take it anywhere you want.






FAQ.



Where can be Edge used ?

You can use it anywhere you want. Place it on the working table or office table to use
it as a wireless charger, or just place it on the shelf in your livingroom like a
decoration lamp. 
The best way to use it, is to put it on your bedside table and let it glow and when you feel like falling asleep, just put your smartphone on top of it, to make sure it will be
fully charged the next morning.



How can i change light colour ?
As mentioned above, Edge has no buttons. All functions are controlled by mobile app. Open the app, turn Edge ON and you can start mixing colours on your own.

 

 

What to do, when package with Edge arrives ? 

Just unpack it, plug it into the socket, pair it with mobile app and you are ready to go.

story:
The Handy Spray Bottle is the perfect product for every home or  office. This is a product that you would see in every drug store or hardware store across the country.  This multi-directional spray functionality can be added to any spray bottle at minimal additional investment, and could be passed to the customer at no additional cost.

The patent pending Handy Spray with the bulb in the dip tube fills and stores an additional volume of liquid in the bulbous segment of the dip tube, allowing for extended multi-directional spraying. Instead of having only 2-3 squirts holding the bottle upside-down or sideways, you get 15-20 squirts before having to refill.

During normal spraying, the tube quickly refills and allows you to continue spraying normally, or you can turn it upside down again to get to any additional hard-to-reach spaces. 

Uses for the technology:

1. Cleaning hard to reach areas in a residential houses or commercial facilities.

2. Spraying insect repellent on your ankle.

3. Spraying cologne.

4. Medical device cleaning or maintenance.

5. Medical procedures requiring spraying or misting hard to reach areas.

6. Spray watering flowers or plants.

7. Inside automobile engines.  

8. And the list could go on and on!

If you own a company that produces any spray product, this simple but effective new functionality offers great marketability to customers, and offers them additional incentive to choose your product over the competition's.

So far there has been no other effective way to incorporate multidirectional spraying functionality into the standard spray bottle in a cost effective manner.  Please watch the video to see it in action.

There have been other attempts at creating a multidirectional spray bottle, but our method is by far the least expensive. We can include this functionality at effectively no additional cost because the design requires very little change in to exisiting molding machine hardware. 

There is more to this campaign than meets the eye.    Dr. David Phillips, my co-designer, is an inventor who is perhaps best known for the thermometer that takes the instant reading from the ear.  He won the inventor of the year award in 1997 for this innovation.  He is currently working on a home breast cancer detection unit that will replace the mammogram and will undoubtedly save lives around the world.  

So, what does that have to do with the spray bottle?  Well, Dr. Phillips needed something that patients could easily spray disinfectants on their wounds when they were injured due to car accidents, or had surgery -- even in battle, but standard spray bottles were hard to self-administrer by patients on their own, especially on feet and limbs, because they had to hold the bottle upright.  We designed the handy spray for small medical bottles to solve this problem, and now we have adapted it to also include household use. 

We are all very excited at the prospect of the Handy Spray!  We have discussed this product with professional house and office building cleaners and they can't wait to get a hold of one.  These regular users of spray bottles are especially intrigued by the improved ability to clean bathtubs, the floor around a commode, or any other multitude of applications,  without having to fight with the bottle to spray evenly and generously around hard-to-reach places.  We are already in license discussions and are really excited about the prospects!

Please take advantage of the perks and back this campaign.  We know we can't succeed without your help!  We thank all of our potential backers in advance, and by all means, please feel free to comment and contact us with questions.

story:
Hi Indiegogo backers, my name is Sergio Spinel.  I am a furniture designer and interior architect.  Throughout my career I have been commited to designing soulfully. I want all pieces and spaces that I design to feel like a constant gift to their owner. My objective is that my design give its user beauty, comfort, serenity, and a sense of value.  I work hard to ensure that everything I design soulfully serves those who come in contact with it.  

The pandemic that we are currently living through has created a new normal. I want to use design to help. I thought  a lot about what I could design to help people sanitize their everyday items simply, conveniently and effectively without sacrificing beauty.  I designed POD.

My team and I worked on creating a multifunctional furniture piece that facilitates a clean exterior to interior transition by sanitizing all items that you put inside it. 

POD is not only a sanitizing furniture piece, it is also a sculptural floorlamp that will add beauty to any space. 

We have already made several prototypes and will be ready to begin production as soon as this campaign ends. 

 

POD is an entryway organizer and floor lamp that sanitizes everyday items before they enter your home or office.

 

 

The Sanitizing System

__________

POD uses a PCO + UVC system that reduces bacteria an viruses and removes odors.             

It was developed for POD  in partnership  with IRTRONIX,  a UV LED technology  company  based in California.

POD does not fully sterilize. See testing information for our sanitizing system here.

Bacteria: Air sanitization of chamber tests result in 3.71 log bacterial inactivation (99.98%) in 90 minutes for S. aureus: Staphylococcus aureus with initial bacterial concentration (cfu/m³) : 10¹². For a 30 minute cycle with the same initial concentration, for the same bacteria, inactivation is .65 log (77.66%).

Viruses: POD's technology includes the UVC system tested by the Guangzhou Institute of Microbiology in China (CGMT). Read more...

Odors: POD's technology includes the PCO system tested by the CHEARI (China Household Electric Appliance Research Institute) to remove over 96% of TMA and MM odors in a 120 min cycle.

VOCs or Volatile Organic Compounds: POD's system removes 83% of VOCs in a 30 min cycle.

A typical POD cycle will run 2 hours unless you interrupt the cycle. PCO + UVC systems are commonly used for air purifiers and refrigeration. See testing information here.

 

 

A typical POD cycle will run for 2 hours unless you interrupt the cycle.

PCO + UVC systems are commonly used for air purifiers and refrigeration.

 

 

Features

__________

POD is hands free. A motion sensor or Alexa will open and close POD.

 

Hang your coat, mask, shoes, bag, and any other item you want to sanitize.

 

Place your phone on the wireless charging tray.

 

When POD closes, the sanitizing cycle will begin. 

 

LED indicators will let you know when the sanitizing cycle is complete. A typical sanitizing cycle will last 2 hours. You can interrupt the cycle at any time by opening POD. 

 

POD is also a dimmable floor lamp.

 

There are three versions available: POD mini, POD, and POD magnus.

 

 

POD is easy to use

__________

 

 

One more thing...

POD will also include UVC LEDs that can be optionally turned on/off for direct UVC light dosage on personal items. Direct UVC light dosage has been widely studied to help sanitize personal items when shined directly. However, it is also known to cause the degradation of certain materials such as polymers. This is why the use of this feature is optional. If the UVC LED option is turned on, the LEDs will be on for 15 minutes during the regular sanitizing cycle. If POD is opened, the LED's will automatically turn off. 

 

 

Project Timeline

__________

 

 

With your support, we will buy the necessary tooling to optimize our manufacturing costs and scale the production of POD.

POD's impeccable design will help clean your personal items while standing beautifully in your space.  

 

Team, Risks & Challenges

__________


Sergio Spinel, the creator and founder of POD, has designed and produced custom high end furniture for more than 20 years in several countries including the US, Panama, Peru and Colombia. Sergio has been published in influential design magazines in Colombia and is currently a well regarded San Francisco interior architect.

Our cofounder Erick Barto is a Manufacturing Engineer with 13 years of experience including stints as a Production Engineer for high precision oil well equipment in the oil services industry and leading Six Sigma projects in the HVAC (Heating, Ventilation, and Air Conditioning) industry.

We have partnered with IRTRONIX, a UV LED technology company to develop an efficient sanitizing solution that can be implemented in your home at an affordable price.

We are a strong and dedicated team who has the necessary skill set to succesfully scale the production of  POD. 

In the past 4 months we have iterated in design, prototyping and testing until we finalized a viable solution to bring to our backers. Our vendors are ready to start full production.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

__________


We understand these are hard times for many people. If you can't contribute financially but like our project and want to see it succeed, please use the Indiegogo share tools to share our project in your social media channels, we will be very grateful.

story:
StorkBox is the first and only smart theft solution that looks like beautiful patio furniture -- because your home's appearance is as important as your packages! Completely customizable, always connected. You'll love the feeling knowing your packages are always safe!

We collected thousands of packages over the past two years, testing for the right size. The result is a crate large enough for your deliveries, but small enough that on nearly every porch, it just fits.

You'll love that StorkBox can be painted any colors that express your unique personality, and we're excited to see the creativity of our community! Show off your awesome new porch using the hashtag #mystorkbox.

We are confident in our engineering, production and logistics ability. We guarantee customer order fulfillment post-production. However, unpredictable events, like natural disasters, could introduce complications. If that happens we will keep every backer in transparent communication.

story:
Locks on the market today are not designed to be rapidly deployed under high stress situations or utilize unreliable/unproven technology. MarqTac aims to solve this!

Introducing the patent pending HBL, the most capable gun lock on the market, providing complete security & rapid access.

 

Your Support Is Important:

We need your support to bring the HBL to market. The HBL will help to change the gun lock industry - providing a solution that doesn’t compromise the users ability to react while still providing security.

The $25,000 goal allows us to implement production and bring this revolutionary product to you!

 

Our Story:

In 2018, we embarked on this journey to change the firearm industry with Smart Firearm Accessories.

MarqTac was co-founded by two life long friends, a father with an engineering/marketing background and a Navy veteran with an engineering/product development background. The duo have a passion to make the world a safer place!

Our vision is to be the brand that provides consumers with smart firearm accessories that enhance their ability to react safely and quickly to real life scenarios. The HBL delivers on that promise by addressing the need for security without compromising access when it comes to firearms within the home.

 

How It Works:

The LOCKING sequence is a simple three step process: 
  1. Insert the MarqTac Safety Round into an unloaded firearm 
  2. Close the firearm's slide 
  3. Insert the MarqTac Security Housing down the barrel of the gun engaging it with the Safety Round 

Your firearm is completely secured - given the components of the system, there is no way for a live round to enter the chamber.

Device status [lock or unlocked] is easily identified, red means you're ready to disengage the lock!

It was our mission to make UNLOCKING easy even under high stress situations (no keys, no combos, no mistakes). Simply:

  1. Tap your pre-authorized RFID tag to the MarqTac Security Housing, which will instantly disengage the locking device.
  2. Rack your firearm, ejecting the MarqTac Safety Round (and loading a live round if you store with a loaded magazine).

Simple and Effective - Security and Access - The HBL

 

Feature Details:

The HBL is powered by Radio-Frequency Identification (RFID). RFID uses electromagnetic fields to automatically identify and track tags attached to objects. The tags contain electronically stored information that can be read within proximity to a reader. RFID technology is used worldwide across numerous industries and trusted for its reliability, security and ease of use. 

Using this proven technology the HBL can automatically and quickly identify when an authorized tag is in range and take you from Locked to Loaded. The small size of RFID devices gives MarqTac the flexibility to incorporate the RFID tag into everyday objects such as key cards, bracelets, and rings. With the ability for additional key types in the future depending on user needs.

 

The HBL is designed for modularity, with the objective of providing you convenience. The proprietary barrel locking system allows one security housing to be used across a variety of caliber sizes and barrel lengths, allowing it to easily be exchanged between firearms. 

Calibers – 9mm, .40cal & .45acp compatible. This is achieved by altering the external geometry to reflect your desired caliber while maintaining a constant internal geometry that drives the locking. Just pick the caliber you need or have all three!

Barrel Length – The HBL is designed to accommodate a max barrel length of 5 inches, any length below that is sized to fit with our included spacers. Set them once and never have to worry about it again.

This flexibility allows the HBL to easily lock a Glock 19 or Colt 1911 and anything in-between!

 

The HBL’s revolutionary implementation of technology is important, however, it is equally important to give users complete peace of mind. So in the event you misplace your RFID tag or the battery dies, we have built in a mechanical back up that can be used to unlock and access the gun. While not as quick as the RFID unlocking sequence, it is an easy 4 step process!

 

The Journey:

The Co-Founders share a vision, solve tough problems and at the same time make the world a safer place. Through every development iteration of the HBL, MarqTac stuck to that vision.

The journey hasn't been achieved alone, the MarqTac Team expands beyond what you see below but the foundation is individuals and organizations all experienced in their own fields and passionate about the HBL.

 

The Future:

Funds from this campaign will go directly to building inventory of the HBL. Making sure our backers get the HBL first, in order to keep their firearm secured yet accessible. 

 

Partnerships:

Since 2015 the Kids S.A.F.E. Foundation has been a leader in the state of Oregon and the nation in regards to children’s firearm safety. They have reached 15,000 kids in Oregon, Washington, and Northern California. 

They share the same passion as MarqTac and we will be donating 50% of the proceeds from the "Children Gun Safety Support" perk. Please consider that perk, which helps support both organizations. 

 

Reach Out:

Contact Us: Contact@marqtac.com

Follow Us: Instagram , Facebook or MarqTac.com
story_txt:
Locks on the market today are not designed to be rapidly deployed under high stress situations or utilize unreliable/unproven technology. MarqTac aims to solve this!Introducing the patent pending HBL, the most capable gun lock on the market, providing complete security & rapid access. Your Support Is Important:We need your support to bring the HBL to market. The HBL will help to change the gun lock industry - providing a solution that doesn’t compromise the users ability to react while still providing security.The $25,000 goal allows us to implement production and bring this revolutionary product to you! Our Story:In 2018, we embarked on this journey to change the firearm industry with Smart Firearm Accessories.MarqTac was co-founded by two life long friends, a father with an engineering/marketing background and a Navy veteran with an engineering/product development background. The duo have a passion to make the world a safer place!Our vision is to be the brand that provides consumers with smart firearm accessories that enhance their ability to react safely and quickly to real life scenarios. The HBL delivers on that promise by addressing the need for security without compromising access when it comes to firearms within the home. How It Works:The LOCKING sequence is a simple three step process: 
Insert the MarqTac Safety Round into an unloaded firearm 
Close the firearm's slide 
Insert the MarqTac Security Housing down the barrel of the gun engaging it with the Safety Round 
Your firearm is completely secured - given the components of the system, there is no way for a live round to enter the chamber.Device status [lock or unlocked] is easily identified, red means you're ready to disengage the lock!It was our mission to make UNLOCKING easy even under high stress situations (no keys, no combos, no mistakes). Simply:

Tap your pre-authorized RFID tag to the MarqTac Security Housing, which will instantly disengage the locking device.

Rack your firearm, ejecting the MarqTac Safety Round (and loading a live round if you store with a loaded magazine).
Simple and Effective - Security and Access - The HBL Feature Details:The HBL is powered by Radio-Frequency Identification (RFID). RFID uses electromagnetic fields to automatically identify and track tags attached to objects. The tags contain electronically stored information that can be read within proximity to a reader. RFID technology is used worldwide across numerous industries and trusted for its reliability, security and ease of use. Using this proven technology the HBL can automatically and quickly identify when an authorized tag is in range and take you from Locked to Loaded. The small size of RFID devices gives MarqTac the flexibility to incorporate the RFID tag into everyday objects such as key cards, bracelets, and rings. With the ability for additional key types in the future depending on user needs. The HBL is designed for modularity, with the objective of providing you convenience. The proprietary barrel locking system allows one security housing to be used across a variety of caliber sizes and barrel lengths, allowing it to easily be exchanged between firearms. Calibers – 9mm, .40cal & .45acp compatible. This is achieved by altering the external geometry to reflect your desired caliber while maintaining a constant internal geometry that drives the locking. Just pick the caliber you need or have all three!Barrel Length – The HBL is designed to accommodate a max barrel length of 5 inches, any length below that is sized to fit with our included spacers. Set them once and never have to worry about it again.This flexibility allows the HBL to easily lock a Glock 19 or Colt 1911 and anything in-between! The HBL’s revolutionary implementation of technology is important, however, it is equally important to give users complete peace of mind. So in the event you misplace your RFID tag or the battery dies, we have built in a mechanical back up that can be used to unlock and access the gun. While not as quick as the RFID unlocking sequence, it is an easy 4 step process! The Journey:The Co-Founders share a vision, solve tough problems and at the same time make the world a safer place. Through every development iteration of the HBL, MarqTac stuck to that vision.The journey hasn't been achieved alone, the MarqTac Team expands beyond what you see below but the foundation is individuals and organizations all experienced in their own fields and passionate about the HBL. The Future:Funds from this campaign will go directly to building inventory of the HBL. Making sure our backers get the HBL first, in order to keep their firearm secured yet accessible.  Partnerships:Since 2015 the Kids S.A.F.E. Foundation has been a leader in the state of Oregon and the nation in regards to children’s firearm safety. They have reached 15,000 kids in Oregon, Washington, and Northern California. They share the same passion as MarqTac and we will be donating 50% of the proceeds from the "Children Gun Safety Support" perk. Please consider that perk, which helps support both organizations.  Reach Out:Contact Us: Contact@marqtac.comFollow Us: Instagram , Facebook or MarqTac.com

story:
A New Concept of Workplace

Passionate About Design And Modern Lifestyle

At Boxlite GmbH, we are passionate about  design and modern lifestyle. We love creating innovative products that help people simplify, organize, and improve their lives.

Boxlite GmbH, founded in 2017 and based in Zurich Switzerland, has been designing, producing and distributing custom lighting and marketing tools for various types of businesses worldwide.

 

What is our project about? 

Our team have been working hard developing a new product line that blends together unique lighting with a masterful works of art.

A clean and tidy workplace translates into productive work.

That is how we got the idea to create a simple but modern workplace, a desk free of clutter and a great good looking environment.

The Lamp and The New York Collection, exclusively for those that demand the best.

New York Collection

The Big Apple

If this town is just an apple, then let me take a bite.The Big Apple is a nickname for New York City. It was first popularized in the 1920s by John J. Fitz Gerald, a sports writer for the New York Morning Telegraph.

 

Uniqueness And Elegance

Looking for something Elegant, Creative and really Unique? Boxlite offers you solutions.

 

 

Highest Quality Materials

Aluminium Composite is magnificent for decorating rooms, halls, offices, facades. Iconic material in the world of photography.

Elegant Variant

Elegant variant of visible placement with decorative screws designed by Boxlite. The image is mounted to the wall with the help of screws visible from the front and included in the delivery. This leaves a space of 2 cm between the image and the wall giving the feeling that “the Image seems to float”.

 

 

 

 

 

The Lamp

The Lamp is made with a unique technology that enables a clean design without all of the cables and joints that are associated with most desk lamps. But then again, The Lamp is no ordinary desk lamp, it is designed for the modern work-space and to match perfectly with your up-to-date mobile gear.

Boasting unique touch control, wireless device charging & multiple color settings, The Lamp is perfect for those that demand the best.

 

THE LAMP: A light. A charger. And a great look. Modern desk accessory that works with all devices. It´s perfect for those that demand the best.

 

 

 

UNIQUE

Is so truly unique that it redefines the entire category of lighting. It´s made with a unique technology and clean design without all of the cables and joints that are associated with most desk lamps.

 

ELEGANT

It’s a fashion statement, a symbol of professionalism, and a wireless charging station for all your devices.

 

 

 

 

USB & WIRELESS CHARGING

The lamp offers wireless charging and USB charging for all modern devices like iPhone, iPads and Android devices. (Wireless Qi Charger 5V/1A, 5 Watt).

 

 

 

LIGHT OPTIONS:

The Lamp offers threes uniquely different light settings, giving you the perfect light for whatever it is that you´re doing. Adjustable intensity and colour temperature. Touch control to switch on or change light setting. Relax: Provides a soft, warm background light. Computer: Gives you a dimmed neutral light while working on screen. Drawing: An intense white light, suitable for off screen or drawing.

 

✓ Relax: 2 Watt 250 Lux 2700 k

✓ Computer: 5 Watt 700 Lux 3200 k

✓ Drawing: 8 Watt 1200 Lux 4000 k

 

 
 

 

TECHNICAL SPECIFICATIONS for the New York

Aluminium Composite

3 layers, UV Protection Printing.

Decorative screws included in the package.

Modern Picture made of Aluminium Composite. Decoration of living rooms, rooms, facades. Wall adjustments included. For Indoor and Outdoor use.

.

 

Sizes:

Small
Dimensions: 0.3 × 80 × 90 cm
Weight: 4 kg

Large
Dimensions: 0.3 × 160 × 140 cm
Weight: 7 kg

TECHNICAL SPECIFICATIONS for the lamp:

 

Touch Controls:

✓Tap the touch sensor once to turn ON.
✓Tap again to change the intensity in 3 steps.
✓Hold the touch sensor to turn OFF.
✓Memory function (will use previous setting when you switch The Lamp back ON).

 

Charging:

✓Wireless Qi Charger 5V/1A (5 Watt).
✓USB Port 5V/2,4A charge (12 Watt).
✓Power supply 5 VDC 26 Watt.

 

Size Information "New York"

Small Apple

Big Apple

 

Size Information "The Lamp"

 

Project  Status

The manufacturing of The Lamp is rather complex. However, with the support of people like you, who loves innovative products, we can go ahead with the mass production of this particular lamp.

Our company has completed all the quality control steps needed to start the production. The prototypes have been approved and we are ready for the launch of The Lamp.

Is amazing to see the great result after such a long time studying and designing the right technology and even better when we found the perfect harmony between The Lamp and The New York Collection, The Big Apple. 

Thanks for the support. 

Timeline

 

Rewards

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Shipping

Free shipping worldwide, January 2022

Packages

We appreciate the feedback.

Need more information? Do not hesitate to contact us, we are here to answer your questions.

Thank you very much!

Boxlite GmbH  Team.
