story:
Routinely photos, videos and other content posted to online platforms, are being used for commercial benefit or gain outside of the platform the content is posted to, without consent or credit to the author. The authors, who are protected by copyright and IP laws, are told that the content, once posted online, is free for the taking. The authors are routinely told that they have no rights. This is an invalid argument, a widely used excuse.

 If you complain, you may be threatened with legal action.

This can include anything from a news story, a photo you took, private photos of your children, your loved ones, or even deceased family, friends or relatives. Imagine seeing a photo of your child that you posted privately online, in a commercial for nappies, or your partner on a beach, in a commercial for a holiday or a piece of lingerie, a dating website or more. Imagine seeing your own photo used to represent something that you disagree with morally?

Imagine emailing the company responsible for using your photo, only to be told that you have no rights, imagine being told that you are worthless.

 Imagine being threatened personally with legal action if you tried to tell others.

Your freedom of speech is not respected.

Your rights are not respected. 

You have no freedom of speech.

You have no rights.


If you complain, you may be threatened and taken to court. You have no privacy, you have no rights, and you will not be respected. Large corporations can, and will do as they please, and with limited financial backing, individuals, poets, artists, photographers and individuals in many capacities cannot challenge this. This issue has gone on for too long unchecked, it is time that a stand was taken.

That is the message which is being sent by big business, that bullying is okay, provided you have legal and financial backing to do as you please.

This has been our experience, and it is time that a stand was taken against this practice within the industry.

We have been subjected to a legal memorandum, after our content was used outside of online platforms, without our consent. We have been subjected to legal action following a public announcement that this incident took place.

We have been threatened, this fight is real, and it involves everybody who uses the internet.

We will not simply accept this any longer. We intend to fight, and we turn to the community, to help us take a stand.


Let us unite, and restore Intellectual Property and Copyright protection once and for all.

story:
Klicke hier für Deutsch

 

Meet GROW!
 

 

The world’s most flexible furniture 
system ever designed.



 

One element, a million possibilities

The system is based on one main element which allows you to create endless configurations – and the possibility to change your interior according to your needs. 

 

Mix and match the colours of all components to get your own unique look.
You can create entire rooms with GROW! without having fixed or permanent installations. 

 

Meet the GROW! team

Passion meets expertise

Everyone involved in the GROW! project is a passionate expert in his/her field, and what this translates into ultimately is a higher quality product. In addition to our core team, we have chosen the best in design, engineering, tool making and production who are collaborating with us to deliver the best product experience to you.  

We have been successfully crowdfunding a project before and delivered on time, so rest assured; we know exactly what’s needed to handle it.

 

Unleash the interior designer inside you...

GROW! has a strong emphasis on playfulness and simplicity. It offers design lovers a single product which is adaptable to any interior environment.

...at home


Mount them on the wall (configuration above is made with 13 GROW! modules)

Freestanding bookshelves, a bench and a bedside table.

Freestanding partition wall used to separate the sleeping area for more privacy.



GROW! is waterproof and antibacterial, making it the perfect piece of furniture for your bathroom.
 

The modules are organically shaped.
White GROW! modules with black  connectors and  white "lid/back/rib" pieces.


...in your office

Create walls that can be moved and changed instantly. Above picture: 50+50 modules in black and white

Storage, bookshelf or seating. You can rearrange the configurations anytime,
in minutes and without any tools, as your needs change. 



Perks

We are offering our backers significant savings in order to help us bring this product to market. You can claim multiple perks to reach the desired number of GROW! module.
Make a new contribution for each perk.

Scroll down to see some examples of what you can do with each perk or click here.

  • Main modules:  4 - 10 - 16 - 20 - 36 - 100 or 272 pieces
  • Lid/back/rib pieces: 4 - 10 or 20  pieces (use one lid piece per main module to create seating)


Want to support via Paypal or bank transfer?

No problem (Indiegogo only accepts Credit Card payments).
Simply send us a transfer (including shipping fees). 

Paypal:
Send money to: shop@movisi.com
Type in:
• the amount (in Euro) of your perk,  including the shipping costs 
• the perk name you would like to have 
• your shipping address 

That's it - we'll do the rest and book the perk for you.
Click here to continue to Paypal!


Wire Transfer:
IBAN DE22600603960040911004
BIC: BIC GENODES1UTV

Please write a mail to grow@movisi.de with a screenshot of the transaction.
We will book the perk for you. 

 

Perk examples

Below are some examples of what you can do with GROW!
Scroll down to see the "DIMENSIONS" or click here.".


 

Prepare to get creative

The connectors allow you to change and rearrange your configuration anytime. Today it’s a shelving, tomorrow a partition wall or bench to accommodate your guest. 

GROW! allows you to extend the system by adding units over time.

Partition wall made from 16 - 32 - 48 modules

 


How it works

GROW! has been designed as a lightweight modular system of only three components – the main module, connectors and the lid & back piece (which is also used as stability rib for seating).

 

Watch the video to see how it works:

 

Growing from single depth (perfect for books, CDs, DVDs and artefacts) to double depth (2 units behind each other, perfect for bigger books, vinyl records), to double width. You can grow your configuration endlessly in all directions.

 

Truly 3-dimensional

The design permits you to create various depths by adding units in all directions.
 

Sturdy stool: made from "4 x GROW! modules" and "4 x lid/back/rib pieces".
 


Flexible and versatile

We believe in versatility, which means your GROW! system will be able to go wherever life takes you. With its unique design and ability to be changed instantly, GROW! provides a beautiful and flexible interior solution.

 

Here are a few ways you can use GROW!:

  • freestanding shelving or storage
  • wall mounted shelving or display
  • freestanding partition / room divider / wall / shrouding walkways
  • room-in-room installation / breakout / informal meeting areas
  • stool, seat, bench
  • bars and counters, bedside table, coffee table
  • come up with your own unique uses for GROW!

You can create an entire landscape with GROW!
The configuration above is made from 272 main modules and 66 lid pieces ("perk 272").


 

Black and white partition wall and a low bedside table.
Made from 36 main modules ("perk 36").

 


GROW! is also suited to the contract furniture market, where it’s design will lend itself to:

  • offices, frequent workplace re-designs and coworking spaces
  • retail stores 
  • trade fair booths
     

Perfect for retail and pop-up stores: single depth wall shelves, freestanding shelving (double depth), some benches and low display tables. 

 

Example of a trade fair booth made with GROW!

    The system permits you to create:

    • walls to display and store your items
    • seating for your visitors
    • bars and sales counters of any height

     

     

    Easy to install

    It can't be easier.  The connectors are simply pressed into the main modules.  
    Also, each module is supplied with a U-clip, allowing you to secure the shelving rows vertically. No tools or expertise needed.

     

     

    Mount it on the wall

    Floating shelves: The supports remain invisible.
    You can mount single GROW modules* to the wall by using the supplied wall mount sets. When mounting to the wall, you will have to use to insert the supplied screws into the modules.

    *Multiple depth configurations (2 or more modules behind each other) can be used freestanding only. 

     


    The curved design of the main module allows you to pass cables behind a shelving unit:


     

     

     

     

     

     

     

     

     

     

        


     

    GROW! is made from 3 components:

     

     

    Dimensions

     

     

     

      

     

    Colours

    GROW! is available in black and white. You can mix and match the colours of all components if you wish.

     

     

    Surface

    GROW! comes with a fine-drawn, textured surface.

     

     

    Easy to clean

    GROW! is resistant to chemicals, antibacterial and waterproof. And if you happen to spill some wine over it – no worries – just wipe with a damp cloth.

     

     

     

    Incredibly light – 95% air

    Enter into a world of lightness - GROW! is made from Movisi’s signature high-performance plastic foam known as ARPRO EPP (Expanded Polypropylene). To make it simple: that is 95% air and 5% Tupperware (PP). The material is strong and sturdy, yet extremely light so you can change and move your GROW! easily. Weight per module: 300g /10 oz,

     

     

    Ultra durable

    You can hardly damage GROW! As it is made from a shock absorbing material, you don’t need to worry about injuries or damages from dropping it on the floor. Perfectly safe for kids, too.

     

     

    100% sustainable

    GROW! is made from only one single material: ARPRO EPP, a 100% recyclable high performance plastic foam, which contains 95% air.

    It is completely toxic-free, emission free, allergy friendly and actually safe enough to eat (food approved)!

    Read more about our commitment to sustainability in the FAQ.

     

     

    Designed to last

    No trees are cut to make GROW! All components can be replaced individually which means that you do not have to throw away an entire piece of furniture again. Good for the environment and good for your wallet.

    Production schedule

    • July-September: construction and ordering of production tools
    • October/November: mould first parts and optimise production and tools. Final inspection.
    • December: production of all GROW parts
    • January/February 2018: ship GROW! to you

     

    Where we are in development

    At present GROW! exists as a series of fully working CNC milled prototypes. We have already identified our industrial partners and we’re ready to start production.

     

    Why Indiegogo?

    We have been working on GROW! for the past 2 years and we've come a long way. But now we need your help. Your support will allow us to initiate tooling and manufacturing so we can make GROW! available to you.

     

    Other ways you can help

    If you're not ready for GROW! just yet you still can help the campaign by letting your your friends know. Or even better- just think of that one friend who you think might just LOVE GROW! and send them a link to this campaign. We'd really appreciate that.

    Thank you so much!

     

     

    FAQ

    If you are a member of the media looking for a press release and images, click here

    Can I claim multiple perks?
    Yes, if you'd like to claim multiple perks, please make a new contribution for each perk.

    Where do you ship to? 
    We offer worldwide shipping.

    What happens if we don't reach our goal?
    You will be refunded in full soon after the campaign has ended.

    Can I get a refund after the campaign has ended?
    The money raised here on Indiegogo will go into purchasing of tools and manufacturing to deliver GROW! to your home. We have crowdfunded before and delivered on time, so no worries, this is a project you can back safely.

    Will GROW! vary from the design above? 
    While we have the design and prototypes build, we may still make some minor improvements. We love hearing from our supporters and if you have any suggestions we will be more than happy to consider it. 

    How can I choose my colours?
    Everyone will have the option to select what colour combination they would like. This will be done in the form of a survey after the campaign has ended. 

    What material is GROW! from and how can I recycle it?
    Cradle to cradle - GROW! is entirely made from a single raw material (polypropylene). No glue, no metal, no unhealthy materials.  This means that at the end of its useful life you can simply place it in the recycle bin.
    Please be responsible and recycle it properly. By properly sorting and recycling your plastics, you are helping to save approximately 88% of the energy required to produce plastic from the raw materials of oil and gas.

      


    Our commitment to sustainability

    GROW! will be manufactured according to strict ecological and socially-responsible production methods. 100% manufactured in Germany.

    Aim for a healthier home

    Most of the furniture you buy these days is designed to fall apart. Depending on its quality, some furniture does stick around for a while, but a large amount of it is built cheaply to be landfilled after just a couple of years of use.

    The most toxic thing in your house is …

    probably your furniture. Furniture is usually made from pressed wood like plywood, MDF, particleboard, or fibreboard. What you probably don't know, is that pressed wood contains high levels of formaldehyde; a highly toxic substance which evaporates over years and causes cancer.  For more info visit The National Cancer Institute and the United States Environmental Protection Agency EPA.

    The bad news end here and the good news start with GROW!

      Deutsche Version

    GROW! ...
     

    Das flexibelste Möbelsystem, das es je gab!
     



     

    Ein Modul, eine Million Möglichkeiten

    Mit nur einem Element kannst Du unzählige Konfigurationen erstellen und Dich genauso einrichten wie Du es willst. In wenigen Sekunden kannst Du Deine Konfiguration ändern oder umstellen und somit Deinen Bedürfnissen anpassen.

     

    Du kannst sämtliche Farben und Elemente des GROW! miteinander kombinieren. Damit bekommst du Deinen wirklich individuellen und besonderen Look. Mit GROW! kannst Du komplette Räume erschaffen und Du kannst Sie auch jederzeit wieder ändern.

     

    Das GROW! Team

    Wenn Leidenschaft auf Kompetenz trifft

    Jeder der an GROW! beteiligt ist, ist auf seinem Gebiet ein Experte, der mit Leidenschaft mitwirkt GROW! zum hochwertigen Design- und Qualitätsprodukt zu machen. Deshalb haben wir zu unserem bestehenden Team nur die Besten in Design, Entwicklung, Werkzeugherstellung, Maschinenbau und Produktion hinzugezogen. Wir möchten Euch ein Produkt liefern, dass euch tagtäglich Freude bringt.

    Wir haben bereits ein Crowdfunding Projekt in der Vergangenheit erfolgreich durchgeführt und unsere Unterstützer rechtzeitig beliefert. Ihr könnt euch sicher sein: wir wissen genau worauf es ankommt um ein gutes Produkt herzustellen und zu liefern.

     

    Entfessele den Designer in Dir…

    GROW! ist verspielt und schlicht in der Formensprache. Es ermöglicht endlose Gestaltungsmöglichkeiten und passt zum modernen oder klassischen Wohnstil.  

    ...zu Hause

    Als Wandregal (13 GROW! Module wurden im Bild oben benutzt)

    Bild oben: Freistehendes Bücherregal, Sitzbank und Nachttisch.

    Bild oben: Freistehender Raumtrenner um einen Schlafbereich abzugrenzen und somit mehr Privatsphäre zu schaffen.



    GROW! ist wasserbeständig, pflegeleicht und resistent gegen Chemikalien und Bakterien. Einfach mit einem feuchten Lappen abwischen. Perfekt für Dein Badezimmer!

    Die organische Form macht GROW! zu einem echten Eye-Catcher.
    Weiße GROW! Module mit schwarzen Verbindern und weißen Deckeln (lid/back rip piece)


    ...im Büro

    Gestalte Raumtrenner und Stellwände, die Du in wenigen Augenblicken ändern und verschieben kannst.  Bild oben: 50 x GROW! schwarz und 50 x GROW! weiß. 

    Egal ob Aufbewahrung, Bücherregal oder Sitzgelegenheit. Mit GROW! lässt sich alles kinderleicht und ohne Werkzeuge ändern. Schnell und einfach.



    Belohnungen (Perks)

    Unsere Unterstützer erhalten GROW! als Allererste und sparen bis zu 71%.
    Ihr könnt auch mehrere Belohnungen (Perks) bestellen um eure gewünschte Anzahl an GROW! Modulen zu erreichen. Einfach eine Belohnung (Perk) auswählen und den Kauf abschliessen und dann die nächste Belohnung Perk aussuchen und bestellen usw.

    Unten findet Ihr einige Beispiele, die eure Kreativität unterstützen.

    Es gibt:

    • Hauptmodule (main modules):  4 - 10 - 16 - 20 - 36 - 100 oder 272 Stück
    • Deckel/ Rücken/ Sitzsrippe (lid/back/rib pieces):  4 - 10 or 20  Stück (benutze einen Deckel pro Hauptmodul , um einen Sitz oder eine Bank zu gestalten)

     

    Du möchtest lieber per PayPal oder Überweisung zahlen?

    Kein Problem. (Indiegogo akzeptiert nur Kreditkartenzahlungen). Überweise uns einfach den Betrag und wir zahlen es für Dich bei Indiegogo ein.

    PayPal:

    Schicke Deine Zahlung einfach an: shop@movisi.com

    Fülle alle nötigen Felder aus:
    • Betrag (in Euro) der gewünschten Belohnung (inkl. der Versandkosten) 
    • Titel der Belohung (Perk) die Du haben willst (z.B. 20 x GROW modules)
    • Deine Versandadresse

    Schon fertig! Wir werden Deine Belohnung für Dich reservieren.
    Hier geht es zu PayPal!


    Überweisung​:
    IBAN DE22600603960040911004
    BIC: BIC GENODES1UTV

    Schreib uns eine Email: sende einem Screenshot Deiner getätigten Transaktion an grow@movisi.de Wir werden Deine Belohnung („Perk“) für Dich reservieren.

     

    Perk Beispiele

    Hier findest Du einige Beispiele was Du mit GROW! alles machen kannst.
    Scrolle runter um die Maße von GROW! zu erfahren oder klicke hier.


     

    Bereite Dich auf jede Menge Kreativität vor!

    Mit den Verbindern kannst Du Dein GROW! jederzeit neu ausrichten, verändern, vergrößern oder verkleinern. Heute brauchst Du ein Regal, morgen eine Bank oder einen Raumtrenner.

    Du kannst jederzeit weitere GROW! Module dazu bestellen.

    Raumtrenner bestehend aus 16 -32 48 Modulen

     

    Wie funktioniert es?

    GROW! besteht aus nur 3 Komponenten:

    • das Hauptmodul (modules)
    • die Verbinder (connectors)
    • Deckel/ Rücken/ Verstärkungsrippe (lid/back/rib pieces)

    Im Video erklären wir wie es geht:

     

    GROW! wächst! Wenn Du lediglich ein GROW! Modul benutzt (einfache Tiefe), kannst Du Bücher, CDs DVDs oder Gegenstände darin aufbewahren. Willst du große Bücher oder Schallplatten in Dein Regal stellen, füge 2 GROW! hintereinander zusammen (doppelte Tiefe), indem Du die mitgelieferten Verbinder (connectors) benutzt. Du kannst so Dein GROW! endlos wachsen lassen, in alle Richtungen.

     

    Wirklich 3-dimensional

    Du kannst GROW! Elemente in alle Richtungen zufügen. So kreierst Du Dein einzigartiges Design, dass zu Dir passt.

    Robuster Hocker: dazu brauchst Du 4 x GROW! Hauptmodule (main modules) und 4 x Deckel (lid/back/rib pieces)


    Flexibel und vielseitig

    Wir glauben an Vielseitigkeit. Das bedeutet für Dich, dass Du Dein GROW! jederzeit verändern kannst, egal wohin Dich Dein Leben auch hin verschlägt. GROW! kannst Du jederzeit neu gestalten. So bleibst Du flexibel. GROW! passt sich auch Deinen wechselnden Bedürfnissen an.
     

    Hier sind ein paar Beispiele wo Du GROW! nutzen kannst:

    • als freistehendes Regal oder Aufbewahrung
    • als Hängeregal oder Auslage
    • als freistehender Raumtrenner/ flexible Wände
    • als Raum in Raum Installation/ Besprechungszonen, Chill out Zonen
    • als Hocker, Sitz, Bank
    • als Bar, Ladentisch, Theke, Tresen, Nachttisch, Couchtisch
    • Deine eigene Idee für GROW!?

    Du kannst auch ganze Wohnlandschaften mit GROW! kreieren.

    Bild oben: Konfiguration besteht aus 272 x Hauptmodulen (main modules) und 66 x Deckeln (lid/back/rib pieces).


     

    Schwarz-weisser Raumtrenner und ein Nachttischchen.
    Bild oben: Konfiguration besteht aus 36 x Hauptmodule (main modules) ("Perk 36").

     

    GROW! eignet sich auch für den Objektmöbelbereich:

    • Büros, häufige Arbeitsplatz-Neugestaltungen und Co-Working Spaces
    • Ladengeschäfte
    • Messestände
       

    GROW! für Ladengeschäfte und Pop-Up Läden: als Display, stylishes Wandregal, freistehendes Regal, Sitzbank und sogar als niedriger Tisch in beliebiger Länge für die Auslage.

     

    Beispiel für einen besonderen Messeauftritt:

      • Display für auszustellende Waren und Güter
      • Sitzgelegenheit für Deine Besucher
      • Bar, Thresen oder Stehtisch (die Höhe bestimmst Du)

       

       

      Einfacher Aufbau

      Es könnte wirklich nicht einfacher sein. Die Verbinder („connectors“) werden einfach in die in die Hauptmodule gesteckt. Mit einfachen U-Clips werden die Regale in der Höhe gesichert.
      Es wird kein Werkzeug oder Fachwissen benötigt.

       

       

      Hänge es an die Wand

      Schwebende Regale: die Wandbefestigung bleiben unsichtbar und das Regal scheint zu schweben.

      Du kannst die Module (einfache Tiefe)* an die Wand hängen. Dafür liefern wir Dir Befestigungssets mit. Wenn Du GROW! an die Wand befestigst, musst Du die mitgelieferten Schrauben in die GROW! Module hineindrehen. Keine Sorge, Du benötigst sehr wenig Kraft dafür. Jedes Kind kann das mit Leichtigkeit!

      * (doppelte Tiefe oder mehr) können nicht an die Wand befestigt werden und sind nur freistehend anwendbar.

       


      Die organisch, gewölbte Form von GROW! erlaubt Dir auch Kabel an der Rückwand problemlos nachträglich zu führen oder zu wechseln (Bild unten).


       

       

       

       

       

       

       

       

       

       

          


       

      GROW! besteht aus 3 Komponenten:

       

       

      Maße

       

       

       

        

       

      Farben

      GROW! gibt es in Schwarz und Weiß. Du kannst die Farben der Komponenten mischen (wenn Du willst).

       

       

      Oberfläche

      GROW! hat eine fein gezeichnete, texturierte Oberfläche.

       

       

      Pflegeleicht

      GROW! ist ist wasserabweisend, resistent gegen Chemikalien und einfach zu reinigen. Falls Du je etwas verschüttest – keine Sorge! - einfach mit einem feuchten Lappen abwischen.

       

       

       

      Unglaublich leicht – 95% Luft

      Betrete zusammen mit uns die Welt der Leichtigkeit – GROW! ist aus Movisi’s eigenem Hochleistungskunststoff ARPRO EPP gefertigt. Lasst es uns so erklären: das sind 95% Luft und 5% Tupperware (PP). Das Material ist stark und robust, gleichzeitig aber sehr leicht. Deshalb kannst Du Dein GROW! jederzeit mit Leichtigkeit neu arrangieren. Jedes Hauptmodul wiegt nur etwa 300g.​

       

       

      Stabil & sicher

      Du kannst GROW! nur schwer beschädigen. Es hat nämlich stoßdämpfende Eigenschaften. Du brauchst Dir auch keine Sorgen zu machen wegen Verletzungen oder dass Du Deinen Boden beschädigen könntest. Es ist so auch absolut sicher für Kinder.

       

       

      100% nachhaltig

      Für uns ist das nicht nur ein Wort. GROW! ist zu 100% recyclebar. Dazu kommt noch, das es auf 95% Luft besteht und tatsächlich nur 5% Material!

      GROW! ist schadstofffrei, emissionsfrei, hypoallergen (Allergiker freundlich), stoßfest (hervorragende Energieabsorption), extrem leichtgewichtig und daher sehr einfach zu handhaben. Es ist sogar lebensmitteltauglich.

      100% Made in Germany.

      Mehr Information findest Du unten bei den FAQ.

       

       

      Langlebig

      Für Möbel lassen wir keinen Bäume fällen. Alle GROW! Komponenten können individuell ersetzt werden. Du musst nie wieder ein ganzes Möbelstück wegwerfen. Das ist nicht nur gut für unsere Umwelt, sondern auch für Deinen Geldbeutel.


      Produktionsplan

      • Juli-September: Konstruktion und Bestellung der Produktionswerkzeuge
      • Oktober/ November: erste Teile werden hergestellt. Optimierung der Produktionswerkzeuge und letzte Kontrollen
      • Dezember: Produktion aller GROW! Teile
      • Januar/ Februar 2018: Versand der GROW! Bestellungen

       

      Wo stehen wir in der Entwicklung?

      Zum jetzigen Zeitpunkt haben wir CNC gefräste voll funktionsfähige Prototypen. Wir haben sämtliche Produktionspartner ausgewählt und sind bereit zu starten.

       

      Warum Indiegogo?

      Die letzten 2 Jahre haben wir intensiv an GROW! gearbeitet und sind weit gekommen. Jetzt aber benötigen wir Eure Hilfe. Eure Unterstützung hilft uns die Werkzeuge und die erste Produktion möglich zu machen um GROW! zu Euch nach Hause zu bringen.

       

      Wie kannst Du sonst noch helfen?

      Teile dieses Projekt mit Deinen Freunden auch wenn Du gerade GROW! nicht brauchst. Vielleicht fällt Dir der ein Freund ein, den GROW! mitten ins Herz treffen könnte. Dann schicke ihm einfach den Link zu dieser Kampagne.
      Vielen Dank!

      FAQ

      Falls Du zur Presse gehörst und nach Pressematerial und Bildern suchst, findest Du Alles hier.

      Kann ich mehrere Belohnungen (Perks) bestellen?

      Ja, wenn Du mehrere Belohnungen (Perks) haben willst, mußt Du für jede einzelne das Bestellformular ausfüllen.

      In welche Länder versendet ihr?

      Wir versenden weltweit.

      Was passiert wenn ihr euer Ziel nicht erreicht?

      Dann erhältst Du Deine Vorauszahlung komplett zurück.

      Kann ich nach dem Ende der Kampagne mein Geld zurück bekommen?

      Das Geld das über Indiegogo kommt wird komplett in die Herstellung von GROW! und die Werkzeuge gesteckt. Wir haben schon zuvor eine solche Kampagne durchgeführt und rechtzeitig ausgeliefert. Du kannst dich also sicher darauf verlassen, dass Du Deine Bestellung bekommst.

      Wird GROW! genauso aussehen wie auf den Bildern?

      Wir haben das Design und die Prototypen fertig. Es kann aber zu geringfügigen Verbesserungen kommen. Wir möchten gerne von unseren Unterstützern wissen was sie noch für machbare Wünsche haben. 

      Wie wähle ich meine Farbe(n) aus?​

      Wir werden Dich am Ende der Kampagne kontaktieren. Dann kannst Du uns Deine Farbkombinationen mitteilen.

      Aus was für einem Material ist GROW! und wie kann ich es recyceln?

      Von der Wiege zur Wiege (Cradle to Cradle) – GROW! ist aus nur einem einzigen Material gefertigt (Polypropylen). Es gibt keine Klebstoffe, kein Metall, keine ungesunden Materialien in GROW!. Das bedeutet für Dich das GROW! am Ende seines Lebenszyklus einfach in die Recyclinganlage kommt.

      Bitte recycel  GROW! ordnungsgemäß. So hilfst ungefähr 88% an Energie zu sparen, die ansonsten notwendig wäre Polypropylen neu herzustellen.

        

      Unser Beitrag zur Nachhaltigkeit

      GROW! wird komplett in Deutschland hergestellt, nach strengsten Umweltstandards und selbstverständlich angemessenen Löhnen für alle die an der Produktion von GROW! beteiligt sind. GROW! wird zu 100% in Deutschland hergestellt.

      Wir streben nach einem gesünderen zu Hause

      Die meisten Möbel, die Du heutzutage kaufen kannst werden produziert um wieder auseinander zu fallen. Je nach Qualität, halten auch manche Möbel ein bisschen länger durch. Der größte Teil davon ist aber billig produziert und verschmutzt nach kurzem Gebrauch unsere Umwelt.

      Das giftigste in Deinem Haus…

      ist möglicherweise eines Deiner Möbel. Diese sind normalerweise aus gepresstem Sperrholz, MDF, beschichtetes Sperrholz oder Faserplatte gefertigt. Was Du vielleicht bisher nicht wusstest ist, dass dieses Material Formaldehyd enthält. Die Substanz ist hoch toxisch und dünstet über Jahre hinweg in Deinem zu Hause aus. Formaldehyd steht im Verdacht bei Menschen Krebserregend zu sein (bei Ratten wurde dies übrigens unzweifelhaft nachgewiesen).

      Mehr Informationen findest Du unter:
      http://www.schadstoffberatung.de/formalde.htm
      https://de.wikipedia.org/wiki/Formaldehyd
      The National Cancer Institute und der US Umweltschutzbehörde EPA.

      Die schlechten Nachrichten enden hier und die GUTEN beginnen mit GROW!

Klicke hier für Deutsch 
Meet GROW!  The world’s most flexible furniture system ever designed. One element, a million possibilitiesThe system is based on one main element which allows you to create endless configurations – and the possibility to change your interior according to your needs.  Mix and match the colours of all components to get your own unique look.You can create entire rooms with GROW! without having fixed or permanent installations.  Meet the GROW! teamPassion meets expertiseEveryone involved in the GROW! project is a passionate expert in his/her field, and what this translates into ultimately is a higher quality product. In addition to our core team, we have chosen the best in design, engineering, tool making and production who are collaborating with us to deliver the best product experience to you.  We have been successfully crowdfunding a project before and delivered on time, so rest assured; we know exactly what’s needed to handle it. Unleash the interior designer inside you...GROW! has a strong emphasis on playfulness and simplicity. It offers design lovers a single product which is adaptable to any interior environment....at homeMount them on the wall (configuration above is made with 13 GROW! modules)Freestanding bookshelves, a bench and a bedside table.Freestanding partition wall used to separate the sleeping area for more privacy.GROW! is waterproof and antibacterial, making it the perfect piece of furniture for your bathroom. The modules are organically shaped.White GROW! modules with black  connectors and  white "lid/back/rib" pieces.
...in your officeCreate walls that can be moved and changed instantly. Above picture: 50+50 modules in black and white Storage, bookshelf or seating. You can rearrange the configurations anytime,in minutes and without any tools, as your needs change. 
PerksWe are offering our backers significant savings in order to help us bring this product to market. You can claim multiple perks to reach the desired number of GROW! module.Make a new contribution for each perk.Scroll down to see some examples of what you can do with each perk or click here.
Main modules:  4 - 10 - 16 - 20 - 36 - 100 or 272 pieces
Lid/back/rib pieces: 4 - 10 or 20  pieces (use one lid piece per main module to create seating)

Want to support via Paypal or bank transfer?No problem (Indiegogo only accepts Credit Card payments).Simply send us a transfer (including shipping fees). Paypal:Send money to: shop@movisi.comType in:• the amount (in Euro) of your perk,  including the shipping costs • the perk name you would like to have • your shipping address That's it - we'll do the rest and book the perk for you.Click here to continue to Paypal!Wire Transfer:IBAN DE22600603960040911004BIC: BIC GENODES1UTVPlease write a mail to grow@movisi.de with a screenshot of the transaction.We will book the perk for you.  Perk examplesBelow are some examples of what you can do with GROW!Scroll down to see the "DIMENSIONS" or click here.". Prepare to get creativeThe connectors allow you to change and rearrange your configuration anytime. Today it’s a shelving, tomorrow a partition wall or bench to accommodate your guest. GROW! allows you to extend the system by adding units over time.Partition wall made from 16 - 32 - 48 modules 
How it works
GROW! has been designed as a lightweight modular system of only three components – the main module, connectors and the lid & back piece (which is also used as stability rib for seating). Watch the video to see how it works: Growing from single depth (perfect for books, CDs, DVDs and artefacts) to double depth (2 units behind each other, perfect for bigger books, vinyl records), to double width. You can grow your configuration endlessly in all directions. Truly 3-dimensionalThe design permits you to create various depths by adding units in all directions. Sturdy stool: made from "4 x GROW! modules" and "4 x lid/back/rib pieces". 
Flexible and versatile
We believe in versatility, which means your GROW! system will be able to go wherever life takes you. With its unique design and ability to be changed instantly, GROW! provides a beautiful and flexible interior solution. Here are a few ways you can use GROW!:
freestanding shelving or storage
wall mounted shelving or display
freestanding partition / room divider / wall / shrouding walkways
room-in-room installation / breakout / informal meeting areas
stool, seat, bench
bars and counters, bedside table, coffee table
come up with your own unique uses for GROW!
You can create an entire landscape with GROW!The configuration above is made from 272 main modules and 66 lid pieces ("perk 272"). Black and white partition wall and a low bedside table.Made from 36 main modules ("perk 36"). GROW! is also suited to the contract furniture market, where it’s design will lend itself to:
offices, frequent workplace re-designs and coworking spaces
retail stores 

trade fair booths 
Perfect for retail and pop-up stores: single depth wall shelves, freestanding shelving (double depth), some benches and low display tables.  Example of a trade fair booth made with GROW!The system permits you to create:

walls to display and store your items

seating for your visitors

bars and sales counters of any height
  Easy to installIt can't be easier.  The connectors are simply pressed into the main modules.  Also, each module is supplied with a U-clip, allowing you to secure the shelving rows vertically. No tools or expertise needed.  Mount it on the wallFloating shelves: The supports remain invisible.You can mount single GROW modules* to the wall by using the supplied wall mount sets. When mounting to the wall, you will have to use to insert the supplied screws into the modules.*Multiple depth configurations (2 or more modules behind each other) can be used freestanding only.  The curved design of the main module allows you to pass cables behind a shelving unit:              
 GROW! is made from 3 components:  Dimensions       ColoursGROW! is available in black and white. You can mix and match the colours of all components if you wish.  SurfaceGROW! comes with a fine-drawn, textured surface.  Easy to cleanGROW! is resistant to chemicals, antibacterial and waterproof. And if you happen to spill some wine over it – no worries – just wipe with a damp cloth.   Incredibly light – 95% airEnter into a world of lightness - GROW! is made from Movisi’s signature high-performance plastic foam known as ARPRO EPP (Expanded Polypropylene). To make it simple: that is 95% air and 5% Tupperware (PP). The material is strong and sturdy, yet extremely light so you can change and move your GROW! easily. Weight per module: 300g /10 oz,  Ultra durableYou can hardly damage GROW! As it is made from a shock absorbing material, you don’t need to worry about injuries or damages from dropping it on the floor. Perfectly safe for kids, too.  100% sustainableGROW! is made from only one single material: ARPRO EPP, a 100% recyclable high performance plastic foam, which contains 95% air.It is completely toxic-free, emission free, allergy friendly and actually safe enough to eat (food approved)!Read more about our commitment to sustainability in the FAQ.  Designed to lastNo trees are cut to make GROW! All components can be replaced individually which means that you do not have to throw away an entire piece of furniture again. Good for the environment and good for your wallet.Production schedule
July-September: construction and ordering of production tools
October/November: mould first parts and optimise production and tools. Final inspection.
December: production of all GROW parts
January/February 2018: ship GROW! to you
 Where we are in developmentAt present GROW! exists as a series of fully working CNC milled prototypes. We have already identified our industrial partners and we’re ready to start production. Why Indiegogo?We have been working on GROW! for the past 2 years and we've come a long way. But now we need your help. Your support will allow us to initiate tooling and manufacturing so we can make GROW! available to you. Other ways you can helpIf you're not ready for GROW! just yet you still can help the campaign by letting your your friends know. Or even better- just think of that one friend who you think might just LOVE GROW! and send them a link to this campaign. We'd really appreciate that.Thank you so much!  FAQIf you are a member of the media looking for a press release and images, click hereCan I claim multiple perks?Yes, if you'd like to claim multiple perks, please make a new contribution for each perk.Where do you ship to? We offer worldwide shipping.What happens if we don't reach our goal?You will be refunded in full soon after the campaign has ended.Can I get a refund after the campaign has ended?The money raised here on Indiegogo will go into purchasing of tools and manufacturing to deliver GROW! to your home. We have crowdfunded before and delivered on time, so no worries, this is a project you can back safely.Will GROW! vary from the design above? While we have the design and prototypes build, we may still make some minor improvements. We love hearing from our supporters and if you have any suggestions we will be more than happy to consider it. How can I choose my colours?Everyone will have the option to select what colour combination they would like. This will be done in the form of a survey after the campaign has ended. What material is GROW! from and how can I recycle it?Cradle to cradle - GROW! is entirely made from a single raw material (polypropylene). No glue, no metal, no unhealthy materials.  This means that at the end of its useful life you can simply place it in the recycle bin.Please be responsible and recycle it properly. By properly sorting and recycling your plastics, you are helping to save approximately 88% of the energy required to produce plastic from the raw materials of oil and gas.  
Our commitment to sustainabilityGROW! will be manufactured according to strict ecological and socially-responsible production methods. 100% manufactured in Germany.Aim for a healthier homeMost of the furniture you buy these days is designed to fall apart. Depending on its quality, some furniture does stick around for a while, but a large amount of it is built cheaply to be landfilled after just a couple of years of use.The most toxic thing in your house is …probably your furniture. Furniture is usually made from pressed wood like plywood, MDF, particleboard, or fibreboard. What you probably don't know, is that pressed wood contains high levels of formaldehyde; a highly toxic substance which evaporates over years and causes cancer.  For more info visit The National Cancer Institute and the United States Environmental Protection Agency EPA.The bad news end here and the good news start with GROW!  Deutsche Version
GROW! ... 
Das flexibelste Möbelsystem, das es je gab!  Ein Modul, eine Million MöglichkeitenMit nur einem Element kannst Du unzählige Konfigurationen erstellen und Dich genauso einrichten wie Du es willst. In wenigen Sekunden kannst Du Deine Konfiguration ändern oder umstellen und somit Deinen Bedürfnissen anpassen. Du kannst sämtliche Farben und Elemente des GROW! miteinander kombinieren. Damit bekommst du Deinen wirklich individuellen und besonderen Look. Mit GROW! kannst Du komplette Räume erschaffen und Du kannst Sie auch jederzeit wieder ändern. Das GROW! TeamWenn Leidenschaft auf Kompetenz trifftJeder der an GROW! beteiligt ist, ist auf seinem Gebiet ein Experte, der mit Leidenschaft mitwirkt GROW! zum hochwertigen Design- und Qualitätsprodukt zu machen. Deshalb haben wir zu unserem bestehenden Team nur die Besten in Design, Entwicklung, Werkzeugherstellung, Maschinenbau und Produktion hinzugezogen. Wir möchten Euch ein Produkt liefern, dass euch tagtäglich Freude bringt.Wir haben bereits ein Crowdfunding Projekt in der Vergangenheit erfolgreich durchgeführt und unsere Unterstützer rechtzeitig beliefert. Ihr könnt euch sicher sein: wir wissen genau worauf es ankommt um ein gutes Produkt herzustellen und zu liefern. Entfessele den Designer in Dir…GROW! ist verspielt und schlicht in der Formensprache. Es ermöglicht endlose Gestaltungsmöglichkeiten und passt zum modernen oder klassischen Wohnstil.  ...zu HauseAls Wandregal (13 GROW! Module wurden im Bild oben benutzt)Bild oben: Freistehendes Bücherregal, Sitzbank und Nachttisch.Bild oben: Freistehender Raumtrenner um einen Schlafbereich abzugrenzen und somit mehr Privatsphäre zu schaffen.GROW! ist wasserbeständig, pflegeleicht und resistent gegen Chemikalien und Bakterien. Einfach mit einem feuchten Lappen abwischen. Perfekt für Dein Badezimmer!Die organische Form macht GROW! zu einem echten Eye-Catcher.Weiße GROW! Module mit schwarzen Verbindern und weißen Deckeln (lid/back rip piece)
...im BüroGestalte Raumtrenner und Stellwände, die Du in wenigen Augenblicken ändern und verschieben kannst.  Bild oben: 50 x GROW! schwarz und 50 x GROW! weiß. Egal ob Aufbewahrung, Bücherregal oder Sitzgelegenheit. Mit GROW! lässt sich alles kinderleicht und ohne Werkzeuge ändern. Schnell und einfach.
Belohnungen (Perks)Unsere Unterstützer erhalten GROW! als Allererste und sparen bis zu 71%.Ihr könnt auch mehrere Belohnungen (Perks) bestellen um eure gewünschte Anzahl an GROW! Modulen zu erreichen. Einfach eine Belohnung (Perk) auswählen und den Kauf abschliessen und dann die nächste Belohnung Perk aussuchen und bestellen usw.Unten findet Ihr einige Beispiele, die eure Kreativität unterstützen.Es gibt:
Hauptmodule (main modules):  4 - 10 - 16 - 20 - 36 - 100 oder 272 Stück
Deckel/ Rücken/ Sitzsrippe (lid/back/rib pieces):  4 - 10 or 20  Stück (benutze einen Deckel pro Hauptmodul , um einen Sitz oder eine Bank zu gestalten)
 Du möchtest lieber per PayPal oder Überweisung zahlen?Kein Problem. (Indiegogo akzeptiert nur Kreditkartenzahlungen). Überweise uns einfach den Betrag und wir zahlen es für Dich bei Indiegogo ein.PayPal:Schicke Deine Zahlung einfach an: shop@movisi.comFülle alle nötigen Felder aus:• Betrag (in Euro) der gewünschten Belohnung (inkl. der Versandkosten) • Titel der Belohung (Perk) die Du haben willst (z.B. 20 x GROW modules)• Deine VersandadresseSchon fertig! Wir werden Deine Belohnung für Dich reservieren.Hier geht es zu PayPal!Überweisung​:IBAN DE22600603960040911004BIC: BIC GENODES1UTVSchreib uns eine Email: sende einem Screenshot Deiner getätigten Transaktion an grow@movisi.de Wir werden Deine Belohnung („Perk“) für Dich reservieren. Perk BeispieleHier findest Du einige Beispiele was Du mit GROW! alles machen kannst.Scrolle runter um die Maße von GROW! zu erfahren oder klicke hier. Bereite Dich auf jede Menge Kreativität vor!Mit den Verbindern kannst Du Dein GROW! jederzeit neu ausrichten, verändern, vergrößern oder verkleinern. Heute brauchst Du ein Regal, morgen eine Bank oder einen Raumtrenner.Du kannst jederzeit weitere GROW! Module dazu bestellen.Raumtrenner bestehend aus 16 -32 48 Modulen Wie funktioniert es?GROW! besteht aus nur 3 Komponenten:
das Hauptmodul (modules)
die Verbinder (connectors)
Deckel/ Rücken/ Verstärkungsrippe (lid/back/rib pieces)
Im Video erklären wir wie es geht: GROW! wächst! Wenn Du lediglich ein GROW! Modul benutzt (einfache Tiefe), kannst Du Bücher, CDs DVDs oder Gegenstände darin aufbewahren. Willst du große Bücher oder Schallplatten in Dein Regal stellen, füge 2 GROW! hintereinander zusammen (doppelte Tiefe), indem Du die mitgelieferten Verbinder (connectors) benutzt. Du kannst so Dein GROW! endlos wachsen lassen, in alle Richtungen. Wirklich 3-dimensionalDu kannst GROW! Elemente in alle Richtungen zufügen. So kreierst Du Dein einzigartiges Design, dass zu Dir passt.Robuster Hocker: dazu brauchst Du 4 x GROW! Hauptmodule (main modules) und 4 x Deckel (lid/back/rib pieces)
Flexibel und vielseitigWir glauben an Vielseitigkeit. Das bedeutet für Dich, dass Du Dein GROW! jederzeit verändern kannst, egal wohin Dich Dein Leben auch hin verschlägt. GROW! kannst Du jederzeit neu gestalten. So bleibst Du flexibel. GROW! passt sich auch Deinen wechselnden Bedürfnissen an. Hier sind ein paar Beispiele wo Du GROW! nutzen kannst:
als freistehendes Regal oder Aufbewahrung
als Hängeregal oder Auslage
als freistehender Raumtrenner/ flexible Wände
als Raum in Raum Installation/ Besprechungszonen, Chill out Zonen
als Hocker, Sitz, Bank
als Bar, Ladentisch, Theke, Tresen, Nachttisch, Couchtisch
Deine eigene Idee für GROW!?
Du kannst auch ganze Wohnlandschaften mit GROW! kreieren.Bild oben: Konfiguration besteht aus 272 x Hauptmodulen (main modules) und 66 x Deckeln (lid/back/rib pieces). Schwarz-weisser Raumtrenner und ein Nachttischchen.Bild oben: Konfiguration besteht aus 36 x Hauptmodule (main modules) ("Perk 36"). GROW! eignet sich auch für den Objektmöbelbereich:
Büros, häufige Arbeitsplatz-Neugestaltungen und Co-Working Spaces
Ladengeschäfte

Messestände 
GROW! für Ladengeschäfte und Pop-Up Läden: als Display, stylishes Wandregal, freistehendes Regal, Sitzbank und sogar als niedriger Tisch in beliebiger Länge für die Auslage. Beispiel für einen besonderen Messeauftritt:

Display für auszustellende Waren und Güter

Sitzgelegenheit für Deine Besucher

Bar, Thresen oder Stehtisch (die Höhe bestimmst Du)
  Einfacher AufbauEs könnte wirklich nicht einfacher sein. Die Verbinder („connectors“) werden einfach in die in die Hauptmodule gesteckt. Mit einfachen U-Clips werden die Regale in der Höhe gesichert.Es wird kein Werkzeug oder Fachwissen benötigt.  Hänge es an die WandSchwebende Regale: die Wandbefestigung bleiben unsichtbar und das Regal scheint zu schweben.Du kannst die Module (einfache Tiefe)* an die Wand hängen. Dafür liefern wir Dir Befestigungssets mit. Wenn Du GROW! an die Wand befestigst, musst Du die mitgelieferten Schrauben in die GROW! Module hineindrehen. Keine Sorge, Du benötigst sehr wenig Kraft dafür. Jedes Kind kann das mit Leichtigkeit!* (doppelte Tiefe oder mehr) können nicht an die Wand befestigt werden und sind nur freistehend anwendbar.  Die organisch, gewölbte Form von GROW! erlaubt Dir auch Kabel an der Rückwand problemlos nachträglich zu führen oder zu wechseln (Bild unten).              
 
GROW! besteht aus 3 Komponenten:  Maße      FarbenGROW! gibt es in Schwarz und Weiß. Du kannst die Farben der Komponenten mischen (wenn Du willst).  OberflächeGROW! hat eine fein gezeichnete, texturierte Oberfläche.  PflegeleichtGROW! ist ist wasserabweisend, resistent gegen Chemikalien und einfach zu reinigen. Falls Du je etwas verschüttest – keine Sorge! - einfach mit einem feuchten Lappen abwischen.   Unglaublich leicht – 95% LuftBetrete zusammen mit uns die Welt der Leichtigkeit – GROW! ist aus Movisi’s eigenem Hochleistungskunststoff ARPRO EPP gefertigt. Lasst es uns so erklären: das sind 95% Luft und 5% Tupperware (PP). Das Material ist stark und robust, gleichzeitig aber sehr leicht. Deshalb kannst Du Dein GROW! jederzeit mit Leichtigkeit neu arrangieren. Jedes Hauptmodul wiegt nur etwa 300g.​  Stabil & sicherDu kannst GROW! nur schwer beschädigen. Es hat nämlich stoßdämpfende Eigenschaften. Du brauchst Dir auch keine Sorgen zu machen wegen Verletzungen oder dass Du Deinen Boden beschädigen könntest. Es ist so auch absolut sicher für Kinder.  100% nachhaltigFür uns ist das nicht nur ein Wort. GROW! ist zu 100% recyclebar. Dazu kommt noch, das es auf 95% Luft besteht und tatsächlich nur 5% Material!GROW! ist schadstofffrei, emissionsfrei, hypoallergen (Allergiker freundlich), stoßfest (hervorragende Energieabsorption), extrem leichtgewichtig und daher sehr einfach zu handhaben. Es ist sogar lebensmitteltauglich.100% Made in Germany.Mehr Information findest Du unten bei den FAQ.  LanglebigFür Möbel lassen wir keinen Bäume fällen. Alle GROW! Komponenten können individuell ersetzt werden. Du musst nie wieder ein ganzes Möbelstück wegwerfen. Das ist nicht nur gut für unsere Umwelt, sondern auch für Deinen Geldbeutel.
Produktionsplan
Juli-September: Konstruktion und Bestellung der Produktionswerkzeuge
Oktober/ November: erste Teile werden hergestellt. Optimierung der Produktionswerkzeuge und letzte Kontrollen
Dezember: Produktion aller GROW! Teile
Januar/ Februar 2018: Versand der GROW! Bestellungen
 Wo stehen wir in der Entwicklung?Zum jetzigen Zeitpunkt haben wir CNC gefräste voll funktionsfähige Prototypen. Wir haben sämtliche Produktionspartner ausgewählt und sind bereit zu starten. Warum Indiegogo?Die letzten 2 Jahre haben wir intensiv an GROW! gearbeitet und sind weit gekommen. Jetzt aber benötigen wir Eure Hilfe. Eure Unterstützung hilft uns die Werkzeuge und die erste Produktion möglich zu machen um GROW! zu Euch nach Hause zu bringen. Wie kannst Du sonst noch helfen?Teile dieses Projekt mit Deinen Freunden auch wenn Du gerade GROW! nicht brauchst. Vielleicht fällt Dir der ein Freund ein, den GROW! mitten ins Herz treffen könnte. Dann schicke ihm einfach den Link zu dieser Kampagne.Vielen Dank!FAQFalls Du zur Presse gehörst und nach Pressematerial und Bildern suchst, findest Du Alles hier.Kann ich mehrere Belohnungen (Perks) bestellen?Ja, wenn Du mehrere Belohnungen (Perks) haben willst, mußt Du für jede einzelne das Bestellformular ausfüllen.In welche Länder versendet ihr?Wir versenden weltweit.Was passiert wenn ihr euer Ziel nicht erreicht?Dann erhältst Du Deine Vorauszahlung komplett zurück.Kann ich nach dem Ende der Kampagne mein Geld zurück bekommen?Das Geld das über Indiegogo kommt wird komplett in die Herstellung von GROW! und die Werkzeuge gesteckt. Wir haben schon zuvor eine solche Kampagne durchgeführt und rechtzeitig ausgeliefert. Du kannst dich also sicher darauf verlassen, dass Du Deine Bestellung bekommst.Wird GROW! genauso aussehen wie auf den Bildern?Wir haben das Design und die Prototypen fertig. Es kann aber zu geringfügigen Verbesserungen kommen. Wir möchten gerne von unseren Unterstützern wissen was sie noch für machbare Wünsche haben. Wie wähle ich meine Farbe(n) aus?​Wir werden Dich am Ende der Kampagne kontaktieren. Dann kannst Du uns Deine Farbkombinationen mitteilen.Aus was für einem Material ist GROW! und wie kann ich es recyceln?Von der Wiege zur Wiege (Cradle to Cradle) – GROW! ist aus nur einem einzigen Material gefertigt (Polypropylen). Es gibt keine Klebstoffe, kein Metall, keine ungesunden Materialien in GROW!. Das bedeutet für Dich das GROW! am Ende seines Lebenszyklus einfach in die Recyclinganlage kommt.Bitte recycel  GROW! ordnungsgemäß. So hilfst ungefähr 88% an Energie zu sparen, die ansonsten notwendig wäre Polypropylen neu herzustellen.  Unser Beitrag zur NachhaltigkeitGROW! wird komplett in Deutschland hergestellt, nach strengsten Umweltstandards und selbstverständlich angemessenen Löhnen für alle die an der Produktion von GROW! beteiligt sind. GROW! wird zu 100% in Deutschland hergestellt.Wir streben nach einem gesünderen zu HauseDie meisten Möbel, die Du heutzutage kaufen kannst werden produziert um wieder auseinander zu fallen. Je nach Qualität, halten auch manche Möbel ein bisschen länger durch. Der größte Teil davon ist aber billig produziert und verschmutzt nach kurzem Gebrauch unsere Umwelt.Das giftigste in Deinem Haus…ist möglicherweise eines Deiner Möbel. Diese sind normalerweise aus gepresstem Sperrholz, MDF, beschichtetes Sperrholz oder Faserplatte gefertigt. Was Du vielleicht bisher nicht wusstest ist, dass dieses Material Formaldehyd enthält. Die Substanz ist hoch toxisch und dünstet über Jahre hinweg in Deinem zu Hause aus. Formaldehyd steht im Verdacht bei Menschen Krebserregend zu sein (bei Ratten wurde dies übrigens unzweifelhaft nachgewiesen).Mehr Informationen findest Du unter:http://www.schadstoffberatung.de/formalde.htmhttps://de.wikipedia.org/wiki/FormaldehydThe National Cancer Institute und der US Umweltschutzbehörde EPA.Die schlechten Nachrichten enden hier und die GUTEN beginnen mit GROW!

story:
Why We're Here

When our son was born, we decided to take steps to lead healthier, cleaner, and greener lives, without it changing who we are at heart, the homeys next door. It was all about putting more thought into what we put in, on, and around our bodies, and in our home. The first step was eliminating the harmful chemicals and toxins found in everyday products that are slowly damaging our bodies. Instead, we sought brands and companies with values like ours. We continue to discover new products all the time, but we have gotten lucky and found a few products that we will continue to buy for the rest of our lives. We want to introduce our customers, to products that could work out the same for them.

We truly believe that how we treat our bodies and others is one of the most important factors we can control in our lives and we want our homeys to be around for as long as possible. 

Launching The Homey Hippies and owning a family business is our dream, and to be doing something we are both passionate about, while having the opportunity to help others is only going to make this ride even better. Your support means the world to us and will help us achieve something we’ve wanted, talked about, and daydreamed about for so long.



 

A solid foundation is the start of anything good

We are aiming to raise $15,000 to act as the foundation for our company and help us get our first 3 boxes into your hands.


A few key highlights of our budget:
  • The Homey Hippies Soy Candle Line | we love candles, but we hate the soot, overpowering fragrances, and general toxins found in a typical store candle. The Homey Hippies subscription boxes will feature a new American made, 100% soy scented candle each month. Meaning you can fully enjoy your quality candle knowing another will come in your next box. Our candles will be free of phthalates, paraffin, and metal cored wicks. With the Homey Hippies, you can rest assured that your candles will burn cleaner and fill your home with an amazing scent.
     
  • Custom eco-friendly boxes | you can’t have a subscription box without the box! On the first month’s box, our custom designed box will feature all of the names of the backers of our campaign. Our boxes will be made of 95% post-consumer waste and 5% post-industrial waste. Save the trees y'all.
     
  • Indie GoGo Fee | we are so happy to have access to a  platform like IndieGoGo. Our dreams are on the verge of coming true because we can spread our message to our homeys around the globe so quickly. There is a fee to use the service, but if we can meet our goal, we've already calculated that fee into our budget.
     
  • The Homey Hippies Branded Merchandise | one of the coolest things about The Homey Hippies brand is that it is more than just a brand. It's a message that we want to spread to the next generation and beyond. It's cool to care about our impact on this planet and life. Our branded merchandise will allow our friends, family, and homeys to spread this message and will feature exclusive designs by John, Tai, and other collaborators.


Perks

For your contribution to getting this dream off the ground in the right way, we want to offer you some great perks to say you rock and thank you all in one badass package.





 








 

Pay It Foward

Living in LA we see both sides of the fence. The rich and famous waltz in the same neighborhoods as those down on their luck. When we come across a fellow man or woman in tough spot, we help when we can. The Homey Hippies wants to continue spreading the love with your help. 10% of the profits from every monthly box will go to a Los Angeles-based organization that helps build up our communities and the people we call neighbors.

 

Empowering Small Business & Green Companies

When we support companies and small business owners that value similar ideals, we can rest assured knowing that these values are shared in other corners of the globe and even in our own backyards. We are all tiny pieces of the puzzle, but together we can make a huge impact.

As a small business ourselves, it is important that we not only introduce our subscribers to natural products free from harmful chemicals, but equally important that we highlight small businesses, artisans, and green companies that passionately create products that do our bodies and minds good.

*We currently have several amazing brands partnering with The Homey Hippies. Stay tuned to our updates to find out more!

 

Other Ways You Can Help

If you love our campaign, products, and message, but can’t back us financially, there are still ways to support your homeys!

  • SHARE this campaign on your social media accounts, with your co-workers, tell your cousins, aunties, uncles, and of course, tell ya homeys.

    Check out our website www.thehomeyhippies.com
     
  • If you have any suggestions for amazing all-natural home goods companies or handmade products for mind + body, hit us up, we want to learn more.
     
  • Thank you all so much in advance. Whatever you can do to support and encourage us is an amazing gift.

story:
I don't want to be a bad husband

I can be sometimes without meaning to.  I am Dad with a wife married over 10 years, 3 kids (2 that are twins) and a dog that is only 10 months old.  Like everyone, my wife and I struggle with chores to maintain the household.  I admit I can be forgetful, absent-minded, and easily distracted.  So when I don't do the dishes or take out the trash it's not because I don't want to do it, I got distracted with work, the dog, kids, etc....

My wife, the MOM does not want to have to remind me nor do I want her to remind me or the kids. It tires her out because she feels that she has the weight of the household on her and it occupies a huge amount of space of her brain.

Mom is the BOSS of the household.  She needs help, more importantly, something that will be easy to set up and will help her run the house.

The campaign is to develop an app to help Dads, Moms, and Families.  This App is called Mom Boss.  Mom Boss will automatically configure the chores for the household after answering a few questions. 

There will be two sides to the App, Mom and everyone else. 

Mom Side:

Mom is the BOSS.  Once she answers the questions she can then she can swipe left (the chore is hers) or swipe right (the chore is someone else's).  She can adjust times for reminders or snooze if the chore is not required that day.

The rest of the Family

The rest of the family will receive the schedule from the Mom side.  They cannot swipe left or right to change the chore schedule.   The once the task is due but not yet completed there will be vocal reminders.  Changing accordingly, the first will be a sweet voice requesting that the chore be done.  Next, it will be a more insistent voice to remind them that it has been more than 15 minutes since it was first asked. After a half-hour, a vocal "kick in the pants" where a very LOUD and very ANGRY sounding voice will remind the family member to do the chore.  The voice will be adjusted if it is kids with a tablet or phone, the last voice will be a cartoon character crying or saying "oh no, we're not done yet!".  If your kids don't have a tablet or smartphone but if you have a smart home, it will turn off Netflix until the chore is done.

Once a chore is done the rest of the family will hit the acknowledge button, but the MOM has to verify if it was done correctly before the reminders are reset.

The focus of this app is to make sure that the rest of the Family can help MOM and give us a kick in the pants when we need it.

Budget

My estimate is that we need $20,000 to get this app developed and in both the Apple App Store and Google Play.  We need a cross-functional platform because sometimes we have multi-system households. 

The estimate for the base App cost is $10,000 for Android and $5,000 for the iOS side. Estimate $5,000 to get the professional voice work to load into the app.

The first version of the app will be in English.  If we get more funding, we plan to expand it to French, Spanish, and Mandarin.  We are open to new languages if there is enough interest.

Mom's work so hard for their families, they are responsible for so much that we can't thank them enough but we can make their lives easier.  This app at its core helps Mom the Boss run the household so that Mom can spend her time do things for herself.

I have been a program/project manager for over 10 years, the same length of me being married.  I have been known to find creative solutions from projects that range from $10,000 to $4 million dollars.  We will make sure this app will launch on time and on budget.   We have reviewed the concept and what we need to make this app successful.  We already have had developers review the concept and reviewed their previous projects to ensure that they are up to the task.  We have been in contact with voice-actors to give our App the extra voices it needs to make it effective.

Other Ways You Can Help

Let the mommy and daddy groups know about this app, and if they want to see anymore features of this app!

My wife, the MOM does not want to have to remind me nor do I want her to remind me or the kids. It tires her out because she feels that she has the weight of the household on her and it occupies a huge amount of space of her brain.
Mom is the BOSS of the household.  She needs help, more importantly, something that will be easy to set up and will help her run the house.
The campaign is to develop an app to help Dads, Moms, and Families.  This App is called Mom Boss.  Mom Boss will automatically configure the chores for the household after answering a few questions. 
There will be two sides to the App, Mom and everyone else. 
Mom Side:
Mom is the BOSS.  Once she answers the questions she can then she can swipe left (the chore is hers) or swipe right (the chore is someone else's).  She can adjust times for reminders or snooze if the chore is not required that day.
The rest of the Family
The rest of the family will receive the schedule from the Mom side.  They cannot swipe left or right to change the chore schedule.   The once the task is due but not yet completed there will be vocal reminders.  Changing accordingly, the first will be a sweet voice requesting that the chore be done.  Next, it will be a more insistent voice to remind them that it has been more than 15 minutes since it was first asked. After a half-hour, a vocal "kick in the pants" where a very LOUD and very ANGRY sounding voice will remind the family member to do the chore.  The voice will be adjusted if it is kids with a tablet or phone, the last voice will be a cartoon character crying or saying "oh no, we're not done yet!".  If your kids don't have a tablet or smartphone but if you have a smart home, it will turn off Netflix until the chore is done.
Once a chore is done the rest of the family will hit the acknowledge button, but the MOM has to verify if it was done correctly before the reminders are reset.
The focus of this app is to make sure that the rest of the Family can help MOM and give us a kick in the pants when we need it.
Budget
My estimate is that we need $20,000 to get this app developed and in both the Apple App Store and Google Play.  We need a cross-functional platform because sometimes we have multi-system households. 
The estimate for the base App cost is $10,000 for Android and $5,000 for the iOS side. Estimate $5,000 to get the professional voice work to load into the app.
The first version of the app will be in English.  If we get more funding, we plan to expand it to French, Spanish, and Mandarin.  We are open to new languages if there is enough interest.
Mom's work so hard for their families, they are responsible for so much that we can't thank them enough but we can make their lives easier.  This app at its core helps Mom the Boss run the household so that Mom can spend her time do things for herself.
I have been a program/project manager for over 10 years, the same length of me being married.  I have been known to find creative solutions from projects that range from $10,000 to $4 million dollars.  We will make sure this app will launch on time and on budget.   We have reviewed the concept and what we need to make this app successful.  We already have had developers review the concept and reviewed their previous projects to ensure that they are up to the task.  We have been in contact with voice-actors to give our App the extra voices it needs to make it effective.

Other Ways You Can Help
Let the mommy and daddy groups know about this app, and if they want to see anymore features of this app!

story:
The Product

How would you like an in-wall 10" touchscreen for controlling your home automation system, cctv system, lights, watching TV, Alexa and an Echo Show? If you do then please read on. 

The Background

The Home Automation scene is constantly changing and in-wall touchscreens have been around for a decade or more, but most if not all are proprietary. My first in wall screen was on a Galaxy system, then HAI, then control4, and with each system the old screens were obsolete, new screens needed to be installed, lots of extra cost, different wiring, different holes and so on. Today pretty much every home automation system has an Android or iOS app so forget about buying proprietary and install something that will outlast your current setup and look first class. 

The Choice

After testing and trialing a number of popular tablets, we settled on the Amazon FireHD10. The reasoning behind this decision was it's cheap, very reliable, has a bright and responsive touchscreen, is a good size and you can install the Google Play store. The other advantage, for anyone interested in Amazon's Alexa is that the FIreHD10 supports Alexa and can even be set to show mode and behave like an Echo Show. 

Since our first prototype more than a year ago, we’ve worked through many prototypes, evaluated performance, taken feedback from the team and several closed beta tests and I'm confident that we've got it as close to perfection as we can. 

The Design

When we started this project the design was rough and functional consisting of 4 parts screwed together to clamp the tablet. We slowly refined this down to three and then two parts which now hold the tablet in place with sprung clips and the face is held on with magnets instead of screws for easy access. With some clever structural design we greatly reduced the thickness of the bezel and depth of the holder whilst maintaining rigidity. 

The Company

Dark Star Laboritories has been developing and prototyping hardware and software since its inception five years ago, but in the past we've always worked for third parties developing their ideas into products. This was our idea and we're excited to be launching this product in our own name for the first time. 

The First Production Run

While we can micro manufacture these in small volumes in-house, we hope that this will be a product with a wider market from likeminded home automation enthusiasts as well as installers and fitters. Injection moulding will provide accuracy and a near perfect high gloss finish that we need whilst reducing the unit price significantly, but there are high setup costs that only make sense with production run quantities. In order to cover these costs and produce a reasonable batch we are here with our first ever crowd funding campaign. In order to achieve the quality and quick turnaround everyone is looking for we will be sourcing tooling and assembly locally here in the UK.

The Timeline

The Investment

For anyone willing to invest in this project, you will receive greatly discounted units from the first production run, express shipped worldwide, and we aim to break even on the first batch. 

The Future

Our design approach has perfected a system of parts that can be quickly and easily fitted, retains and cools the tablet and looks great. Supporting other tablets is simply a case of changing the retaining clips and bezel and we intend to support Amazon's full range of 7" and 8" tablets as well as a selection from Apple and Samsung, We also intend to micro-manufacture a selection of custom bezels in exotic materials such as marble, carbon fibre, metallics and so on.

story:
Fenix Pan: The World's Lightest Cast Iron Frying Pan
 

After close to 3 years of research and development, we are excited to launch the Fenix Pan, the world's lightest cast iron frying pan. The Fenix Pan is a revolutionary cast iron pan developed by master metal craftspeople in Japan, a country famous for metal processing.

This 10 inch cast iron pan weighs just over 2 pounds, is very easy to handle and very durable. In fact, because of the incredible thinness of the Fenix Pan (1.5 mm), it can heat up to 100 degrees Celsius (212 degrees Fahrenheit) in about half the time of other cast iron pans. And yet, the Fenix Pan retains heat just as well as heavier cast iron pans weighing three times more.
 

   

Lightweight Cast Iron

The secret to our lightweight pan is a combination of a specialized type of cast iron material, and a proprietary casting process that results in a durable frying pan that is as thin as a penny (1.5 mm) and weighs just over 2 pounds (1 kg)

 

 

Superior Heat Transfer

The key to cooking delicious dishes is the speed and consistency of heat conduction. The Fenix Pan not only provides excellent heat retention and consistency across the bottom of the pan, but also on the sides as well. This helps ensure ingredients cook evenly. And because the Fenix Pan is made of cast iron, you can enjoy full-flavored dishes, made on your stove top or in your oven.

 

Unique Cooking Surface

The ultra fine texture of the Fenix Pan's cooking surface, reduces the number of contact points with food ingredients, which lowers the chance of scorching and sticking. Plus, this cooking surface allows fat from meats and moisture from vegetables to fill these tiny crevices, which imparts a special finish to your dishes.

 

Compact Design

With an ergonomic handle, the Fenix Pan is perfectly suited for stovetop and oven use. While it is compact, this pan is much deeper than a typical frying pan, so it can hold a large volume of ingredients.  Plus, the flared upper edge allows for easy transferring of food to your plate.

How It's Made

Manufacturing of the Fenix Pan begins with a proprietary precision sand cast mold that allows molten iron to be cast at a thickness of only 1.5 mm on the side walls and just 2 mm thick on the bottom. This proprietary process has taken us close to 3 years of development to perfect. 

After casting, each Fenix Pan is thoroughly hand checked for quality and consistency, to ensure you receive the highest quality product that lives up to the Made in Japan name.

A precision sand cast mold is created to make the Fenix Pan casting
 

Fenix Pan cast molds are stacked together in preparation for pouring molten iron
 

Special molten iron heated to 1200℃ is prepared to create Fenix Pans
 

Molten iron is poured into stack of Fenix Pan castings. Precision temperature control
allows us to create a 1.5 mm thick, ultra lightweight frying pan
 

After Fenix Pans have finished cooling, each pan is thoroughly hand checked, prepped and
cleaned to ensure the highest, most-consistent quality


How a 500 Year Old Iron Pot Discovered In Japan Led To Inventing The Fenix Pan


The town of Sanjo city (Japan) has a long history of craftsmanship.  Already in the Muromachi Period (1336 - 1537 AD),  some 500 years ago, Sanjo possessed casting technology so advanced that it could make extremely thin cast iron pots that would be hard to reproduce even today.

In 2002, several everyday items and a mold for a cast iron pot, were unearthed in the Shimocho Ruins located in Sanjo.

This discovery highlighted the existence of a group of craftsmen known as the Osaki Cast Iron Craftsmen, or Osaki Casters, who were active in Sanjo during the Muromachi Period.

The historic iron pot seen above, excavated from the Fujinoki Ruins, is thought to have been made by the Osaki Casters with the very mold discovered in the Shimocho Ruins in Sanjo.

Amazingly, this pot is only 3 mm thick! Even today, it would difficult to produce a pot as thin and fine as this iron pot made by a group of Sanjo craftsmen some 500 years ago.

Yet to surpass even this degree of thinness, was the goal for a new kind of cast iron frying pan, the Fenix Pan.

Why Lightweight Cast Iron Cookware Is Very Difficult To Make

In casting, a form is created by pouring hot, molten metal into the empty space of a mold. The molten metal starts to harden the instant it touches the mold. 

The challenge is that the more constricted the space within the mold, the more likely it is that the molten iron will harden and set, before the object is fully formed - resulting in very brittle iron that would easily crack.

It is for this reason, that cast iron objects are typically cast as thick, heavy objects to overcome this challenge. But thinness was our objective, because a lighter object is more practical and easier to use.

By targeting a thinness of only 1.5 mm, we would improve on the achievements of the Sanjo craftsmen some 500 years ago.

How We Solved These Challenges

Using key knowledge passed down over many generations,  we began development of the Fenix Pan. We started by using a special type of iron called ductile cast iron, which when cast, produces extremely strong, top-grade cast iron products.

The carbon in this iron alloy is specially manipulated into spherical nodules to prevent structural cracks. The final material is hard yet ductile, meaning that it can deform under tensile stress - perfect attributes for casting the Fenix Pan.

Development of Proprietary Sand Cast Mold

Drawing upon our extensive experience manufacturing industrial-grade cast iron products, we dedicated close to 3 years of research, development, prototyping and testing to finally create an innovative sand cast mold, capable of casting molten ductile iron as thin as 1.5 mm.
 

The result of this 3-year journey has led to creating the lightest cast iron pan in the world -  a pan we believe to be worthy of the achievements of the Osaki Casters from 500 years ago. 


 

Testing Reveals Fenix Pan Heats Up 50% Faster Than Regular Cast Iron

Because the Fenix Pan is amazingly thin and lightweight, it is able to heat up incredibly fast. In fact, it can heat up to 100℃ (212°F) in about half the time of regular cast iron cookware. 

Plus, the Fenix Pan retains heat just as well as heavier cast iron pans weighing double and even triple the weight.

 

Test 1: Temperature Rise to 100 Degrees Celsius  (Bottom)
 

 

 

 

Our first test measured how quickly the Fenix Pan can heat up to 100℃ (212°F) compared to other popular cast iron pans.

Each pan was heated on a gas stove and the main cooking surface temp. was measured. As the graph illustrates, the Fenix Pan is able to heat up 50% faster than other cast iron pans!

The reason behind this difference, is that the Fenix Pan is made of ultra lightweight cast iron construction, and therefore has less mass to heat up. This makes the Fenix Pan highly energy efficient and provides more precise pan temperature control.
 

Test 2: Temperature Rise to 100 Degrees Celsius (Sides)
 

 

 


The second test we conducted was to see how well the sides of the Fenix Pan heat up in the same time-frame as test #1.

You can clearly see once again, that the Fenix Pan is able to heat up roughly 50% faster than other cast iron cookware. 

This enables excellent heating consistency throughout the cooking surface of the Fenix Pan.

 

 

Test 3: Heat Retention Rate  (Bottom)

 

 

Our final test measured how well the Fenix Pan retains heat compared to heavier cast iron pans.

This test involved heating each piece of cookware to 100℃ (212°F), then turning off the heat source to measure the rate of heat loss over time.

A key benefit of cast iron is that, as a cookware material, it is able to absorb and retain heat for a considerable period of time. This ensures consistent heating and therefore even cooking of ingredients. Amazingly, even thought the 10 inch Fenix Pan weighs just over 2 lbs (compared to other pans weighing 4-5+ lbs), it is able to retain heat in a similar way. 

These tests demonstrate that the Fenix Pan not only heats up faster than regular cast iron cookware, but it also incorporates all of the best characteristics of traditional cast iron cooking: consistent heating, great heat retention, stove and oven dual use, etc. without the added weight.

 

About Us

Our manufacturing team consists of some of the best precision metal craftspeople in all of Japan. We are proud of the dedication and hard work demonstrated by each of our team members.  It is through a shared vision and commitment, that the Fenix Pan is now finally a reality.

Thank you for supporting our Indiegogo campaign!

 

Frequently Asked Questions


Is the Fenix Pan non-stick?

The Fenix Pan is finished with a safe, food grade eco-friendly coating, to prevent rusting. While this coating is not inherently non-stick, the ultra fine texture of the pan makes it behave like a non-stick or seasoned pan.

Is there a lid available for the Fenix Pan?

We are currently testing a glass top lid to use with the Fenix Pan. Once we are happy with its long term performance, we will let our backers know how to order one.

What cooking surfaces work with the Fenix Pan?

The Fenix Pan is designed to work with all cooktops: electric, gas, induction, glass top, open flame, ovens, barbeques, etc. The Fenix Pan also comes with a removable silicon handle end cap which is heat resistant up to 250℃ (482°F).

Where will my Fenix Pan be shipped from?

Since our manufacturing facility is located in Japan, all orders will be shipped from our central shipping hub in Japan using Fedex.

When can I expect delivery of my Fenix Pan?

This will depend on which perk reward you selected. Every perk has a corresponding estimated delivery date.

 

Risks & Challenges

Manufacturing the Fenix Pan, requires precise specifications and robust system processes. We have dedicated close to 3 years of research, development and testing in preparation for full scale production.

As we begin ramping up towards full scale production, we will be ensuring that the Fenix Pan maintains the highest standards in terms of fit, finish and overall quality associated with a Made in Japan product,

Timing is a potential risk with all manufacturing projects and something we take very seriously. That is one reason why we have waited until now to introduce the Fenix Pan to you.  With our full scale production systems now in place, we are confident in our ability to meet our conservative delivery estimates, and we promise complete transparency on any unforeseen issues.
